Around 29 August 2022 (as reported), in Bolivar municipality (Cauca), a farmer was shot and killed and his body was found. The motives and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 29 August 2022 (as reported), in El Bagre (Antioquia), three unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle (drive-by shooting) shot and killed a man at a commercial establishment. The motives and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 29 August 2022 (as reported), in El Estrecho (Cauca), a truck driver was shot and killed by unknown perpetrators on the Cali - Pasto highway. There is no information about the motive of the attack or the perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 29 August 2022 (as reported), around El Palo corregimiento (Cauca), a man was shot and killed and his body was found on the road that leads to Toribio municipality. Around 29 August 2022 (as reported), in the rural area of Popayan municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals arrived at a commercial establishment in La Rejoya sector and abducted the owner. The whereabouts of the victim are unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups.

notes: On 28 August 2022, in the rural area of Caldono municipality (Cauca), three indigenous men, members of the same family and also relatives of an indigenous social leader, were shot dead by ELN members. One of the victims was killed in the morning, and then the perpetrators killed the other two during the afternoon at their private residence. The motives of the attack are unknown. 3 fatalities.

source: AFP; El Espectador; AP; El Heraldo (Colombia)
notes: On 28 August 2022, in Fundacion municipality (Magdalena), unidentified armed men on a motorcycle (drive-by shooting) opened fire on a car with two journalists in it, killing both. The victims were returning to the municipal seat after covering a carnival in Santa Rosa de Lima corregimiento. Social organizations have claimed that the attack is related to the profession of the victims and that one of them had received threats in the past, even hours before, at the carnival. The other victim, who was a woman, also worked as press officer for the municipal government. Another man was injured in the attack, but it is unknown if he was also a journalist. 2 fatalities.

source: El Espectador; INDEPAZ; El Heraldo (Colombia); UNOCHA
notes: On 28 August 2022, in Santa Rita (Magdalena), a social leader was shot and killed by two unidentified armed individuals who arrived at his private residence. The victim was involved in infrastructure and health projects and had recently denounced corruption in the corregimiento. According to the source, there is presence of the Gulf Clan and other criminal organizations in the area. 1 fatality.

On 28 August 2022, in Astilleros La Ye (Norte de Santander), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in La Virgen sector. According to the source, the perpetrators are ELN members. There are no details about the motive of the attack. 1 fatality.
On 28 August 2022, in Agua Clara (Norte de Santander), ELN members shot and killed a homeless man near the police station. There are no details about the motives of the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 28 August 2022 (as reported), in San Roque (Antioquia), two men were shot and killed by unidentified perpetrators in the Calle Caldas sector. The motives of the attack are unknown but authorities said the Gulf Clan could be behind the attack. 2 fatalities.

source: INDEPAZ; AFP; UNOCHA; La Opinion (Colombia); El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: On 27 August 2022, in Cucuta - Southwest (Norte de Santander), around five unidentified armed individuals opened fire at an informal vendor in the Pueblo Nuevo neighborhood, killing him. Other three men who were at the site, all musicians and one of them a teacher, were also shot by the perpetrators as they were trying to flee the scene. Despite being taken to the hospital by the police and the residents of the sector, all three men died. According to the source, there is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 4 fatalities.

On 27 August 2022, in the rural area of El Zulia municipality (Norte de Santander), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle (drive-by shooting) shot and killed a man at a commercial establishment in the Brisas de Astilleros vereda. Around 24 August 2022 (as reported), in the rural area of Segovia municipality (Antioquia), a Gulf Clan member abducted seven farmers from a farm in El Pescado vereda. The victims were rescued in a military operation (coded separately).

notes: Around 19 August 2022 (as reported), in the rural area of Segovia municipality (Antioquia), a farmer social leader, who was also the president of a Council of Communal Action (JAC), was shot and killed and his body was found in El Rio vereda and taken to the morgue. The woman was released by the armed group the same day his husband was found dead. 1 fatality.

On 19 August 2022, in Puerto Wilches (Santander), a social leader was shot and killed by armed individuals on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting in the Villa Pinzon neighborhood. The victim had received threats from the Gulf Clan in the past, which is why authorities believe the group is responsible for the attack. 1 fatality.

The area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

notes: On 6 August 2022, in the rural area of El Aguila municipality (Valle del Cauca), an environmental social leader was shot and killed by an unidentified armed individual in El Salado vereda. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown, however, there is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 6 August 2022, in San Jose del Playon (Bolivar), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown, however, according to the report, there is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 6 August 2022, in Puerto Santander (Norte de Santander), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle (drive-by shooting) shot and injured a man in the 16 de Julio neighborhood. The victim managed to escape and then was taken to a hospital. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown, however, according to the report, there is presence of the ELN and Gulf Clan in the area. There were no fatalities.

On 5 August 2022, in El Tetillo (Cauca), a sugar cane field was occupied by a group of armed and hooded indigenous people who claim ancestral land rights over the property. The armed suspects opened fire at the farmers working at the property and detonated an explosive device. There were no casualties.

On 5 August 2022, in Tibu (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals stopped an ambulance, forced the paramedics to get off and then shot and killed the patient that was inside in the Santander neighborhood. The victim, who was a Venezuelan man, had been previously shot and injured by the same perpetrators in his arms and leg and was being taken to a hospital in Cucuta (Norte de Santander). There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 5 August 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), eight unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man when he was working at his store in the San Gerardo sector. The perpetrators escaped to Venezuela. The victim had received extortion-related threats from several armed groups in the past and had been the victim of another attack in February 2022 (coded separately), in which he was injured. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: On 5 August 2022, in the rural are of Puerto Guzman municipality (Putumayo), a social leader, who was also a member of the Council of Communal Action (JAC) at the Brisas de Yurilla vereda, was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in La Ceiba vereda. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 5 August 2022, in the rural area of El Zulia municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Agualasal vereda. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown, however, there is presence of the ELN and Gulf Clan in the area. 1 fatality.

On 5 August 2022, in Aguachica municipality (Cesar), a man was abducted by unidentified armed individuals near El Tigre sector. The victim was released a week later. According to the report, there is presence of armed groups in the area.

On 4 August 2022, in the rural area of Arauca municipality (Arauca), members of an unidentified armed group abducted a cattle farmer from a farm in the Matepina vereda. It is suspected that the victim was taken to Venezuela and his whereabouts are unknown.

Around 3 August 2022 (as reported), in Segovia (Antioquia), a man was stabbed to death and his dismembered and decapitated body was found inside a plastic bag between El Hueso and Piedra del Diablo neighborhoods. A pamphlet signed by the Gulf Clan was found next to the body in which they threatened some residents of the area. A video of the victim was posted on social media before he was killed, in which the perpetrators threatened him and forced him to give information about other residents of the municipality. 1 fatality.

On 3 August 2022, in the rural area of Remedios municipality (Antioquia), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in La Cruz sector. A video of the victim was posted on social media before being killed, in which the perpetrators threatened him and drug dealers at the municipality. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 3 August 2022 (as reported), near La Esmeralda (Jujua) corregimiento (Arauca), a man was shot and killed and his body was found around the Puerto Triunfo sector. There is no information about the motive and perpetrators of the attack but there is presence of the ELN and FARC Dissident groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 2 August 2022, in Tamalameque (Cesar), a social leader was shot and killed by unidentified individuals inside his house in the Avenida Palmira neighborhood. The victim had received threats in the past. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 33rd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (33rd Front)
notes: Around 2 August 2022 (as reported), in the rural area of El Tarra municipality (Norte de Santander), members of the FARC Dissident group 33rd Front abducted a woman and her daughter for eight days because the victim was an informant for the military forces. Both victims were released on 10 August.

On 2 August 2022, in Cucuta - North (Norte de Santander), two armed men opened fire at a group of people gathered at a commercial establishment in Las Americas neighborhood, injuring three of them. The injured victims were taken to a hospital, where one of them died days later. Both perpetrators were arrested by the police. The motive of the attack is unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 2 August 2022 (as reported), in the rural area of Fortul municipality (Arauca), the municipal political campaign leader for the presidential candidate Rodolfo Hernandez (LIGA) was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle (drive-by shooting) in the Palo de Agua sector. The victim had also been a candidate for the municipal council for the Liberal party in the past. 1 fatality.

Around 2 August 2022 (as reported), in Puerto Lleras (Meta), a cattle farmer was shot in the back by unidentified armed individuals and injured. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

Around 2 August 2022 (as reported), in San Martin (Meta), unidentified armed individuals arrived at a motorcycle workshop in the Pedro Daza neighborhood and shot and injured a pregnant woman and a Venezuelan man. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

Around 1 August 2022 (as reported), in Narino department (coded to San Juan de Pasto),unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an Awa indigenous person in the Piguambi Palambala indigenous reserve. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 1 August 2022, in Villa Rica (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty police officer at a commercial establishment. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 1 August 2022, in the rural area of Puerto Rico municipality (Caqueta), a minor who had been forcibly recruited by a FARC Dissident group was shot and killed. The body of the victim was found near Los Cuervos river. The victim had texted his parents days earlier that he was going to attempt to escape that day. 1 fatality.

Around 1 August 2022 (as reported), in Caldono municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an Indigenous man and injured other two people when they were leaving a commercial establishment in Las Mercedes sector. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 1 August 2022, in Puerto Rico (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man at a sports center. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 1 August 2022 (as reported), in the rural area of Sucre municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man inside his property in El Retiro corregimiento. The son-in-law of the victim was also injured in the attack. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carolina Ramirez Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carolina Ramirez Front)
assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 31 July 2022, in Puerto Caicedo (Putumayo), a demobilized former FARC member was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals at a commercial establishment. Other two people were injured in the attack. Authorities said that the Carolina Ramirez FARC Dissident faction is behind the attack. The motive is unknown. 1 fatality.

source: El Espectador; El Tiempo (Colombia); UNOCHA; INDEPAZ
notes: On 31 July 2022, in the rural area of Mercaderes municipality (Cauca), three men who had been abducted by members of an unidentified armed group earlier that day were shot and killed and their bodies were found in La Chicheria sector. A man was injured and there is another person missing. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.

source: El Tiempo (Colombia); AFP; INDEPAZ; El Espectador
notes: On 31 July 2022, in Altaquer (Narino), unidentified armed individuals shot at a group of people gathered at a commercial establishment, killing four Awa indigenous men and injuring other two people. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of the ELN and FARC Dissident groups. 4 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Awa Indigenous Group (Colombia); Women (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: El Tiempo (Colombia); El Espectador; INDEPAZ; AFP
notes: On 31 July 2022, in the rural area of Llorente corregimiento (Narino), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an Awa indigenous woman who was also a social leader in the Vaquerio vereda. The victim was also six months pregnant. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

notes: On 31 July 2022, in the rural area of San Miguel municipality (coded to La Dorada, Putumayo), a demobilized former FARC member who was also a farmer social leader was killed by unidentified armed individuals in the San Carlos vereda. The body was taken to the La Hormiga (Putumayo) morgue. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

source: El Espectador; Xinhua; INDEPAZ; El Tiempo (Colombia); AFP; UNOCHA
notes: On 31 July 2022, in La Union (Valle del Cauca), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle (drive-by shooting) opened fire at a group of people who were at a party in La Ciudadela Grajales neighborhood. Five people were killed and between four and five were injured. The injured victims were taken to the hospital. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of the ELN and FARC Dissident groups. 5 fatalities.

On 31 July 2022, in Tibu (Norte de Santander), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals at a commercial establishment. The victim had received death threats from an armed group in the past for being a drug user. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

source: El Tiempo (Colombia); El Colombiano; El Espectador; UNOCHA
notes: On 31 July 2022, in the rural area of El Tres corregimiento (Antioquia), an off-duty military officer was shot and killed by several Gulf Clan members while he was on his way to a medical appointment in La Trampa vereda. 1 fatality.

On 31 July 2022, in the rural area of San Bernardo del Viento municipality (Cordoba), an off-duty military official was shot and killed by Gulf Clan members while he was attending his father's funeral in the Cano Grande sector. 1 fatality.

Around 31 July 2022 (as reported), in the rural area of Fredonia municipality (Antioquia), a man was shot and killed and his body was found in La Garrucha vereda. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 31 July 2022 (as reported), in Santo Domingo (Antioquia), a man was killed by unidentified perpetrators. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 31 July 2022 (as reported), in Segovia (Antioquia), a man was shot in the head and killed by unidentified armed individuals. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 31 July 2022, in Pedregal (Cauca), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man at a commercial establishment in La Floresta sector. The victim was shot 11 times. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 31 July 2022 (as reported), in Vistahermosa (Meta), a man was shot and killed and his body was found. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 30 July 2022, in La Jagua de Ibirico (Cesar), three people were shot and killed and their bodies were found in the Altos de La Mina urbanization. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.

On 30 July 2022, in Taraza (Antioquia), members of an unidentified armed group shot and killed a man in El Basurero sector. The victim had been missing for several days. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but there is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022) UNP: National Unit for Protection
notes: On 30 July 2022, in the rural area of Caloto municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and injured a demobilized former FARC member, who is also a bodyguard of the National Protection Unit (UNP) (assumed off-duty at the moment of the attack), in the Maranon vereda. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 29 July 2022 (as reported), in Fortul municipality (Arauca), two civilians that had been kidnapped by the ELN in Tame municipality on 13 July (coded separately) were killed and their bodies were found in the Palmarito sector. One of the victims was a former FARC member. According to the version of the ELN the victims were killed in a clash with security forces, however, the ombudsman's office and social organizations said they were killed by the armed group. 2 fatalities.

On 29 July 2022, in Arenal (Bolivar), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle (drive-by shooting) shot and killed a well-known livestock trader at a commercial establishment in the center of the town. Authorities said that the attack might be related to the victim's occupation. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 29 July 2022, in El Carmen de Bolivar (Bolivar), an off-duty military officer was shot and injured in the face by an unidentified armed individual in the Paramo neighborhood. The victim was taken to the hospital. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

source: El Espectador; El Tiempo (Colombia); El Pais (Colombia)
notes: On 28 July 2022, in Santiago de Cali (Valle del Cauca), a police officer opened fire against a vehicle in front of a police station killing a trans woman in the San Nicolas neighborhood. According to the police, the vehicle was parked in front of the station and the officer approached the vehicle to ask the passengers to step out of the vehicle but instead, they drove away trying to escape, then the officer fired his gun. The victim was taken to the hospital where she died. Some LGBT organizations said that it was a hate crime. 1 fatality.

On 27 July 2022, in El Vaiven (Atlantico), unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle (drive-by shooting) shot and killed a man. The victim was taken to the hospital but died before arriving. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but there is presence of the Gulf Clan in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 27 July 2022 (as reported), in Pasacaballos (Bolivar), a man was killed and his body was found with his hands tied and signs of torture in the face floating on the Dique Canal. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 27 July 2022, in the rural area of San Luis municipality (San Luis, Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle (drive-by shooting) shot and killed two men in LA Josefina vereda, near the Medellin - Bogota highway. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 27 July 2022, in Sonson (Antioquia), two men were shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in El Trigal and La Calzada neighborhoods. Two perpetrators were arrested. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 26 July 2022 (as reported), in Medellin (Antioquia), a man who was a member and leader of the LGBT community and human rights activist, was shot and killed and his body was found at La Luz sector in the 13th commune. The motive of the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 26 July 2022 (as reported), around La Fonda corregimiento (Cauca), two men were killed and their bodies were found with their eyes and mouth covered and with signs of torture near the Pan-American Highway. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 26 July 2022, in Santiago de Tolu (Sucre), a man was shot and killed by an unidentified armed individual with a traumatic weapon in the Brisas de Mar sector. The victim was taken to the hospital but died minutes after arriving. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 26 July 2022, in Barrancabermeja (Santander), an off-duty police officer was shot by unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle (drive-by shooting) as he was getting off his car. The officer was injured and taken to the hospital. There were no fatalities.

Around 26 July 2022 (as reported), in La Gloria (Cesar), a police officer shot and killed a man who had been arrested after engaging in a street fight and who, according to witnesses, was in handcuffs, in a case of excessive use of force. According to the police version the officers were being attacked with knives by a group of people. 1 fatality.

Around 26 July 2022 (as reported), in Arauca (Arauca), a woman was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in El Recero sector. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but there is presence of the ELN and FARC Dissident groups in the area. 1 fatality.

source: El Colombiano; SAT- Defensoria del Pueblo; UNOCHA
notes: Around 25 July 2022 (as reported), in El Carrizal (Antioquia), two Ecuadorian Indigenous men were killed and their bodies were found in El Osito sector. The victims had been abducted by an unidentified armed group in El Puna vereda in early July. The motive of the attack is unknown but there is presence of several armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 25 July 2022, in Puerto Rico (Caqueta), at least two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed three people, including a demobilized former FARC member, at a commercial establishment. Two women were also injured in the attack and were taken to the hospital. The motive and perpetrators are unknown but there is presence of armed groups in the area. 3 fatalities.

On 25 July 2022, in El Palo (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men at a commercial establishment. A woman was also injured and taken to the hospital. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 25 July 2022 (as reported), in Arboletes (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty military officer when he was going to his house. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
Around 25 July 2022 (as reported), in Carepa (Antioquia), Gulf Clan members shot and killed an off-duty military official at his house. 1 fatality.

Around 25 July 2022 (as reported), in the rural area of Belen de Bajira corregimiento (Choco), unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle (drive-by shooting) shot and killed an off-duty military official when he was at his family house in La Loma vereda, in front of his relatives. 1 fatality.

On 25 July 2022, in Cienaga (Magdalena), an off-duty police officer was shot by an unidentified armed individual with a traumatic weapon in La Floresta neighborhood. The officer was injured and taken to the hospital. There were no fatalities.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz; El Heraldo (Colombia); El Espectador; INDEPAZ
notes: On 25 July 2022, in Chocho (Sucre), police officers killed three men accusing them of being Gulf Clan members and killing a police officer in Sampues (Sucre) minutes before (coded separately). The official version was that the three men were killed in a clash with police forces, however, according to relatives of the victims, witnesses and social organizations, the victims were not members of the Gulf Clan and had been arrested first and taken alive in a police car before being killed. The police officers involved in the event have been suspended. 3 fatalities.

Around 25 July 2022 (as reported), in Acacias (Meta), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed a cattle farmer who was also the president of the labour union at the municipal farmers market. The motive and perpetrator of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 24 July 2022, in the rural area of Norcasia municipality (Caldas), an environmental activist, who was also a social leader and tourist guide, was shot and killed by an unidentified sniper when he was moving on a boat on La Miel river in La Habana vereda. The victim was on his way to guide a tour. The motive and perpetrator of the attack are unknown but there is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

source: El Colombiano; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; El Espectador
notes: On 24 July 2022, in San Martin (Meta), a social leader, who was also a human rights defender, was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle (drive-by shooting) at his house in the Pedro Daza neighborhood. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but there is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 24 July 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle (drive-by shooting) at a commercial establishment in the Cundinamarca neighborhood. The motive and perpetrator of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 24 July 2022 (as reported), in Villa del Rosario (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle (drive-by shooting) shot and killed a man in La Esperanza neighborhood. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 24 July 2022 (as reported), in the rural area of Puerto Rico corregimiento (Cauca), a farmer was shot and killed and his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition in La Cacharra vereda. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 23 July 2022, in La Aurora (Cesar), unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle (drive-by shooting) opened fire against a group of people gathered at a commercial establishment. Around 23 July 2022 (as reported), in the rural area of Popayan municipality (Cauca), a woman was killed and her body was found in an advanced state of decomposition near a river in the Jumulito vereda. Around 22 July 2022 (as reported), in the rural area of Fredonia municipality (Antioquia), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in El Hoyo vereda. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 21 July 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), two men were shot and killed by unknown perpetrators in El Salado neighborhood. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 21 July 2022 (as reported), in Campo Dos (Norte de Santander), a man was shot and killed and his body was found in the Punta de Palo sector. The motive and perpetrator of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
Around 20 July 2022 (as reported), in Canutal (Sucre), Gulf Clan members abducted two men who were providing services for a company. Military forces rescued the victims.

Around 20 July 2022 (as reported), in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), a man was shot and killed and his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition in the Bocono sector. The motive and perpetrator of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 20 July 2022 (as reported), in Palmira (Valle del Cauca), a man was abducted by unidentified armed individuals in the Municipal neighborhood. The kidnappers took the victim in a car and his whereabouts are unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups.

Around 18 July 2022 (as reported), in Taparto (Antioquia), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 18 July 2022, in the rural area of San Pedro municipality (Valle del Cauca), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but there is presence of a FARC Dissident group in the area. 1 fatality.

The victims were released hours later. There is no information about the motive or the perpetrators but the area is known for the presence of armed groups.

notes: On 1 July 2022, in Mapiripan municipality (Meta), members of a FARC Dissident group opened fire at an Indigenous social leader from the Puerto Alvira community. There is no further information. There were no casualties.

On 30 June 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the Ciudad Rodeo neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Colombia (2018-2022); PLC: Colombian Liberal Party
notes: On 30 June 2022, in the rural area of Fortul municipality (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a Congressman from the Colombian Liberal Party. The perpetrators intercepted the victim's vehicle on the road linking Fortul to La Esmeralda after a meeting with other local politicians. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 30 June 2022, in Pileta (Sucre), an off-duty police officer was shot and injured by Gulf Clan members at his house. The victim was taken to the hospital. The perpetrators were arrested on 23 July 2022. There were no fatalities.

Around 29 June 2022, near Santiago de Cali municipality (Valle del Cauca), a man was killed and his body was found after the driver of a motorcycle threw a plastic bag on the street in the Petecuy neighborhood, Comuna 6. Inside, authorities found the dismembered body of an adult man. There are no further details about the reasons for the attack or the possible perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 29 June 2022, in San Marcos (Sucre), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a former police officer in a drive-by shooting near the Campo Nuevo neighborhood. The victim also had a police record, according to one source. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, authorities suspect that the Gulf Clan perpetrated the attack. 1 fatality.

On 29 June 2022, in Granada (Meta), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the El Bosque neighborhood. Perpetrators shot multiple times against the victim. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 28 June 2022, in Yondo (Antioquia), a woman was killed and her body was found inside her house in the El Prado neighborhood. The victim was shot in the head. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 28 June 2022, in San Martin de Loba (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty police officer in a drive-by shooting near the Bolivar streets. Perpetrators approached the victim and opened fire. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
notes: Around 28 June 2022, in the rural area of El Tambo municipality (Cauca), two young men were killed and their bodies were found near the El Porvenir vereda. There are no further details on the attack but perpetrators left behind a leaflet claiming the victims were killed by the Carlos Patino FARC dissident faction. 2 fatalities.

Around 28 June 2022, in the rural area of Morales municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals forcibly recruited three indigenous children from the rural areas of Pueblillo, Belen, and Honduras. The men took the children in a vehicle and left in an unknown direction. The whereabouts of the victims are unknown. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups.

Around 28 June 2022, in Llano Bajo (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a young man who was part of a protection program for threatened and displaced persons. Perpetrators searched for the victim at his house and shot him dead. The victim worked as a farmer. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

notes: Around 27 June 2022, in the rural area of Orpua corregimiento (Choco), four Wounaan indigenous people and an Afro-Colombian person were killed and their bodies were found near the Venado area. The victims were abducted by suspected Gulf Clan members around 21 June (coded separately). 5 fatalities.

On 27 June 2022, in Pescador (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two young men who had gathered at a local store. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of FARC dissident factions and other armed groups. 2 fatalities.

source: UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; El Tiempo (Colombia); El Colombiano
notes: On 27 June 2022, in Santa Ana (Granada, Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a social leader member of the PH political party. The victim was a well-known environmental activist in the area. The victim's wife and father were also wounded in the attack. Although authorities are investigating the incident as a personal dispute, activists reported that the victim was on a list of social leaders at high risk of attack because of his work with the communities. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 27 June 2022, in Saravena (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a social leader, who was also the vice-president of a welder's union in a drive-by shooting. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of ELN, FARC dissident factions, among other armed groups. 1 fatality.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 27 June 2022, in Mecaya (Putumayo), suspected members of the CDF killed a young farmer and ordered members of the El Conquistador community to dismantle a communications antenna, leaving the community isolated. 1 fatality.

source: El Universal (Colombia); El Tiempo (Colombia); Diario La Libertad
notes: On 27 June 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), Gulf Clan members shot and killed an off-duty police officer in a drive-by shooting near the El Carmelo and Plan 400 neighborhoods. The victim was brought to a local hospital but died due to the severity of the wounds. 1 fatality.

On 27 June 2022, in Simiti (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and injured an off-duty police officer in a drive-by shooting. The victim was leaving the station for lunch when the perpetrators approached and opened fire. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

Around 27 June 2022, in the rural area of Bolivar municipality (Cauca), a man was killed and his body was found in the Laderas vereda. The victim was shot multiple times. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 26 June 2022, in the rural area of Puerto Santander municipality (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found near an illegal crossing path. The victim was shot dead. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 26 June 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the San Blas neighborhood. The two victims were retired members of the police forces. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: Around 25 June 2022 (weekend of), in Caldono (Cauca), suspected members of the Dagoberto Ramos FARC dissident faction shot and killed a young man in front of a local pub. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 25 June 2022 (weekend of), in the rural area of Caldono municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a farmer at his house in the La Buitrera vereda. Perpetrators searched for the victim at his private residence where they subsequently opened fire on him. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 25 June 2022 (weekend of), in Medellin (Antioquia), three unidentified individuals beat a transgender woman in the Padro neighborhood. The perpetrators used belts and chains to beat the victim. Authorities investigated the incident as a hate attack. There were no fatalities.

On 25 June 2022, in Villanueva (Bolivar), an officer shot and killed a civilian when the man tried to escape from police custody after a domestic disorder procedure. Family members stated that the victim was handcuffed when the agent opened fire. 1 fatality.

Both victims were released by the ELN to a humanitarian mission on 17 August.
On 25 June 2022, in El Carmen De Bolivar (Bolivar), a Gulf Clan gunman shot and killed an off-duty police officer in a drive-by shooting near the Los Laureles neighborhood. 1 fatality.

On 24 June 2022, in Fonseca (La Guajira), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man member of the LGBT community in a drive-by shooting near the Cristo Rey neighborhood. Although the victim had a police record, it has not been confirmed whether the assault was personal or a hate crime. 1 fatality.

On 24 June 2022, in Sincelejo (Sucre), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a lawyer in a drive-by shooting near the Cauca street. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 24 June 2022, in the rural area of Copacabana municipality (Antioquia), a young man was killed and his body was found in the Penolcito vereda. The victim was shot multiple times. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 24 June 2022, in the rural area of Arauquita municipality (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man near the La Union vereda. Perpetrators arrived at the area in a vehicle, killed the victim, and then fled the area. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
On 23 June 2022, in Las Delicias (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals attacked the house of an Indigenous leader. The men opened fire on the victim's house. There were no fatalities.

Around 23 June 2022, in Puerto Jordan (coded to La Esmeralda (Jujua), Arauca), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed the wife of the president of a local JAC. Perpetrators approached the victim and opened fire on her. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality. [women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons]

On 22 June 2022, in the rural area of Ocana municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals abducted a farmer, who is the uncle of the current mayor of the municipality. The armed men arrived at the victim's house in Venadillo vereda and left with the farmer. A day later, the victim's body was found on a road connecting the area to the Catatumbo sub-region. The cause of death has not yet been confirmed but authorities believe victim died in captivity due to a heart attack caused by lack of access to his usual medication. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of the dissident faction of the FARC and the ELN. 1 fatality.

On 22 June 2022, near Las Delicias corregimiento (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals kidnapped an indigenous man who was a member of the Guardia Indigena Nasa; later the same day, Indigenous authorities found the victim's body near the area of La Primavera. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 22 June 2022 (as reported), in the rural area of Tame municipality (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in Cravo Regilia vereda. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 22 June 2022, in Tibu (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals abducted the owner of a local store. Two men on motorcycles took the victim from her business and drove off with her. The victim was release on 24 June. Although the perpetrators have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of the dissident faction of the FARC and ELN.

On 22 June 2022, in Quibdo (Choco), a man was shot and killed by unidentified perpetrators. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but there is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 21 June 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals opened fire in a shootout against a group of men who had gathered to play domino in the Candelaria neighborhood. One person was killed and two others were wounded. There are no further details on the motives for the attack or the possible perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 21 June 2022, in Villavicencio (Meta), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the Los Pinares neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 20 June 2022, near the Las Delicias corregimiento (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an Indigenous person. There are no further details on potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 20 June 2022, in the rural area of Corocito locality (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a social leader. The victim was abducted by the perpetrators in his wood workshop and hours later neighbors found the victim's body. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 20 June 2022, in Sincelejo (Sucre), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the Verbe neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 20 June 2022, in Mondomo (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a woman in the Los Pinos neighborhood. Perpetrators approached and shot the victim in the head multiple times. Around 19 June 2022, in the rural area of Guapi municipality (Cauca), two students were killed and their bodies found. The victims were abducted two days earlier, on June 17, in the community of El Limon by an unidentified armed group (coded separately). 2 fatalities.

source: Vanguardia Liberal; El Colombiano; Diario La Libertad; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ
notes: On 19 June 2022, in El Patia (Cauca), a social leader was killed by unidentified armed individuals while practicing sports. Although some sources reported the incident as a robbery, local NGOs claim the incident was related to his work as a social leader and activist of the PH political party. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 33rd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (33rd Front)
notes: On 19 June 2022, in the rural area of Abrego municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals abducted a woman teacher near Santa Rita vereda. The victim was in the area to participate in the presidential elections when the armed men intercepted her and took her away. The victim was released during a military operation around June 29. Five suspected members of the 33rd FARC dissident faction were arrested, but no clashes were reported.

On 19 June 2022, in Guapi municipality (Cauca), an electoral witness for the Historic Pact political party (PH) was killed when he was going to the voting place on the day of the presidential election. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 18 June 2022, in the rural area of Caloto municipality (Cauca), a man was killed and his body was found in the Crucero de Guali area. The victim had hands and feet tied, multiple signs of torture, and was shot dead. Perpetrators left behind a leaflet claiming the victim was 'killed for thief'. There are no further details on potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 17 June 2022, in the rural area of Guapi municipality (Cauca), members of an unidentified armed group abducted two students from El Limon community. The victims' bodies were found killed on the evening of 19 June (coded separately).

assoc_actor_2: Former AUC: United Self-Defence Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 16 June 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a former AUC member in a drive-by shooting near the Bellavista neighborhood. The victim has returned to civilian life following his demobilization in 2006 and had no reported previous death threats. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 16 June 2022, in the rural area of El Encanto municipality (Amazonas), an unidentified armed group abducted an indigenous person. The victim's wife was also threatened. There are no further details on the incident or potential perpetrators. The whereabouts of the victim are still unknown.

Around 16 June 2022, in the rural area of Miranda municipality (Cauca), a man was killed and his body was found in El Progreso vereda. The victim has his throat cut. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 15 June 2022, in Santiago de Cali (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals opened fire against a group of people who had gathered at a soccer field near the Villa del Lago neighborhood. Two people were killed in the drive-by shooting. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 15 June 2022, in Itagui (Antioquia), a man was killed and his body was found on the San Francisco neighborhood. The victim had been decapitated and his head was missing. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 15 June 2022, in the rural area of El Aguila municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near El Guayabo vereda. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim multiple times. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 14 June 2022, in the rural area of Convencion municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals abducted a teacher from a rural school. The armed men broke into the school and took the victim while she was lecturing a class. Although the perpetrators have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups which have threatened at least 30 teachers in the area. The victim was released 36 hours later on a rural road.

On 14 June 2022, in Tumaco (Narino), two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two patients who were in the ICU. The victims had been threatened the night before by medical personnel due to gunshot wounds. Perpetrators broke into the hospital searched for the victims and opened fire on them inside the premises. Subsequently, the perpetrators fled the area on a motorcycle. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

On 14 June 2022, in El Carmen De Bolivar (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and injured two men members of the same family in a drive-by shooting near the 8 de Junio neighborhood. The victims were business owners and had not reported previous death threats. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

On 14 June 2022, in Caracoli (La Guajira), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed a Wiwa indigenous woman. The man broke into the victim's house and shot her dead. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

notes: Around 8 June 2022, in Bogota - Engativa (Bogota, D.C.), an LGBT activist and social leader was killed near the Bonanza neighborhood. Moreover, he was a member of the CC political party. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 8 June 2022, in Miranda (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a woman in the Suerte 40 neighborhood. The victim was the daughter of a known local businessman and was shot in the head. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality. [women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons]

On 8 June 2022, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a moto-taxi driver near the Panamericano neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 8 June 2022, in the rural area of Andalucia municipality (Valle del Cauca), a young man was killed and his body was found near the Tamboral vereda. The victim was shot dead. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 8 June 2022, in the rural area of Bolivar municipality (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a young man in a drive-by shooting near the Pescador vereda. Police arrested the perpetrators. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 8 June 2022, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), a young man was killed and his body was found. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

The victim was in town visiting one of her children in the La Floresta neighborhood when the perpetrators broke into the house and opened fire on her. The woman was transported to a local hospital but died due to the severity of her wounds. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: Around 7 June 2022, in the rural area of Curvarado corregimiento (Choco), a farmer was killed and his body was found with several signs of torture near a rural road. The victim was the brother of a social leader who is an environmental activist in the area. His family reported him missing on 14 May. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 7 June 2022, in El Charco (Narino), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a group of teachers who had gathered in the municipal park following a peaceful protest (coded separately). The attack happened after the protest ended. Five people were injured. There are no further details on the motives for the attack or the possible perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

On 6 June 2022, in the rural area of Miranda municipality (Cauca), a social leader who was a former member of multiple indigenous organizations was killed and his body was found near the El Llanito area. The victim was found shot dead hours after leaving his house. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 5 June 2022, in San Martin (Meta), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the Los Molinos neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 5 June 2022, in the rural area of Tulua municipality (Valle del Cauca), a farmer was killed and his body was found in the El Tochecito corregimiento. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 4 June 2022, in Quibdo (Choco), a man was shot and killed by unidentified perpetrators. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but there is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 4 June 2022, in the rural area of Timba corregimiento (Cauca), a farmer was killed and his body was found in La Ventura vereda. The victim was shot several times. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 4 June 2022 (weekend of), in Tulua (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and injured a former candidate for the city hall who was a member of the CD political party. The victim remains in ICU due to the severity of the wounds. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

On 3 June 2022, in Pivijay (Magdalena), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a tattoo artist. Perpetrators left behind a leaflet signed by the Gulf Clan claiming the victim was 'killed for extorting money', but the responsibility of this armed group has not been confirmed yet. 1 fatality.

Around 3 June 2022, in the rural area of Tulua municipality (Valle del Cauca), a man was killed and his body was found near the Los Caimos area. The victim, who was shot dead, was a former member of the police forces. The man retired in 2021. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 2 June 2022, in Monteria (Cordoba), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a cattle farmer in a drive-by shooting near the Santa Helena neighborhood. Perpetrators approached and opened fire on the victim. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: On 2 June 2022, in the rural area of Planeta Rica municipality (Cordoba), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a social leader who was a member of the JAC of Tapa Sola vereda. Perpetrators broke into the victim's house and subsequently shot him dead on the street. The area is known for the presence of Gulf Clan members. 1 fatality.

On 2 June 2022, in the rural area of Tibu municipality (Norte de Santander), a military soldier opened fire against a local farmer in the El Retiro vereda. The perpetrator claimed that he mistook the victim for a member of an armed group. However, the victim's partner claimed that the soldier knew that the victim was the only person in the area and even added that other soldiers restrained the military soldier when he opened fire. The victim was unarmed and was spraying his crops when the military soldier opened fire on him. The farmer remains in the ICU due to the severity of his wounds. There were no fatalities.

On 1 June 2022, in Tucurinca (Magdalena), unidentified armed individuals broke into a local residence and opened fire on a family, killing three people and injuring one more. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.

On 1 June 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a moto-taxi driver in a drive-by shooting near the San Pedro Martir neighborhood. Perpetrators approached and opened fire on the victim, subsequently fleeing the area on a motorcycle. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 1 June 2022, in the rural area of Aguasclaras corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a farmer was kidnapped by unidentified armed men on his farm in the El Uvito sector. This was the third time the victim was abducted by armed men; he had been abducted in December 2018 (coded separately) and in July 2020 (coded separately). The victim was later released on 4 June.

Around 1 June 2022 (as reported), in Quibdo (Choco), a man was shot and killed and his body was found with signs of torture in La Arrocera sector. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but there is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 1 June 2022, in the rural area of Santander De Quilichao municipality (Cauca), a young man was killed and his body was found. The victim was shot several times in the head. Inhabitants claimed the victim was a Venezuelan national. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Witoto Indigenous Group (Colombia); Teachers (Colombia)
notes: Around 31 May 2022, in the rural area of Solano municipality (Caqueta), a Witoto indigenous social leader who was a teacher was killed and his body was found near the Caqueta River with multiple gunshots. The incident occurred after communities reported that members of an unidentified armed group ordered the community not to take part in the presidential elections of 29 May 2022. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 31 May 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and injured a lawyer in a drive-by shooting near the Canapote neighborhood. The victim was the lawyer of well-known politicians in the city. There are no further details on the motives for the attack or the possible perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. The victim died one day later due to the severity of the wounds. 1 fatality.

On 31 May 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the El Refugio sector. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 31 May 2022, in the rural area of El Roble municipality (Sucre), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man who had recently returned after spending years in jail for attacking a social leader in October 2020. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim in a drive-by shooting. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 31 May 2022, in the rural area of Balboa municipality (Cauca), a young farmer was killed and his body was found near the La Esperanza vereda. The victim was shot several times. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 30 May 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the San Fernando neighborhood. Likewise another man was injured in the Las Lomas. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 30 May 2022, in Punta Arenas (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man, in Isla de Tierra Bomba. Perpetrators arrived at the area on a speed boat. Authorities claimed the victim had suffered a previous attack on 31 December 2021. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 30 May 2022, in the rural area of Urrao municipality (Antioquia), suspected Gulf Clan members killed a man and stole the victim's motorcycle. Although the incident was initially reported as a robbery, the vehicle was later found and seized by law enforcement following an armed confrontation with members of this armed group around 4 June 2022 (coded separately). 1 fatality.

Around 30 May 2022, in Medellin (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a barber shop owner in a drive-by shooting in the Manrique area. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 28 May 2022, in the rural area of Santiago de Cali municipality (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a young man in a drive-by shooting near the Los Tamayos area. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

A military unit near the area also clashed with the perpetrators (coded separately). There are no further details on the reasons for the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 27 May 2022, in the rural area of Iscuande municipality (Narino), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a member of the Bella Vista community. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the attack caused the displacement of between 66 and 150 people, residents in the area. 1 fatality.

On 25 May 2022, in Arauquita (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a builder in a drive-by shooting. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Farmers (Colombia)
notes: On 24 May 2022, in the rural area of Calarma corregimiento (Tolima), unidentified armed individuals killed four people from the same family, who were cattle farmers, near the Calarca vereda. Although authorities claimed the incident may be related to a robbery, two of the victims were known social leaders in the community, one of them a woman who was the president of the JAC. Perpetrators beheaded one of the victims and cut the neck of two more. Moreover, the perpetrators threw two of the bodies into a local river. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 4 fatalities.

On 24 May 2022, on the Coast of Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a boat driver on the island of Tierra Bomba. The perpetrators broke into a local bar and shot the victim in the head after he complained that the men were carrying guns. Authorities claimed that the perpetrators were looking for a known drug dealer in the area, but this information was not confirmed. 1 fatality.

Around 24 May 2022, in the rural area of Teorama municipality (Norte de Santander), two men were killed and their bodies were found near the La Muralla sector. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 23 May 2022, in Ciudad Bolivar (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a professional athlete in a drive-by shooting in the La Floresta neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 23 May 2022, in the rural area of Baru corregimiento (Bolivar), ten unidentified armed individuals broke into a private residence and took away three of the workers. The perpetrators were disguised in police uniforms. The body of one of the victims was later found near a local creek with several shots and tied up. The whereabouts of the other two workers remain unknown. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 23 May 2022, in the rural area of El Torno locality (Sucre), two men were killed and their bodies were found. The victims were two brothers who were shot in the head. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 23 May 2022, in the rural area of Venadillo vereda (Ocana, Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals broke into the house of an elderly man and abducted the victim. There are no further details on the potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. The victim was later released by his captors around 28 June in the municipality of El Tarra (Norte de Santander).

Around 23 May 2022, in the rural area of Tauramena municipality (Casanare), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the Villa Rosa vereda. Perpetrators approached the victim on a motorcycle and called the victim by his name before opening fire. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 23 May 2022, in the rural area of Corinto municipality (Cauca), a man was killed and his body was found near the Rio Negro sector. The victim had several gunshot wounds, and according to the residents, the victim is not an inhabitant of the area. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 22 May 2022, in Mondomo (Cauca), suspected ELN members shot and killed a teenager who was at the local square. Perpetrators approached the victim and opened fire on him. The victim died due to the severity of the wounds. 1 fatality.

Around 21 May 2022, in Barranquilla (Atlantico), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a group of people in a drive-by shooting, killing three people and injuring one more. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.

On 21 May 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the Chile neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 21 May 2022 (weekend of), in the rural area of Cajibio municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a group of people who were celebrating at a party. A teenager was killed and another party attendee was injured. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 21 May 2022, in the rural area of Gonzalez municipality (Norte de Santander), suspected ELN members shot and killed a woman near the Cotorrera vereda. Perpetrators left behind a leaflet claiming the victim was 'killed for snitching information'. 1 fatality.

On 20 May 2022, in Bogota - Puente Aranda (Bogota, D.C.), a social leader was physically assaulted by two unidentified men in the Ricaurte sector. The perpetrators intimidated the social leader and threatened to kill him. The victim was injured in his face. There were no fatalities.

The area is known for the presence of several armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
notes: Around 19 May 2022 (as reported), in the rural area of Balboa municipality (Cauca), suspected Carlos Patino FARC dissidents shot and injured two citizens who tried to avoid a checkpoint set up by the armed group. The armed men opened fire on the victim's vehicle when they made a U-turn after noticing the group on the road. Other citizens reported that the dissident made identity control them. There were no fatalities.

Around 19 May 2022, in the rural area of Rosas municipality (Cauca), two unidentified armed individuals attacked the police inspector when the victim was arriving at his house in the La Soledad vereda. Perpetrators beat up the victim and put into his mouth a paper while pointing at him with a gun and claiming he had 48 hours to quit his job and leave the area. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

On 18 May 2022, in the rural area of Bolivar municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a political activist who was leading the campaign for the presidential candidate of the PH in the area. Perpetrators attacked the victim near the El Joncal vereda. The region is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 18 May 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the Los Hoyos neighborhood. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim four times and fled the area on a motorcycle. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 18 May 2022 (as reported), in Sabana De San Luis (Bolivar), a social leader, who was also a cattle farmer, was shot several times and killed and his body was found. The victim was a leader of the San Antonio vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown but there is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
