notes: On 13 May 2022, in the rural area of Dabeiba municipality (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an indigenous social leader who was a teacher in a local school. Perpetrators intercepted the victim near the Choromando bridge when he was returning to his house after a workday and shot him dead. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 13 May 2022, in Abrego (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. Two more people were injured. Witnesses claimed perpetrators opened fire on the victims without any previous warning. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

source: El Colombiano; El Tiempo (Colombia); INDEPAZ; UNOCHA
notes: On 13 May 2022, in Guadalajara de Buga (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a group of people who had gathered at a local park in the La Revolucion neighborhood. Perpetrators killed three young men and injured one more in the drive-by shooting. Authorities claimed that the incident could be related to a settling of scores, but this version has not been confirmed. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.

Around 13 May 2022, in El Cerrito (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a retired police officer in a drive-by shooting near the Calle 2. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 13 May 2022, in the rural area of Guapi municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a farmer in the Bocas de Barro sector. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Guardia Cimarrona (Colombia); Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 12 May 2022, in Quibdo (Choco), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on the house of an Afro-Colombian social leader who is an active member of the local Guardia Cimarrona. The victim and his family fled the attack uninjured. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

Around 12 May 2022, in the rural area of El Tambo municipality (Cauca), members of an unidentified armed group abducted and subsequently killed a farmer who was a social leader in his community. Perpetrators arrived at the victim's house searching for him after they found him and took him; minutes later, witnesses claimed to hear the gunshots and found the victim's body. Perpetrators claimed the man supported the military forces, which residents claimed was a false affirmation. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 11 May 2022, in the rural area of Guayacana corregimiento (Narino), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an Awa indigenous person member of the Gran Sabalo indigenous reserve area. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim and his family when he drove to the town. There are no further details on the potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Colombia (2018-2022); PCC: Colombian Conservative Party
notes: On 11 May 2022, in Ansermanuevo (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a councilman who was a member of the Conservative Party in a drive-by shooting. The victim was in the area for holidays when the perpetrators approached him and opened fire. The region is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: Around 10 May 2022, in the rural area of Puerto Guzman municipality (Putumayo), unidentified armed individuals raided the house of two social leaders in the Paujil vereda. Perpetrators killed one of the residents who was a former member of the JAC and abducted his son who is the current president of the JAC. The area is known for the presence of the Carolina Ramirez FARC dissident faction and the CDF. 1 fatality.

On 10 May 2022, in Inza (Cauca), an indigenous teenager was killed in a suspected incident of police brutality. Officers claimed they opened fire on the victim when they saw the young man was carrying a weapon he used to threaten a group of moto-taxi drivers. However, witnesses claimed officers shot dead the victim as he was on the floor and already unarmed. Police are investigating the incident. 1 fatality.

On 10 May 2022, in El Cerrito (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two city hall workers in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators approached the victim's vehicle and opened fire. One of the victims was a former running candidate for the city hall, but none of the victims had reported previous death threats. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 10 May 2022, in Yumbo (Valle del Cauca), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed an off-duty officer. The man approached the victim near the Belalcazar neighborhood and opened fire on the victim. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 10 May 2022, in the rural area of El Tambo municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a farmer. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 9 May 2022, in Buenos Aires (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a group of people who had been displaced the same day from the Mazamorras vereda due to increasing armed group activity (coded separately). One child was killed in the attack, which took place in the Nueva Colonia neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 9 May 2022, in the rural area of Buenos Aires municipality (Cauca), members of an unidentified armed group broke into the house of a resident and shot dead one of the family members. Other sources reported the victim as a former member of the military forces, but this information has not been confirmed. The incident took place near the Mazamorreros area, where armed clashes have been reported over the past two days. The attack triggered the displacement of at least 40 families that live in the area. 1 fatality.

On 9 May 2022, in the rural area of Lopez Adentro corregimiento (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals attacked an Indigenous leader who is a member of a local Guardia Indigena. Perpetrators intercepted the victim near the Japio area and opened fire, but he could avoid the attack, fleeing uninjured. Indigenous groups stated that, even though the leader has received multiple death threats, the government has not assigned him any security. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 9 May 2022, in the rural area of San Vicente Del Caguan municipality (Caqueta), a former FARC member was killed and his body was found near the Villalobos sector. The victim was shot several times. There are no further details on potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 9 May 2022, in the rural area of Morales municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a farmer in the La Concordia vereda. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 9 May 2022, in the rural area of Santander De Quilichao municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a child in a drive-by shooting in the Campito vereda. Perpetrators opened fire on a group of people, killing the victim. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 8 May 2022, in the rural area of Novita municipality (Choco), the bodies of four business persons who had been abducted by suspected ELN forces were found. The armed group abducted the victims around 1 May near Sipi municipality (coded separately). 4 fatalities.

On 8 May 2022, in Sincelejo (Sucre), suspected Gulf Clan members opened fire on a group of people who had gathered near the Paraiso Puerta Roja neighborhood, injuring between three to five people. The drive-by shooting took place amid a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence. There were no fatalities.

On 8 May 2022, in Yumbo (Valle del Cauca), a young girl was attacked and tortured by unidentified perpetrators. The victim was found injured in the Fray Alfonso neighborhood and was brought to the hospital where she died due to the severity of her wounds. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality. [women targeted: girls]

On 8 May 2022, in Urumita (La Guajira), a young man was killed in a suspected incident of police brutality after responding to a domestic disturbance call. An officer opened fire on a group after the victim attempted to attack the officer with a stick, resulting in the victim being killed and another person injured. The incidents triggered a mob (coded separately). 1 fatality.

On 8 May 2022, in the rural area of Granada municipality (Meta), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Aguas Claras area. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 8 May 2022, in Villavicencio (Meta), a man was killed and his body was found in the El Milagro neighborhood. The victim was shot several times. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: On 7 May 2022, in the rural area of San Vicente del Caguan municipality (Caqueta), a social leader and another civilian were killed near la Novita vereda. The victim was an active member of the JAC of the Morrocoy vereda. Perpetrators left behind a leaflet claiming the victim was 'killed for being part of an armed group', something denied by relatives and residents in the area. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 7 May 2022, in La Loma de Calenturas (Cesar), suspected Gulf Clan members opened fire on a group of people who had gathered in a local bar, injuring six people. The incident took place amid the beginning of a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence. One of the victims died a few days after the attack due to the severity of her injuries. 1 fatality.

On 7 May 2022, in the rural area of Bajo Calima corregimiento (Choco), suspected Gulf Clan members opened fire at buses of public service that covered the route that connects the area with Buenaventura. The incident took place on the third day of a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence. The drivers and passengers fled the attack uninjured. There were no fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 33rd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (33rd Front)
notes: On 7 May 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), armed individuals set fire to a taxi in the El Contento neighborhood. Perpetrators intercepted the vehicle as service, threatened the driver and passenger, forced them out of the car, and burned it down. The driver was hospitalized due to wounds he suffered during the attack. Similar incidents took place in the past months, and the FARC 33rd dissident front claimed responsibility for the incident. There were no fatalities.

Around 7 May 2022, in the rural area of Santander De Quilichao municipality(Cauca), a man was killed and his body was found in the Ardovela sector. The victim was shot in the head and had his hands tied. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 7 May 2022, in the rural area of Timbiqui municipality (Cauca), an unidentified armed group killed a woman after accusing her of stealing and being a drug user. Perpetrators shot at the victim and throw her body into the river, which later was found by a local fisherman. 1 fatality.

On 6 May 2022, in the rural area of Aguachica municipality (Cesar), a driver was injured after a vehicle set on fire by suspected Gulf Clan members exploded. The incident took place on the second day after the beginning of a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence. There were no fatalities.

source: El Espectador; El Tiempo (Colombia); El Heraldo (Colombia)
notes: On 6 May 2022, in the rural area of El Copey municipality (Cesar), suspected Gulf Clan members shot and killed a driver who attempted to cross multiple vehicles burned down across the road. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim's vehicle. The armed men had set fire to three vehicles on the route that connects the area with Bosconia municipality. The incident took place on the second day after the beginning of a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence. 1 fatality.

On 6 May 2022, in Pivijay (Magdalena), Gulf Clan members shot and injured three people at a store after the owner refused to close its doors. The incident took place amid a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence. Moreover, there are reports of vehicles burned down in the municipality, but there are no further details on the event. There were no fatalities.

source: El Espectador; El Heraldo (Colombia); El Colombiano
notes: On 6 May 2022, in the rural area of San Onofre municipality (Sucre), suspected Gulf Clan members opened fire on the vehicle of a woman who was driving to Cartagena. The bullet impacted her car and crossed near the victim's leg, but she fled the attack uninjured. The incident took place on the second day after the beginning of a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence.

On 6 May 2022, in San Jeronimo (Antioquia), Gulf Clan members shot and injured three people in a drive-by shooting. The incident took place amid a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence. Moreover, there are reports of vehicles burned down in the municipality, but there are no further details on the event. There were no fatalities.

On 6 May 2022, in Morelia (Antioquia), suspected Gulf Clan members opened fire near a local school. The armed men also set to fire the vehicle of a teacher that was parked near the area. The incident took place amid a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence. On 6 May 2022, in the rural area of Chiriguana municipality (Cesar), a woman was injured after suspected Gulf Clan members set fire to a vehicle. The incident took place on the second day after the beginning of a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence. There were no fatalities.

On 6 May 2022, in the rural area of Orihueca corregimiento (Magdalena), suspected Gulf Clan members set fire to a food delivery truck. The driver was hospitalized following the attack, but there are no further details on the severity of his wounds. The incident took place on the first day after the beginning of a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence. There were no fatalities.

On 6 May 2022, in Granada (Sucre), suspected Gulf Clan members opened fire on a store owner who refused to close his store. The victim fled the attack uninjured. The incident took place amid a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence. 1 fatality. There were no fatalities.

On 6 May 2022, in Segovia (Antioquia), suspected Gulf Clan members set fire to a vehicle near the Borbollon neighborhood and beat up the driver. The incident took place amid the beginning of a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence. notes: On 6 May 2022, in Norosi (Bolivar), Gulf Clan members shot and killed a social leader who was active member of the JAC Santa Helena. Perpetrators attacked the man when he was with friends in a private residence. Two members of the armed group have been arrested for the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 6 May 2022, in San Jeronimo (Antioquia), suspected Gulf Clan members opened fire on a group of people, injuring four people. The incident took place amid the beginning of a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence. notes: On 5 May 2022, in Cerete (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a store owner. The incident took place on the first day after the beginning of a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim after he refused to close his store. Moreover, the armed men shot in the air and threatened all students and teachers in local schools and forced them to go to their houses. 1 fatality

Around 5 May 2022, in the rural area of Juan de Acosta municipality (Atlantico), a man was killed and his body was found inside a well. The victim was beheaded. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of the Gulf Clan. 1 fatality.

On 5 May 2022, in Santiago de Cali (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a doctor in a drive-by shooting near the La Hacienda neighborhood. Perpetrators waited for the victim at a local soccer field and then opened fire. The man was the chief anesthesiologist at a hospital. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 5 May 2022, in the rural area of Barranco de Loba municipality (Bolivar), suspected Gulf Clan members held captive a group of students and teachers for several hours. Perpetrators subsequently released the group but set fire to the school bus. The incident took place on the first day after the beginning of a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence.

On 5 May 2022, in San Pablo (Bolivar), a store owner was killed. Although there are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, the incident took place amid a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence. 1 fatality.

On 5 May 2022, in the rural area of Sampues municipality (Sucre), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed a man whose vehicle broke down on the road that connects the area with the Sahagun municipality. The victim got off the vehicle, after which a perpetrator on a motorcycle approached and opened fire. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. Moreover, the incident took place on the first day after the beginning of a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence. 1 fatality.

On 5 May 2022, in the rural area of Magangue municipality (Bolivar), suspected Gulf Clan members set fire to a truck near the Juan Arias corregimiento, resulting in the driver injured. The incident took place on the first day after the beginning of a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: Around 5 May 2022, in the rural area of San Pedro municipality (Sucre), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a social leader in La Gloria vereda. Perpetrators searched and shot the victim at his private residence. The victim was an active member of the JAC in La Gloria. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 5 May 2022, in Bojaya municipality (Choco), the Gulf Clan abducted four members of a humanitarian mission at an illegal checkpoint. The victims were released on 9 May. There are no further details, but the event took place amid the beginning of a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence.

On 4 May 2022, in Cargueros (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals intercepted a boat of miners. The incidents took place on the eve of the first day after the beginning of a four-day curfew or 'paro armado' introduced by the Gulf Clan, prohibiting all vehicle traffic or the movement of civilians in areas where the armed group has a presence. Nevertheless, there are other armed groups operated in this area. It remains unclear if the workers are still with members of the armed group or not, as the whereabouts of the victims are not reported.

On 4 May 2022, in the rural area of Pelaya municipality (Cesar), unidentified armed individuals abducted a cattle breeder and his family. Perpetrators drove the three victims in the direction of the Catatumbo sub-region. Later they released a woman and a child, but a man remained with the group. The victim's whereabouts are still unknown. The area is known for the presence of ELN and FARC dissident factions.

On 4 May 2022, in Corocito (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and injured a man in a drive-by shooting. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Farmers (Colombia); PH: Historic Pact for Colombia
notes: On 3 May 2022, in the rural area of Sucre municipality (Sucre), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a social leader in a drive-by shooting near the Buenos Aires vereda. The victim was a farmer and also an active member of the political coalition Historic Pact for Colombia. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

source: INDEPAZ; El Espectador; El Tiempo (Colombia); UNOCHA

On 3 May 2022, in the rural area of Arauquita municipality (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a young man near the Palestina vereda. Perpetrators chased the victim on a motorcycle before they shot him dead. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of FARC dissident factions and ELN. 1 fatality.

Around 3 May 2022, in the rural area of Morales municipality (Cauca), a farmer was killed and his body was found in the Sombrerillo vereda. Residents claimed the perpetrators brought the victim from his private residence in Cajibio (Cauca) before they shot him dead. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 2 May 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and injured three people in a drive-by shooting at a local bar in the Olaya Herrera neighborhood. Perpetrators approached the area opened fire on a group, and subsequently fled on a motorcycle. The region is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

On 2 May 2022, in the rural area of Barranco De Loba municipality (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a cattle farmer in a drive-by shooting near the El Pital area. The victim's business partner was killed on a similar incident on 1 May (coded separately). There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 2 May 2022, in the rural area of Abrego municipality (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found near the San Javier vereda. The victim was shot dead and a motorcycle, presumed to belong to the victim, lay next to him. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 2 May 2022, in Arauquita (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man that worked selling lottery tickets in a drive-by shooting near the bus terminal. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 2 May 2022, in Saravena (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a woman in a drive-by shooting near the El Terraplen neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 2 May 2022, in Florencia (Caqueta), two young men were killed near a local bar. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 2 May 2022, in Granada (Meta), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the Calle 15. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

notes: On 1 May 2022, in Valledupar (Cesar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two former AUC members in a drive-by shooting near the Altagracia neighborhood. On 1 May 2022, in the rural area of Hatillo De Loba municipality (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a cattle farmer in a drive-by shooting near the La Regla vereda. The victim's business partner was killed on a similar incident on 2 May (coded separately). There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 1 May 2022, in the rural area of Simiti municipality (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men on a rural road. Perpetrators used weapons and knives to kill the victims and subsequently set to fire a motorcycle that it is believed belonged to the men. According to police officers, the victims used to pretend to be members of a FARC dissident faction to extort money from residents. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 1 May 2022, in La Ventura (Sucre), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed two men who were smoking marijuana near the local cemetery. The perpetrator wore a hood during the attack. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 1 May 2022, in Pasacaballos (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a fish seller in a drive-by shooting near the La Paz area. Around 1 May 2022, in the rural area of Sipi municipality (Choco), suspected ELN members abducted three men and a woman who had traveled to the area to arrange a business deal near the Charco Largo corregimiento. On 1 May 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), a young man was killed in a suspected incident of police brutality. The victim was shot on the terrace of his home while police were in the area attending to a call about a domestic dispute. There are no further details about the attack. 1 fatality.

On 1 May 2022, in Arauca (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the Los Libertadores neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 1 May 2022, in the rural area of Totoro municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a store owner. Three perpetrators abducted the victim from the town's center and subsequently, his body was found near the Avirama indigenous reserve area. The area is known for the presence of FARC dissident faction Dagoberto Ramos. 1 fatality.

Around 1 May 2022, in the rural area of Saravena municipality (Arauca), a man was killed and his body was found near the Y de Puerto Lleras area. The victim was shot multiple times. notes: On 30 April 2022, in the rural area of Caldono municipality (Cauca), an Nasa indigenous leader who was a former indigenous authority in his community was killed in the La Aguada indigenous reserve area. Perpetrators arrived at the indigenous reserve area looking for the victim. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Siona Indigenous Group (Colombia); Women (Colombia)
notes: On 30 April 2022, in the rural area of Puerto Leguizamo municipality (Putumayo), members of the CDF shot and killed a Siona woman Indigenous leader and her husband. Perpetrators searched for the victim at her private residence in the El Hacha indigenous reserve area and shot her dead. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 30 April 2022, in Saravena (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the El Prado neighborhood. A second attack was reported in the Limites Cabecera neighborhood, where the victim was tied and blindfolded. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 29 April 2022, in the rural area of Rionegro municipality (Antioquia), two young men were killed and their bodies were found in the Ojo de Agua vereda. The victim's bodies were wrapped with blankets and their bodies had signs of torture. Both of the men died due to asphyxiation. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 29 April 2022, in Santa Cruz De Mompox (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a bar owner in a drive-by shooting. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of the Gulf Clan. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Women (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: Around 29 April 2022, in the rural area of El Penol municipality (Antioquia), a woman social leader who was a member of the JAC was killed. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 29 April 2022, in Santiago de Cali (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men who were members of the same family in a drive-by shooting near the Alfonso Lopez neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 28 April 2022, in Santiago de Cali (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two people in a drive-by shooting near the Alfonso Lopez neighborhood. The victims were members of the same family. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 28 April 2022, in Armenia (Quindio), three unidentified individuals attacked an animal activist when the victim walked near Ancizar Lopez Avenue. The attackers approached the victim on motorcycles and then beat and injured her with a knife. The perpetrators claimed that she was bothering multiple groups with her activism and assured them that next time they would kill her. The victim has received multiple death threats for her animal rights work. She was hospitalized due to the severity of her injuries. There were no fatalities. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Around 27 April 2022, in the rural area of El Ejido corregimiento (Narino), two women were killed and their bodies were found in the El Eden vereda. The victims were shot dead, and near their bodies perpetrators left a leaflet claiming the victims were 'killed for roaming in the area without authorization'. It is presumed the victim are Venezuelan nationals, but this information has not been confirmed. The region is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 26 April 2022, in the rural area of Andes municipality (Antioquia), members of an unidentified armed group beat up an Embera Katio indigenous man near the village of Santa Isabel. The attack caused the displacement of about 80 Embera Katio indigenous residents in the area. The group has denounced that an armed group has been threatening the families to leave the region. There were no fatalities.

Around 26 April 2022, in Cienaga (Magdalena), a man member of the LGBT community was killed and his body was found in a hotel in the Padro Centro neighborhood. The victim was naked and tied up. LGBT collectives denounced that this incident has similar characteristics to multiple cases in which a members of the community were killed in Medellin (Antioquia) and called for a prompt police investigation of the incidents alleging possible hate killings. 1 fatality.

On 26 April 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the El Pozon neighborhood. Perpetrators approached the victim and shot him in the head several times. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 26 April 2022, in Tibu (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators shot at the victim when he was in a haircut saloon. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 26 April 2022, in Tibu (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on the vehicle of the president of the local association of JAC. The victim fled the attack uninjured. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

Around 26 April 2022, in the rural area of Banco De Arenas corregimiento (Norte de Santander), three men were killed and their bodies were found in the La Arenosita area. Authorities claimed the event is related to an armed confrontation between two groups, but this has not been confirmed. Meanwhile, a fourth body was found in the El Infierno area. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of Gulf Clan and ELN. 4 fatalities.

On 26 April 2022, in Ocana (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a young man near the El Bosque neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: On 25 April 2022, in the rural area of Cantagallo municipality (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two social leaders who were also members of the JAC of La Esperanza vereda. Perpetrators broke into the victims' houses dragged them out and shot them dead. The area is known for the presence of FARC dissent groups, ELN, and Gulf Clan members. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carolina Ramirez Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carolina Ramirez Front)
assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
source: UNOCHA; Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz; INDEPAZ
notes: On 25 April 2022, in the rural area of Puerto Guzman municipality (Putumayo), suspected members of the Carolina Ramirez FARC dissident faction shot and killed a former FARC member in the San Jose area. There are no further details on the attack. 1 fatality.

On 25 April 2022, in Jamundi (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man and his daughter in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators approached the victims and opened fire. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 25 April 2022, in the rural area of La Boquilla corregimiento (Bolivar), a man was killed and his body was found near the El Zapatero vereda. The victim was shot and his throat was cut. There are no further details about the reasons for the attack or the possible perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 24 April 2022, in Salgar (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals broke into a private residence and opened fire against three people, killing two people and injuring another one. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 24 April 2022, in the rural area of Miranda municipality (Cauca), a former FARC member was killed. The victim was an active member of social collectives and worked as a guard of the Monterredondo ETCR. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carolina Ramirez Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carolina Ramirez Front)
source: El Tiempo (Colombia); La Patria; UNOCHA; Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 24 April 2022, near Yurilla corregimiento (Putumayo), suspected members of the Carolina Ramirez FARC dissident faction shot and killed three men near Las Perlas vereda. Perpetrators searched for their victims at their homes and forced them out. Minutes later other residents found their bodies a few meters from the area. Another source claimed in total four men were killed. at least 3 fatalities.

Around 24 April 2022, in the rural area of El Cerrito municipality (Valle del Cauca), a trans woman was murdered and her body was found in the village of Pomo, Santa Helena. The victim was a member of LGBT collectives and actively participated in beauty contests for members of this community. LGBT collectives denounced the event as a hate attack. 1 fatality.

On 24 April 2022, in the rural area of Palmarito corregimiento (Cucuta, Norte de Santander), suspected Gulf Clan members held hostage a group of five people on a rural road. Three of the victim's bodies were found on the Road El Amparo on the same day. The whereabouts of the other two victims are still unknown. Authorities claim it was an armed confrontation between this group and the ELN, but this version has not been confirmed as inhabitants described it as a 'massacre'. 3 fatalities.

On 24 April 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), two men were shot and killed in two separate incidents. In the Palmeras neighborhood, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a student. While, in the Esperanza neighborhood, armed men shot dead a man. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 24 April 2022, in the rural area of Astilleros La Ye corregimiento (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man who was visiting a relative. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim when the moto-taxi driver made a pause on the road. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 33rd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (33rd Front)
source: Diario La Libertad; La Opinion (Colombia); El Universal (Colombia)
notes: On 24 April 2022, in the sub-region of Catatumbo (coded to Cucuta, Norte de Santander), members of the 33rd FARC dissident faction abducted two men accusing them of being drug users. The victims were taken to a residence in rural El Tarra and forced into forced labor with poor food. The victims were released during a military operation around 8 June 2022, in which two other victims who had been previously abducted on two different dates (coded separately) were freed, and multiple explosive materials were seized.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
assoc_actor_2: CR: Radical Change; Government of Colombia (2018-2022)
source: UNOCHA; El Tiempo (Colombia); El Colombiano; El Espectador
notes: On 24 April 2022, in the rural area of Guapi municipality (Cauca), two suspected members of a FARC Dissident faction abducted the mayor (CR party) of the municipality of El Charco (Narino) in La Bocana sector. Perpetrators intercepted the boat where the victim was and fled the area with him. Both perpetrators were arrested on 22 July 2022. The victim's whereabouts are still unknown.

On 24 April 2022, in Frontino (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the Las Mercedes neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 24 April 2022, in the rural area of Puerto Rico municipality (Caqueta), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men in the Cimitarra vereda. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 33rd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (33rd Front)
notes: On 23 April 2022, in the rural area of Cucuta municipality (Norte de Santander), suspected members of the 33rd FARC dissident faction forcibly disappeared a taxi driver. The victim's family reported him missing after the victim went to work. On 18 May 2022, authorities found the victim's vehicle burned on the road in the direction of Puerto Santander. Although the victim was not seen being taken, official sources point to the armed group as responsible for the action, as they have been carrying out multiple attacks against taxi companies in the city to extort money. The victim's whereabouts are still unknown.

On 23 April 2022, in the rural area of Cajica municipality (Cundinamarca), police officers opened fire on a civilian vehicle after the driver ignored a stop sign. The driver was killed, while another passenger was wounded. The victims were unarmed. 1 fatality.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz; El Espectador
notes: On 22 April 2022, in the rural area of the Litoral del San Juan municipality (Choco), suspected ELN members abducted all the passengers of a boat of public transport that was covering the route between Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca) and Docordo (Choco). The armed men stopped the boat near the Papayo Wounaan indigenous reserve area and took all passengers with them. Perpetrators abandoned the boat and released the nine victims after military forces began a rescued operation on 25 April.

On 22 April 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the Aguascalientes neighborhood. Two more people were injured. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 22 April 2022, in Saravena (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the Hogar Geriatrico. The victim worked as moto-taxi driver. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 22 April 2022, in the rural area of Corinto municipality (Cauca), a woman was killed and her body was found in the El Tablon area. Perpetrators left behind a leaflet claiming the victim was 'killed for working for Ramon'. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of the Dagoberto Ramos FARC dissident faction. 1 fatality.

Around 21 April 2022, in the rural area of Juan Frio corregimiento (Norte de Santander), two men were killed and their bodies were found near the La Ramona crossing. The victims were shot dead. Witnesses claimed that armed men brought the victims on foot from one illegal crossing that connects Venezuelan and Colombia, subsequently killing them on the Colombian side of the border. 2 fatalities.

Around 21 April 2022, in the rural area of La Parada corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found in the Los Mangos area. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 21 April 2022, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Fundelpa sector. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 21 April 2022, near Florida municipality (Valle del Cauca), a young man was killed and his body was found. The victim was shot dead. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 20 April 2022, in the rural area of Santander De Quilichao municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a former FARC member in the Canoas vereda. Perpetrators broke into the victim's house and shot him dead. Another resident in the house was injured in the attack. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 20 April 2022, in the rural area of Santa Rosa de Lima municipality (Bolivar), a man was killed and his body was found. Witnesses claimed the body had signs of torture. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 20 April 2022, in La Estrella (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a young man in a drive-by shooting in the Tablaza sector. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 20 April 2022, in Medellin (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Comuna 8. Perpetrators opened fire at the victim from the back and then fled the area. The victim was on a bicycle in the direction of his workplace. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 20 April 2022, in the rural area of Buenos Aires municipality (Cauca), armed individuals shot and killed two farmers in the Santa Catalina vereda. Perpetrators broke into the victims' house and opened fire on them. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack. The area is known for the presence of the Jaime Martinez FARC dissident faction. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: Around 20 April 2022, in the rural area of Suarez municipality (Cauca), a man was killed and his body was found near the El Amparo vereda. Perpetrators left behind a leaflet claiming the victim was 'killed for rapist' and was signed by a FARC dissident faction. 1 fatality.

On 19 April 2022, in the rural area of Rionegro municipality (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a social leader in a drive-by shooting near the Cuatro Esquinas sector. Perpetrators approached the victim and opened fire. The victim used to be an active member of social organizations and the boy scouts in the municipality. There are no further details on the potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former Government of Colombia (2018-2022); PLC: Colombian Liberal Party
source: El Tiempo (Colombia); INDEPAZ; El Espectador; UNOCHA; La Patria
notes: On 19 April 2022, in Briceno (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a former mayor in a drive-by shooting in the La Inmaculada neighborhood. The victim was a member of the PLC and was visiting family when the attack occurred. The victim had not reported death threats. There are no further details on potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of FARC dissident factions. 1 fatality.

Around 19 April 2022, in San Martin (Meta), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a woman in the Cafuches neighborhood. Perpetrators broke into the victim's house and opened fire on her several times. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 18 April 2022, in the rural area of Balboa municipality (Cauca), two young men were killed and their bodies were found near the La Roca sector. Residents claimed that the victims were part of the same group of people who were attacked around 17 April by unidentified armed individuals near Bermeja corregimiento (coded separately), but this information has not been confirmed. Days before the event, clashes were reported between two armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Jaime Martinez: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Jaime Martinez)
notes: Around 18 April 2022, in the rural area of Jamundi (Valle del Cauca), suspected members of the Jaime Martinez FARC dissident faction opened fire on a group of people on a road near the Robles corregimiento, killing one person and injuring two more. Authorities claimed the armed group distributed some leaflets hours before the attack occurred. 1 fatality.

On 18 April 2022, in Villanueva (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and injured a couple in a drive-by shooting in the El Cano neighborhood. The couple was returning to their residence when two armed men on a motorcycle approached them and opened fire. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Farmers (Colombia); Guardia Campesina (Colombia)
notes: Around 18 April 2022, in the rural area of Saravena municipality (Arauca), a social leader was killed. The victim was a member of the Guardia Campesina and other farmers' organizations in the area. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); PCC: Colombian Communist Party; Labour Group (Colombia); Refugees/IDPs (Colombia)
notes: On 18 April 2022, in the rural area of Tame municipality (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals abducted and subsequently shot dead a social leader in the Puerto Nidia vereda. The man had been displaced in January due to increasing violence in the area, but had returned to teach a workshop. The perpetrators broke into a school in the area and took him away; hours later, neighbors found the victim's body nearby. The man was a member of the PCC and a labor leader. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 18 April 2022, near Tibu municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man suspected of being involved in the killing of a Baru indigenous person over the weekend. Perpetrators left near the body a sign that claimed the victim was shot for 'killing a Motilon'. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 18 April 2022, in the rural area of Tibu municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a former ELN member. The victim had a police record for having been part of the armed group. There are no further details on the motives for the attack or the possible perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 18 April 2022, in the rural area of Convencion municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals abducted a woman teacher near the Aguablanca vereda. Perpetrators intercepted the victim and drove in the direction of the forest area. The victim was held for 4 days, after which the perpetrators released her around April 22. There are no further details on the potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups.

On 18 April 2022, in the rural area of La Parada (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man on an illegal crossing road known as La Playita. Witnesses heard a shoot-out and minutes later found the body. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of ELN and Tren de Aragua. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Comunes Party (Colombia); Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Women (Colombia)
source: Vanguardia Liberal; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; El Pais (Colombia)
notes: Around 18 April 2022, near Mesetas municipality (Meta), a woman former FARC member, who was also member of the Comunes political party, was killed and her body was found inside her house. The victim was assisting the team in monitoring the reintegration process of former FARC members and members of the political party Comunes from a gender perspective. She was an activist for women's rights, particularly for former members of the armed group. 1 fatality. [women targeted: political party supporters] [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Around 18 April 2022, in Medellin (Antioquia), a member of the LGBT community was killed and his body was found in a pension in the Padro Centro neighborhood. A pillow covered the victim's head. LGBT collectives denounced multiple incidents of similar characteristics in which a member of the community is killed and called for a prompt police investigation of the incidents alleging possible hate killings. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former Government of Colombia (2018-2022); PCC: Colombian Conservative Party
notes: Around 18 April 2022, in the rural area of Gonzalez municipality (Cesar), a former town mayor, member of the PCC party, was killed and his body was found near the La Floresta corregimiento. The victim, who was shot dead, was a well-known member of the community as his family is active in politics in the region. The man had also been investigated for the killing of a political opposition candidate. There are no further details on the possible perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of the ELN and the EPL. 1 fatality.

Around 18 April 2022, in Rionegro (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two young men in a drive-by shooting near the La Inmaculada neighborhood. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators. 2 fatalities.

On 18 April 2022, in the rural area of Castilla La Nueva municipality (Meta), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on two men in a drive-by shooting near the San Lorenzo locality. One person was killed and another was injured. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 18 April 2022, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and injured a man in a drive-by shooting in the Viento Libre neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

source: El Universal (Colombia); El Nuevo Dia (Colombia); El Heraldo (Colombia)
notes: On 18 April 2022, in Barranquilla (Atlantico), Gulf Clan members shot and killed a police officer in a drive-by shooting in the Caribe Verde sector. Perpetrators approached the officer as he drove his private motorcycle (assumed off-duty) and opened fire on the officer, wounding him in the head and the shoulder. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack. 1 fatality.

source: INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; El Colombiano; El Tiempo (Colombia); El Espectador
notes: On 17 April 2022, in the rural area of Tame municipality (Arauca), suspected ELN members opened fire on a private vehicle on the route that connects Puerto Rondon and Santo Domingo in the Las Nubes vereda. Four passengers were killed and the other five injured. Residents claimed the victims were all members of the same family and were known farmers in the region. In a public statement, the armed group claimed the victims had been mistaken for members of another armed group. 4 fatalities.

source: El Espectador; Vanguardia Liberal; El Tiempo (Colombia); UNOCHA
notes: Around 17 April 2022, in the rural area of Bermeja corregimiento (Cauca), four young men were killed and their bodies were found on a rural road. Residents stated that the victims were attacked by unidentified armed individuals that set the victim's vehicle and four motorcycles to fire. Three of the victims were tied. Around the same time, clashes between two armed groups were reported in the area. Some versions claimed the men were part of an armed group, but this has not been confirmed. 4 fatalities.

On 17 April 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), armed individuals shot and killed two men in the Heliopolis neighborhood. Witnesses claimed armed men came from an illegal crossing road with the two victims and shot them dead in the neighborhood's park. The two victims were tied up and had no identification documents with them. Further information pointed to ELN as potentially involved in the event as similar incidents have been reported in the past. 2 fatalities.

On 17 April 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), members of the ELN kidnapped a child in the Comuna 9 area. The armed group took the victim to the Catatumbo sub-region with the argument that he would find a missing family member. Subsequently, the armed men informed him that he had to stay with them. The victim was able to escape and reach the authorities around 22 April.

On 17 April 2022, in Medellin (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a police officer who was off-duty at the moment of the attack in the Comuna 3. Perpetrators beat up the victim before shooting him. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 17 April 2022, in the rural area of San Jose del Guaviare municipality (Guaviare), a man was killed and his body was found on a rural road to the El Retorno. The victim was shot dead. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 16 April 2022, in the rural area of Alcala municipality (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a Netherlands citizen near the Piedras de Moler vereda in a drive-by shooting. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 16 April 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), a moto-taxi driver was shot dead by police officers, during an identity check procedure in the San Fernando neighborhood. Authorities claimed the group attacked the officers after they found drugs, moreover claimed the victim had a criminal record. However, witnesses and family members claimed that the officer opened fire on the group, despite the fact that none of them were armed and that the victim was never in trouble with the police. 1 fatality.

On 15 April 2022, in the rural area of El Palo corregimiento (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals abducted 3 Indigenous teenagers who were members of the Huellas indigenous reserve area. Family members stated that the victims communicated with their families and informed them that they were forcibly recruited by an armed group. The victims' whereabouts are still unknown.

assoc_actor_2: Bari Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 15 April 2022 (month of), around Tibu municipality (Norte de Santander), a Bari Indigenous social leader and activist was killed by unknown perpetrators. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: On 15 April 2022, in the rural area of Jambalo municipality (Cauca), unidentified individuals abducted and subsequently killed a social leader who was a member of the local JAC of the Loma Pueblito locality. Perpetrators strangled the victim and fled the area. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: Around 13 April 2022, in the rural area of La Montanita municipality (Caqueta), a social leader, who was also member of the JAC, was killed and his body was found. The victim was abducted on 10 April by unidentified armed individuals (coded separately). Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 12 April 2022, in the rural area of Santander De Quilichao municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a local farmer in a drive-by shooting. The victim was in a local store when the perpetrators approached on a motorcycle and opened fire. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatalities.

Around 12 April 2022, in the rural area of Santa Barbara municipality (coded to Iscuande, Narino), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an Afro-Colombian man who was driving a boat, when the man tried to avoid an illegal checkpoint set up by an unidentified armed group. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: On 11 April 2022, in the rural area of Puerto Caicedo municipality (Putumayo), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a social leader who was a member of the JAC of the La Independencia vereda. Perpetrators searched for the victim at his private residence. Although the victim was rushed to a local hospital, he died due to the severity of his injuries. He had previously reported multiple death threats. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 11 April 2022, in Sincelejo (Sucre), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the La Independencia neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. Police arrested two men suspected of carrying out the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 11 April 2022, in the rural area of Silvia municipality (Cauca), two men were killed and their bodies were found in the Santa Lucia vereda. The victims were shot dead. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 11 April 2022, in Mapiripan (Meta), unidentified armed individuals raided the house of a couple and killed two of the residents. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 10 April 2022, in La Cruzada (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed one person in a drive-by shooting. The victim had arrived at the locality three days before the attack occurred. Two more people were injured in the attack. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of the Gulf Clan and the ELN. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: On 10 April 2022, in the rural area of La Montanita municipality (Caqueta), unidentified armed individuals abducted a social leader who was an active member of the JAC of the area. The victim's body was found around 13 April (coded separately). Although the perpetrators have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Jaime Martinez: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Jaime Martinez)
source: El Heraldo (Colombia); El Tiempo (Colombia); El Universal (Colombia); UNOCHA
notes: On 10 April 2022, in the rural area of El Queremal corregimiento (Valle del Cauca), members of the Jaime Martinez FARC dissident faction abducted an off-duty police officer. Perpetrators intercepted the victim's vehicle around the El Placer area and took the victim with them. The victim was later release around 23 April.

On 9 April 2022, in Bogota - Chapinero (Bogota, D.C.), two unidentified individuals attacked two members of the LGBT community near a local theater. The perpetrators approached the victims in their private vehicles and beat them with sticks and other objects. The men also attacked a group of women and civilians who came to help the victims. The attack was considered a hate crime. There were no fatalities.

On 9 April 2022, in Tibu (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the municipal park. Perpetrators attacked the victim at a local bar and then fled the area. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 9 April 2022 (weekend of), in Calamar (Guaviare), a young couple was killed by unidentified armed individuals. Perpetrators attacked the victims inside their private residence. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 9 April 2022, in San Jose del Guaviare (Guaviare), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a young man in a drive-by shooting near the El Centro neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 9 April 2022, in Granada (Meta), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a young man in a drive-by shooting. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 8 April 2022, in the rural area of Santiago de Cali (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a DJ in a drive-by shooting near the Sameco area. Perpetrators chased and opened fire on the vehicle, killing one of the occupants and injuring another. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Indigenous Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 8 April 2022, in the rural area of Mutata municipality (Antioquia), a former FARC member and a indigenous person were killed and their bodies were found on a rural road. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 8 April 2022, in San Faustino (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man who worked selling meat delivered through an illegal crossing. The perpetrators approached the victim and shot him in the head. Although the man had no threats, authorities believed the incident is related to a payment to an armed group that control the crossings. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 8 April 2022, in Magangue (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Jarillon Sur area. The victim's name appeared on a list of people threatened by an unidentified armed organization. There are no further details on the motive for the attack or the name of the group that perpetrated the attack. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 8 April 2022, in the rural area of Albania municipality (La Guajira), eight unidentified armed individuals in military gear detained the son of an indigenous leader of a Wayuu indigenous group who recently won a ruling against the construction of a wind farm on his territory. The young man was interrogated and subsequently released but followed by a pick-up truck. The community has denounced harassment incidents by armed men following the ruling in their favor.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
notes: Around 8 April 2022, in the rural area of Argelia municipality (Cauca), suspected members of the Carlos Patino FARC dissident faction shot and killed a farmer near the Santa Clara corregimiento. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 7 April 2022, in the rural area of La Parada corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found in the Los Mangos area. The victim was found near an illegal crossing road and was shot dead. The victim, who is a Venezuelan national was abducted from his house on 2 April (coded separately). The area is known for the presence of the ELN and the Tren de Aragua. 1 fatality.

On 7 April 2022, in the rural area of Barbacoas municipality (Narino), members of an unidentified armed group killed an Awa indigenous man, who was a member of the Gran Sabalo indigenous reserve area, after the victim refused to be recruited by the armed group. 1 fatality.

Around 6 April 2022 (as reported), in Guapi (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a sex worker in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators searched for the victim at a local brothel and opened fire against her. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

source: El Tiempo (Colombia); UNOCHA; El Espectador; El Pais (Colombia)
notes: Around 6 April 2022, in the rural area of Bugalagrande municipality (Valle del Cauca), two young women were killed and their bodies were found near El Tochechito corregimiento. The victims were shot in the head. Authorities claimed the victims were killed in the area. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 6 April 2022, in Soledad (Atlantico), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on the vehicle of the local hospital director in a drive-by shooting near the El Tucan neighborhood. The victim fled the attack uninjured. There are no further details on the potential perpetrators. There were no fatalities.

Around 6 April 2022, in the rural area of Jambalo municipality (Cauca), an unidentified armed individual stabbed to death a young girl member of the local Guardia Indigena. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 6 April 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a businessman in a drive-by shooting in the Latino neighborhood. The perpetrator shot at the victim multiple times and injured his wife. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Mobile Column: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Adan Izquierdo)
notes: On 6 April 2022, in Monteloro (Valle del Cauca), members of the Adan Izquierdo FARC Dissident group shot dead a woman, accusing her of being an informant of security forces, which is not confirmed. 1 fatality.

On 5 April 2022, in the rural area of Tamesis municipality (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a cattle farmer in the La Oculta vereda. Perpetrators searched for the victim at his private residence and shot him dead. His daughter was also injured. The victim was the son of a former senator and congressman for the conservative party. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 5 April 2022, near Guadalajara de Buga municipality (Valle del Cauca), a woman was killed and her body was found inside her private house. The victim's body was dismembered and hidden inside plastic bags. She was last seen on 3 April. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: Around 5 April 2022, in the rural area of El Palo corregimiento (Cauca), a young man was killed and his body was found. The victim was forcibly recruited by the Dagoberto Ramos FARC dissident faction in 2016 while still underage. Residents claimed this same organization killed the victim. 1 fatality.

source: El Espectador; El Tiempo (Colombia); UNOCHA; El Heraldo (Colombia)
notes: Around 4 April 2022, near Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), a woman was killed and her body was found in the Comuna 12 area. The victim's body was dismembered. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 4 April 2022, in the rural area of Suarez municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two construction workers in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators opened fire on the victims while they were at a local bar. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 3 April 2022, in Bogota - Ciudad Bolivar (Bogota, D.C.), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a former FARC member at his private house. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators. 1 fatality.

source: INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; El Espectador; El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: On 3 April 2022, in Puerto Concordia (Meta), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a farmer who was a social leader and active member of a farmers' organization in a drive-by shooting. The attack occurred in the El Diamante neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 3 April 2022, in the rural area of Campo Dos corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found in the Campo Leon area. The victim was shot dead and had a backpack in which he carried a military uniform. It is still unclear whether the man was a member of the military or not. Residents claimed that the victim was kidnapped, but this has also not been confirmed. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 3 April 2022, in the rural area of Puerto Wilches (Santander), a man was killed and his body was found in the La Punta sector of the Arenal neighborhood. The victim had been beaten up and had 'ELN' spray-painted on his back. 1 fatality.

On 3 April 2022, in Puerto Wilches (Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men in the Km 8 neighborhood. The victims worked as hairstylists. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators. 2 fatalities.

On 3 April 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), suspected ELN members shot and killed a woman who was abducted the day before from her house on the Venezuelan side of the border (coded separately).
