Drivers at the area near the 51 illegal crossing noticed the incident and alerted the authorities. 1 fatality.

On 3 April 2022, in the rural area of Santa Rosa del Sur municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals abducted a man, son of a known local businessman. Perpetrators broke into the victim's house and subsequently drove away with the victim. The victim was released around 23 June. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
notes: On 2 April 2022, in the rural area of Argelia (Cauca), suspected members of the Carlos Patino FARC dissident faction attacked a group of farmers in the Santa Clara area, killing one and abducting another. Witnesses stated that several former FARC members have reinsertion projects in the area, but it is unclear if the victims were former FARC members. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
source: UNOCHA; El Espectador; INDEPAZ; El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: On 2 April 2022, in the rural area of El Retorno municipality (Guaviare), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a former FARC member in a drive-by shooting near the La Libertad area. The victim had survived a previous attack in 2021. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Wayuu Indigenous Group (Colombia)
source: UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; Diario La Libertad; El Espectador
notes: On 2 April 2022, in Aremasain (La Guajira), unidentified armed individuals ambushed a social indigenous leader and two more people, killing three of them. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators. 3 fatalities.

On 2 April 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a homeless person in a drive-by shooting in the El Pozon neighborhood. Perpetrators approached the victim and opened fire several times as the man was using drugs. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. Other cases of homeless people being killed in the city have been recently reported. 1 fatality.

On 2 April 2022, in the rural area of La Parada corregimiento (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals abducted a man from his house. Perpetrators arrived at the victim's house and forced him into a vehicle claiming an armed group was punishing him. Around 7 April, the victim's body was found in an illegal crossing (coded separately). The area is known for the presence of the ELN and the Tren de Aragua.

On 2 April 2022, in Vistahermosa (Meta), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators shot at the victim while he was at a local brothel. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 1 April 2022, in the rural area of Puerto Libertador municipality (Cordoba), a man was killed and his body was found. The victim's body had signs of torture and his hand were tied. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 1 April 2022, in the rural area of Tierralta municipality (Cordoba), a woman was killed and her body was found on a rural road. The victim was taken from her residence under false pretenses and later, her body was found with several gunshot wounds. There are no further details about the attack or the possible perpetrators, but authorities have several approaches to the attack. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 1 April 2022, in Monteria (Cordoba), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a barber in a drive-by shooting in La Candelaria neighborhood. A pedestrian was also injured. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 1 April 2022, in the rural area of Toro municipality (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed men killed a social leader who was an active member of a farmers' organization. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 1 April 2022, in Puerto Libertador (Cordoba), unidentified armed individuals killed a young man who had recently left the military service. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 31 March 2022, in Medellin (Antioquia), a man member of the LGBT community was killed and his body was found in a hotel in the Padro Centro neighborhood. The victim was naked and tied up. LGBT collectives denounced that this is the third incident of similar characteristics in which a member of the community is killed and called for a prompt police investigation of the incidents alleging possible hate killings. 1 fatality.

On 31 March 2022, in Juan de Acosta (Atlantico), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a local farmer in a drive-by shooting near the Media Luna corregimiento. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 31 March 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a homeless person in a drive-by shooting near the El Pozon neighborhood. Perpetrators approached the victim and shot him in the head. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. Other cases of homeless people being killed in the city have been recently reported. 1 fatality.

Around 31 March 2022, in the rural area of Pereira municipality (Risaralda), a teacher who was a community activist and member of a human rights organization was killed and his body was found in the Boquia vereda. The victim's whereabouts had been unknown since March 29. The victim's body had multiple stab wounds and signs of a beating. 1 fatality.

Around 31 March 2022, in Argelia (Cauca), an unidentified armed man shot and killed a young man a few meters from the police station. The perpetrator shot the victim in the head and then fled the area. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 31 March 2022, in Puerto Carreno (Vichada), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man who worked transporting goods. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim at his private house in the Simon Bolivar neighborhood and subsequently fled the area. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 31 March 2022, in the rural area of Sevilla municipality (Valle del Cauca), two young men were killed and their bodies were found on a rural road. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 30 March 2022, in Barranquilla (Atlantico), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man member of the LGBT community in a drive-by shooting in Las Malvinas neighborhood. The attack occurred near the Las Malvinas neighborhood. The victim was hospitalized but died due to the severity of the wounds. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators. 1 fatality.

Around 30 March 2022, in the rural area of Medio Atrato municipality (Choco), Gulf Clan members killed and threw into the river the body of an indigenous leader who was the governor of the Tramando indigenous reserve area. The victim was abducted by the perpetrators on 25 March (coded separately). 1 fatality.

On 30 March 2022, in the rural area of La Montanita municipality (Caqueta), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in his private residence in the Puerto Gaitan vereda. Perpetrators searched for the victim at his private residence and then opened fire on him and other people who were at the house. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 30 March 2022, in Santander de Quilichao (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a private vehicle in a drive-by shooting, killing a man and injuring a woman, who were in the vehicle. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 29 March 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the Belen neighborhood. The perpetrator approached the victim and opened fire on the victim's head. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 28 March 2022, in the rural area of La Sierra municipality (Cauca), suspected ELN members opened fire on a garbage truck, injuring the driver. The attack occurred near the Quebrada Azul area. The driver remains in the hospital to treat his wounds. There were no fatalities.

On 28 March 2022, in Uribia (La Guajira), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed three Wayuu indigenous people in a drive-by shooting near the Tres de Abril neighborhood. Two victims died on the spot, while a third died on the way to the hospital due to the severity of his injuries. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators. 3 fatalities.

On 28 March 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), a man was killed in a drive-by shooting near the La Esperanza neighborhood. Four perpetrators on motorcycles intercepted the victim and opened fire. Authorities claimed the shooters were members of the Gulf Clan. 1 fatality.

Around 28 March 2022, in the rural area of Cucuta municipality (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found near the 51 crossing. The body had signs of torture, was shot dead, and his hands were tied. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but authorities believed the ELN perpetrated the attack. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Quechua Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz; El Espectador; INDEPAZ; El Tiempo (Colombia); El Universal (Colombia); El Colombiano
notes: On 28 March 2022, in the rural area of Puerto Leguizamo municipality (Putumayo), at least 11 people were killed during a military operation in the El Remanso vereda. Although authorities had initially reported the incident as an armed confrontation against an armed group, multiple social organizations and residents in the area denied the claims and stated that the victims are all residents, including farmers, Quechua indigenous people, and active social leaders. In addition, witnesses claimed that military forces modified the area in order to make the scene look like an armed confrontation. Among the victims there is a Quechua indigenous governor, and an active member of a local JAC. At least 11 fatalities.

Around 28 March 2022, in the rural area of Yumbo municipality (Valle del Cauca), an Afro-Colombian man was killed and his body was found in the Imderty area. The victim was missing since 17 March after he never returned to his house. Subsequently, his body was found with signs of torture and his hands tied. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Jaime Martinez: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Jaime Martinez)
notes: Around 27 March 2022, in the rural area of Timbio municipality (Cauca), suspected members of the Jaime Martinez FARC dissident faction abducted three civilians in the Campo Alegre vereda. The three victims were later released in a military operation, in which the military arrested 4 dissidents. One of the perpetrators committed suicide when the military arrived in the area where the hostages were being held. It has not been reported whether or not the security forces clashed with the perpetrators.

On 26 March 2022, in the rural area of Tibu municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a Venezuelan national. The victim had recently moved to work as a construction worker. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 26 March 2022, in the rural area of Cucuta municipality (Norte de Santander), a local businessman was killed and his body was found. The victim had been kidnapped in the previous days. There are no further details on the attack or possible perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 25 March 2022, in the rural area of El Aguila municipality (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed three men and a woman in the La Maria area. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 4 fatalities.

On 25 March 2022, in the rural area of Medio Atrato municipality (Choco), Gulf Clan members abducted an indigenous social leader who was the governor of the Tramando indigenous reserve area. Around 30 March, local organizations claimed that the victim was killed and his body was thrown to the Atrato river by the perpetrators (coded separately).

Around 25 March 2022, in the rural area of Banco de Arenas corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found in the El Infierno area. The victim was shot several times. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 25 March 2022, in Muzo (Boyaca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a social leader who was dedicated to promoting the work of small-scale miners. The perpetrators attacked the victim in his private home. 1 fatality.

On 25 March 2022, in Bocachica (Bolivar), in a suspected case of police brutality, one prisoner was injured inside a police station. There are no further details on the incident. The victim was hospitalized to treat his injuries. There were no fatalities.

On 25 March 2022, in Aguazul (Casanare), unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a Venezuelan national. Perpetrators approached the victim in the evening and asked him to leave the public park, to which he denied, then the armed men opened fire and shot him dead. 1 fatality.

Around 25 March 2022 (as reported), in the rural area of El Palo corregimiento (Cauca), two men were killed and their bodies were found near the El Nilo and la Trampa sector. The victims were shot dead. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 25 March 2022, in the rural area of El Tambo municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals kidnapped 5 workers of an energy company. The men were carrying out repair work when the perpetrators intercepted their vehicle in the vereda of San Barbara and forced them to the Cana Agria vereda. The victims were released after military forces launched a rescue operation in search of the victims, but it was not reported whether there were any clashes during the rescue operation. The area is known for the presence of armed groups.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 24 March 2022, in the rural area of Playa Rica corregimiento (Cauca), a former FARC member was killed and his body was found in the 20 Julio vereda. The victim was shot dead and perpetrators left behind a leaflet claiming the victim was 'killed for blackmailing residents'. Locals claimed the man worked administrating a property in the area. The area is known for the presence of FARC dissident factions and ELN. 1 fatality.

On 24 March 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a mechanic who also was a social leader in a drive-by shooting in the 7 Agosto area. The perpetrators opened fire on the victim through an open window when the man was resting in his house. The victim had reported multiples death threats after he rejected dealing with stolen vehicles. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 24 March 2022, in the rural area of Juan Frio corregimiento (Norte de Santander), two men were killed and their bodies were found near the La Ramona crossing. The victims had their hands tied and were shot dead. Witnesses claimed that suspected ELN members brought the victims on foot from one road that connects Venezuelan and Colombia, subsequently killing them on the Colombian side of the border. One of the victims had been abducted by suspected ELN members on 1 March (coded separately). 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Colombia (2018-2022); PU: Social Party of National Unity
notes: On 24 March 2022, in the rural area of La Playa de Belen municipality (coded to La Playa, Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on the vehicle with the mayor (PU), injuring the driver. The attack occurred near the La Virgen area. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

On 23 March 2022, in the rural area of Tibu municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals abducted a heavy equipment operator of a contractor of the oil company. The incident occurred on the road between Tibu and the corregimiento of Gabarra. The whereabouts of the victims are still unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups.

On 23 March 2022, in Cartagena Del Chaira (Caqueta), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed near the Limonal neighborhood. The victim worked at a car workshop. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 23 March 2022, in Tacueyo (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man who was at a bar in a drive-by shooting. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

source: El Espectador; El Colombiano; INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; El Heraldo (Colombia)
notes: Around 22 March 2022, in Medellin (Antioquia), three men were killed and their bodies were found in the Robledo commune. The victims were shot dead and two victims were Venezuelan nationals. Their bodies were thrown in a nearby landfill. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.

On 22 March 2022, in the rural area of San Onofre municipality (Sucre), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a young man in the La Libertad corregimiento. The victim went hunting with friends when the armed men opened fire against him. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 22 March 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a truck driver in a drive-by shooting in 5 Ave. Perpetrators approached the victim on a motorcycle and opened fire on him as he was in his truck. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 22 March 2022 (as reported), in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the city center. Perpetrators approached the victim and opened fire. Subsequently, a group dragged his body to the center of the street. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 22 March 2022, in Villa del Rosario (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the La Palmita neighborhood. Witnesses mentioned the perpetrators wore uniforms from a gas company. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 22 March 2022, in Santiago de Cali (Valle del Cauca), a man, a member of the LGBT community, was killed and his body was found inside his apartment in commune 14. The victim was tied up, beaten and the perpetrators cut his throat. The man was an aspiring artist and his family claimed that he had reported some death threats, but it is unclear from whom. Activists claimed that the event is related to a hate crime. 1 fatality.

On 22 March 2022, in Bello (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a Venezuelan citizen in the Paris neighborhood. Perpetrators broke into the victim's house and shot him dead. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 22 March 2022, in Puerto Narino (Arauca), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed a young woman in a drive-by shooting. The perpetrators intercepted the victim and opened fire, subsequently fleeing the area. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 22 March 2022, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a young Afro-Colombian man in the Independencia neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 22 March 2022, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), a young man was killed and his body was found in the Gamboa neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but authorities believe that the victim accidentally crossed a border limit set up by an armed group. 1 fatality.

Around 22 March 2022, in El Carmelo (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Bella Vista neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 21 March 2022, in Loma de Arena (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a local store owner in a drive-by shooting near the El Campo sector. Residents in the area claim that in recent days an unidentified armed group had distributed leaflets introducing a curfew and announcing a social cleansing. Locals fear that the recent attacks are linked to this armed group. 1 fatality.

On 21 March 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), armed individuals shot and killed two men in the Heliopolis neighborhood. Witnesses claimed five armed men came from an illegal crossing road with the two victims, asked the children in the area to leave, and minutes after the community reported the shooting. The two victims were tightened and had no identification documents with them. Although authorities initially claimed the incident may be related to gang fighting, further information pointed to ELN as potentially involved in the event. 2 fatalities.

On 21 March 2022, in Tame (Arauca), one man was killed and another one injured during an attack. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 21 March 2022, in the rural area of Curillo municipality (Caqueta), unidentified perpetrators shot two men inside their private residence. The victims were relatives, one of them died in the event. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Farmers (Colombia)
source: El Tiempo (Colombia); El Colombiano; INDEPAZ; UNOCHA
notes: On 20 March 2022, in the rural area of Argelia municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a farmer who was a social leader and member of the JAC of the Santa Clara vereda. Perpetrators arrived at the victim's house and opened fire against the man. The perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 20 March 2022, in the rural area of Corinto municipality (Cauca), a young girl was killed and her body was found on the road that connects Corinto and Miranda. Perpetrators left behind a leaflet claiming the victim was 'killed for being involved with police'. The victim was shot multiple times. Residents claimed the girl was known for being friends with local officers. The perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality. [women targeted: girls]

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 20 March 2022, in the rural area of Guapi municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a former FARC member in the Temuey vereda. After his demobilization from the armed group, the victim continued to work promoting peace as part of a social association in the area. The area is known for the presence of ELN, FARC dissident factions, and other armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 20 March 2022, in the rural area of Tunia corregimiento (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a couple in a drive-by shooting near the Tunia toll booth. The victims were driving back after attending a cockfight. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups . 2 fatalities.

Around 20 March 2022, in the rural area of La Parada corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found in the Los Mangos area. The victim was found near an illegal crossing road and worked carrying goods between the border. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but witnesses claimed he had had an altercation with some member of the Venezuelan authorities the night before his body was found. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 20 March 2022 (weekend of), in the rural area of Timba corregimiento (Valle del Cauca), the body of a young man abducted on 17 March (coded separately) was found. The victim was tortured and his body was dismembered. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of FARC dissident factions. 1 fatality.

On 20 March 2022, in Guapi (Cauca), an unidentified armed individual opened fire on a group of people in the Santa Monica neighborhood. The victims were sitting in front of a private residence when the perpetrator approached and opened fire, injuring two people. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of the ELN FARC dissident factions and other armed groups. There were no fatalities.

On 20 March 2022, in Maria La Baja (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Marica El Ultimo neighborhood. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim when he played dominos with friends in front of his private residents. Subsequently, perpetrators fled the area on a motorcycle. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 20 March 2022, in Santa Barbara (Antioquia), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed a couple in a drive-by shooting near the central park. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 19 March 2022, in El Plateado (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals killed a farmer. Perpetrators forced the victim out of his private house, and a few hours after the incident, residents found the victim's body. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of FARC dissident factions and ELN. 1 fatality.

source: INDEPAZ; El Espectador; El Heraldo (Colombia); El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: Around 18 March 2022, in San Andres (San Andres y Providencia), a local LGBT activist was killed and his body was found near the La Cueva de Morgan. The victim worked as a dancer at local hotels and promoted dance among the community. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 18 March 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a local business contractor in the Arroz Barato neighborhood. The victim was hospitalized but he died due to the severity of the wounds. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 18 March 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a moto-taxi driver in a drive-by shooting in the Olaya Herrera neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
notes: Around 18 March 2022, in the rural area of El Plateado corregimiento (Cauca), suspected members of the Carlos Patino FARC dissident faction abducted nearly 20 young people, accusing them of being drug users. Five of the victims were killed (coded separately), and five more were released after residents searched for the victims. The whereabouts of the other 10 victims remain unknown.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
notes: Around 18 March 2022, in the rural area of El Plateado corregimiento (Cauca), suspected members of the dissident FARC faction Carlos Patino killed at least five young men, accusing them of being drug users. The victims were abducted along with 15 other persons (coded separately). Local organizations claimed that the bodies of other victims were thrown into a local river, but this information has not been confirmed. A second source reported 6 people have been killed. At least 5 fatalities.

On 18 March 2022, in Cerete (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the Villa Celina neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. Further information claimed one of the victims had criminal records and was known for pretending to be a member of the Gulf Clan. 2 fatalities.

On 18 March 2022, in Saravena (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a health worker in the Las Villas neighborhood. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 17 March 2022, in the rural area of Timba corregimiento (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals abducted a young man from his private residence in the Chagres vereda. The victim and his family had moved to the area two weeks ago. Around 20 March the victim's remains were found in a rural area of the same municipality (coded separately). There are no further details on potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of FARC dissident factions. There were no fatalities.

Around 17 March 2022, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an Afro-Colombian man in the Los Pinos neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 17 March 2022, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the Los Pinos neighborhood. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 16 March 2022, in Bolombolo (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals killed three people, among them two young people and a Venezuelan citizen. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.

Around 16 March 2022, in the rural area of Loma De Arena corregimiento (Bolivar), a young fisherman was killed and his body was found near El Patio del Muho area. The victim was shot several times. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 16 March 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals broke into a private birthday party and opened fire on the guests, injuring three people. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

On 16 March 2022, in Venadillo (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 16 March 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a mechanic in a drive-by shooting in the Palmeras neighborhood. Perpetrators opened fire when the victim was in a maintenance shop. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 16 March 2022, in Medellin (Antioquia), unidentified individuals killed a member of the LGBT community. The victim arrived at his house with two men, who subsequently abandoned the house in a rush. Subsequently, a victim's relatives found his body in the room tied. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
notes: Around 16 March 2022, in the rural area of El Tambo municipality (Cauca), suspected members of the Carlos Patino FARC dissident faction shot and injured a woman in a drive-by shooting in the La Florida vereda. Perpetrators arrived at the victim's house on a motorcycle, opened fire, and fled the area. Perpetrators left behind a leaflet claiming the victim was 'killed for being nosy and vicious'. The victim remains in the hospital. There were no fatalities.

Around 15 March 2022, in the rural area of La Parada corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found in the Los Mangos area. The victim was found near an illegal crossing road. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 15 March 2022, in Cartago (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a vehicle in a drive-by shooting in the La Libertad area. Two people were killed and another one resulted injured. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 15 March 2022, in the rural area of Convencion municipality (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found in the La Trinidad vereda. The victim was shot multiple times. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 15 March 2022 (month of), in Bogota - Engativa (Bogota, D.C.), a lawyer was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in the Modelia neighborhood. Authorities said the attack could be related to his work as a lawyer. The brother of the victim, who was also a lawyer, was killed in similar circumstances on 12 July 2022 (coded separately). 1 fatality.

Around 15 March 2022, in the rural area of Restrepo (Valle del Cauca), one woman was killed and a man was injured in a shooting attack in la Calimita vereda. There are no further details on the reasons for the incident or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups, 1 fatality.

On 15 March 2022, in the rural area of Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), a fisherman was killed and his body was found in the La Gloria area. Witnesses claimed they heard shotguns hours after the body was found. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 15 March 2022, near Cartago municipality (Valle del Cauca), a man was killed and his body was found. The victim was shot several times. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

source: El Tiempo (Colombia); INDEPAZ; El Colombiano; UNOCHA
notes: On 14 March 2022, in the rural area of Popayan municipality (Cauca), an indigenous social leader was killed and his body was found in the Las Chozas vereda. Witnesses claimed the victim was last seen early the same day after finishing a meeting with local authorities. A week before the attack, the victim's name had been published in a threatening pamphlet by suspected members of the Aguilas Negras. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 14 March 2022, in Pitalito (Huila), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a former FARC member in the Los Pinos neighborhood. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators. 1 fatality.

Around 14 March 2022, in the rural area of Chinu municipality (Cordoba), a young farmer was killed and his body was found near the Flecha Sevilla corregimiento. The victim was shot and perpetrators left behind a leaflet claiming the victim was 'killed for rat'. Authorities believe the incident may be a settling of scores, but this has not been confirmed. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 14 March 2022, in the rural area of Pinuna Blanca area (Putumayo), police forces entered into a Nasa indigenous territory. They destroyed several coca crops in the Kwesx Kiwe indigenous reserve area. The civilians claimed that the officers threw rubber bullets and tear gas at community members when they approached them to ask them not to damage the crops before reaching an agreement. One indigenous person was reported injured and arrested by the officers. There were no fatalities.

On 14 March 2022, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals killed a young Afro-Colombian person in the Antonio Narino neighborhood. The victim had recently returned to the municipality after living abroad for several years. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Labour Group (Colombia); Raizal Ethnic Group (Colombia); Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia)
source: El Espectador; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; El Tiempo (Colombia); El Heraldo (Colombia)
notes: On 13 March 2022, in San Andres (San Andres y Providencia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a Black musician in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim when he sat in front of his private residence. The man was known for promoting the Raizal culture and residents of the island said he was considered a social leader in the community. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carolina Ramirez Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carolina Ramirez Front)
notes: Around 13 March 2022 (between 13 - 14 March), in the rural area of Puerto Alegria municipality (Amazonas), suspected members of the Carolina Ramirez FARC dissident faction raided a village near the limits of the Puerto Leguizamo municipality (Putumayo). Perpetrators killed an unspecified number of people, among the victims, there is the nephew of an indigenous leader who had reported death threats the days before the attack occurred. Unknown number of fatalities coded as 3.

On 13 March 2022, in the rural area of Murindo municipality (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals held hostages a group of 15 civilians who helped at the election poll. Victims were intercepted by the armed men near the Opogado, Campo Alegre, and Bella Luz areas. They were released hours later. The area is known for the presence of armed groups.

Around 11 March 2022 (as reported), in Guapi (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals abducted a student. Perpetrators intercepted the victim in the town center and drove away with him. The victim's whereabouts remain unknown. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups.

On 11 March 2022, in the rural area of Carepa municipality (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals attacked the vehicle of two women running candidates for one of 16 legislative seats reserved for armed conflict victims. Perpetrators opened fire on the car, injuring one of the occupants. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities. [women targeted: candidates for office]

Around 11 March 2022, in Saravena (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a political activist in a drive-by shooting. The man is a promoter of the blank vote in the municipality and was a running candidate for the mayor's office in the past election. Perpetrators intercepted the victim and his wife and opened fire, injuring him and killing the woman. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 11 March 2022, in Santa Marta (Magdalena), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed three people in a drive-by shooting in the Gaira neighborhood. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of Gulf Clan members. 3 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 11 March 2022, in the rural area of Cumbal municipality (Narino), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a former FARC member near the San Juan corregimiento. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 11 March 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), a man was killed and his body was found in the Membrillar neighborhood. The victim had signs of torture and his hands and feet were tied. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 11 March 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a young student in a drive-by shooting in the Claret neighborhood. Neighbors brought the victim to a local hospital but he died due to the severity of the wounds. There are no further details on the reasons for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 11 March 2022, in Vegachi (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty police officer. Perpetrators attacked the man when he walked on the streets of the Puerto Nuevo neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia); Former Government of Colombia (2018-2022); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 11 March 2022, in Lopez de Micay (coded to Lopez, Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a former city mayor in a drive-by shooting: The man was a known Afro-Colombian social leader. The victim was under investigation for electoral fraud. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 10 March 2022, in Medellin (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed the vice-dean of a local university in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim nine times when she approached her house in the Laureles neighborhood. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Farmers (Colombia); Protestant Christian Group (Colombia)
notes: On 10 March 2022, in the rural area of Banco De Arenas corregimiento (Norte de Santander), suspected Gulf Clan members shot and killed a local social leader and three more people near the El Infierno vereda. Witnesses stated that the gunmen were returning from an armed confrontation against the ELN (coded separately) when they began attacking civilians on their way. Among the victims were the leader who was a member of the local JAC, an evangelic priest, a farmer, and his assistant. 4 fatalities.

On 10 March 2022, in Bucaramanga (Santander), unidentified armed individuals attacked a trans woman who was an activist for LGBT rights. Perpetrators arrived at the victim's store on a motorcycle. One of them broke into the premises and stabbed the woman in the neck. The victim died due to the severity of her injuries. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
source: El Tiempo (Colombia); El Pais (Colombia); El Colombiano; UNOCHA
notes: On 9 March 2022, in the rural area of Caloto municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals abducted four indigenous children from a rural school in the El Credo area near the Las Huellas indigenous reserve area. Residents claimed that the victims were forcibly recruited by an armed group operating in the area. Two of the victims were later released by members of the Guardia Indigena near El Tambo (Cauca). The other two victims' whereabouts are still unknown. Authorities claimed the FARC dissident faction Dagoberto Ramos as responsible for the incident.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Jorge Briceno Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Jorge Briceno Front)
notes: On 9 March 2022, in the rural area of La Montanita municipality (Caqueta), suspected members of the FARC dissident faction Jorge Briceno shot and killed a social leader in the Miramar vereda. The victim was an activist in the national program for the substitution of illicit crops. 1 fatality.

On 9 March 2022, in Sincelejo (Sucre), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a recycler worker in a drive-by shooting in the El Cortijo neighborhood. Perpetrators intercepted the victim has who was running behind a dump truck and shot him in the head several times. Residents in the area stated that the victim used to work at night, but decided to switch to daytime hours after a personal dispute with unidentified individuals. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Farmers (Colombia)
notes: Around 9 March 2022, in the rural area of Villagarzon municipality (Putumayo), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a social leader in the Villa Colombia vereda. The victim was a farmer and an active member of the local JAC. He was working at his house when armed men arrived and opened fire on him. Although the perpetrator of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 9 March 2022 (as reported), in Cartagena (Bolivar), a woman was seriously injured in an suspected case of police brutality. Witnesses claimed that a police officer opened fire several times after the driver of a motorcycle refused to provide police officers with an identification document in an identity check. The shots wounded the woman, who is in the ICU for treatment of her injuries. There were no fatalities.

Around 8 March 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a Venezuelan citizen in a drive-by shooting in the Belen neighborhood. Perpetrators approached the victim and opened fire on the man, subsequently fleeing the area on a motorcycle. The victim worked selling goods at a local store. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 8 March 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and injured a man in a drive-by shooting in the Latino neighborhood. Perpetrators arrived at the victim's bicycle store and opened fire using a weapon with a silencer. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: Around 8 March 2022 (as reported), in the rural area of Puerto Alegria municipality (Amazonas), suspected FARC dissidents killed three people. There are no further details on the attack. 3 fatalities.

Around 8 March 2022, in La Granja (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a young man. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim when he drove on his motorcycle through the vereda. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 8 March 2022, in the rural area of Caloto municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and injured a teenager in the Santa Rosa vereda. The victim was shot in the head several times. The victim was severely injured but survived the attack. There are no further details on the incident or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: Around 7 March 2022, in the rural area of Planadas municipality (Tolima), a social leader who was a member of the local JAC in Armenia was killed and his body was found hidden in the area of El Hueco. Although the authorities stated that the event could be related to a robbery, this has not yet been proven. Moreover, witnesses claimed that armed men had previously searched for the victim at his house and forced him out of the residence. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 7 March 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a moto-taxi driver in the El Pozo neighborhood. The perpetrators broke into the victim's residence and opened fire on the man several times. The family still does not know the motives for the attack. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 33rd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (33rd Front)
notes: On 7 March 2022, in Ocana (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Belen neighborhood. Perpetrators left a leaflet claiming the man was killed for using drugs and signed by the FARC dissident faction 33rd. 1 fatality.

On 7 March 2022, in the rural area of Perea corregimiento (Amazonas), an unidentified armed group shot and killed two workers of a telecommunications company who were carrying out repair work. The armed group arrived at the place where the men were and shot them dead, then forced their driver to go to the municipality of Puerto Leguizamo, where he was later killed (coded separately). The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 7 March 2022, in Puerto Leguizamo (Putumayo), members of an unidentified armed group shot and killed the driver of a telecommunications company. On the same day, the group had killed two other workers (coded separately) in the rural area of Perea corregimiento (Amazonas). They had forced the driver to go to the municipality of Puerto Leguizamo, where he was later killed. 1 fatality.

On 7 March 2022, in the rural area of Calamar municipality (Guaviare), unidentified individuals killed two men who were transporting goods to the town. There are no further details on motives for the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

source: UNOCHA; El Tiempo (Colombia); El Espectador; El Colombiano
notes: Around 6 March 2022 (weekend of), near Caldono municipality (Cauca), two underage indigenous people were killed and their bodies were found on a road that connects the town with the locality of Belen, near the La Cucharita area. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 6 March 2022 (weekend of), in La Curva (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a resident. Perpetrators also shot and injured a well-known local leader. Perpetrators arrived at a store looking for the victims and opened fire on them as they identified them among the diners. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 6 March 2022, in the rural area of Castilla la Nueva municipality (Meta), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two residents in a drive-by shooting. The victims were a dad and his son. Perpetrators approached them when they were walking in the area and opened fire on them. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Labour Group (Colombia); Refugees/IDPs (Colombia)
notes: On 5 March 2022, in the rural area of Barranco De Loba municipality (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a social leader in a drive-by shooting in the La Riqueza corregimiento. Armed men intercepted the victim and opened fire several times, injuring another three people. The victim was a member of the local JAC and worked to promote the right of small-scale miners in the area and was a victim of forced displacement. The area is known for the presence of Gulf Clan members and ELN. 1 fatality.

Around 5 March 2022, in the rural area of Aspasica corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a farmer was killed and his body was found on a rural road. The victim was shot several times in the head, and perpetrators left behind a leaflet claiming the victim was 'killed for pirating'. Nevertheless, relatives claimed the victim might have been killed in a robbery as none of the victim's belongings was found. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 5 March 2022, in the rural area of Cartagena Del Chaira municipality (Caqueta), a man was killed and his body was found in the El Paujil area. The victim had hands and feet tied and was shot several times. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 5 March 2022, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Jorge Eliecer Gaitan neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

notes: Around 4 March 2022, in the rural area of San Jose del Guaviare municipality (Guaviare), a former FARC member was killed and his body was found in the Colinas vereda. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of FARC dissident factions and other armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 4 March 2022, in Sabaletas (Choco), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a woman. Perpetrators broke into the store the victim owned and opened fire on her. Although the perpetrator of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 4 March 2022, in the rural area of Aguasclaras corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a taxi driver was killed and his body was found on a rural road. Near the El Chamizo area. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 4 March 2022, near San Faustino corregimiento (Norte de Santander), two men were killed and their bodies were found on a rural road. Perpetrators searched for one of the victims at his private house and forced him into a vehicle. There is no further information about the second victim. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 4 March 2022, in the rural area of Buenaventura municipality (Valle del Cauca), a man was killed and his body was found in the Zaragoza area. Residents claimed the victim worked as a miner. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 3 March 2022, in Convencion (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a political activist who was a militant for the CD political party in a drive-by shooting. The victim requested a security detail due to increasing death threats. Although the perpetrator of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 3 March 2022, in Barrancabermeja (Santander), unidentified armed individuals opened fire in the vehicle of a local journalist in a drive-by shooting in the Colombia neighborhood. The victim fled the attack unharmed. Although authorities stated that the incident is related to a robbery, the victim received death threats to his private phone in the days leading up to the incident. In addition, the victim has been assigned a security detail for being considered a person at risk of attack. There were no fatalities.

On 2 March 2022, in Puerto Carreno (Vichada), unidentified armed individuals killed a person in a drive-by shooting in the Santa Helenita neighborhood. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 2 March 2022, in Puerto Carreno (Vichada), a man was killed and his body was found in a local landfill. The victim was shot. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 1 March 2022, in Maicao (La Guajira), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed three Wayuu indigenous people in a drive-by shooting in the Pastrana neighborhood. Perpetrators searched for the victims at one of their residences, broke into the house, and opened fire on the group, subsequently fleeing the area on a motorcycle. Authorities expressed that the incident was possibly related to a settling of scores, but this version has not been confirmed. 3 fatalities.

On 1 March 2022, in the rural area of San Onofre municipality (Sucre), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near the El Deseo plot of land. Perpetrators approached the victim on a motorcycle and opened fire several times. Although the perpetrator of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 1 March 2022, in the rural area of Villa del Rosario municipality (Norte de Santander), suspected ELN members abducted a man and took him to Venezuela. The victim was killed and his body was found around 24 March (coded separately).

Around 1 March 2022, in Tibu (Norte de Santander), ELN members held hostage a running candidate for one of 16 legislative seats reserved for armed conflict victims. Perpetrators intercepted the victim in the town, forced him to drive into a different area, and held him with the group for several hours. Subsequently, the victim was released but the armed men stole the vehicle that was part of his security detail.

Around 28 February 2022, in the rural area of Tibu municipality (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found in the Bertrania vereda. The victim was shot several times in the head and the body. Witnesses claimed they heard members of an unidentified armed group talking about scaring the victim, but this information has not been confirmed. The area is known for the presence of ELN and FARC dissident factions. 1 fatality.

Around 28 February 2022, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), a woman was killed and her body was found in a landfill in the city. Perpetrators dismembered the body. On 28 February 2022, in the rural area of El Carmen De Bolivar municipality (Bolivar), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed a local farmer at his private house in the Rabo Largo area. On 28 February 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), two people were shot and killed in two separate incidents. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

The group demanded payment for the release of the victim. On 17 February, authorities reported the teenager was released following the intervention of a humanitarian organization.

The incident occurred near the Peracos, on the route to Tasajero. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 16 February 2022 (as reported), in Murindo (Antioquia), members of an unidentified armed group choked to death an indigenous person member of the Urriquitado Alto indigenous reserve. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of ELN and Gulf Clan members. 1 fatality.

On 16 February 2022, in the rural area of Belmira municipality (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Zancudito vereda. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the department is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 16 February 2022, in El Bagre (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a young man. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim on his back. The incident happened in the El Porvenir neighborhood. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 16 February 2022, in the rural area of El Bagre municipality (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near la Paz area. Although the perpetrator of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 16 February 2022, in the rural area of Giraldo municipality (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Boqueron vereda. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the department is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 16 February 2022, in San Carlos (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Las Vegas neighborhood. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim in a drive-by shooting when he was walking on the streets. The department is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 16 February 2022, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an Afro-Colombian man in a drive-by shooting in the El Reten area. The victim worked at the bus terminal and was on his way to his job when the attack took place. Hours later, in a similar incident, another man was killed in the Juan XXIII neighborhood. The victim was an Afro-Colombian fruit seller. Although the perpetrators of the attacks have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 15 February 2022, in Mojarras vereda (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals abducted and subsequently killed two women who were also members of the local community council. Perpetrators took the victims from their private house to a nearby creek and shot them dead. One of the victims was the mother of a renowned young leader from the area. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders] [women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons]

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 15 February 2022, in the rural area of Puerto Gaitan municipality (Meta), suspected FARC dissidents opened fire on a group of Venezuelan citizens who were at a local bar in Puerto Triunfo vereda, killing two people and injuring two more. 2 fatalities.

On 15 February 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a local businessman in a drive-by shooting in the Villas de Aranjuez neighborhood. Perpetrators intercepted the victim's vehicle and opened fire on the man. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, and relatives claimed the victim did not have previous attacks or death threats. 1 fatality.

Around 15 February 2022, in Medellin (Antioquia), a Colombo-Venezuelan man member of the LGBT community was killed and his body was found at his house in the Las Acacias neighborhood. The victim's body was found by his boyfriend and was naked and tied up. LGBT collectives denounced that this is the third incident of similar characteristics in which a member of the community is killed and called for a prompt police investigation of the incidents alleging possible hate killings. 1 fatality.

On 15 February 2022, in Medellin (Antioquia), unidentified individuals attacked a Lebanese-Australian citizen member of the LGBT community. The victim was hospitalized after the perpetrators impaled him. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but LGBT collectives called for a prompt police investigation alleging a possible hate incident. There were no fatalities.

Around 15 February 2022 (month of), near Argelia municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals forcibly recruited an Indigenous teenage girl from the Pajarito vereda. The victim was killed around 15 April (month of) during an armed clash between two unidentified armed groups (coded separately). The area is known for the presence of armed groups. [women targeted: girls]

On 15 February 2022, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an Afro-Colombian worker in a drive-by shooting in the Punta del Este area. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 14 February 2022, in Leiva (Narino), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a woman local social leader. Perpetrators approached the victim as she was on the way to her house and opened fire on her several times. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 14 February 2022, in Siberia (Magdalena), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a worker of a coffee plantation. Perpetrators arrived at the victim's house, chased him inside the residency and opened fire against him. The victim was the son of a renowned social leader who was being the victim of extortion. The perpetrator of the attack has not been confirmed. 1 fatality.

On 14 February 2022, in La Quebrada (Sucre), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a resident in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators arrived at the store where the victim worked and opened fire on the man 5 times. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of the Gulf Clan. 1 fatality.

Around 14 February 2022, in Altavista (Antioquia), a man was killed and his body was found. The victim's body had several signs of violence. There are no further details about the attack or the possible perpetrators. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 14 February 2022, in Apartado (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a worker of a public utility company in a drive-by shooting. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 14 February 2022, in Taraza (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals killed a young man in the Puente Roto neighborhood. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 13 February 2022, near Betoyes (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals abducted a woman and her baby. Perpetrators intercepted the victim's vehicle and fled the area with the car and the victims. Relatives claimed they received a call demanding payment for the woman's release. Around 14 February, the victim was released. The area is known for the presence of armed groups.

Around 13 February 2022, in the rural area of Miranda (Cauca), two young men were killed and their bodies were found in the Los Guaduales area. Witnesses claimed armed men took the men to the area and subsequently shot them in the head. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: Around 13 February 2022 (as reported), in the rural area of Puerto Caicedo municipality (Putumayo), police forces entered into a Nasa indigenous territory. They destroyed several coca crops in the Selva Hermosa and Guayabales indigenous reserve areas. The civilians claimed that the officers threw tear gas at community members when they approached them to ask them not to damage the crops before reaching an agreement. There were no fatalities.

On 13 February 2022, in Bosconia (Cesar), unidentified armed individuals killed two people in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators opened fire on the victims when these were at a local park. One of the victims was a city hall worker. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 13 February 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man who was a worker for the departmental government. Perpetrators arrived where the victim had gathered with friends in the La Maria neighborhood and opened fire on him. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but sources claimed the victim was known in the area for supporting social initiatives in the neighborhood. 1 fatality.

On 13 February 2022, in the rural area of Tame municipality (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals abducted a local farmer. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. The whereabouts of the victim are still unknown.

Around 13 February 2022, in Santiago de Cali (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals killed a young man in a drive-by shooting in the Alto Jordan neighborhood. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 12 February 2022, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed a Venezuelan citizen who was visiting his family in the city. The victim was at a local pool in the Cundinamarca neighborhood when the perpetrator came into the bar and opened fire on the victim. Although the perpetrator of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

notes: On 12 February 2022, in Sevilla (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals attacked and killed the former mayor for the PLC party. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 12 February 2022, near Saravena municipality (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a car mechanic in his workshop near La ye Puerto Lleras. The victim was a Venezuelan national. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 12 February 2022, in Tame (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Bellavista neighborhood. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 12 February 2022, in Santander De Quilichao (Cauca), three people were killed in three separate incidents. In the Morales neighborhood, an unidentified armed man broke into a barbershop and opened fire on a young man, killing him. During the evening in the Porvenir neighborhood, armed men killed a Venezuelan citizen in a drive-by shooting. Within a few minutes of difference, an unidentified perpetrator shot dead a recycling worker. Although the perpetrators of the attacks have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.

On 12 February 2022, in the rural area of Santander De Quilichao (Cauca), a man was killed and his body was found on the road that connects the municipal seat with the corregimiento of Timba. The victim worked as moto-taxi driver. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 11 February 2022, in Otu (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals raided a public pool, killing three people and injuring another. Perpetrators arrived at the facilities and opened fire on the civilians. Although perpetrators have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.

Around 11 February 2022, in the rural area of Buenaventura municipality (Valle del Cauca), the remains of two people abducted by suspected ELN members on 7 June 2021 (coded separately) were found near the Bocas del Rio Cajambre. Police found the bodies after receiving reports from residents that men were digging a grave. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 33rd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (33rd Front)
notes: Around 11 February 2022, in Abrego (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found in the La Inmaculada neighborhood. Near the body, authorities found a pamphlet stating that the attack had been perpetrated by FARC dissident faction 33, as the victim was a thief and drug user. 1 fatality.

Around 11 February 2022, in Puerto Santander municipality (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found near the Las Delicias area. The victim was shot at least 9 times. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 11 February 2022, in La Quebrada (Sucre), a man was killed and his body was found in a local creek with several gunshot wounds. There is no further information on the potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of the Gulf Clan. 1 fatality.

Around 11 February 2022, in Villa del Rosario (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found in the San Jose neighborhood. Authorities believe the perpetrators took the victim to the top of a cliff, killed him, and then dumped him off the cliff so that his body would not be found. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former Government of Colombia (2018-2022); Labour Group (Colombia); Women (Colombia)
notes: On 11 February 2022, in Morales (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two women in the Modelo neighborhood. Perpetrators opened fire on the victims when they were riding on a motorcycle. The women were a mother and her daughter, and one of them used to be a former employee for the mayor's office. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.
On 11 February 2022, in Fortul (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and injured a man in a drive-by shooting in the Ramirez neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups.

On 11 February 2022, in the rural area of Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), Gulf Clan members abducted an Afro-Colombian man who was a member of the community La Nueva Esperanza, of the Community Council of the Black Community Cuenca Baja del Rio Calima. The victim was returning home after being forcibly displaced from the area on 2 February. The man boarded the passenger boat that covers the Colonia-Bajo San Juan route, and at the point known as La Mojarra, about 20 minutes from the pier, the boat was intercepted by the armed men, who forced him to get off. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 10 February 2022, in Guabas (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a social leader in the El Sol neighborhood in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators intercepted the victim and opened fire on him several times. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 10 February 2022, in Cartagena (Bolivar), a man was killed in a barbershop in the Los Campanos neighborhood in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators broke into the store and shot dead the victim. The man had a police record. There are no further details on potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 10 February 2022, in Sincelejo (Sucre), unidentified armed individuals shot and injured a man near the El Papayo neighborhood in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim several times and subsequently fled the area. The victim had a police record. There are no further details on potential perpetrators. The area is known for the presence of armed groups.

Around 10 February 2022, in the rural area of San Vicente Del Caguan municipality (Caqueta), a man was killed and his body was found near la Cristalina de Lozada area. There are no further details on the attack, potential perpetrators or victim's identity. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
