On 12 December 2021, in the rural area of Mallama municipality (coded to Piedrancha, Narino), unidentified armed men broke into a house in the El Pailon vereda and opened fire on the residents, killing four people. The victims were one man, two women, and a child, all members of the same family. There are no further details on the potential perpetrators. 4 fatalities.

Around 12 December 2021 (as reported), in Puerto Lopez (Meta), two men were killed and their bodies were found in the Clemente Naranjo neighborhood. There is no information about the perpetrators or the motive of the attack but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 10 December 2021, in the rural area of Acandi municipality (Choco), an Afro-Colombian social leader was killed and his body was found. The victim was a leader in land restitution processes among Afro-Colombian communities. Perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 10 December 2021, in Betulia (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a group of civilians in the Narino neighborhood, killing one person and injuring five more. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, several armed groups are disputing the control of the area. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 33rd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (33rd Front)
source: El Universal (Colombia); Diario La Libertad; La Opinion (Colombia)
notes: On 10 December 2021, in the sub-region of Catatumbo (coded to Cucuta, Norte de Santander), members of the 33rd FARC dissident faction abducted a man accusing him of being a drug user. The victim was taken to a residence in rural El Tarra and forced into forced labor with poor food. The victim was released during a military operation around 8 June 2022, in which three other victims who had been previously abducted on two different dates (coded separately) were freed, and multiple explosive materials were seized.

On 10 December 2021, in the rural area of Amalfi municipality (Antioquia), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in Naranjal vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 10 December 2021, in Medellin (Antioquia), a member of the LGBT community was killed, and his body was found in the Campo Valdes neighbourhood. The victim was naked and was stabbed several times. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 10 December 2021, in the rural area of Santa Rosa de Osos municipality (Antioquia), two men was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in the Gimani neighborhood. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 8 December 2021, in Tibu (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a resident near the Municipal Park. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim while he drove on his motorcycle, injuring a second person in the attack. Perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, but the area is known for the presence of ELN members and FARC dissidents faction. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 33rd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (33rd Front)
notes: Around 7 December 2021, in Tibu (Norte de Santander), members of the FARC 33rd dissident front captured and tied up a suspected drug user to a street light in the center of town. The group left a sign near the victims claiming that the man was consuming drugs in the community. Residents fear that the group is carrying out a social cleansing, as this is the second incident in less than a week. There were no fatalities.

On 7 December 2021, in Santa Marta (Magdalena), unidentified armed individuals killed a trans woman who is also an LGBT social leader in a drive-by shooting in the Ondas del Caribe neighborhood. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim several times. The trans woman had requested protection from the UNP due to several death threats from the Gulf Clan and two previous attacks in 2020. Residents of the city believed Gulf Clan was responsible for the attack but this information was not confirmed. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 7 December 2021, in the rural area of Pueblo Bello municipality (Cesar), two farmers were killed by suspected members of an unidentified armed group. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but residents have reported the presence of armed men over the pasts weeks. 2 fatalities.
On 6 December 2021, in San Jose de Apartado corregimiento, in the rural area of Apartado municipality (Antioquia), a farmer was killed by Gulf Clan members in El Guineo vereda. 1 fatality.

Around 6 December 2021 (as reported), in Tacueyo (Cauca), an Indigenous woman was shot and killed and her body was found. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 5 December 2021, in the rural area of Samana municipality (Caldas), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a social leader from the municipality of Narino (Antioquia) in the Cristales Vereda. Perpetrators approached the victim and opened fire on him when he was chatting with a resident. The victim worked as a miner near the Samana River. The other person was injured in the attack. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 33rd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (33rd Front)
notes: Around 5 December 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Campo Dos corregimiento (Norte de Santander), members of the dissident front 33 of the FARC abducted for several hours a group of journalists covering a report on the armed conflict in the area. The perpetrators forced the team to move almost 20 kilometers away from the populated area. The armed group later released the men on the same day.

Around 5 December 2021, in the rural area of Buenos Aires municipality (Cauca), two unidentified armed individuals opened fire in the house of a family of local farmers in the San Miguel vereda, killing one person and injuring two more. Survivors of the attack claimed perpetrators arrived at the house asking for a family member who is a military officer in another department. The perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 5 December 2021 (as reported), in Tulua (Valle del Cauca), a person was killed and their decapitated body was found in La Playita sector. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 4 December 2021, in La Pedregosa (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals raided a local bar, killing one person and injuring six more. Perpetrators have not been confirmed, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 4 December 2021, in the rural area of Banco De Arenas corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found near the El Infierno area. The victim had several gunshot wounds on his body. Perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of the ELN and Gulf Clan members. 1 fatality.

Around 4 December 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Tibu municipality (Norte de Santander), a woman was killed and her body was found with her throat slit inside her house in Socuavo Norte vereda. The motive of the attack is being investigated by the authorities. There is presence of the ELN and FARC dissident factions in the area. 1 fatality.

On 3 December 2021, in the rural area of Puerto Santander municipality (Norte de Santander), a Venezuelan street vendor was killed and his body was found with four gunshot wounds in the El Diamante vereda. Witnesses saw the victim selling his products in the town's main square hours before finding his body. Perpetratrors of the attack have not been confirmed, but the area is known for the presence of the ELN and Gulf Clan members. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former Government of Colombia (2018-2022); PU: Social Party of National Unity
notes: On 3 December 2021, in La Palmilla (Risaralda), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed the former mayor (PU) of the municipality of Alcala (Valle del Cauca) and another person who was with the victim in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators intercepted the victims' vehicle and opened fire several times, killing both passengers. 2 fatalities.

Around 3 December 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of El Tambo municipality (Cauca), a farmer was shot several times and killed and his body was found in the Cuatro Esquinas corregimiento. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Awa Indigenous Group (Colombia); Guardia Indigena (Colombia); Indigenous Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 2 December 2021, in the rural area of Tumaco (Narino), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an Awa indigenous person who was also a member of the local Guardia Indigena. Perpetrators abducted the victim from his house, few hours after this incident, the community organized a commission to search for the victim and found his body with several gunshot wounds in the El Pinde area. The authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 2 December 2021 (as reported), in Remedios municipality (Antioquia), a man was shot and killed by Gulf Clan members and his body was found next to a sign that read 'For being a rat, an extortionist and a motorcycle thief, AGC'. The victim had been reported missing from Segovia municipality hours before the body was found. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Indigenous Group (Colombia); CRIC: Indigenous Regional Council of Cauca
notes: On 1 December 2021, in the rural area of El Tambo (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and injured an indigenous person who is an active member of the CRIC. Perpetrators intercepted the victim when he drove on his motorcycle near the Cajete area, injuring the victim on his shoulder. The authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

On 1 December 2021, in the rural area of Yolombo municipality (Antioquia), two men were shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in Las Frias vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Jaime Martinez: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Jaime Martinez)
notes: Around 30 November 2021, in Mazamorreros (Cauca), suspected members of the Jaime Martinez FARC dissident faction abducted three young Afro-Colombian residents. Members of the armed group released one of the victims when the Guardia Cimarrona began to search for the victims. Residents claimed the group probably took the men to recruit them. The whereabouts of the two remaining victims are still unknown.

Around 30 November 2021, in the rural area of Argelia municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a local farmer. Perpetrators intercepted the victim when he was on his way to his house in the La Gloria vereda. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former AUC: United Self-Defence Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 30 November 2021, in the rural area of Monteria municipality (Cordoba), a former AUC member was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds in the Tres Piedras area. The victim had left his home to go to a meeting on 27 November, and when he did not return his relatives reported him missing. UNP bodyguards who were with the victim at the time of the attack were located alive near the municipality of Planeta Rica by local authorities. The man was part of the truth commission and was helping the authorities to locate the graves of victims of the armed conflict in the department of Sucre. He had not reported any death threats. 1 fatality.

Around 30 November 2021, in Caldono (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two young indigenous men in the La Cucharita neighborhood. The armed men intercepted the victims as they were leaving a store in the area and opened fire on them several times. Their bodies were later found by neighbors in a green area. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Jaime Martinez: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Jaime Martinez)
notes: On 30 November 2021, in the rural area of Santander de Quilichao municipality (Cauca), suspected members of the Jaime Martinez FARC dissident faction abducted two civilians on the road that connects the municipality with the town of Buenos Aires, in Mazamorreros vereda. There are no further details on the incident. The whereabouts of the victims are unknown.

On 29 November 2021, in Apartado (Antioquia), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 28 November 2021, in Apartado municipality (Antioquia), person was killed by unidentified armed individuals on the Apartado - Turbo road. There is no further information. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 28 November 2021, in Currulao (Antioquia), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
Around 28 November 2021, in Mesa de La Lindosa (Guaviare), a social leader was killed. There are no further details on the attack or perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 27 November 2021, in the rural area of Santa Barbara municipality (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals wearing hoods raided a private birthday party and opened fire on the guests in Los Charcos vereda, killing two people. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of the Gulf Clan and splinter groups of this organization. The two victims had previous convictions for robbery. 2 fatalities.

On 26 November 2021, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), an unidentified armed man shot and killed a homeless person in a drive-by shooting in the Claret neighborhood. The victim was a known drug user. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 26 November 2021, in the rural area of Caucasia municipality (Antioquia), armed individuals who identified themselves as members of the armed group Los Caparros kidnapped two workers from a local company. The men were held hostage for several hours and were later released by the perpetrators after military forces approached the area where they were being held.

Around 26 November 2021, in Nutibara (Antioquia), two unidentified armed individuals forced a woman out of her house and shot her dead on the streets. The victim's body remained for more than 12 hours in the place where she was killed as local authorities claimed the area is difficult to access due to the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 26 November 2021, in Tumaco municipality (Narino), an Awa indigenous man was killed in front of his family and another was injured by unknown perpetrators. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 26 November 2021, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), two engineers were kidnapped by unidentified armed individuals in the Comuna 12 neighborhood. The victims were released hours later after the ransom was paid.

Around 25 November 2021, in Tame (Arauca), unidentified individuals abducted a livestock farmer. Perpetrators intercepted the victim and forced him inside a vehicle. Although the authorship has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. The whereabouts of the victim remain unknown.

On 25 November 2021, in the rural area of Tibu municipality (Norte de Santander), suspected ELN members broke into the house of a palm farmer in the Miraflores vereda and abducted two people. One of the victims was released on 1 December, and on 19 December, the armed group released the other victim.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Colombia (2018-2022); Health Workers (Colombia); Women (Colombia)
notes: On 25 November 2021, in Arauca (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals abducted the department's medical mission coordinator in the Villa Maria neighborhood. Perpetrators intercepted the victim when she was working out and forced her inside a vehicle. Although the authorship has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. The whereabouts of the victim remain unknown. [women targeted: government officials]

On 24 November 2021, in the rural area of La Moralia (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals killed a social leader who worked with youths in the area. The victim was intercepted and shot dead by the perpetrators. The authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 24 November 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Caucasia municipality (Antioquia), ELN members kidnapped a teenage girl. The girl was later released and handed over to a humanitarian delegation formed by the ICRC and the catholic church. [women targeted: girls]

On 22 November 2021, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), two brothers were killed by unknown armed individuals. The motive of the attack is unknow. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 21 November 2021, in the rural area of Buenos Aires municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an indigenous leader who was a former governor of the Las Delicias indigenous reserve area in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim several times in the Pan Coger area, near the La Cabana sector. The authorship of the attack has not been confirmed but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 20 November 2021, in the rural area of Tumaco municipality (Narino), three unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an Awa indigenous person in the Rosario indigenous reserve area. Perpetrators broke into the victim's house and opened fire on him. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Farmers (Colombia)
notes: Around 18 November 2021 (as reported), in El Carrizal (Antioquia), a farmer who was also a social leader was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals. The victim was a running candidate for the election of the JAC in the area. There are no further details on the potential perpetrators. 1 fatality.

Around 15 November 2021, in the rural area of San Bernardo de Los Farallones corregimiento (Antioquia), three members from the same family of farmers were killed by unidentified perpetrators and their bodies were found. Although there are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.

source: Diario La Libertad; El Espectador; Vanguardia Liberal
notes: Around 15 November 2021, in the rural area of Convencion municipality (Norte de Santander), two men were killed and their bodies were found in the Aguas Claras corregimiento. The victims were abducted on 12 November from Ocana municipality (Norte de Santander) by unidentified armed individuals (coded as separate event). Their bodies were found burned, with hands tied and several signs of torture near a rural road. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz; El Espectador; La Opinion (Colombia); INDEPAZ
notes: Around 15 November 2021, in the rural area of Puerto Leguizamo (Putumayo), armed individuals shot and killed two farmers in the La Sencella vereda. A third victim was shot and killed a few hours after the first attack took place, but the incident is yet to be confirmed. According to the authorities, the CDF and the Carolina Ramirez FARC dissident faction are fighting for control of illicit crops in this area. One of the victims was a social leader and member of the JAC. At least 2 fatalities.

On 15 November 2021, in the rural area of Yarumal municipality (Antioquia), a man was killed by unknown perpetrators in Preventorio vereda. The motive of the attack is unknow. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 14 November 2021, in the rural area of Vistahermosa (Meta), a youth farmer was killed in a suspected case of police brutality after an officer shot and killed him during a police procedure. Police sources claimed the victim attempted to attack one of the officers with a knife when the officer arrive at the area following reports of a street fight. 1 fatality.

On 14 November 2021, in Soacha (Cundinamarca), a woman, who is an activist, was attacked by a police officer who responded to a call reporting a street fight in the area. The victim claimed that the officer approached her when the man recognized her, pushed her to the ground and hit her with the baton while referring to her work as an activist. The victim has organized several protests demanding the truth in a case in which several prisoners died during a fire at a local jail in September 2020. There were no fatalities. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 14 November 2021, in the rural area of La Parada corregimiento (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals abducted a military soldier. The victim was off-duty at the moment of the incident. Witnesses claimed two armed men approached the victim and subsequently took him to the Venezuelan side of the border. The whereabouts of the victim are still unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: Around 12 November 2021, in the rural area of La Montanita (Caqueta), a social leader and member of the JAC was killed by unidentified perpetrators. The victim had an active role in supporting the peace reconciliation process between victims of the FARC-EP and former guerrilla members. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of several FARC dissident factions. There are no further details on the attack. 1 fatality.

source: Vanguardia Liberal; Diario La Libertad; El Espectador
notes: On 12 November 2021, in the rural area of Ocana municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals abducted two men from a local bar in the El Limon vereda. The victims' bodies were found around 15 November in a rural area of Convencion municipality (coded as separate event). The area is known for the presence of armed groups.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: On 12 November 2021, in the rural area of Caldono municipality (Cauca), suspected members of the FARC dissident faction Dagoberto Ramos forcibly recruited a local boy. On 17 November, the Guardia Indigena released the victim, but no further details of the incident were described.

On 12 November 2021, in Soledad (Atlantico), a woman police officer was sexually assaulted by one of her superiors at the police station. According to the victim, the officer called her to a private office and subsequently touched her and ejaculated on her. [women targeted: government officials]

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 12 November 2021, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), an off-duty police officer and a civilian were injured after a police officer opened fire on the victims. The officer fired at the victims when one of them ignored a stop sign. The civilian was a member of the JAC of the corregimiento of Campo Dos. There were no fatalities.

Around 12 November 2021, in Bucaramanga (Santander), two youths reported being attacked while being under police custody in a police station in the Real de Minas neighborhood. Victims leaked a video online where they claimed officers made them get undressed and subsequently beat them up. One of the victims was a drug user. Police claimed they are investigating the incident.

On 12 November 2021, in the rural area of Granada municipality (Meta), a merchant was kidnapped by unknown perpetrators in Cano Venado vereda. There is no further information. The area is known for the presence of armed groups.

Around 11 November 2021 (as reported), in Corinto (Cauca), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting in front of the town's market square. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 11 November 2021, in Puerto Carreno (Vichada), a man was shot and killed and two people were injured by unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting at a restaurant in the Camilo Cortes neighborhood. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
source: El Tiempo (Colombia); El Espectador; El Colombiano
notes: Around 10 November 2021, in El Retorno (Guaviare), armed individuals shot and killed three to four civilians in the La Paz vereda. Military reports claimed there were three victims, while local organizations claimed in total four people were killed. Although authorities attributed the attack to a dissident faction of the FARC, there has been no confirmation of responsibility. The region is known for the presence of several armed groups such as the Gulf Clan, FARC dissidents from the 1st and the 7th Front, and other armed groups. Reports claimed that recently FARC dissidents distributed pamphlets which threatened to kill residents from the El Retorno who moved through the La Paz vereda. At least 3 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Awa Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 10 November 2021, in the rural area of Llorente (Narino), two young Awa indigenous leaders were killed and their bodies were found hidden in the El Jardin neighborhood. The victims were reported as disappeared on 25 October, after which members of their community began to search for them. The bodies were decapitated and had several signs of torture. Although perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 10 November 2021, in Puerto Berrio (Antioquia), a female soldier was sexually assaulted by one of her superiors inside the military base facilities. The victim stated that the man physically assaulted her until she lost consciousness. After recovering, she was taken to a hospital, where doctors confirmed the sexual abuse. The victim claimed that the military officer had tried to hide her case to avoid scandal.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 10 November 2021 (as reported), in Arauca (Arauca), a demobilized former FARC member was killed by unknown perpetrators. There is no further information. 1 fatality.

Around 10 November 2021 (as reported), in Puerto Leguizamo municipality (Putumayo), an Awa Indigenous man was killed by an unidentified armed group. After the killing, three families from the Monterrey Indigenous community were displaced. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 33rd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (33rd Front)
notes: Around 9 November 2021, in El Tarra (Norte de Santander), FARC dissidents abducted seven people, including five Venezuelan citizens. In a video leaked on the internet, the armed group claimed responsibility for the kidnapping and stated that the victims were abducted as part of a social cleansing of drug users and thieves. The whereabouts of the victims are still unknown.

Around 9 November 2021 (as reported), in Buenos Aires municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals opened fire against the vehicle of an Indigenous man who is the coordinator of the Guardia Indigena of Las Delicias reserve. The victim and all the passengers of the car managed to escape unharmed. Hours previous to the attack the victim had received verbal threats from members of an armed group. There is presence of armed groups in the area. There were no casualties.
On 9 November 2021, in La Cruz municipality (Narino), a man was killed by unidentified perpetrators. There is no further information. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 9 November 2021 (as reported), in La Cruz municipality (Narino), a man was killed by unidentified perpetrators. There is no information about the motive of the attack. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
source: El Universal (Colombia); El Tiempo (Colombia); El Espectador; INDEPAZ
notes: On 8 November 2021, in the rural area of Montelibano (Cordoba), unidentified perpetrators killed a farmer's leader who was an active member of the local JAC. According to the victim's family, the man left his house following a phone call. A few hours later, his body was found near his residence with several knife injuries. Although local authorities assured that the attack was not related to the victim's social work, residents contradicted that version and claimed he had received previous death threats due to his commitment to the community. The area is known for the presence of armed groups, including ELN, Gulf Clan, FARC dissidents of the 18th front, and Los Caparros. 1 fatality.

Around 8 November 2021, in Valencia (Cordoba), a man was killed and his body was found. Residents believe that the incident is related to social cleansing, as near the body was a sign saying 'killed for stealing motorcycles'. Residents claimed that the victim was in a list of people targeted. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 8 November 2021, in Samaniego (Narino), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a former FARC member in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators broke into the store where the victim was repairing a motorbike and shot at him several times. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: On 8 November 2021, in the rural area of Caldono (Cauca), members of the FARC Dissident group Dagoberto Ramos Front opened fire on the vehicle of a social leader who is an Indigenous authority in his community. The perpetrators attempted to intercept the victim's car, to which the man accelerated, precipitating the shooting. The victim and his family fled unharmed from the attack. There were no fatalities.

On 8 November 2021, in Quibdo (Choco), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a woman and a teenage girl inside their house. A child was also reached by a stray bullet and died. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 3 fatalities. [women targeted: girls]

Around 8 November 2021 (as reported), in Juan Jose (Cordoba), unidentified armed individuals forcibly took a man out of his house and the victim's body was found with gunshot wounds hours later in the Corozalito corregimiento. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area, particularly the Gulf Clan. 1 fatality.

Around 8 November 2021 (as reported), in Puerto Libertador municipality (Cordoba), a man was killed and his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition inside a plastic bag in a river. The victim had been reported missing since 3 November. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 8 November 2021, in Guacari (Valle del Cauca), a minor was shot and killed by unidentified perpetrators. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 7 November 2021, in the rural area of Anserma municipality (Caldas), a teenage boy was forced to get undressed and squat while being under police custody. The incident was reported after police carried out an operation following reports of an illegal party. There were no fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
notes: On 7 November 2021, in Huisito (Cauca), members of the Carlos Patino FARC dissident faction forcible recruited an underaged indigenous person. A member of this armed group lured the child by promising payment and other benefits that later the victim described never happened. The victim voluntarily surrendered to the Segunda Marquetalia FARC dissident faction during an armed clash around 14 March 2022 (coded separately). The group released the victim to a humanitarian commission around 14 March 2022.

On 7 November 2021, in the rural area of Puerto Carreno municipality (Vichada), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men who were father and son. Authorities said that the killing could be related to settling of scores but the motive is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 6 November 2021, in the rural area of Albania (Caqueta), unidentified armed individuals killed a local teacher. The perpetrators interrupted the class and took the victim a few kilometers away from the school, where they subsequently shot him dead. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 6 November 2021, in the rural area of Agua de Dios municipality (Cundinamarca), three people were killed and their bodies were found on a road that connects the municipal seat with the locality of Ricaurte. One of the victims survived the attack but died in a local hospital due to the severity of the wounds. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.

Around 5 November 2021, (as reported) in the rural area of Corinto municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two people. Perpetrators intercepted the victims who were on a motorcycle near the Mira Valle area before opening fire at them. Subsequently, the men left a warning that said 'killed for rats' near their bodies. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of several armed groups, among them the Dagoberto Ramos FARC dissident factions. 2 fatalities.

source: El Espectador; Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz; INDEPAZ
notes: On 5 November 2021, in the rural area of Yurilla (Guaviare), unidentified armed individuals killed three farmers in the La Esmeralda locality. The perpetrators arrived in the area, took two of the victims from their homes, and shot them in the street. The third victim was killed after the perpetrators pulled her from a ferry. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of FARC dissident factions Carolina Ramirez and the CDF. 3 fatalities.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 5 November 2021, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), two armed men from La Local gang kidnapped two young men from the humanitarian zone of Puente Nayero (La Playita). One of the victims was able to flee from his captors and reported the incident to the local police. According to the report, police forces arrested one of the perpetrators and released the second victim. There were no reports of armed confrontations during the operation to release the other victim.

Around 5 November 2021, in the rural area of Cucuta (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found in the El Suspiro vereda. The victim was abducted on 2 November from his house in El Zulia (Norte de Santander) by 5 unidentified armed individuals. Relatives claimed the victim had not reported any previous death threats. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 5 November 2021, in the rural area of Puerto Santander municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on two youths who were driving on a motorcycle in the El Dave vereda, killing both of them. The perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed but the area is known for the presence of the ELN and Gulf Clan. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario La Libertad; Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz; INDEPAZ
notes: On 4 November 2021, in the rural area of Orito municipality (Putumayo), four armed individuals arrived at the house of an Awa indigenous family in the El Padro vereda. The perpetrators forced two of the family members to look for a third relative and, after returning to the house, shot and killed the three victims. According to residents, the attack was perpetrated by members of the CDF after the group learned that the family was selling the coca leaf harvest to other buyers. Whereas, the armed group released a public statement denying its involvement in the incident and blaming the attack on the La Constru gang. One of the victims was a member of the local Indigenous Guard. 3 fatalities.

On 2 November 2021, in the rural area of El Zulia (Norte de Santander), five unidentified armed individuals abducted a man from his private house in the Aguasal area. Perpetrators arrived on three motorcycles asking for the victim and subsequently forced him into one of the vehicles. The victim's body was found around 5 November in a rural area of Cucuta municipality (coded as separate event). The area is known for the presence of armed groups.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 2 November 2021, in the rural area of Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an Afro-Colombian social leader at his private house. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of ELN and FARC dissident factions. 1 fatality.

Around 2 November 2021, in the rural area of Saravena (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a Venezuelan citizen in the La Playa vereda. The victim has not been fully identified as it does not have a personal id or document. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups such as FARC dissident factions and ELN. 1 fatality.

On 1 November 2021, in San Antonio (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two residents who were in a local bar. The perpetrators burst into the premises and opened fire on the victims. Although the perpetrators and motives for the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 1 November 2021, in the rural area of El Tambo (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on the vehicle of a former FARC member. The victim fled unharmed from the attack. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

On 31 October 2021, in the rural area of Corinto (Cauca), military forces opened fire on two civilians on a motorcycle when they ignored a stop sign made by one of the military soldiers at a checkpoint in the Gualanday sector. Military sources stated that their units mistook the victims for members of an armed group. Two civilians and one military soldier were injured in the incident as, according to authorities, the victims drove their vehicle against the soldiers. There were no fatalities.

On 30 October 2021, in Buesaco municipality (Narino), unidentified armed individuals opened fire against a car, killing two people who were on board of the vehicle near the Parque Tecnologico Ambiental Antanas. The motive of the attack is unknow. 2 fatalities.

Around 30 October 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of La Hormiga corregimiento (Putumayo), a man was shot and killed and his body was found in El Recreo vereda. The motive of the attack is unknow. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 29 October 2021, in the rural area of Guamalito (Norte de Santander), three men were killed and their bodies were found. Initial reports stated that there was a fight before local residents reported a shooting. However, the area is also known for the presence of armed groups such as the ELN, Gulf Clan and FARC dissidents. The victims had several gunshot wounds. 3 fatalities.

Around 27 October 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Miranda (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an Indigenous person in the El Progreso area. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 27 October 2021, in the rural area of Cienaga (Magdalena), unidentified armed individuals attacked a member of the Green Alliance political party in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim's vehicle. The woman, who already had protection measures due to death threats, fled unharmed from the attack. There were no fatalities. [women targeted: political party supporters]

On 26 October 2021, in Maicao (La Guajira), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed three civilians in a drive-by shooting near the Rojas Pinilla neighborhood. Two people were killed in the place where the attack took place, while the third victim was declared dead in the hospital. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of Gulf Clan members, ELN, and other armed groups. 3 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 26 October 2021, in the rural area of Puerto Asis (Putumayo), unidentified armed individuals attacked a former FARC member in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrator opened fire on the victim's vehicle from another car. The victim fled unharmed from the attack. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

On 26 October 2021, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), an Afro-Colombian man was shot and killed by an unidentified armed individual outside of his house in the Rockefeller neighborhood. The motive of the attack is unknow. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former AUC: United Self-Defence Forces of Colombia
notes: On 25 October 2021, in Anserma (Caldas), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a former AUC member. The victim was displaced from Pensilvania (Caldas) after receiving death threats. Likewise, he had suffered an attack in Santiago de Cali. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or attack motivation. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Coccam: National Coordinating Committee of Coca, Marijuana and Poppy Cultivators
notes: On 25 October 2021, in the rural area of Timba (Cauca), on the road that connects the corregimiento with the La Balsa locality, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a social leader who was an active member of COCCAM. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 25 October 2021, in the rural area of Puerto Santander municipality (Norte de Santander), a group of at least 10 armed men broke into a birthday party celebration and shot dead two of the guests. The perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed but the area is known for the presence of the ELN and Gulf Clan members. 2 fatalities.

On 25 October 2021, in Chachagui (Narino), an unidentified armed individual opened fire against a group of moto-taxi drivers. One driver was injured. The motive of the attack is unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 25 October 2021 (as reported), near Llorente corregimiento, Tumaco municipality (Narino), Awa Indigenous people reported the forced disappearance of one of their members. Witnesses claimed that the victim was intercepted by unidentified armed individuals before he was reported missing. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. The whereabouts of the victim are unknown.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 24 October 2021, in the rural area of Tame (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals ambushed the bullet-proof vehicle of a former FARC member in the Santo Domingo area. The victim's daughter was injured in the attack. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

Around 24 October 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Mapiripan municipality (Meta), a person was killed by unidentified perpetrators. A sign was found next to the body but there is no information about the content of it. There is no further information. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

source: El Pais (Colombia); El Tiempo (Colombia); UNOCHA; INDEPAZ
notes: Around 23 October 2021, in the rural area of Morales municipality (Cauca), a Misak Indigenous woman was killed and her body was found in the La Cuchilla vereda. The victim had an active role during the political unrest of April 2021 and was mayor of the Indigenous reserve in 2013. Initial reports claimed the victim was killed due to land issues with an armed group. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders][women targeted: politicians]

On 23 October 2021, in Guadalajara de Buga, Buga municipality (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed three people in a drive-by shooting in the Santa Barbara neighborhood. One of the victims worked for the local government. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. 3 fatalities.

Around 23 October 2021, in Soplador (Magdalena), police forces carried out an eviction operation from a private plot of land. Security forces used tear gas against a group of 200 families. Residents reported excessive use of force by officers and claimed that an elderly person and several children were injured in the incident.

On 23 October 2021, in the rural area of Mercaderes municipality (Cauca), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in Matacea vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

source: UNOCHA; El Heraldo (Colombia); El Espectador; INDEPAZ
notes: Around 21 October 2021, in the rural area of Cajibio municipality, (Cauca), the body of one of three brothers abducted on 15 October from their house in the same municipality was found in the Rosario corregimiento. The bodies of the other two victims were found in Morales (Cauca) (coded separately). Circumstances of death are unknown. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of FARC dissidents from the Dagoberto Ramos and Jaime Martinez factions. 1 fatality.

source: UNOCHA; El Espectador; INDEPAZ; El Heraldo (Colombia)
notes: Around 21 October 2021, in the rural area of El Playon, Morales municipality, (Cauca), the bodies of two of three brothers abducted on 15 October from their house in Cajibio (Cauca) were found. The body of the third victim was found in Cajibio (Cauca) (coded separately. Circumstances of death are unknown. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of FARC dissidents from the Dagoberto Ramos and Jaime Martinez factions. 2 fatalities.

On 20 October 2021, in the rural area of La Jagua De Ibirico (Cesar), for the second time in less than a week, an unidentified armed individual opened fire against members of the firefighter department. The group received a call for a false emergency, when the men arrived at the area of the call, an armed individual opened fire against their vehicle, the group fled unharmed from the attack. There were no fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: Around 20 October 2021, in the rural area of Santander De Quilichao (Cauca), suspected members of the Dagoberto Ramos FARC dissident faction raided the house of a local farmer, injuring the victim in the head. There are no reports on attack motivation. There were no fatalities.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz; UNOCHA; El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: On 19 October 2021, in Santiago De Cali (Valle del Cauca), an unidentified armed individual opened fire at least three times at the home of the family of a political activist who was killed on 22 July. It is suspected that the victim was killed for his participation in anti-government protests in the Puerto Resistencia area, and his family has reported ongoing threats, following the young man's death. The attack occurred one day before anti-government protests took place across the country. There were no fatalities.

Around 19 October 2021 (as reported), in San Alberto (Cesar), at least seven members of a private security company beat a suspected robber, who had to be hospitalized due to the severity of his injuries. The victim had his lungs perforated. As the municipality as a low number of police officers, residents hire a private company to patrol some areas to prevent criminality. Residents denounced the excessive use of force by sharing a video of the attack on social media. There were no fatalities.

source: El Colombiano; El Universal (Colombia); UNOCHA; El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: On 19 October 2021, in San Rafael (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a group of young men who had gathered in the local park to plan activities to promote the defense of the local eco-systems. Three of the victims died immediately, a fourth survived the attack but died later in hospital. The authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 4 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); MP: Patriotic March
notes: On 19 October 2021, in the rural area of Cajibio (Cauca), an unidentified armed individual shot and killed a social leader in a drive-by shooting near the Primera vereda. The victim was an active member of several farmers' organizations, an activist of the Integral National Program for the Substitution of Illicitly Used Crops (PNIS), and member of the MP party. The perpetrator intercepted the victim's car and opened fire on the vehicle, killing the activist. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 19 October 2021 (as reported), in El Carmen de Viboral (Antioquia), a member of the LGBT community was stabbed to death in a suspected homophobic attack. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators. 1 fatality.

Around 19 October 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Santo Domingo municipality (Antioquia), a man was shot several times and killed and his body was found near a river in the Versalles corregimiento. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 19 October 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Cajibio municipality (Cauca), a man was shot and killed and his body was found in El Picacho vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 19 October 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Morales municipality (Cauca), two men were shot to the head and killed and their bodies were found with their hands tied in La Union Altillo sector. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 19 October 2021, in Puerto Concordia municipality (Meta), two unidentified armed individuals opened fire against a vehicle. Both people who were on board of the vehicle were injured. The attack took place after the armed individuals gave the order to the men in the vehicle to stop but the latter disregarded it. There is presence of armed groups in the area. There were no fatalities.

On 19 October 2021, in the rural area of Banco de Arenas corregimiento (Norte de Santander), several unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man outside of his house. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
source: El Universal (Colombia); INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: On 18 October 2021, in Sinai, Argelia municipality, (Cauca), a social leader who was also one of the founders of a local farmers' organization was killed by armed perpetrators. Attackers arrived at the victim's house and forced him out of the premises before killing him. Residents claimed that the Carlos Patino FARC dissident faction perpetrated the attack. 1 fatality.

source: El Tiempo (Colombia); INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; El Universal (Colombia)
notes: On 18 October 2021, in the rural area of Santa Barbara corregimiento, La Vega municipality (Cauca), an indigenous leader, who was a local authority, was killed and his body was found in the El Guayabo vereda. Residents found the victim in his private residence with his throat slit and several gunshots. The victim had UNP protection, but the guards were not with him at the time of the attack. There are no further details on the potential perpetrators. 1 fatality.

Around 18 October 2021 (as reported), near Santiago de Cali (Valle del Cauca), a social leader, who was also an urban farming activist, was killed and his body was found hidden near a sugarcane field. Family members had reported the victim missing on October 10, and had expressed concern for his safety, as he was a well-known activist in protests in the Aguablanca district. The victim was stabbed several times. The identity of the perpetrators and the motivation for the crime have not been reported. 1 fatality.

On 18 October 2021, in the rural area of Villa del Rosario municipality (Norte de Santander), three armed individuals abducted a farmer from his private home in the La Uchema vereda. Minutes after the abduction took place, neighbors reported hearing several gunshots. Residents found the next morning the body of the victim 100 meters from his house. The man was a Venezuelan national. Local authorities claimed that the area is controlled by ELN members. 1 fatality.

On 18 October 2021, in the rural area of La Jagua De Ibirico (Cesar), an unidentified armed individual attacked members of the firefighter department when the victims attended a fake emergency call. Perpetrator opened fire against the group. Victims fled the attack unharmed. Authorities discarded robbery as motivation for the attack. There were no fatalities.

On 18 October 2021, in the rural area of Caldono municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two indigenous people in Plan de Zuniga vereda. Perpetrators arrived at a bar where the victims were, forced them out of the facilities, and subsequently shot them dead. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 18 October 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of El Bagre municipality (Antioquia), a man was shot and killed and his body was found near the Nechi River in the San Jose sector. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 18 October 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Buenos Aires municipality (Cauca), a man was shot to the head and killed and his body was found in Barracon vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 18 October 2021, in the rural area of Mojarras, Mercaderes municipality (Cauca), two people were killed and their bodies were found in the Gana Plata area. Near the bodies was a note stating that the victims were killed for 'robbers'. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 18 October 2021, in the rural area of Guaramito corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found on the Guaramito - Llano Seco road. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 18 October 2021, in the rural area of Villagarzon municipality (Putumayo), a man and his daughter were shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in Betulia vereda. The motive of the attack is unknow. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
notes: Around 17 October 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Argelia (Cauca), a young man was killed and his body was found in the Tierra Alta vereda. The victim was from the municipality of Silvia (Cauca). Perpetrators left near the body a poster of the Carlos Patino FARC dissident faction. 1 fatality.

source: El Tiempo (Colombia); UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; El Colombiano
notes: On 17 October 2021, in the rural area of Betania (Antioquia), five farmers were killed and their bodies were found in a coffee farm between the La Sucia and La Primavera vereda. Among the victims there are three Venezuelan citizens and two Colombians, all of them recently arrived in the area to work in the coffee harvest. The circumstances of the deaths are unknown. Although the perpetrators of the attack have not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups fighting for control of drug routes. Other sources reported that the perpetrators left an explosive device to make it difficult for authorities to access the area. 5 fatalities.

Around 17 October 2021 (as reported), in Suarez (Cauca) unidentified armed individuals shot dead a Venezuelan national who was in the main square in a drive-by shooting. Local authorities reported that an unidentified armed group gave the order that Venezuelan citizens must leave the municipality or they would be killed. 1 fatality.

On 16 October 2021, in the rural area of Litoral del San Juan municipality (Choco), suspected ELN members shot and killed an Afro-Colombian social leader who was a member of the Guardia Cimarrona of Choco. Perpetrators searched for the victim at his house in the Pangalita area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 16 October 2021, in Florencia (Caqueta), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a former FARC member in a drive-by shooting near the Siete de Agosto neighborhood. The victim worked at a local bakery that he had opened following his demobilization. 1 fatality.

On 16 October 2021, in Bogota - Ciudad Bolivar (Bogota, D.C.), unidentified armed individuals attacked in a drive-by shooting a social leader, who works with young women in the area. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim's vehicle, injuring two children who were with her when the attack occurred. The woman had reported previous death threats. There were no fatalities. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Around 15 October 2021 (month of), in the department of Cauca (coded to Popayan), the ELN abducted four civilians. There are no further details on the incident. Later around 25 December 2021 perpetrators released the victims to a humanitarian commission in the rural area of Argelia (Cauca).

actor1: FARC Dissident - 33rd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (33rd Front)
notes: Around 15 October 2021 (month of), in Tibu municipality (Norte de Santander), two minors were killed by members of the FARC Dissident group 33rd Front. The motive of the attack is unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 15 October 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Buritica municipality (Antioquia), a man was shot and killed and his body was found in Llano Grande vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 15 October 2021, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found with his throat slit and next to a sing that read 'for snitching'. The victim's family said he was involved in theft and drug consumption. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 14 October 2021, in the rural area of Tibu municipality (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found on a local road that connects Tibu and the La Gabarra corregimiento. The victim was shot several times and near the body there was a sign that stated the victim was killed for being a thief. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Women (Colombia)
source: UNOCHA; El Pais (Colombia); Diario La Libertad
notes: On 14 October 2021, in the rural area of Buenos Aires (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a former FARC member who was part of the La Elvira reintegration area. Armed men intercepted the victim's motorcycle and opened fire on her and one of her relatives near a residence in the Mazamorrero vereda. The victim's partner, who was also a former FARC member, was killed on 25 July. Both victims died in the attack. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 13 October 2021, in Popayan (Cauca), an unidentified armed individual attacked a former FARC member in a local restaurant. The perpetrator's weapon jammed, allowing the victim to flee the attack unharmed. Although the victim had police security with him, the bodyguards did not respond to the attack. There were no fatalities.

Around 13 October 2021 (as reported), Near Llorente, Tumaco (Narino), unidentified individuals tortured and killed a young man from the indigenous Awa community. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 13 October 2021, in the rural area of Ocana (Norte de Santander), the owner of a local store was killed and his body was found. The victim left his house in the morning to do sports in the Nuevo Amanecer vereda when he was intercepted by armed men. Family members had no information on his whereabouts until hours later when his body was found in a secluded area with several gunshot wounds. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or the motivation for the crime, but the area is known for the presence of dissident factions of the ELN, EPL, and FARC. Also the victim had a criminal record for illegal possession of weapons. 1 fatality.

On 12 October 2021, in Puerto Tejada (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a resident doctor of the local hospital in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim when he drove his vehicle near the Platano Monument. The authorship or reason for the attack has not been confirmed. However, the authorities confirmed that it was not a robbery, since the victim had all his belongings. 1 fatality.

On 12 October 2021, in the rural area of Cucuta (Norte de Santander), a farmer was shot and killed in El Cementerio sector. The motive and authorship of the attack are unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
source: UNOCHA; El Universal (Colombia); El Tiempo (Colombia); INDEPAZ
notes: On 11 October 2021, in Olaya, Balboa municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a former FARC member in the town's square. Subsequently, the armed men threatened to kill anyone who dare to move the victim's body. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of Gulf Clan members, FARC dissident groups, and ELN. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 11 October 2021, in Gabriel Lopez, Totoro municipality (Cauca), armed individuals shot dead a farmer at a local bar. A first version of the attack stated that the victim was close to another person who was the real target of the attack, while a second version of the event stated that the man was killed for not complying with the rules introduced by an armed organization. Residents claimed the attack was carried out by a FARC dissident faction. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Guardia Indigena (Colombia); Indigenous Group (Colombia); Embera Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 11 October 2021, near Dabeiba (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals abducted an Embera indigenous person who was a member of the local Guardia Indigena. Although the victim's body has not been found, the community claimed that perpetrators killed the man, dismembered the corpse, and threw it into a local river. The area is known for the presence of Gulf Clan members and ELN. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Gentil Duarte Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Gentil Duarte Front)
assoc_actor_2: Government of Colombia (2018-2022); PU: Social Party of National Unity
notes: On 11 October 2021, in the rural area of La Macarena municipality (Meta), suspected members of the Gentil Duarte FARC dissident faction attacked the vehicle in which the governor (PU) and members of his cabinet were traveling. Perpetrators set off an explosive device and opened fire on the group as the car approached the Cristalina area. The group fled unharmed from the attack, but local residents were reported injured. There were no fatalities.

On 10 October 2021, in Pijino del Carmen (Magdalena), unidentified armed individuals burst into a local bar, killing 3 people. The perpetrators opened fire on the people inside. Two people died on the spot, and a third died on the way to the local hospital. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. 3 fatalities.

On 10 October 2021, in Barranquilla (Atlantico), police officers attacked a trans woman in a suspected homophobic attack. There are no further details on the attack, but sources claimed the victim suffered several injuries and medical complications due to the incident. There were no fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 33rd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (33rd Front)
notes: On 8 October 2021, in the rural area of El Tarra (Norte de Santander), suspected members of the 33rd FARC dissident faction killed two civilians accused of robbing a local store. The store owners were taking the alleged thieves to the police station when men from the armed group appeared and took the victims away. The men's bodies were later found outside the locality with several gunshot wounds. Two victim were underaged Venezuelan nationals, and one of them was a member of the Wayuu indigenous community. 2 fatalities.

On 8 October 2021, in Ansermanuevo (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a social activist, who was a member of the LGBT community. Perpetrators attacked the victim at her house in the Cll 9 Cr 6. The victim had reported sexual misconduct by police officers in August this year. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 8 October 2021, in the rural area of Dabeiba municipality (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two Embera indigenous people near the Nutria Tascon area. The area is known for the presence of Gulf Clan members and ELN. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
notes: Around 7 October 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Argelia (Cauca), suspected members of the Carlos Patino FARC dissident faction killed a resident and abandoned his body in a rural area. Subsequently, at least 150 residents of the Mirovilo vereda were displaced as the activity of the armed group increased in the area. Circumstances of death and victim's identity are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 October 2021, in Santander De Quilichao (Cauca), unidentified individuals killed a trans woman. The victim was stabbed several times. Local authorities stated that the victim had argued with someone before the attack, but it is unclear whether the motive for the attack is homophobic or personal. 1 fatality.

source: Diario La Libertad; El Tiempo (Colombia); Vanguardia Liberal; INDEPAZ
notes: On 6 October 2021, in Puerto Wilches (Santander), unidentified armed individuals attack in a drive-by shooting a worker, who was leading members of a petroleum company worker's union. The man survived the attack but was hospitalized to treat the injuries. On 7 November, the victim died due to the severity of the wounds. 1 fatality.

Around 6 October 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Puerto Rico municipality (Meta), a man was shot and killed and his body was found in La Sultana vereda. Neighbors claim that the victim was involved in theft and was a consumer of drugs. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); UP: Patriotic Union
notes: Around 5 October 2021, in Bogota - Usme (Bogota, D.C.), an environmental activist who was a social leader and active member of the UP party was killed and his body was found. The victim was fatally stabbed with sharp objects and residents found his body in a local park. The victim had received multiple death threats before the attack. 1 fatality.

source: INDEPAZ; Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 5 October 2021, in the rural area of Puerto Caicedo (Putumayo), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a social leader who was an active member of a local farmers' organization. Perpetrators intercepted the victim in the Nuevo Progreso area, tight him up, and subsequently opened fire. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of FARC dissident factions and other armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 5 October 2021, in the rural area of El Palmar, Leiva municipality (Narino), a former FARC member was killed and his body was found on a rural road. The victim's family had reported him missing to the authorities since the end of September. Moreover, the victim had reported receiving death threats before the attack occurred. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 5 October 2021, in Ipiales (Narino), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a man in the San Carlos sector. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Jaime Martinez: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Jaime Martinez)
assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Nasa Indigenous Group (Colombia)
source: INDEPAZ; El Universal (Colombia); El Espectador; UNOCHA
notes: On 4 October 2021, in the rural area of Las Delicias corregimiento, Buenos Aires municipality (Cauca), four unidentified armed individuals shot dead a social leader who was an authority of the Nasa indigenous people. The perpetrators attacked the victim in his house, located in an indigenous reserve area in the Bello Horizonte vereda. Residents claimed that the attack was carried out by members of the dissident FARC Jaime Martinez faction, although there are several groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 4 October 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Caloto (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals kidnapped five indigenous people in the area of the Toez indigenous reserve. The perpetrators intercepted the victims and held them captive for several hours until members of the Indigenous Guard were alerted to the location of the group and rescued them. No armed confrontations or altercations were reported during the rescue. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups.

Around 4 October 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Corinto (Cauca), six unidentified armed individuals abducted an engineer who was carrying out field work. The victim was released after several hours on a rural road, after military forces conducted a search operation. There were no reports of clashes. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups.

On 3 October 2021, in the rural area of Argelia (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a social leader who was also a member of the JAC. The perpetrators arrived at the victim's house in the Mirolindo village and opened fire several times at the man. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 3 October 2021, in Granada (Meta), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man who was on board of a motorcycle. There is no further information. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 3 October 2021, in Puerto Lopez (Meta), two men were shot by unidentified armed individuals. One of them was killed and the other was injured. The motive of the attack is unknow. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 2 October 2021, in the rural area of Tulua (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on the car of a political activist in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators shot at the victim's vehicle when she had recently abandoned the car, nevertheless, the driver and a journalist were still inside. Both fled unharmed from the attack. There were no fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 36th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (36th Front - Jair Aldana Baquero)
assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
source: El Colombiano; El Tiempo (Colombia); UNOCHA; INDEPAZ
notes: On 2 October 2021, in the rural area of Anori municipality (Antioquia), suspected members of the 36th FARC dissident faction shot dead 4 people, including a former FARC member. Witnesses claimed that hours before the bodies were found the men were seen in the town square. Some residents have accused the victims of posing as members of the armed group to blackmail locals. Authorities believe the group killed the victims in retaliation for this act, while other sources claimed the armed men mistaken the victims with Gulf Clan members. 4 fatalities.

On 2 October 2021, in Santander de Quilichao (Cauca), two unidentified armed individuals shot and injured a man and his baby inside their house in the Betania neighborhood. The motive of the attack is unknow. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

On 2 October 2021, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), a man was shot and killed by an unidentified armed man inside a bus in Los Pinos sector. The perpetrator fled with his accomplice on a motorcycle. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 1 October 2021, in the rural area of Toribio municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals attacked and injured an indigenous person, who is also a leader of the local Guardia Indigena. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim when he was in front of his house in the San Francisco Indigenous Reserve area. There were no fatalities.

Around 1 October 2021, in Cienaga (Magdalena), unidentified armed individuals killed a female teacher who was a local social leader. The victim was an activist and promoted the rights of people displaced by armed conflict. Perpetrator shot the victim dead in a drive-by shooting. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 1 October 2021, in La Estrella (Antioquia), in a drive-by shooting, unidentified armed men on a motorcycle opened fire at least 30 times against the car in which were a female lawyer and her nephew. The victims had just left the Itagui prison where they were making a visit. The nephew was killed. 1 fatality.

On 1 October 2021, in Florencia (Caqueta), an unidentified armed individual killed a farmer in the Ventilador neighborhood. The victim was a member of the coca plant eradication team in the area. The perpetrator was arrested by police forces, but no further details about the attack were provided. 1 fatality.

On 1 October 2021, in Puerto Gaitan (Meta), a man was shot and killed inside a hotel by unidentified armed individuals inside a hotel in the Villa Valentina neighborhood. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 30 September 2021, in the rural area of Morales (Bolivar), a social leader was killed and his body was found. The victim, who was a leading member of a farmers' organization, was abducted by suspected Gulf Clan members around 26 September. 1 fatality.

Around 30 September 2021, in the rural area of Puerto Leguizamo (Putumayo), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a social leader who was also member of a JAC of San Lorenzito vereda. Perpetrators raided the victim's house and killed him. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 30 September 2021, in the rural area of Tumaco (Narino), unidentified armed individuals broke into the house of an Awa Indigenous family, getting four of the residents, including a child, out of the house from the Gran Sabalo Indigenous reserve area, in El Mero community. The report does not clarify the situation of the people who were removed from the house by the armed group. There are no further details on the incident or potential perpetrators.

On 29 September 2021, in Yopal (Casanare), unidentified armed individuals opened fire several times on a social leader, who was also co-founder of a recycling workers association, in a drive-by shooting near the Llano Lindo neighborhood. The victim was hit two times and remains in the hospital due to the severity of the injuries.

assoc_actor_2: Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz; INDEPAZ; Telesur TV
