notes: On 29 September 2021, in the rural area of Pinuna Negro, Puerto Leguizamo (Putumayo), suspected CDF armed men shot dead an Afro-Colombian leader. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim while he was at his private property. 1 fatality.

On 28 September 2021, in Curillo (Caqueta), a woman was killed by unidentified armed individuals inside her house. The victim is a relative of the municipal ombudsman. The motive of the attack is unknown. 1 fatality. [women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons]

On 27 September 2021, in the rural area of Palmor, Cienaga municipality (Magdalena), the conflict between two different Kogui indigenous clans in the Tucurinca vereda escalated when one of the groups tightened and forced at least 100 members of the other clan to undress. The group acted in retaliation after a recent event where one of the clans declared its independence from another group. Four people were reported injured and one Kogui indigenous persons is missing.

On 27 September 2021, in Arauca (Arauca), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals near the Arauca River. The motive of the attack is unknow. There is presence of FARC dissident factions in the area. 1 fatality.

On 27 September 2021, in Bogota - Antonio Narino (Bogota, D.C.), a lawyer was stabbed to death by two unidentified individuals in the Nueva Roma neighborhood. The motive of the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 26 September 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Morales (Bolivar), suspected Gulf Clan members abducted a local farmer who is a social leader. The victim is an active member of a local farmers' organization. The whereabouts of the victim are still unknown.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Urias Rondon: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Urias Rondon)
source: UNOCHA; El Colombiano; INDEPAZ; El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: On 26 September 2021, in the rural area of Llorente corregimiento (Narino), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a group of civilians who had gathered at a local bar in the El Carmen vereda, killing five people and injuring between 11 to 12 more. Authorities claimed the Urias Rondon FARC dissident faction is responsible for the attack, although the area is known for the presence of other armed groups. 5 fatalities.

On 25 September 2021, in Puerto Lopez (Meta), a man was shot and killed by two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting in the La Rochela neighborhood. The motive of the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 September 2021, in Ipiales municipality (Narino), unidentified armed individuals opened fire against a car near the Rumichaca international bridge. One person who was inside the car was killed and the other passenger was injured. The motive of the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022) Prison Guards
notes: On 24 September 2021, in Bogota - Kennedy (Bogota, D.C.), a police officer member of INPEC (prison guard) was beaten by a group of three police officers while in police custody and handcuffed. The victim claimed that the agents arrested him while they were conducting a routine search at the store of one of his relatives. In addition, the victim claimed that the officers stole some of his belongings during the incident. The man was off-duty at the time of the attack. There were no fatalities.

Around 24 September 2021, in Saravena (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals opened fire to the vehicle of a social leader in a drive-by shooting. The victim was able to flee unharmed. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups.

On 24 September 2021, in Ipiales (Narino), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting in the center of the town. The motive of the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 23 September 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Morales municipality (Bolivar), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a social leader who was a member of the JAC of the La Cuchilla community. Perpetrators raided the victim's house in the Tierra Nueva vereda and killed him. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of ELN and the FARC 37th dissident faction. 1 fatality.

Around 23 September 2021, in the rural area of Jambalo (Cauca), three unidentified armed individuals shot dead an indigenous woman who was an authority in her community. Perpetrators intercepted the victim near the Loma Redonda area and opened fire against her. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Around 23 September 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Arauca municipality (Arauca), a man was killed and his body was found floating on the Arauca River. The victim was shot several times. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 22 September 2021, in Bucaramanga (Santander), a military officer opened fire on a civilian in an alleged case of police brutality. The officer shot at the man as he was walking near the military base. The victim was hospitalized due to his injuries. There is no further information as to why the officer opened fire.

Around 21 September 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of El Rodeo corregimiento (Cauca), two men were shot and killed and their bodies were found in Florida vereda. One victim was a Venezuelan national. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); Former Military Forces of Colombia (2018-2022)
notes: Around 21 September 2021, in the rural area of La Herradura corregimiento, Almaguer municipality (Cauca), residents reported that an armed group killed a young farmer. Witnesses claimed that the victim had gathered with other residents when several heavily armed individuals arrived unexpectedly and searched them. Perpetrators shot dead the man when they found he had been part of the military forces as part of the mandatory military service. 1 fatality.

Around 21 September 2021, near Samaniego municipality (Narino), two women were killed and their bodies were found in the Monumento area. Witnesses claimed that armed men dragged the victims out of their private residence, subsequently, the bodies were found. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

source: El Tiempo (Colombia); UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; El Colombiano
notes: On 20 September 2021, in the rural area of Santa Rosa de Osos municipality (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals killed a local teacher who was a member of the regional union of teachers in a drive-by shooting near the La Lomita vereda. The woman was going in direction to the school where she worked when perpetrators intercepted her and opened fire. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 20 September 2021, in Toez, Caloto municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a Nasa indigenous leader. The victim was a member of the Lopez Adentro indigenous reserve area. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

source: Diario La Libertad; INDEPAZ; Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz; El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: On 20 September 2021, in the rural area Carmen Del Darien (Choco), unidentified armed individuals shot dead an Embera indigenous leader while he was in the forest cutting wood near the So Bia Dura indigenous reserve area. The victim had received several threats prior to the attack, including an attempted kidnapping in 2019 by the ELN and multiple death threats from members of the Gulf Clan in 2020. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 20 September 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Tibu municipality (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found. Near the victim's body was found a sign claiming the victim was 'killed for rapist'. Although the authorship of the attack has not been confirmed, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 20 September 2021, in the rural area of Tame (Arauca), residents denounced a suspected case of excessive use of force by the security forces. According to witnesses, military soldiers were conducting warrant searches in the area when multiple gunshots rang out, a few hours later a resident was reportedly shot dead by the military unit. Authorities claimed that the victim opened fire on security forces, while residents claimed that the house belonged to a local farmer who was not violent. Residents also reported that the victim's body was removed from the scene before other authorities arrived in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 20 September 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Tumaco municipality (Narino), four people were killed in a public bar by armed men. Perpetrators forced the people to the ground, then shot them dead. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 4 fatalities

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia)
notes: On 19 September 2021, in Quibdo (Choco), suspected Gulf Clan members shot dead a former FARC member who was also an Afro-Colombian person. Perpetrators forced the victim out of his house and subsequently killed him on the street. The victim had not reported any death threats previous to the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 19 September 2021, in the rural area of Tumaco (Narino), two Awa indigenous people were killed and their bodies were found. The victims, who were members of the indigenous reserve areas Quejuambi Feliciana and Hojal La Turbia, respectively, were reported missing on 19 September. One day later their bodies were found with signs of torture. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 19 September 2021, in Tulua (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals killed a local journalist in the La Esperanza neighborhood. The perpetrator broke into the store and opened fire on the victim several times. Subsequently, he fled the area on a motorcycle. 1 fatality.

On 19 September 2021, in Guamal (Meta), a man was shot dead and another was injured by unidentified armed individuals in Las Villas neighborhood. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

source: INDEPAZ; El Pais (Colombia); UNOCHA; El Espectador
notes: On 18 September 2021, in the rural area of Caldono municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a social leader who was also a member of the Nasa indigenous group. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim as he drove on his motorcycle. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

source: UNOCHA; El Espectador; El Tiempo (Colombia); INDEPAZ
notes: Around 18 September 2021, in the rural area of Tulua (Valle del Cauca), three men were killed and their bodies were found in the Mategudua corregimiento. The victims were shot several times. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.

actor1: Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022) DIRAN: Anti-Narcotics Directorate
source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 18 September 2021, in the rural area of Puerto Guzman (Putumayo), officers of the DIRAN police forces attacked a Nasa indigenous person near the San Cayetano locality. The agents beat the man, accusing the victim of participating in protests against the eradication of coca plants in the area. The security forces then forced the victim to record a video in which he claimed that the agents had not assaulted him.

On 18 September 2021, in the rural area of Puerto Concordia municipality (Meta), a farmer was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals while he was at a social gathering in La Primavera vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 17 September 2021, in the rural area of Caldono (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals killed an indigenous person in the Pescador area. Hours before the attack, alleged members of an armed group were accused of being in the area recruiting minors. The region is known for the presence of several armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 17 September 2021, in Regidor (Bolivar), police opened fire on a civilian who was suffering a mental-health episode. While military forces claimed the victim attempted to attack the officer with a knife, forcing them to open fire on him, other witnesses reported the event as excessive use of force. The teenager died due to the severity of his injuries. 1 fatality.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz; El Universal (Colombia); INDEPAZ
notes: On 16 September 2021, in the rural area of Acandi (Choco), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a former Embera indigenous authority, who was a member of the Indigenous Guard of the Chidima Tolo indigenous reserve area. The victim was shot dead while fishing in a local river. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022) DIRAN: Anti-Narcotics Directorate
source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 16 September 2021, in a rural area of Puerto Asis municipality (Putumayo), anti-narcotics police forces used tear gas and flash bombs against indigenous people requesting they not spray the farmland with herbicides in the areas of the Sat Tama indigenous reserve area. The police was conducting an operation to eradicate illegal crops. Two indigenous women were injured.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: On 15 September 2021, in the rural area of Caldono (Cauca), suspected members of the FARC dissident faction Dagoberto forcibly recruited two Nasa teenagers from the indigenous area of Las Mercedes. The victims were leaving their homes in the Miravalle sector when armed men intercepted them and forced them to leave with them. The event was reported by a third victim who was able to escape.

source: El Espectador; El Colombiano; El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: On 15 September 2021, in the rural area of El Tarra (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals abducted a military soldier who was returning to a military base after being off-duty. Perpetrators intercepted the victim in the El Rosal vereda. On 10 November, a video from the ELN was circulated as proof of the survival of the man. Subsequently, media outlets informed the victim was released to a humanitarian commission around 11 November.

Around 15 September 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Taparto corregimiento (Antioquia), a man was shot and killed and his body was found with two gunshot bullet wounds in the head in El Tapao vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 15 September 2021, in Quibdo (Choco), unidentified armed individuals arrived at the former mayor's house and fired several shots at the house's facade. The victim had not reported any previous threats, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

Around 15 September 2021 (as reported), in Granada (Meta), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 14 September 2021, in the rural area of Sabaletas, Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed men opened fire and threw grenades at a group of seven tourists who were visiting the Aguasclaras area. The group was driving back to the city of Cali when armed men attempted to stop their car at an illegal checkpoint. The group of civilians reacted by speeding up and driving the vehicle away, which triggered the attack. There were no fatalities.

On 14 September 2021, in Malambo municipality (Atlantico), unidentified armed individuals shot dead an off-duty officer who was in his private business. Authorities are currently investigating whether this was a retaliation for the operations carried out by the National Police against criminal gangs and armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 14 September 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Teorama municipality (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found in the Travesias sector. The motive behind the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 12 September 2021, in Fredonia (Antioquia), a man reported being sexually harassed and assaulted while being under police custody. According to the victim, he was sexually abused by other inmates at the police station, after officers persuaded other inmates to carry out the abuse. Police denied this version.

Around 12 September 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Amalfi (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot dead two civilians walking near the village of Naranjal. Although the perpetrators of the attack are not officially known, the area is known for the presence of armed groups, in particular dissident factions of the ELN and FARC. 2 fatalities.

Around 12 September 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Cajibio municipality (Cauca), a man was killed and his body was found by farmers in El Dinde corregimiento. Motive of the attack and circumstances of death are unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 12 September 2021, in Barranca de Upia (Meta), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a Venezuelan woman and injured two Venezuelan people in a drive-by shooting in the Las Ferias neighborhood. Authorities claim that the motive of the attack is settling of scores. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Farmers (Colombia)
notes: On 10 September 2021, in the rural area of Lejanias municipality (Meta), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a social leader and farmer, who was also a member of the JAC. The victim was attacked in the Lusitania vereda. There are no further details about the event or possible perpetrators. 1 fatality.

Around 10 September 2021, in the rural area of Timbio (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals targeted an indigenous authority near the Puerta Roja area during a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim's vehicle several times, but no fatalities or injuries occurred. The region is known for the presence of armed groups.

On 10 September 2021, in the rural area of Tibu municipality (Norte de Santander), a farmer, who is also a land restitution social leader, was abducted by ELN members in El Ambato vereda. The victim was released by the armed group to a humanitarian mission on 6 September 2022.

On 8 September 2021, in Caucasia (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot a man at a restaurant in the Camello Dos neighborhood. The victim was taken to the hospital but died hours later. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

source: UNOCHA; El Pais (Colombia); El Tiempo (Colombia); Diario La Libertad
notes: On 7 September 2021, in Florida (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed men set fire to two public service buses. According to the report, men wearing civilian clothes got on the buses and ordered the passengers who were waiting to travel to get off. Subsequently, perpetrators burned down the vehicle. Some sources reported between 1 to 3 people injured, while others informed that no civilians got injured in the attack. The area is known for the presence of armed groups.

Around 7 September 2021, in Villavicencio (Meta), an unidentified individual attacked a social leader, who is also an activist for the right to decent housing for several families in the Camelia neighborhood. The assailant physically attacked the victim and told her that she had 72 hours to leave or she would be killed. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: On 6 September 2021, in the rural area of Caldono municipality (Cauca), suspected members of the Dagoberto Ramos FARC dissident faction attacked Nasa indigenous people from the San Lorenzo indigenous reserved land. There are no further details on the attack, but no fatalities or injuries occurred. Indigenous leaders suspected the attack is retaliation, as members of the Guardia Indigena detained several members of the Dagoberto Ramos front in the hours previous to the event.

On 6 September 2021, in the rural area of El Escobal corregimiento, Cucuta municipality (Norte de Santander), suspected ELN members shot dead a woman on one of the illegal crossings paths between Venezuela and Colombia. The attack occurred in a place known as El Aguila when armed men opened fire five times on the victim. Authorities believed the victim was killed after refusing to pay the armed group for using the way. 1 fatality.

On 6 September 2021, in the rural area of El Bagre municipality (Antioquia), members of the Gulf Clan carried out several attacks, resulting in the death of one person. The source did not provide details on the identity of the victim or further description of the event. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former AUC: United Self-Defence Forces of Colombia
notes: On 6 September 2021, in San Cristobal (Antioquia), a former AUC member was stabbed to death by unidentified perpetrators in the Pajarito sector. The motive of the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 6 September 2021, in Santa Fe De Antioquia (Antioquia), a man was shot and killed by two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown. The department is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 6 September 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Valdivia municipality (Antioquia), two men were killed and their bodies were found. Authorities claim the attack was perpetrated by the ELN and that the victims were related to the consumption and selling of drugs. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
assoc_actor_2: Nasa Indigenous Group (Colombia); CRIC: Indigenous Regional Council of Cauca
notes: On 5 September 2021, in the rural area of Caldono (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals attacked a Nasa indigenous leader, who is an active member of the CRIC, in the Porvenir Vilachi vereda. The armed men opened fire on the car assigned to the victim by the UNP and subsequently burned down the vehicle. No fatalities or injuries occurred. Indigenous leaders suspected the attack is retaliation, as members of the Guardia Indigena detained several members of the Dagoberto Ramos front in the hours previous to the event.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 48th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (48th Front - Pedro Martinez)
notes: Around 5 September 2021 (weekend of), in the rural area of El Orito municipality (Putumayo), members of the 48th FARC dissident front shot dead two people. The source did not provide details on the identity of the victims or further description of the event. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 10th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (10th Front)
notes: On 4 September 2021, in the rural area of Fortul (Arauca), suspected members of the 10th FARC dissident faction abducted a worker of a petroleum company. The victim was later released around 26 September to a humanitarian commission.

On 4 September 2021, in the rural area of La Hormiga corregimiento, Valle del Guamuez municipality (Putumayo), a man was shot 12 times and killed by unidentified armed individuals in Las Vegas vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 3 September 2021, in El Mango, Argelia municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals killed a professional athlete, who was a social activist in his community. The armed men entered the young man's house, violently took him out and then shot him dead in the presence of the villagers. The man had been living there for a short time and had not reported any threats previous to the attack. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 3 September 2021, in Samaniego (Narino), a teenage girl was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality. [women targeted: girls]

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Women (Colombia)
notes: Around 2 September 2021, in Pereira (Risaralda), a demobilized FARC member was killed. One source claimed that the victim was killed during a meeting with other people, while a second media outlet reported that the victim's body was found dead in his parents' home. There is no further information about the circumstances of the death. 1 fatality. [women targeted: political party supporters]

On 2 September 2021, in Santiago De Cali (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals opened fire against the car of a woman public employee in charge to control the city finances and contracts in a drive-by shooting. The victim's vehicle received four gun impacts in the back. The victim did not report death threats previous to the attack. There were no fatalities. [women targeted: government officials]

On 1 September 2021, in Cartagena (Bolivar), an informal vendor reported a suspected case of police abuse during a routine police operation. According to the report, officers arrived at the area following a call for public disorder. In the middle of the argument, an officer pushed an elderly woman, causing injuries to her shoulder and hip as a result of a fall.

Around 1 September 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Guarne municipality (Antioquia), a man was shot and killed and his body was found in the Guamito vereda. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 1 September 2021 (as reported), near Suarez town (Cauca), a miner was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals between La Turbina and El Basuro sectors. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 1 September 2021 (week of), in the rural area of Vista Hermosa municipality (coded to Vistahermosa, Meta), a man was killed by unidentified perpetrators. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 31 August 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of La Danta corregimiento (Antioquia), a man was shot and killed by unidentified perpetrators. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 31 August 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Maceo municipality (Antioquia), a man was killed and his body was found in La Pureza vereda. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 31 August 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Segovia municipality (Antioquia), a man was killed and his body was found in the Manzanillo vereda. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 30 August 2021, in La Virginia (Risaralda), a man attacked and killed an LGBT trans woman with a Machete. The perpetrator attacked the victim when she demanded payment of her service as a sex worker. The victim remained 4 months in intensive care but later died due to the severity of the wounds. It remains unclear the motive for the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 30 August 2021, near Taraza (Antioquia), Gulf Clam members killed a moto-taxi driver and a seller near the Las Pavas area. According to the report, the victims argued with another person the week before. Perpetrators shot at the men several times. 2 fatalities

On 29 August 2021, in the rural area of El Castillo (Meta), unidentified armed individuals attacked two social leaders in the Brisas de Yamanes area. Victims were on their motorcycles when perpetrators jumped from a nearby forestry area and opened fire on the couple, killing the woman who was an active member and leader of a farmers' organization. The other victim was the president of the JAC of the Cano Lindo vereda. 1 fatality.

source: El Colombiano; El Tiempo (Colombia); UNOCHA; INDEPAZ
notes: Around 29 August 2021 (weekend of), in Banco De Arenas, Cucuta municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a group of civilians who had gathered at a local bar, killing three people. The event occurred in Puerto Leon vereda, an area known for the presence of Gulf Clan and ELN members. 3 fatalities.

On 29 August 2021, in the rural area of La Plata municipality (Huila), a farmer was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in the Villa Mercedes vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 August 2021, in Bogota - Kennedy (Bogota, D.C.), a police officer beat up a citizen while carrying out an arrest procedure for breaking regulation introduced due to the coronavirus pandemic. Video leaked to the press showed that the victim was handcuffed when the attack occurred.

On 27 August 2021, in Popayan (Cauca), two unidentified individuals attacked a social leader who is also a member of a students' organization. Perpetrators threw glue at the hair and face of the victim, who is a recognized activist for women's rights. The woman claimed the attack is related to her political activism during the ongoing anti-government protests that are taking place in the city. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

actor1: Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022) DIRAN: Anti-Narcotics Directorate
notes: On 26 August 2021, in the rural area of Cartagena Del Chaira (Caqueta), a woman was reported severely injured due to the actions of the DIRAN police forces, in vereda Comuneros. Police attacked a group of farmers as they gathered to complain about the eradication of coca fields. The victim was hit by a tear gas canister on her face.

Around 26 August 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Bolivar municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in La Pradera vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 26 August 2021, in the rural area of Cumbitara (Narino), ELN members abducted a group of seven farmers, accusing them of being part of another armed group. Three of the victims were released a few days later, and four more returned to their families around 8 September 2021.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carolina Ramirez Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carolina Ramirez Front)
notes: On 26 August 2021, in Pinuna Negro (Putumayo), two men were kidnapped by members of the FARC Dissident group Carolina Ramirez Front. Before kidnapping the man, the group harassed, asked for the identification of the residents, and restricted the movement of civilians (coded separately). There is no further information.

Around 25 August 2021, in Puerto Valdivia (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals killed a resident in a shooting. Authorities claimed that while the reason for the killing is still unknown, the area is known for the presence of ELN, Gulf Clan, and FARC dissident groups. 1 fatality.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 24 August 2021, in the rural area of Litoral del San Juan (Choco), suspected Gulf Clan members killed a Wounaan indigenous person in the Playa Linda indigenous reserve area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 24 August 2021, in the rural area of San Jose de la Fragua municipality (Caqueta), authorities reported that a former FARC member was shot dead by unidentified perpetrators in the La Luna vereda. There are no further details about the attack. 1 fatality.

On 24 August 2021, in the rural area of Remedios municipality (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man and injured another in La Cruzada vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 24 August 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Corinto municipality (Cauca), two women were killed and their bodies were found with several gunshot wounds in La Paila vereda. The victims were on a motorcycle when they were attacked by the perpetrators from a car in a drive-by shooting. The motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of the FARC Dissident group Dagoberto Ramos Front in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 24 August 2021, in Medio Baudo municipality (coded to Puerto Meluk, Choco), four civilians were injured, including two minors, after stepping on a landmine that detonated in the Taparal community. There is no information about the armed group that planted the explosive. There were no fatalities.

On 24 August 2021, in San Pablo (Meta), an indigenous man was shot dead by two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 24 August 2021, in Santiago De Cali (Valle del Cauca), three students' leaders were reported injured after four unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle attacked them in a drive-by shooting. The victims were organizing an open-air cinema in the Manuela Beltran neighborhood when perpetrators opened fire on the group. There were no fatalities.

On 23 August 2021, in Popayan (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a health worker in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim in the Belalcazar neighborhood. Authorities are investigating if the victim had received death threats before the attack occurred. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Colombia (2018-2022); PCC: Colombian Conservative Party
source: El Colombiano; El Espectador; INDEPAZ; UNOCHA
notes: On 23 August 2021, in Zaragoza (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals killed a councilman, who was also a member of the Conservative party, in the Las Flores neighborhood. Perpetrators knocked at the victim's door and opened fire at him when he opened it. Subsequently, the men fled the area on a motorcycle. The Bajo Cauca subregion is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 23 August 2021, in Neiva (Huila), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a police officer in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators intercepted the victim and opened fire several times against him. The victim was off-duty when the attack occurred. 1 fatality.

Around 23 August 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Betulia municipality (Antioquia), a man was shot dead by unidentified armed individuals. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 23 August 2021 (as reported), in Jardin (Antioquia), a man was killed and his body was found with several gunshot wounds. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 23 August 2021, in Popayan (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a student's leader who had actively participated in the 2021 national anti-government protests. The victim had lost an eye in one of the clashes with police forces during the demonstrations and had received death threats from armed groups in the past. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 23 August 2021 (as reported), in Bajo Baudo municipality (Choco), Gulf Clan members opened fire against two Wounaan indigenous men on board of a boat. The victims were returning to the Playa Linda community when they were attacked. They jumped into the river to avoid being reached by the bullets and swam to the shore. One of the victims was injured by a bullet and taken to a hospital. There were no fatalities.

Around 23 August 2021 (as reported), near La Parada corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found in the smuggling route known as Los Mangos. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of the ELN and the Venezuelan criminal group Tren de Aragua in the area. 1 fatality.

On 23 August 2021, in Palmira municipality (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle intercepted a vehicle with a family inside on the road Cali - Palmira. The armed individuals forced the mom and the daughter to get off the car and kidnapped the son, who is a minor. The whereabouts of the abducted minor is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the department.

source: El Tiempo (Colombia); INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; El Espectador
notes: On 22 August 2021, in the rural area of Santander De Quilichao municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals opened fire at a group of civilians who were celebrating a party in El Aguila vereda, killing three people. Two victims died in the area, while a third one died in the hospital. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.

Around 22 August 2021, in the rural area of Banco De Arenas corregimiento (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a local leader who was also a member of the JAC. Initial reports claimed that perpetrators raided the victim's house in the La Punta vereda. But further investigations indicated that the victim's body and the remains of one of his employees were found in the rural area. The man had reported several death threats before the attack occurred. The corregimiento is known for the presence of Gulf Clan members, FARC dissident groups, and ELN members. Official sources pointed to ELN as a potential perpetrator since the bodies had the face covered with a t-shirt, a signature in the killings committed by this armed group. 2 fatalities.

On 22 August 2021, in the rural area of Gonzalez municipality (Cesar), suspected ELN members kidnapped a civilian as the man was arriving at his private home. The perpetrators forced the victim onto a motorcycle and then fled in the direction of the Catatumbo sub-region. The victim is a former mayor of the municipality and had already been kidnapped by the same organization in 1991. The man was reportedly released around 8 October.

On 22 August 2021, in Soata (Boyaca), a social leader, who was also a local teacher, was killed in her private residence. Relatives of the victim went to her house to search for her after she never returned to a family party. Local authorities claimed the victim was asphyxiated. 1 fatality.

On 22 August 2021, in Acacias (Meta), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals outside of his house in the Nueva Victoria neighborhood. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 22 August 2021 (as reported), in Mesetas (Meta), a person was killed and their body was found. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 22 August 2021, in Ocana (Norte de Santander), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals near the Francisco de Paula Santander University. The victim was on a motorcycle with another person when he was attacked. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 22 August 2021, in Cayetano municipality (Norte de Santander), near Urimaco corregimiento, a man was shot seven times and killed by unidentified armed individuals in La Batea sector. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Refugees/IDPs (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
source: UNOCHA; El Universal (Colombia); INDEPAZ; Vanguardia Liberal
notes: Around 21 August 2021, near Popayan (Cauca), a social leader and political activist was abducted and subsequently killed by unidentified perpetrators. Relatives had reported the man's disappearance, whose body was later found in the rural area of Cajibio (Cauca). The victim had been previously forcibly displaced from El Plateado (Cauca), where he was a member of the JAC. Moreover, the man had an active role in the ongoing anti-government protests. 1 fatality.

On 21 August 2021, in Pelaya (Cesar), unidentified armed individuals killed the Secretary of Rural Development of the town in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim several times when the latter drove a vehicle near the town's center. The victim had reported several death threats. 1 fatality.

Around 21 August 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Frontino municipality (Antioquia), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in La Herradura vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 21 August 2021 (as reported), in La Union (La Union, Antioquia), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 21 August 2021 (as reported), in Segovia municipality (Antioquia), a teenager was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 21 August 2021, in Segovia (Antioquia), a person was killed by unknown perpetrators inside a night club. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 21 August 2021, in Segovia (Antioquia), a person was killed by unknown perpetrators in the Los Guamos neighborhood. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 20 August 2021, in Segovia (Antioquia), a person was killed by unknown perpetrators inside a barbershop. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 20 August 2021, in Tulua (Valle del Cauca), two men, father and son, were killed by unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting in La Galeria sector. The motives of the attack are under investigation. There is presence of armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 10th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (10th Front)
notes: On 19 August 2021, in Arauca (Arauca), suspected members of the 10th FARC dissident faction abducted a health worker from his private residence. Authorities claimed perpetrators took the victim to Venezuelan territory. The victim was later released around 5 September.

On 19 August 2021, in the rural area of Popayan municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals attacked a leading member of the Comunes political party in a drive-by shooting. The victim reported that the perpetrators opened fire on his vehicle near the Guadalejo area. Perpetrator fled the area following the reaction of the victim's protection team. No fatalities or injuries occurred.

On 19 August 2021, in Inza, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals attacked the National Unit Protection (UNP) car, in which a member of the Comunes party was supposed to be inside. No one was injured and the targeted victim was not at the scene. Several armed groups operate in this department.

On 19 August 2021, in Granada (Meta), two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in a commercial establishment in the Las Delicias neighborhood. The motive of the attack is unknown. The perpetrators were later arrested after clashing with police forces (coded separately). There is presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 19 August 2021, in Tulua (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the La Galeria sector. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 18 August 2021 (as reported), in Guadalajara de Buga, Valle del Cauca, an individual was killed and his head was found in Fuenmayor neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 18 August 2021, in the rural area of Cumbitara (Narino), ELN members kidnapped a group of farmers. The armed group released the victims following pressure from the community to free the hostages.

Around 18 August 2021 (as reported), in Puerto Santander (Norte de Santander), a man was shot and killed and his body was found in the Centro neighborhood. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 18 August 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of San Faustino corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a Venezuelan man was shot and killed and his body was found with seven gunshot wounds in the Santa Cecilia sector. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 17 August 2021, in Cartagena, Bolivar, unidentified armed men shot and killed an individual in Lomas de San Blas neighborhood. Circumstances of the attack are not clear and police investigates if it was crime-related or a targeted action. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 17 August 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Arauca (Arauca), authorities found the body of a former local council candidate, who was also an active social leader, floating in the Arauca River. The body was in advanced state of decomposition. The victim's family had reported him missing on 7 August. Although the circumstances of his death are still unknown, the area is known for the presence of several armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Farmers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 17 August 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Puerto Libertador municipality (Cordoba), suspected Gulf Clan (AGC) members killed a social leader, who was also a JAC member, and a farmer beneficiary of the illicit crop substitution program (PNIS) on the road between La Pedra and La Terminal veredas. 1 fatality.

Around 17 August 2021 (as reported), near La Gabarra corregimiento, Tibu municipality (Norte de Santander), a man was shot and killed and his body was found next to a pamphlet warning that other people with addictions and bad habits would have the same ending as the victim. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 17 August 2021 (as reported), in Mocoa (Putumayo), two unidentified armed men kidnapped a woman inside a business establishment in the Bolivar neighborhood. Police forces rescued the woman, who was found with her hands and feet tied and with signs of being beaten. Both kidnappers were arrested. The area is known for the presence of armed groups.

On 16 August 2021, in Caicedonia (Valle del Cauca), an unidentified armed man shot and killed an off-duty military officer outside his residence in the El Progresa neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 16 August 2021 (between 15 - 17 August), in the rural area of Piendamo (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals killed two brothers and their bodies were found in the San Isidro vereda. They went missing on 15 August. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

Around 16 August 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Cumaribo municipality (Vichada), a couple of social leaders of the area were killed and their bodies were found inside their house in the Guacamayas vereda. The perpetrators of the attack are unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 15 August 2021, in Soledad (Atlantico), a trans-woman claimed she was harassed and physically assaulted by a group of police officers in a suspected homophobic attack. The officers chased the victim down the street and assaulted her psychically while shouting discriminatory expletives at her. The victim claimed that her sexual identity triggered the attack as officers forced her to show her breast to them. There were no fatalities.

Around 15 August 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Argelia municipality, Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds in Botafogo vereda. FARC dissidents operate in the area. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
notes: On 15 August 2021, near El Mango corregimiento, Cauca, Carlos Patino FARC front of dissidents killed two men in Cruce de Las Perlas sector. The victims tried to escape from the guerrilla checkpoint and were shot by the dissidents. One of the victims was a farmer and the son of the Municipal Committee of Victims of the city. 2 fatalities.

Around 15 August 2021 (between 14 - 16 August), in Ayapel, Cordoba, a man was killed and his body was found with machete marks. He went missing on 14 August. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: Around 14 August 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Corinto, Cauca, FARC dissidents shot and killed a Haitian migrant in Caracoli sector. According to residents, since the man was not from the area, he did not know that the territory could not be trespassed due to the dissidents territory control in the area. 1 fatality.

On 14 August 2021, in Cartagena, Bolivar, unidentified armed individuals killed a man in a drive-by shooting in Olaya Herrera neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: On 13 August 2021, in El Palo corregimiento, Cauca, Dagoberto Ramos FARC front of dissidents shot and killed two robbers and their bodies were found in El Palo corregimiento. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: On 12 August 2021, in the rural area of Caloto, Cauca, Dagoberto Ramos Ortiz FARC Front dissidents shot and killed two men in La Trampa sector. Perpetrators left a note of authorship and claimed they were killed because of the robberies they had committed in the region. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 12 August 2021, in the rural area of Leiva municipality, Narino, unidentified armed individuals killed a former FARC combatant in El Cucho vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 12 August 2021, in Caucasia, Antioquia, unidentified armed men killed two men in El Paraiso neighborhood. Authorities investigate if Gulf Clan (AGC) is responsible for the killing. 2 fatalities.
On 12 August 2021, in Sonson, Antioquia, unidentified armed individuals killed two brothers in a drive-by shooting. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

Around 12 August 2021 (as reported), in Sonson municipality (Antioquia), two people were killed and their bodies were found. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.
On 12 August 2021, in El Plateado corregimiento, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a farmer. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 12 August 2021, in Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca, unidentified armed men shot and killed a man. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 11 August 2021, in Fuente de Oro, Meta, unidentified armed individuals killed a teacher near the school he worked at. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 11 August 2021, in the rural area of Chita municipality, Boyaca, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed the mayor's husband, while he was in his car, in La Playa vereda. 1 fatality.

On 11 August 2021, in Santiago de Cali, Valle del Cauca, unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting in El Ingenio park. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 11 August 2021, in Antioquia, Caucasia, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man on a street. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 11 August 2021, in El Palo sector, Cauca, unidentified armed men shot and killed a man. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 11 August 2021, in Santander de Quilichao, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals arrived at a basketball court, shot and killed an individual in Bello Horizonte neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 11 August 2021 (as reported), in Floridablanca (Santander), unidentified armed individuals opened fire several times against an establishment owned by the son of a social leader. The son was inside the establishment at the time but was unharmed. The social leader had received several threats in the past. There were no casualties.

Around 10 August 2021 (as reported), in Pereira, Risaralda, the son of the Secretary for the Social Development was killed and his body was found without his belongings in El Remanso neighborhood. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 10 August 2021, in the rural area of Leiva municipality, Narino, a demobilized FARC member was killed and his body was found with several gunshot wounds. The Jaime Martinez FARC front of dissidents, Franco Benavidez FARC front of dissidents and Carlos Patino FARC front of dissidents operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 10 August 2021, in La Union (La Union, Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a teenage boy in the El Cementerio sector. Although authorities claim that the victim was mistaken for someone else, the motive of the attack is unknown. The department is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Second Marquetalia: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Segunda Marquetalia)
notes: On 10 August 2021, in San Felipe municipality (Guainia), members of the FARC Dissident group Segunda Marquetalia set an illegal checkpoint and temporarily held four humanitarian workers in the Rio Negro sector.

Around 10 August 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Ricaurte municipality, Narino, an indigenous couple was killed and their bodies were found with gunshot wounds inside their house in Palvi Gualtal indigenous reserve. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.
Around 9 August 2021 (as reported), in Puerto Leguizamo, Putumayo, a woman was killed and her body was found slaughtered. The armed group Comandos de Frontera operate in the city. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 9 August 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of El Paujil municipality, Caqueta, a former FARC combatant was killed and his body was found in La Concordia vereda. Next to his body, a note said that anyone who would try to affect the community' well-being would have the same end as the victim. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 5th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (5th Front)
assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: El Colombiano; INDEPAZ; Contagio Radio; UNOCHA
notes: On 9 August 2021, in the rural area of San Andres De Cuerquia municipality (Antioquia), members of the FARC Dissident group 5th Front broke into the house of a social leader, who was also a member of the JAC of the Montebello vereda, and shot the victim dead. The social leader had already been the victim of threats against him. 1 fatality.

On 8 August 2021, in Segovia, Antioquia, unidentified armed men on a motorcycle shot against a group of people in a drive-by shooting. According to the police, Gulf Clan (AGC) operates in the area and is the attack may be related to drug trafficking disputes. Three people were injured.
On 8 August 2021, in Lopez Adentro vereda, Cauca, unidentified individuals shot and injured an indigenous man. Several armed groups operate in this department.

On 8 August 2021, in Santander de Quilichao, Cauca, unidentified armed men on a motorcycle shot against a group of people in a drive-by shooting in Alfonso Lopez neighborhood. One person was killed. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 8 August 2021, in the rural area of Isnos municipality (coded to San Jose de Isnos), Huila, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a demobilized former FARC member in the Bajo Planes vereda. The wife of the victim was also injured in the attack. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 8 August 2021, in Villavicencio, Meta, unidentified armed men shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in Las Delicias neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 8 August 2021 (as reported), in Santiago De Cali, Valle del Cauca, two men were killed and their bodies were found tortured and floating on the Cali river. Their bodies had signs of constriction and stabbing. One of the victim was an Afro-descendant. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

On 7 August 2021, in the rural area of Puerto Lopez municipality (Meta), two men were shot and killed by an unidentified armed individual in the Altamira vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 7 August 2021, in Roldanillo, Valle del Cauca, an unidentified armed man entered a private establishment and shot against two people. One of the victims died, the other was injured. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 6 August 2021, in Medellin, Antioquia, police officers killed a man in Aranjuez neighborhood, and moved his body to the police vehicle, disobeying the standard procedures in that case. Investigations to clarify the circumstances of the attack are underway. 1 fatality.

Around 6 August 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Miranda municipality (Cauca), a man was shot and killed and his body was found in the Tierra Dura vereda. The motive or perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 6 August 2021, in the rural area of San Miguel municipality (coded to La Dorada), Putumayo, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a Venezuelan man near the Agua Clara vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 5 August 2021, in the rural area of Sibundoy (Putumayo), unidentified armed individuals raided the house of a Kamentsa indigenous leader and shot him dead. The victim was the leader of the Biya indigenous reserve area. 1 fatality.

On 5 August 2021, in the rural area of San Miguel municipality (coded to La Dorada), Putumayo, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a Venezuelan man in the San Jose vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 5 August 2021, in the rural area of Valle del Guamuez municipality (Putumayo), a Venezuelan man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in the San Marcos vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 4 August 2021, in the rural area of Cabuyal, El Tambo (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a group of civilians during a community festival in the Cipres Pueblo Nuevo vereda. One person was killed, and three more were reported injured. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 4 August 2021 (as reported), in Caucasia (Antioquia), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in the Villa Uribe settlement. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 4 August 2021 (as reported), in Guatape (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the San Rafael neighborhood and injured a teenage boy. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 4 August 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Marinilla municipality (Antioquia), a man was shot and killed and his body was found in La Esperanza vereda. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 3 August 2021, in the rural area of Astilleros La Ye, El Zulia (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a farmer who was transiting the road between El Zulia and Banco de Arena. The victim survived the attack but he was injured and hospitalized. The area is known for the presence of ELN and Gulf Clan members.

On 3 August 2021, in the rural area of El Zulia (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals killed a farmer in the Agualasal vereda. Perpetrators dragged the victim out of his residence and subsequently shot him dead. Witnesses claimed the victim had his hands tightened. The area is known for the presence of ELN and Gulf Clan members. 1 fatality.

On 2 August 2021, in Aracataca (Magdalena), unidentified armed individuals killed three people during a drive-by shooting attack in the Alto Prado neighborhood. Two more people were reported injured. While the area is known for the presence of the Gulf Clan and other armed groups, there are still no known reasons behind the killing or potential perpetrators. 3 fatalities.

Around 2 August 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Puerto Asis municipality (Putumayo), a man was killed and his body was found with several gunshot wounds in a river in El Aguila vereda. The motive and perpetrators of the attack are unknown but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

source: El Espectador; El Nuevo Siglo; INDEPAZ
notes: On 1 August 2021, in Herrera, Rioblanco (Tolima), unidentified armed individuals killed three people who had gathered in a local store. Two of the victims were members of the same family. There are no known reasons behind the killing or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of FARC dissident Faction, ELN, and Gulf Clan members. 3 fatalities.

On 1 August 2021, in Tibu (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a fruit seller in the Barrio Largo neighborhood. The attack occurred minutes after the municipal election took place in the town. While there are no known reasons behind the killing or potential perpetrators, local residents claimed a group of armed individuals killed the victim to be used as bait and to ambush authorities, but the latter never showed up. 1 fatality.

On 1 August 2021, in the rural area of El Penol municipality (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals shot at two men in La Cristalina vereda. One of the men was killed and the other was injured. The motive of the attack is unknown. The department is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

source: El Diario (Colombia); Radio Nacional De Colombia
notes: On 31 July 2021, in Pereira (Risaralda), an unidentified armed individual opened fire seven times on a social leader and member of the JAC of the Los Independientes neighborhood. The social leader is hospitalized due to the injuries received during the attack. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of Gulf Clan members.

On 31 July 2021, in La Hormiga (Putumayo), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the San Francisco neighborhood. The motive of the attack is unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Mobile Column: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Adan Izquierdo)
notes: On 31 July 2021, in the rural area of Guacari municipality (Valle del Cauca), members of the Adan Izquierdo FARC Dissident group shot dead two men in the Monterrey vereda. The motive is unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 29 July 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Puerto Rondon municipality, Arauca, unidentified armed individuals killed three members from the same family on a rural road near Sabana de Marrero. There are no known reasons behind the killing or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of FARC dissident Faction, ELN, and Gulf Clan members. 3 fatalities.

On 29 July 2021, in Apartado, Antioquia, two men shot and killed an off-duty police officer at his private residence in the 20 de Enero neighborhood. Authorities believe the Gulf Clan is behind this attack. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 29 July 2021, in Bolombolo corregimiento, Venecia, Antioquia, a man was killed by unknown attackers. Authorities believe the attack is related to drug trafficking territorial control. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 29 July 2021, in La Pintada, Antioquia, two men were killed by unknown attackers in the Puente Viejo area. Authorities believe the attack is related to drug trafficking territorial control. Several armed groups operate in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 29 July 2021, in a rural area of Venecia municipality, Antioquia, a man was shot and killed by unknown attackers in Palenque vereda. Authorities believe the attack is related to drug trafficking territorial control. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 29 July 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Isnos municipality (coded to San Jose de Isnos), Huila, a woman was killed and her body was found inside a house, in Las Delicias vereda. The victim was tied and gagged. According to the report, the perpetrators were at least three men. The reason for the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.
On 29 July 2021, in Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca, a man was killed by unknown perpetrators. The report does not provide further details. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 28 July 2021 (as reported), Valledupar (Cordoba), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a livestock farmer in a drive-by shooting. The victim escaped with no injuries. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups.

On 28 July 2021, in a rural area of Timba corregimiento, Buenos Aires, Cauca, a woman was killed and her body was found bearing a gunshot wound in Ventura vereda. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 28 July 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Purisima municipality (coded to Purisima de la Concepcion), Cordoba, a person was killed and his body was found bearing several gunshot wounds in Barro Lindo vereda. There is the presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 27 July 2021, in the rural area of El Escobal, Cucuta (Norte de Santander), suspected ELN members killed a man on one of the illegal crossing paths to Venezuelan territory. The victim was shot several times in the head. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 27 July 2021, in San Jose Del Guaviare (Caqueta), unidentified armed men shot dead a former FARC militant participating in the reintegration process. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim several times in the El Modelo neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 27 July 2021, in a rural area of Bolivar municipality, Cauca, a man was killed in the San Lorenzo corregimiento. According to the report, an armed group carrying the ELN insignia arrived at a bar and dragged the victim. His body was found moments later bearing several gunshot wounds. 1 fatality.

On 27 July 2021, in a rural area of Barbacoas municipality, Narino, a man was killed by unknown perpetrators in Kenda vereda. According to the report, the perpetrators shot the victim several times. The victim was a minor. Several groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 27 July 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Tumaco municipality, Narino, a man was killed and his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition at height KM 47 of the road to Pasto city. The victim was a local social leader who was kidnapped on 29 June 2021 in the Espriella corregimiento. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality

Around 26 July 2021, in El Espinal (Tolima), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a woman who had gathered in a local store, in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim several times and subsequently fled the area in a motorcycle. The region is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 26 July 2021, in the rural area of El Zulia (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals killed two people and injured one more in the La Alejandra vereda. Victims were shot dead. While there are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 26 July 2021, in the rural area of Tibu (Norte de Santander), military soldiers killed a civilian and injured another one in a checkpoint located in the rural area of the municipality. According to the report, the victims ran from the checkpoint when security forces attempted to arrest them under false accusations. Subsequently, security forces opened fire on the unarmed men. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 37th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (37th Front)
assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: El Universal (Colombia); UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: On 26 July 2021, in the rural area of Montecristo municipality, Bolivar, unidentified armed individuals raided the house of a local social leader and member of the JAC of Mina de Piojo vereda. Perpetrators killed the victim, triggering the displacement of nearly 1,400 people due to fear of more attacks. The victims had reported threats from FARC dissident faction 37th, although authorities reported the presence of several armed organizations in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia); Farmers (Colombia)
source: INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; El Universal (Colombia); El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: On 26 July 2021, in the rural area of Santander de Quilichao municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed men shot dead an Afro-Colombian and former FARC combatant participating in the reintegration process. The victim, who participated in a local farming project, was intercepted by perpetrators near his private residence. A person who was with the victim at the moment of the attack was injured. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: Around 26 July 2021, in the rural area of Guamalito (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a social leader and member of the JAC in Las Aguilas vereda. Perpetrators opened fire three times against the victim. The victim had reported previous death threats by armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 26 July 2021, in Puerto Libertador, Cordoba, a man was killed by unknown perpetrators inside a store located at the entrance of the town. The motive of the attack is not reported. There is the presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 26 July 2021 (as reported), in Tulua, Valle del Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found in the Tulua River, at the height of the Fatima neighborhood. The victim's body bore a gunshot to his head. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 26 July 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Purificacion municipality, Tolima, two men were killed by unknown perpetrators in La Esperanza vereda. One victim was minor. Several graffiti were tagged next to the bodies, reading, 'AUC, death to the collaborators with the guerrilla groups, frogs, thieves.' Several armed groups operate in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 25 July 2021, near Villa Uribe, Montecristo (Bolivar), two people were killed and their bodies were found in El Salto vereda. The victims were shot dead. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators, but the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 25 July 2021, in Andalucia municipality, Valle Del Cauca, a man was decapitated and killed and his body was found by residents of the area. Perpetrators cut the victim's head off and threw it in the middle of the region wrapped in a bed sheet. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 24 July 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of La Montanita municipality, Caqueta, unidentified armed individuals shot dead three members of the same family. Perpetrators intercepted the victim's vehicle on the road that connects the municipality with the locality of Milan and subsequently opened fire on the victims. An off-duty military soldier was among the victims. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.

source: El Tiempo (Colombia); El Espectador; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ
notes: On 24 July 2021, in Balboa (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals killed three people in a drive-by shooting in the Bolivar neighborhood. Perpetrators opened fire against a woman, killing two more people in the attack. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.

On 24 July 2021, in Bucaramanga (Santander), a Venezuelan national was shot dead in a drive-by shooting by unidentified armed men while gathering at a local bar. The victim was a former member of the Venezuelan regime and public secretary who had migrated to Colombia more than 10 years ago. Sources claim the victim was being investigated by Venezuelan authorities in relation to the death of two people in the Apure state, Venezuela. 1 fatality.

On 24 July 2021, in a rural area of Argelia municipality, Cauca, several armed men shot and killed a farmer in Las Perlas vereda. According to the report, he was taken out of this house and shot dead. A cardboard message signed by the ELN was left next to his body, accusing him of being a collaborator with the FARC dissident front Carlos Patino. 1 fatality.

On 24 July 2021, in the rural area of Uribia municipality, La Guajira, 16 humanitarian workers were held by rioters, members of the communal militia of the Taparajin Wayuu Indigenous community for three hours. According to the report, the rioters argued the workers were held as a complaint for the work carried out by the humanitarian organization in the past. There were no casualties.

On 24 July 2021, in Tumaco, Narino, two armed men on a motorbike killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the El Jardin neighborhood. The reason for the attack is not reported. Several armed groups operate in the department. 1 fatality.

On 23 July 2021, in the rural area of Riohacha (La Guajira), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a Venezuelan national in a drive-by shooting. The victim was sleeping on the sidewalk when perpetrators opened fire on him. Residents claimed the man had arrived to live in the area two weeks ago. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators. 1 fatality

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
source: UNOCHA; El Colombiano; INDEPAZ; El Espectador
notes: On 23 July 2021, the rural area of La Union Peneya municipality, La Montanita (Caqueta), unidentified armed individuals killed a social leader and active member of a local farmers' organization in in a drive-by shooting near Los Andes vereda. The victim had an active role in the ongoing anti-government protests and was member of a local JAC. 1 fatality.

On 23 July 2021, in Armenia (Quindio), unidentified armed individuals killed three people in a drive-by shooting in the Simon Bolivar neighborhood. While the area is known for the presence of the Aguilas Negras, Gulf Clan, among other armed groups, there are no known reasons behind the killing or potential perpetrators. 3 fatalities.
On 23 July 2021, in a rural area of Fortul municipality, Arauca, an unknown number of armed men abducted a local merchant. His whereabouts is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area.

On 23 July 2021, in a rural area between Tame and Fortul municipalities (coded to Fortul), Arauca, an unknown number of armed men abducted three men, who work for a sanitization company in Saravena municipality. Several armed groups operate in the area. The whereabouts of the victims is unknown.

source: UNOCHA; El Tiempo (Colombia); El Espectador; Diario La Libertad
notes: On 22 July 2021, in Santiago De Cali, Valle del Cauca, two people were attacked by an unidentified armed individual. One victim is a German citizen, well known for taking an active role in the ongoing political unrest in the country. The perpetrator shot several times at the victims. One victim received over 13 gunshots and died days later in hospital. While authorities claim the attack is related to a robbery, victims and social organizations reported the victims had received previous death threats and claimed that the authorities' statement is unreliable. 1 fatality.

On 22 July 2021, in the rural area of Santa Barbara municipality, Antioquia, a man was shot and killed while walking down the street with his girlfriend in the Versalles corregimiento. The reason for the attack is not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 22 July 2021, in the rural area of Puerto Santander municipality (Norte de Santander), a farmer was killed by an unidentified perpetrator in El Diamante vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
On 21 July 2021, in the rural area of Matanza municipality (Santander), 3 unidentified armed men abducted a retiree from his farm. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

Around 21 July 2021 (week of), in the rural area of El Plateado, Argelia (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals tortured and killed a local farmer after accusing the victim of being a supporter of a FARC dissident faction. Witnesses claimed that members of the Carlos Patino front had forced the man to let them set up a camp in the victim's plot of land the day previous to the attack, but the victim had no engagement with the armed group.
On 21 July 2021, in Villa De Leyva (Boyaca), police forces used excessive force against an arrested civilian when officers tased the handcuffed man.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
