assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 21 July 2021, in a rural area of El Plateado corregimiento, Argelia, Cauca, a former FARC fighter was shot and injured after passing an illegal checkpoint established by the FARC dissident front Carlos Patino. The exact location of the checkpoint was not reported. There were no fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 21 July 2021, in the rural area of Puerto Leguizamo municipality, Putumayo, two unidentified armed men shot and killed a former FARC militant participating in the reintegration process. Perpetrators stopped the vehicle in which the victim drove towards La Tagua area and shot him dead. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 21 July 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Mercaderes municipality, Cauca, a woman was killed and her body was found bearing several gunshot wounds in El Bado vereda. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 21 July 2021, in Acacias, Meta, an unknown number of armed men shot and injured a man who was working in a local store in the Saman neighborhood. According to the report, the victim died moments later in hospital. The reason for the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 21 July 2021, in a rural area of La Tola municipality, Narino, armed men on a motorbike killed a farmer in a drive-by shooting in the San Antonio sector. The reason for the attack is not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 21 July 2021, in Ocana, Norte de Santander, three men were shot and killed by unknown attackers in the Libardo Alonso neighborhood. The ELN, EPL, FARC dissident fronts, and Los Rastrojos operate in the area. 3 fatalities.

On 20 July 2021, in the rural area of Chiriguana municipality, Cesar, unidentified armed individuals attacked the leading member of a local trade union in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim's vehicle. The victim leads a social and indigenous organization and works promoting the rights of victims of armed conflict. He had suffered a similar attack two years ago in Ocana, Norte de Santander. There were no casualties.

Around 20 July 2021 (as reported), in the outskirts of El Plateado corregimiento, Argelia, Cauca, two farmers were killed and their bodies were found. Several armed groups operate in the area. 2 fatalities.

Around 20 July 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Morales municipality, Cauca, an Afro-Colombian couple were killed and their bodies were found bearing several gunshot wounds on the shores of the La Salvajina dam. The reason for the attack is not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 20 July 2021, in Timba corregimiento, Buenos Aires, Cauca, a group of armed men attacked an ambulance carrying a doctor, a nurse, a pregnant woman, and another person. The attack was perpetrated before crossing the Rio Timba Bridge. The driver was injured. Several armed groups operate in the area. There were no fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 20 July 2021, in Santa Marta, Magdalena, two people on a motorcycle attacked a man in a drive-by shooting between the Luis R Calvo and the Alto Delicias neighborhood. The victim was injured. A civilian woman, who was a communal leader and secretary of the local JAC, was also injured. The reason for the attack is not reported. Both injured victims died moments later in hospital. 2 fatalities.

Around 19 July 2021, in Yumbo (Valle del Cauca), in a drive-by shooting unidentified armed individuals shot dead two youths who had gathered in a local store. One of the victims was a journalist. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 19 July 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Copacabana municipality, Antioquia, two people were shot and killed and their bodies were found in La Beta vereda. Several armed groups operate in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 19 July 2021, in the rural area of El Mango corregimiento, Argelia, Cauca, armed men shot and killed a farmer and injured a woman after asking them to stop at an illegal checkpoint on the road at the height of La Primavera vereda. The area is known for the presence of the ELN and the Carlos Patino dissident front. 1 fatality.

On 19 July 2021, in Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca, a Venezuelan national was killed by unknown perpetrators. The report does not provide further details. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 19 July 2021, in Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca, four men were shot and killed in different attacks. One man was shot and killed in the Alberto Lleras Camargo neighborhood. Another man was killed in the Alfonso Lopez Michelsen neighborhood. A third man was killed in the La Independencia neighborhood and a fourth man was killed in the Puertas del Mar neighborhood. The reasons for the attacks are unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 4 fatalities.

On 18 July 2021, in the rural area of El Mango, Argelia municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a group of farmers on the La Primavera vereda, killing one person and injuring another one. Perpetrators shot at the group when the latter approached an illegal checkpoint set up by the armed group. The fatal victim was an activist and leader of a local farmers' organization. 1 fatality

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
source: UNOCHA; El Tiempo (Colombia); INDEPAZ; El Colombiano
notes: On 18 July 2021, in Yolombo, Antioquia, ten unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a group of civilians who had gathered at a local store in La Cruz vereda. Four people were killed. Three victims were members of the same family and another was a social leader and member of the local JAC. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 4 fatalities.

On 18 July 2021, in Villavicencio, Meta, an unknown number of armed men broke into a house and shot and injured four people in the El Recreo neighborhood. The reason for the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. There were no fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022); Teachers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 17 July 2021, in the rural area of Santander De Quilichao municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a group of civilians at a local pool saloon. Three civilians were killed and another was injured. One victim was a teacher and social leader of his community. The injured victim was an off-duty police officer. The area is known for the presence of the Jose Maria Becerra ELN front, the Milton Hernandez Guld Clan column, and the FARC dissident groups Dagoberto Ramos and Jaime Martinez. 3 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Jaime Martinez: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Jaime Martinez)
notes: Around 17 July 2021 (as reported), in Villa Colombia, Jamundi municipality (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals abducted a worker from a water utility company while the latter carried out maintenance work in the area. No particular armed group has yet claimed responsibility for the abduction, but authorities believe the FARC dissident faction Jaime Martinez is connected with the event. The whereabouts of the victim are still unknown.

Around 17 July 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Jamundi municipality, Valle del Cauca, a man was killed and his burned body was found in the Bonanza sector. According to the report, he was reported missing on 5 July 2021. The reason for the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 16 July 2021, in Juan Frio, Villa del Rosario municipality (Norte de Santander), twelve suspected ELN members crossed from the Venezuelan side of the border and killed two people. Perpetrators arrived at the town looking for the victims and had a small conversation with them before chasing them through the locality to shot them dead. Authorities claimed that the victims were local store owners. Four people were injured in the attack. 2 fatalities.

On 16 July 2021, in Bogota - Bosa, Bogota, D.C., unknown perpetrators shot and killed two men in a square park in the Pablo Sexto neighborhood. According to the report, one victim has a police record and was serving in prison in the United States for drug trafficking. According to the report, the victims were departing in the park when the armed men arrived and without mentioning a word, opened fire. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 16 July 2021, in a rural area of Tumaco municipality, Narino, a man was killed by unknown perpetrators in La Nupa vereda. The victim was a minor and was a member of the Community Council of Bajo Mira and Frontera. The details of the attack are not provided. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 15 July 2021 (month of), in the rural area of Puerto Santander municipality (Amazonas), a young girl was forcibly recruited by an unidentified armed group. The victim's relatives claimed that an unidentified armed group operating in the area persuaded the girl to use a cell phone and other valuables. The minor was last seen in the rural area of Araracuara wearing a camouflage uniform (Amazonas). Her whereabouts are still unknown. [women targeted: girls]

Around 15 July 2021 (month of), in Soacha (Cundinamarca), two female applicants for police forces were sexually abused and suffered workplace harassment from one of their superiors. According to their testimony, the man frequently harassed the women by extending their work hours. Additionally, he demanded oral sex in return for a work license. The events occurred inside the police station of the municipality.

assoc_actor_2: ASI: Independent Social Alliance Movement; Government of Colombia (2018-2022)
source: El Tiempo (Colombia); El Colombiano; INDEPAZ; UNOCHA
notes: On 15 July 2021, in Armenia, Quindio, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a councilman and member of the ASI political party in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators approached the victim near his house to open fire and subsequently fled the area. 1 fatality.

On 15 July 2021, in Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca, unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a group of civilians that had gathered to celebrate a funeral. Four people were reported injured in the attack. The area is known for the presence of several armed groups. There were no fatalities.

Around 14 July 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Timbio (Cauca), a truck driver was killed and his body was found in the El Platanillal vereda. The victim was moving home appliances to Popayan when relatives lost contact with him. Hours later, his body was found. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality

Around 14 July 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Jamundi (Cauca), a woman was killed and her body was found in the Cauca River. Relatives reported the woman as missing on 3 July, after she never arrived at an appointment. Some of her belongings were found in Puerto Tejada municipality. Authorities claimed the victim died after being shot in the head. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 14 July 2021, in the rural area of Ataco (Tolima), a Nasa indigenous leader was killed and his body was found. The victim was reported missing on 25 June after he never arrived at his workplace. While an arrested person confessed the killing, there are no known reasons behind the killing. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Women (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
source: UNOCHA; El Tiempo (Colombia); INDEPAZ; El Espectador
notes: Around 14 July 2021, in the rural area of Morales municipality, Cauca, a social leader was killed and her body was found in Altamira vereda. The victim had been reported missing by her family since 12 July, two days later local farmers spotted her remains with several gunshots. The victim was a political activist in her vereda and a former JAC member. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

assoc_actor_2: Indigenous Group (Colombia); ACIN: Association of Indigenous Councils of North Cauca
notes: Around 14 July 2021, in a rural area of Tacueyo municipality, Toribio municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals killed an Indigenous person and active member of the ACIN at a local store in La Susana Vereda. Relatives claimed that the victim had not received any threats previous to the attack. The area is known for the presence of the FARC dissident faction Dagoberto Ramos, the EPL, and the Gulf Clan . 1 fatality.
On 14 July 2021, in Medellin, Antioquia, two armed men on a motorcycle killed a Venezuelan man in a drive-by shooting in the city center. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: On 13 July 2021, in Sabanalarga (Atlantico), unidentified armed individuals shot dead a social leader and member of the JAC. Perpetrators opened fire at the victim while he was sitting in front of his house. The victim had left town due to previous death threats and had recently returned to the locality. 1 fatality.

Around 13 July 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of El Penol municipality, Antioquia, a man was killed by unknown perpetrators and his body was found in El Morro vereda. The victim's body bore several gunshot wounds. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 13 July 2021, in a rural area of El Penol municipality, Antioquia, unknown attackers shot and killed a man in El Salto vereda. The reason for the attack is not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 13 July 2021, in a rural area of Valdivia municipality, Antioquia, a man was shot and killed by unknown perpetrators in El Silencio vereda. The reason for the attack is not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 13 July 2021, in Payan, Magui Payan, Narino, an unknown number of armed men shot and killed the brother of a councilmember. The details of the attack are not provided. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); Former NDVC: North Valley Cartel
notes: On 13 July 2021, in the rural area of Bugalagrande municipality, Valle del Cauca, two men were killed in a farm in the Galicia corregimiento. According to the report, four men broke into the farm and shot them dead. One victim used to work with one of the founders of the NDVC (North Valley Cartel) many years ago. Several armed groups operate in the area. 2 fatalities.

source: El Espectador; Vanguardia Liberal; El Universal (Colombia)
notes: Around 12 July 2021 (as reported), in Bogota - Kennedy (Bogota, D.C.), a youth was killed and his body was found floating in a local creek near the Portal Americas 37 days after being reported missing. While the cause of death has not been determined, reports note similarities to the apparent abduction and killing of another two youth who were found in similar circumstances in the department of Valle del Cauca. Some reports indicate the victim had been arrested by police during a demonstration, though the latter refuted rumors that agents were involved in the killing. 1 fatality.

On 12 July 2021, in the rural area of Alcala municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a group of civilians in the Piedras de Moler area. Three people were killed in the attack and four others were injured. The area is known for the presence of armed groups such as the Gulf Clan and the ELN. 3 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Colombia (2018-2022); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 12 July 2021, in Santiago De Cali (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals attacked a councilman and environmental activist in the Commune 5 neighborhood. The victim died two days later due to the severity of his injuries. There is no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 12 July 2021, in a rural area of Barbosa municipality, Antioquia, an unknown number of perpetrators killed a couple in their private residence in Monte Loro vereda. The reason for the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 2 fatalities.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: Around 11 July 2021 (as reported), in Santander De Quilichao (Cauca), a youth was killed and his body was found after being reported missing during ongoing anti-government demonstrations. While the cause of death has not been determined, reports note similarities to the apparent abduction and killing of another three youth who were found in similar circumstances in the department of Valle del Cauca and Bogota, respectively. The victim had an active role in the protests in Santiago de Cali (Valle del Cauca), where he was reported missing on 27 May. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: Around 11 July 2021, in the rural area of Cartagena Del Chaira municipality (Caqueta), unidentified armed individuals killed a social leader and member of a local JAC. Perpetrators raided the house of the victim and shot him dead. 1 fatality.

source: INDEPAZ; El Tiempo (Colombia); UNOCHA; El Colombiano
notes: Around 11 July 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Cravo Norte municipality, Arauca, unidentified armed men killed four people in Corozo vereda. The victims all belonged to the same family. While the perpetrators are unknown, local officials state the area is known for a strong presence of armed groups. 4 fatalities.

On 11 July 2021, in Cartago (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals opened fire against a group of civilians in a drive-by shooting, killing two and injuring four more. While the perpetrators and the motives are unknown, local officials state the area is known for a strong presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 11 July 2021, in Corinto, Cauca, a man was shot and killed by unknown attackers at a bar in the La Colombiana neighborhood. Two civilians were injured. The reason for the attack is not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

On 11 July 2021, in Puerto Santander municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals shot and killed one man in the La Isla sector. One hour later, a Venezuelan man was shot and killed by unknown individuals in the Las Casetas sector. Both killings are related but the motives are unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 10 July 2021, in Medellin, Antioquia, two men shot and killed a man who was departing in a local store in the Santander neighborhood. According to the report, the victim was sat at a bar when the armed group arrived and shot him dead. The perpetrators fled the scene on a motorcycle. Police believe this attack could be related to the drug trafficking. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 10 July 2021, in a rural area of Patia municipality, Cauca, a Venezuelan man was killed by unknown attackers while riding his motorcycle between the El Estanquillo and de la Fonda corregimientos. The reason for the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 10 July 2021, in Granada, Meta, a man was killed by unknown perpetrators at a bar in the El Paraiso neighborhood. The report does not provide details or reason for the attack. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 9 July 2021, in Palmarito, Cucuta municipality (Norte de Santander), suspected Gulf Clan members killed a social leader and active member in her community. The victim was targeted after asking a Gulf Clan unit to abandon areas populated by the civilian population. Perpetrators broke into the victim's house and shot at her four times. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 9 July 2021, in a rural area of La Estrella municipality, Antioquia, two people were killed in their private residence in San Isidro vereda by an armed group. The victims are a father and son. The report does not provide further details. Several armed groups operate in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 8 July 2021, near Ambalema municipality (Tolima), unidentified armed individuals killed four people in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators opened fire on two of the victims and subsequently shot death two farmers who witnessed the attack. The area is known for the presence of FARC dissident factions, Gulf Clan members, and paramilitary groups. 4 fatalities.

Around 8 July 2021 (as reported), in Bogota - Suba (Bogota, D.C.), a woman reported being sexually harassed by a group of demonstrators during the ongoing political unrest. According to the victim, a group of demonstrators forced her to undress and subsequently get into the water in a local wetland area. Victims claimed she had been harassed for several days by the group. The organization so-called Primera Linea, which is in the first front of many of the demonstrations, denied the accusations.

On 8 July 2021, in a rural area of Cumaral municipality, Meta, a man was shot and injured by unknown perpetrators inside a taxi in Guacavia vereda. The victim died moments later in the hospital. The reason for the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 8 July 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Villavicencio municipality, Meta, a man was killed and his body was found in a farm. The reason for the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 7 July 2021, in Itagui, Antioquia, armed men on a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Santa Maria Dos neighborhood. According to the report, the attack is a reckoning. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 7 July 2021 (as reported), in Puerto Raudal vereda, Valdivia, Antioquia, a man was killed and his body was found bearing several gunshot wounds. The details of the attack are not provided. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 7 July 2021 (as reported), in Santa Rosa de Osos municipality, Antioquia, a man was killed and his body bearing several gunshot wounds was found in El Chaquiro vereda. The details of the attack are not provided. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality

On 7 July 2021, in Segovia, Antioquia, a man was killed in the Siete de Agosto neighborhood. The victim was a minor. The details of the attack are not provided. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 7 July 2021, in Saravena, Arauca, a group of armed men abducted two workers at a private company working on the oil station Banadia. According to the report, the victims were having lunch in a restaurant when the armed men, former FARC dissidents, turned up and kidnapped them. A ransom call was received. The ELN and the former FARC 28th front operate in the area. The whereabouts of the victims are unknown.

On 7 July 2021, in El Cofre, Cajibio, Cauca, two men attacked an Indigenous woman. According to the report, she is the treasurer of an indigenous organization and she was shot and injured after leaving her house. 1 injured. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Around 7 July 2021 (as reported), in the rural area La Hormiga, Valle del Guamuez, Putumayo, a Venezuelan man was shot and killed by an unidentified armed group in Palestina vereda. The perpetrators subsequently burned the victim's body. There is the presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 6 July 2021, in Itagui, Antioquia, a man was killed while watching a football match at a bar in the Santa Maria neighborhood. According to the report, a hitman turned up at the bar and shot him dead. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 6 July 2021, in a rural area of El Doncello municipality, Caqueta, a community leader was kidnapped in Berlin vereda. He was the Chairman of the Berlin Inspection Board at the Doncello. His whereabouts is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area.

Around 6 July 2021 (as reported), in rural area of Morales municipality, Cauca, a man was shot and killed by an unidentified armed group and his body was found in La Arena vereda. There is no information about the time and the causes of dead. There is a heavy presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 6 July 2021 (as reported), in San Juan Micay corregimiento, El Tambo, Cauca, a man was killed with several gunshots by unknown perpetrators and his body was found. He was reported missing by his family two days before the finding. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Colombia (2018-2022); Labour Group (Colombia); Refugees/IDPs (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 6 July 2021, between Uribe and Mesetas municipality, Meta, four people were killed and their bodies were found. The victims were part of a commission of a land restitution unit that was carrying fieldwork and they had been missing since 27 May 2021. One victim worked at a government agency, his driver, and two women who were part of a land restitution process as they were IDPs who had been threatened days before for been part of the restitution process. The area is known for the presence of the Gentil Duarte FARC dissident front, but no further indication of the group's responsibility has been found. 4 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 6 July 2021, in San Jose del Tarra corregimiento, Hacari, Norte de Santander, a local JAC leader was shot and killed. According to the report, the leader was killed by a Venezuelan national. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 6 July 2021, in Villagarzon, Putumayo, two men killed in a drive-by shooting in the Machimbre sector by two unidentified men on a motorcycle. Perpetrators and victims were both driving a motorcycle when the event happened. There is the presence of several armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.
Around 5 July 2021, in Suarez (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot death a journalist and host of a local radio station. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 5 July 2021, near Chicoral corregimiento, Espinal municipality (Tolima), unidentified armed individuals killed three farmers on a rural road. Perpetrators opened fire on the victims when the latter drove by on their motorcycles. Two victims were Venezuelan nationals, and a third one was Colombian. Three worked as farmers on a local ranch. 3 fatalities.

Around 5 July 2021, in Medellin, Antioquia, a man was shot by unidentified men in the Belen Rincon neighborhood. The attack might have been motivated by a the context of gang disputes. The victim was taken to hospital, where he later died. There is the presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 5 July 2021, in La Carbonera corregimiento, Bolivar, Cauca, a Venezuelan man was killed by unidentified armed group. The victim's body was found by farmers with several gun shots to the head. There is the presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Farmers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 4 July 2021, in the rural area of Bosconia municipality (Cesar), a former FARC militant participating in the reintegration process, farmers' leader, and activist of the national program of illegal crop substitution was killed. There are no further details on the attack or potential perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 4 July 2021, in Medellin, Antioquia, an unidentified armed individual killed a trans woman inside a pub, when she was returning from the Pride Parade, in a hate crime in the El Poblado neighborhood. Two more people were reported injured in the knife attack. There is the presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 4 July 2021 (week of), in Medellin, Antioquia, a man was shot and injured by unidentified men in the Castilla neighbourhood. The victim was taken to hospital. There is the presence of several armed groups in the area. There were no fatalities.

Around 3 July 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Balboa (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals killed three young men. Two of bodies were found in the El Filo area, while the third one was left on the Los Andes vereda. Two of the victims participated actively in the ongoing anti-government protests. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.

On 3 July 2021, in Tibu (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals dragged a man outside his private residence and subsequently shot him dead on the street. Hours prior, a second victim was killed and near the body was a sign that claimed: 'killed for motorcycle thieving'. One of the victims was a Venezuelan national, and both victims worked in coca fields in the area. The Catatumbo sub-region is known for the presence of armed groups, including ELN, Gulf Clan members, FARC dissidents groups, among others. 2 fatalities.

On 3 July 2021, in Florencia (Caqueta), unidentified armed individuals killed a social leader and environmental activist in a drive-by shooting. The victim was a recognized surgeon who worked at the local hospital and also focused efforts on promoting the protection of the Amazonas forest. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 3 July 2021, in rural area of Puerto Concordia municipality, Meta, a man was attacked by unidentified shooters in La Jaula vereda. There is heavy presence of armed groups in the area. There were no fatalities.

Around 2 July 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Santa Catalina de Catru corregimiento (coded to Alto Baudo), Choco, Gulf Clan members attacked an indigenous community. The armed men decapitated one of the members of the community and set fire to several of their houses. 1 fatality.

On 2 July 2021, in the rural area of Puerto Concordia municipality, Meta, a man was shot and killed by unidentified shooters in the El Viso sector. There is no more information, but the area has heavy presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 1 July 2021, in Tulua municipality (Valle del Cauca), a youth was killed and his body was found with several gunshot wounds. His hands and legs were tied up. The victim was reported missing on 26 June. This is the third body of a young person found in the area in less than two weeks. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 1 July 2021, in Tibu (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals killed a local resident in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators chased the victim and subsequently shot at the victim multiple times. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 1 July 2021 (week of), in Segovia, Antioquia, several armed men fired shots at a woman in her private residence in the 12 de Octubre neighborhood. The victim died days later in hospital. Details and reasons for the attack are not provided. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality

On 1 July 2021, in a rural area of Nuqui municipality, Choco, an indigenous person was injured by unknown assailants. The indigenous person is currently under confinement due to the clashes between armed groups in the area. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

On 1 July 2021, in the rural area of Banco de Arenas corregimiento, Cucuta, Norte de Santander, two ELN members shot and killed a man in La Punta vereda. The victim had received threats before for being an collaborator for another armed group. 1 fatality.

Around 1 July 2021, in the rural area of Orito municipality, Putumayo, two people were shot and killed and their bodies were found n El 35 vereda. There is no information about the perpetrators, but there had been many people who had been killed in the area under unknown conditions. There is the presence of several armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 30 June 2021, Medellin, Antioquia, two members of an unidentified armed group killed a man in the Jesus Nazareno Neighborhood. The victim was driving his car while two unidentified men killed him a drive-by shooting. There is the presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 30 June 2021, in Pororio vereda, Puerto Concordia, Meta, a man was stabbed by unknown perpetrators. The victim was severely injured and taken to hospital. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. There were no fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 29 June 2021 (between 26 - 29 June), in a rural area of Magui Payan municipality (coded to Payan, Narino), an Afro-Colombian social leader was reportedly killed, three days after being abducted by presumed Gulf Clan militants on 26 June. 1 fatality.

Around 29 June 2021 (as reported), in Yumbo (Valle del Cauca), a female ballerina was shot to death and her body found in a field in Panorama neighborhood. While the perpetrators are unknown, the area is known for the presence of both armed groups and rioting in recent months. 1 fatality.

On 29 June 2021, in the rural area of Banco de Arenas corregimiento, Cucuta municipality (Norte de Santander), suspected ELN members killed a store owner in the La Punta vereda. The victim was forcibly displaced by the armed group after militants accused him of helping another armed group in the area. For an unknown reason, the man returned to his house, after which perpetrators shot at him four times in the head. 1 fatality.

On 29 June 2021, in Medellin (Antioquia) two Venezuelan nationals were shot several times and injured in the Santander neighbourhood by an armed individual disguised as a telecommunication worker. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. There were no fatalities.

On 29 June 2021, in Espriella corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, a local social leader was abducted by an unknown number of armed men. The circumstances around his abduction are not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. His corpse was found on 27 July 2021.

Around 28 June 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Yondo municipality (Antioquia), two people were shot to death and their bodies found in Guanabanos vereda. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 28 June 2021, in Giraldo (Antioquia) unknown shooters fired several shots against a man in the Pinguru corregimiento, Las Penitas sector. The victim was killed. According to authorities, the victim had not received any threats prior to his killing. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 27 June 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Bugalagrande municipality (Valle del Cauca), an elderly man was killed and his body found in the Cali river. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
On 27 June 2021, in Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed men shot and killed a man in his house in Santa Rita neighborhood. The department is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 27 June 2021, in a rural area of Giron municipality (Santander), a woman was killed and her dismembered corpse found in La Guebrada La Iglesia. The identity and motive of the perpetrators is unknown, though reports highlight attacks against presumed Venezuelan women and prostitutes in the area in recent months. 1 fatality.

On 27 June 2021, in Santiago de Cali (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed men shot and killed ten civilians, including two children, in nine separate events across the city. The motives for these attacks are unknown, and the area has been known for significant armed group activity and rioting/mob violence in recent months. 10 fatalities.

On 27 June 2021, in Bello (Antioquia) a man was killed in a drive-by shooting in the Barrio Nuevo neighborhood by two armed individuals on a motorcycle. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 27 June 2021, in the rural area of Suarez municipality, Cauca, a man riding his motorcycle was shot and killed by unidentified shooters in the La Betulia sector. The perpetrators subsequently burnt the victim's body and his motorcycle. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 27 June 2021, in the rural area of Riohacha municipality, La Guajira, a farmer of Wayuu origin was abducted when he arrived at his farm in the rural area, four men from an unidentified armed group took him away in an unknown direction. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators, or crime motivation.

On 27 June 2021, in Cumaral, Meta, a man was shot and killed by unidentified shooters in the Villa Carolina neighborhood. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators, or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 27 June 2021, in Tumaco (Narino) a social leader and his family were kidnapped by an unidentified armed group. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department.

Around 26 June 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Caucasia municipality (Antioquia), a man was killed and his body found floating in the Nechi river. The victim had been reported missing since 22 June, when he left his house in the company of unidentified men in Puerto Estilla vereda. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 26 June 2021, in Covenas (Sucre), an unidentified, masked man shot and killed a man in a billiards hall in Guayabal neighborhood. The department is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Edison Cinco Mil Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Edison Cinco Mil Front)
source: INDEPAZ; El Universal (Colombia); El Colombiano; El Espectador
notes: Around 26 June 2021, in a rural area of San Vicente del Caguan municipality (Caqueta), five farmers were shot to death by presumed FARC dissidents from the Edison Cinco Mil from the Oriental Front, and their bodies were found in La Sierra vereda. 5 fatalities.

On 26 June 2021, in Santiago de Cali (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed men shot and killed three men including a Venezuelan citizen in separate events across the city. The motives for these attacks are unknown, and the area has been known for significant armed group activity and rioting/mob violence in recent months. 3 fatalities.

notes: On 26 June 2021, near Cuestecita corregimiento (La Guajira), unidentified armed intercepted and abducted a Wayuu indigenous rancher and retired mine worker. Though the whereabouts of the victim are unknown, the perpetrators left behind both his car and his son, who they had tied up.

On 26 June 2021, in Malambo (Atlantico), unidentified armed men fired shots into the home of the city's mayor (political party not reported) before fleeing in a car, in La Manga neighbourhood. No injuries nor fatalities were reported.

On 26 June 2021, in the rural area of Puerto Rondon municipality, Arauca, unidentified armed men abducted the director of El Porvenir de Libano mine from his farm. The victim's whereabouts are unknown. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation.

On 26 June 2021, in the rural area of San Cristobal corregimiento, Medellin, Antioquia, a woman was stabbed to death and her body was found on a trail in the Pajarito sector. The victim's lower-body was found without clothes. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 26 June 2021, in Pailitas (Cesar) off-duty police officers were attacked in a drive-by shooting by armed individuals on a motorcycle. Three officers were killed and a pregnant woman was injured. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 3 fatalities.

On 26 June 2021, in La Macarena (Meta) five people were killed by in an area known as Sierra de La Macarena. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators, circumstances of death, or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 5 fatality.

Around 25 June 2021, in a rural area of Barranco de Loba municipality (Bolivar), a woman was killed and her body found tied up with signs of torture and floating in the Magdalena river. The corpse was the second to appear in less than 24 hours in the area, which is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 33rd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (33rd Front)
source: La Opinion (Colombia); El Colombiano; El Espectador
notes: On 25 June 2021, in the rural area of Cucuta municipality (Norte de Santander), armed individuals opened fire on the helicopter in which Colombian President Ivan Duque and two of his cabinet members were, after holding a meeting in the Sardinata municipality. The chopper received five to six bullet impacts, forcing an emergency landing. While the area is known for the presence of ELN, FARC dissident factions, Gulf Clan members, among other armed groups. In a public statement the 33rd FARC dissident faction claimed responsibility for the attack. No fatalities or injuries occurred.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Women (Colombia)
notes: On 25 June 2021, in the rural area of Buenos Aires municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed men shot and killed two women in El Palmar vereda. One victim was a former FARC militant participating in the reintegration process. Perpetrators shot each victim three times in the head. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 25 June 2021, in the rural area of El Tambo municipality, Cauca, a farmer was kidnapped by an armed group in the San Juan de Mechengue sector. Witnesses stated the perpetrators were equipped with rifles. The victim's body was found the next day in Guayacana vereda. This area is known for ongoing clashes between the ELN and the FARC Carlos Patino front. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. 1 fatality.

On 25 June 2021, in the rural area of Santander de Quilichao municipality, Cauca, a man was shot and killed by an armed group in Quitapereza vereda. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 25 June 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Puerto Concordia municipality, Meta, a woman was killed by unknown shooters and her body was found in an advanced stage of decomposition in Cano Ceiba Alto vereda. The victim's body had several gunshot wounds. The victim was in charge of the public administration in the hamlet, called Chilin. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality. [women targeted: government officials]

Around 25 June 2021 (as reported), in Santiago De Cali (Valle del Cauca) a man was killed by unknown perpetrators and his body was found in the Canaveralejo River. The victim's body had gunshot wounds and presented signs of torture. The victim had been missing for several days. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 24 June 2021, in Bogota - Usaquen (Bogota, D.C.), unidentified armed individuals attacked the lawyer and legal representative of a local health service provider. Perpetrators injured the victim using a knife. Subsequently, the men damaged the victim's car with graffiti against the company. The victim was hospitalized due to the severity of the wounds.

On 24 June 2021, in La Parada, Villa del Rosario municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a street seller. The victim remains in intensive care due to the severity of his injures. The area is known for the presence of armed groups.

Around 24 June 2021 (as reported), in Buena Esperanza, Cucuta municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals killed a local resident. Perpetrators shot at the victim five times. The area is known for the presence of armed groups, such as the ELN, FARC dissidents, among others. 1 fatality.

Around 24 June 2021, in a rural area of Magangue municipality (Bolivar), a woman was killed and her body found with signs of torture floating in the Magdalena river in Yati vereda. The victim had been reported missing in Caucasia municipality (Antioquia) since 16 June, and the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

source: El Tiempo (Colombia); El Colombiano; UNOCHA; El Espectador
notes: On 24 June 2021, in the rural area of Yarumal (Antioquia), eight suspected ELN members set fire to a toll booth located on the road that connects the town with the city of Medellin. The armed men stole all the money and left a flag of the ELN when fleeing the area. One person was reported injured with third degree burns, and a few days later died in the hospital due to the severity of his injuries. 1 fatality.

On 24 June 2021, in Medellin (Antioquia) two armed men entered a restaurant in the El Poblado neighbourhood (Southeast) and shot and killed a man. The perpetrators escaped on a motorcycle. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
assoc_actor_2: Government of Colombia (2018-2022); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Nasa Indigenous Group (Colombia)
notes: On 24 June 2021, between Toribio and Caloto municipalities, Cauca, national government officials were intercepted and attacked by the Dagoberto Ramos Ortiz front of the FARC on a road near the Pajarito sector. The government officials were holding a meeting with JAC presidents, Indigenous Nasa representatives, and officials of the Alcadia municipality at the moment of the attack. No one was injured. The perpetrators took the government officials' vehicle. There were no casualties.

Around 24 June 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Barranca de Upia municipality, Meta, a man was decapitated by unknown perpetrators. The victim's body was found on the roadside in Las Moras vereda. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 23 June 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of La Parada, Villa del Rosario municipality (Norte de Santander), an unidentified armed individual shot dead one person on one of the illegal crossings paths that connect Colombia and Venezuela. The area is known for the presence of armed groups, such as the ELN, FARC dissidents, among others. Residents claimed the victim used to charge money to people who use the illegal crossings. 1 fatality.

On 23 June 2021, in Tibu (Norte de Santander), an unidentified armed individual killed a local farmer. The perpetrator approached the victim when the latter was in a local bar, subsequently opening fire several times and fleeing the area. The area is known for the presence of ELN members and FARC dissident factions. 1 fatality.

Around 23 June 2021 (as reported), around Tulua municipality, Valle del Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found floating in the Cauca River. Police stated he might have been killed by the San Francisco gang. 1 fatality.

On 22 June 2021, in Pitalito (Huila), unidentified armed individuals attacked a social leader in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators opened fire on the victim and his security guard, impacting the bullet-proof car assigned by the UNP. The victim is an internally displaced person, and works as an active member of an organization that seeks to improve the rights of other people affected by the armed conflict. No fatalities or injuries occurred.
On 22 June 2021, in Palermo corregimiento (Magdalena), unidentified armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a truck driver in a drive-by shooting outside La Magdalena hotel. 1 fatality.

Around 22 June 2021 (as reported), in Bucaramanga municipality (Santander), unidentified armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in El Retiro sector. The victim had survived a previous assassination attempt on 2 May. 1 fatality.

On 22 June 2021, in Neiva (Huila), unidentified armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a retired army colonel outside a church in Altico neighborhood, in a drive-by shooting. The victim had been head of the Third Brigade in Cali in 2008. 1 fatality.

source: Diario La Libertad; El Colombiano; UNOCHA
notes: On 22 June 2021, in Aguaclara corregimiento, Tulua, Valle del Cauca, a reported member of the Primera Linea (anti-government demonstrators) was killed and his decapitated head was thrown into a garden by a man passing on a motorcycle. Authorities stated that the attack was perpetrated by the San Francisco gang. Some reports indicate the victim had been arrested by ESMAD police, though the latter refute rumors that ESMAD agents were involved in the killing. The area is also known for the presence of armed groups. The victim's body is still missing. 1 fatality.
On 22 June 2021, in El Rosario vereda, Arauca, two farmers were kidnapped from their farm by an armed group. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction

There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department.

On 20 June 2021, in Tibu (Norte de Santander), an unidentified armed individual killed a man in a local bar. The perpetrator searched for the victim and fled the area after opening fire at the man. The area is known for the presence of ELN members and FARC dissident factions. 1 fatality.
On 20 June 2021, in Los Patios (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men shot and killed a man on the side of the city's main road. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 20 June 2021, in La Estrella (Antioquia) an armed group killed a man in a drive-by shooting. The victim had a criminal record. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 20 June 2021, in the rural area of Argelia municipality, Cauca, unidentified shooters killed a man who was leaving a commercial establishment in El Limoncito vereda. On 20 June 2021, in Cumaral (Meta) two armed suspects on a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 19 June 2021, in a rural area of San Onofre municipality (Sucre), three unidentified armed men shot and killed a young student in La Lucha vereda, Villa Recuerdo farm. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

The event prompted demonstrations at the police station later that day. 1 injured, 1 fatality.

Around 18 June 2021, overnight in Bello municipality (Antioquia), a female social leader and a couple she was friends with were killed and their bodies found in plastic bags within a few kilometers of each other, in Barrio 5 community and La Navarra area. Around 15 June 2021 (as reported), in Bogota - Suba (Bogota, D.C.), a woman was killed and her body found in an advanced stage of decomposition in Guaymaral sector. The woman had been reported missing since 26 May and had previously received threats from an unknown group. actor1: FARC Dissident - Second Marquetalia: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Segunda Marquetalia)
notes: On 15 June 2021, in Neiva (Huila), unidentified armed men on a motorcycle shot a social leader known for her work with women abused by the FARC, in a drive-by shooting. The victim died due to the severity of her injuries on 7 July. While no armed group has claimed responsibility yet for the attack, there are strong suspicions that the FARC dissident group Segunda Marquetalia perpetrated the attack. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]
Around 15 June 2021 (as reported), in Santa Marta (Magdalena), police detained and beat up two women for not wearing masks during the ongoing coronavirus pandemic. 2 injured, no fatalities.

On 15 June 2021, in Cajete vereda, Popayan municipality, Cauca, a Venezuelan woman was killed in a drive-by shooting by two individuals on a motorcycle. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators, circumstances of death, or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 15 June 2021, in Puerto Gaitan, Meta, two armed individuals on a motorcycle killed a person in a drive-by shooting. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 14 June 2021, in the rural area of Atanquez, Valledupar municipality (Cesar), a member of the Kankuamo indigenous community was killed and his body was found. Relatives of the victim began to look for him when his horse returned home without him. The group found the burned remains near the Hato Nuevo plot of land. According to the family, the victim received threats but they did not specify from which group. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department .1 fatality.

On 13 June 2021, in the rural area of El Zulia municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals abducted five teenagers who were on a fishing trip. Two of the victims were beaten up and later released the same day. Further investigations proved the armed men are local farmers who decided to take justice into their hands given the increasing insecurity in the area, and they attacked the teenagers when they mistaken the group with potential thieves. However, the whereabouts of three of the victims are still unknown.

notes: On 13 June 2021, in Bogota - Kennedy (Bogota, D.C.), ESMAD forces fired non-lethal projectiles against onlooking neighbors and businessowners while reportedly arresting a man with a machete. At least three civilians were injured in the event, including a child who was hospitalized. Two police were also reportedly injured, though it is unclear if they were injured by the suspect or by community members. 3 wounded, no fatalities.

On 13 June 2021, in Medellin, Antioquia, several men from an unidentified armed group shot and the two men in the commune 16, Belen Altavista neighbourhood (Southwest). assoc_actor_2: Nasa Indigenous Group (Colombia); Teachers (Colombia); Women (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 9 June 2021, in Corinto (Cauca), a social leader and her partner were killed and their bodies were found with several gunshot wounds. The victims were local teachers and leaders of the Nasa indigenous group. Next to their bodies, authorities found a letter stating the attack was a retaliation from the ELN. 2 fatalities. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Around 9 June 2021, in Medellin (Antioquia) a woman was decapitated and later found in her private residence in the Belen La Gloria neighborhood. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 9 June 2021, in Fortul, Arauca, members of an unidentified armed group shot and killed the person in charge of Indigenous affairs and his son. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. 2 fatalities.

On 8 June 2021, in Medellin (Antioquia), eight unidentified armed individuals attacked a journalist and director of a local radio station in the city. The armed men opened fire on the victim's house. Perpetrators failed to break into the residence. The victim was uninjured.

On 8 June 2021, in Tibu (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals killed a district attorney in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators attacked the victim at her private residence, shooting at her at least nine times. According to authorities, her death may be related to other work as an investigator combatting drug trafficking or with the conflict between ELN and FARC dissidents in the area. 1 fatality.
On 8 June 2021, in Corinto, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in El Trapiche locality. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 8 June 2021, in Miranda, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the San Antonio neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 8 June 2021 (as reported) , in the rural area of La Macarena municipality, Meta, an unidentified armed group shot and killed a man in vereda Diamante 1. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators, or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.
On 8 June 2021, in Villavicencio, Meta, unidentified armed men killed an individual in the Villa Humberto neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
Around 7 June 2021, in Socuavo vereda (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body found on the Tibu-La Gabarra road. Reports note the presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 7 June 2021, in the rural area of Buenaventura municipality (Valle del Cauca), suspected ELN members abducted three members from the same family. The victim owns a hotel in the area. One of the men was released after the family paid money to the perpetrators, but two others remained with the armed group. Around 11 February 2022, the bodies of the other two victims were found (coded separately).

On 7 June 2021, in Sabaletas vereda (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed men abducted three civilians outside a vacation cabin. The victims' whereabouts are unknown. Several armed groups operate in this department.

On 7 June 2021, in the rural area of Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man outside his residence in Socuavo vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 7 June 2021, in the rural area of La Hormiga municipality, Putumayo, unidentified armed individuals killed a Venezuelan man. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 6 June 2021, in Magangue municipality (Bolivar), unidentified armed men shot and killed a young adult in Bodega Central sector. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 6 June 2021, in El Torno vereda (Sucre), two unidentified armed men on a motorcycle intercepted, shot, and killed a driving youth in a drive-by shooting. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Comunes Party (Colombia); Farmers (Colombia); Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 6 June 2021, in a rural area of Tulua municipality (Valle del Cauca), two unidentified armed men shot and killed a former FARC member who was also JAC president, a farmer, and a Comunes Party candidate for the Tulua municipal council. 1 fatality.

On 6 June 2021, in the rural area of Argelia, Cauca, several unidentified armed men entered the house of an indigenous social leader and killed him. FARC dissidents and ELN operate in the area, disputing territory control. 1 fatality.

Around 6 June 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Corinto municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals killed a man and his body was found with several gunshot wounds. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 6 June 2021, in Timbio, Cauca, unidentified armed men shot and killed an individual in the Boyaca neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 5 June 2021, in a rural area of Sucre municipality (Sucre), two unidentified armed men shot and killed a local man on the road to La Palma corregimiento. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 5 June 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of El Carmen de Viboral municipality, Antioquia, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a lawyer. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 5 June 2021 (between 2 June - 9 June), in the rural area of Caloto municipality, Cauca, a couple from the Tacueyo indigenous reservation was killed and their bodies were found in El Pedregal vereda. According to locals residents, they were kidnapped on June 2nd. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

On 5 June 2021, in Convencion, Norte de Santander, unidentified armed men killed a man in a drive-by shooting. Reports of threats and extortion are common in the area. ELN and FARC dissidents operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 5 June 2021 (as reported), in Convencion, Norte de Santander, unidentified armed men killed a man. Reports of threats and extortion are common in the area. ELN and FARC dissidents operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 5 June 2021 (as reported), in La Parada, Norte de Santander, unidentified armed individuals killed a man and his body was found with gunshot wounds. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 5 June 2021, in Puerto Asis, Putumayo, unidentified armed men shot a man 10 times and killed him. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 4 June 2021 (as reported), in Villa del Rosario, Norte de Santander, a man was killed in his body was found with several gunshot wounds. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack or the identity of the victim. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 4 June 2021, in Canaveral corregimiento (Bolivar), four unidentified armed men invaded a farm, tying up two farmers before beating them up, burning them, and throwing acid on their bodies. One of the victims later died from his injuries, while the other remains hospitalized. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 wounded, 1 fatality.

Around 4 June 2021, in Agua Clara corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a rice merchant was killed and his body found in Campo Alegre vereda. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
On 4 June 2021, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men killed a man in Belisario neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 4 June 2021 (as reported), in Campo Alegre vereda, Antioquia, a man was killed and his body was found with multiple gunshot wounds in his head. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 4 June 2021, in the rural area of Montelibano municipality, Cordoba, a shoot-out took place during a military operation near a farmer's settlement in the El Morro sector. Casualties unknown.

On 3 June 2021, in Uribia, La Guajira, two unidentified men who arrived on a motorcycle tried to kill a contractor of an energy company. Before they were able to start shooting, the victim tried to remove the gun from the perpetrators hand, who then fired to the ground. The perpetrators escaped. No injured were reported. The company had issues in executing their works due to the topography of the region, which led to the cancellation of their contract by the authorities.

On 3 June 2021, on the outskirts of Barranquilla (Atlantico), three men claiming to be Gulf Clan members abducted a couple and demanded a 50 million peso ransom. Police arrested the three men and rescued the couple two days later, on 5 June.

On 3 June 2021, in Montelibano, Cordoba, two unidentified individuals shot against an off-duty police officer inside a bar in the city center. He was injured and taken to hospital. Authorities believe the attack is an act of vengeance to recent operations of state forces against criminal organizations in the south of the department. Several armed groups operate in this department.

On 3 June 2021, in Villa del Rosario (Norte de Santander), ELN members crossed the border from Venezuela, and killed a street seller. Perpetrators shot at least five times at the woman. The area is known for the presence of FARC dissident factions, ELN members, and other armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 3 June 2021 (as reported), in Miranda, Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found dismembered, with signs of torture, and with machete wounds in Miralindo neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 2 June 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Tacueyo, Toribio municipality (Cauca), two indigenous people were abducted by unidentified perpetrators. Subsequently, the victims were killed and their bodies were found on 9 June in the rural area of the municipality. Toribio is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 2 June 2021, in a rural area of Barranco de Loba municipality (Bolivar), presumed Gulf Clan militants shot and killed a man in Pueblito Mejia corregimiento. The group had established a presence in the area one day prior. 1 fatality.

On 2 June 2021, in Santa Marta, Magdalena, a former councilman of the city was shot by two unidentified individuals who arrived on a motorcycle, outside his house in El Pinon 2 neighborhood. No one was injured during the attack. He had been threatened before.

On 2 June 2021, in Tibu (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals killed a woman who was working at the local market. Perpetrators shot four times at the victim. The area is known for the presence of FARC dissident factions, ELN members, and other armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 2 June 2021, in El Carmen de Viboral, Antioquia, two unidentified armed individuals killed a man in a drive-by shooting outside the victim's house. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 2 June 2021, in the rural area of Yali municipality, Antioquia, unidentified armed individuals killed a man in La Leona vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 2 June 2021, in Villavicencio, Meta, unidentified armed individuals attacked a school used by farmers protesting in the city, in a drive-by shooting. No one was injured. Several armed groups operate in this department.

Around 1 June 2021 (as reported), in Bello, Antioquia, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket in the Zamora neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

source: El Tiempo (Colombia); El Espectador; INDEPAZ; La Patria
notes: Around 31 May 2021, in a rural area in Algeciras municipality (Huila), nine people were killed and their bodies were found in the Quebradon Sur vereda. The attack happened in a farmhouse where previous attacks were reported, in June and September 2020. The area is known for the presence of members of FARC dissident groups. The victims were farmworkers that had arrived at the area for the coffee bean harvest season. 9 fatalities.

Around 31 May 2021 (as reported), in the outskirts of Belalcazar municipality, Paez, Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found bearing several gunshot wounds. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 31 May 2021, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a man opened fire in a bar and shot and killed a woman, and injured a man in the Antonia Santos neighborhood. The reason for the attack is not reported. Several groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 30 May 2021, in the rural area of Cucuta municipality (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his body was found near the border with Venezuela. The victim was shot at least three times in the head. The area is known for the presence of ELN, Gulf Clan members, FARC dissident factions, among other armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 30 May 2021, in the rural area of Belalcazar (Caldas), a youth indigenous person was killed and his body was found floating in the Cauca River 8 days after being reported missing. While the cause of death has not been determined, reports note similarities to the apparent abduction and killing of another two youth who were found in similar circumstances in the department of Valle del Cauca. Some reports indicate the victim had been arrested by police during a demonstration. Two officers have been arrested in relation with the killing. 1 fatality.

On 30 May 2021, in Puerto Raudal corregimiento, Valdivia, Antioquia, two armed men shot and killed an indigenous woman and injured a man in the Puente Pescado area. According to the report, the attackers opened fire at them for not apparent reason. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 29 May 2021, in Cartago (Valle del Cauca), an unidentified armed man shot and wounded four people in a restaurant in San Nicolas neighborhood. The region is known for the presence of armed groups. 4 injured, no fatalities.

On 29 May 2021, in Bogota - Kennedy (Bogota, D.C.), two transexual women were injured when a group of men attacked them and beat them up in the 1ro de Mayo neighborhood. There are no further details on the circumstances of the attack.
On 29 May 2021, in a rural area of Pelaya municipality (Cesar), unidentified armed men shot and killed a trans woman in Costillas corregimiento. 1 fatality.

On 29 May 2021, in Bogota - San Cristobal (Bogota, D.C.), a woman member of the LGBT community reported that a taxi driver attacked her using a breaker bar. Although they initially argued over the high prices of the service, the victim claimed the perpetrator turned extremely violent after disclosing her sexual orientation. The victim required medical attention due to the severity of the injuries.

On 29 May 2021, in the outskirts of Patia municipality, Cauca, ELN members shot and killed a man in Guayabal vereda. According to the report, the attackers broke into the victim's private residence and killed him. The reason for the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 May 2021, in Cartagena (Bolivar), four men ran with a vehicle over a transexual woman in the city center. A subsequent investigation indicated the victim was targeted by a transphobic attack instead of a car accident, as it was initially declared. The victim was hospitalized due to the severity of her injuries.

Around 28 May 2021 (as reported), in Hatonuevo municipality (La Guajira), a merchant who was also a mayoral candidate in Hatonuevo for the Radical Change party was shot to death and his body found on the road between Hatonuevo and Barrancas municipalities. 1 fatality.

On 28 May 2021, in the rural area of Remedios municipality (Antioquia), unidentified armed individuals forced a farmer and social leader out of his private residence in the Tamar vereda. The victim's body was later found in the municipality of Cantagallo with several gun injuries. The victim was an activist and social leader whose efforts focused on promoting the creation of the farmers' reserve areas in the Cimitarra sub-region. 1 fatality.

On 28 May 2021, in a rural area of Itagui municipality, Antioquia, a man was killed in Los Zuleta vereda. Authorities believe it was a retaliatory attack committed by an armed group. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 28 May 2021, in Medellin, Antioquia, a Venezuelan man was killed in the Belen Rincon neighborhood. According to the report, he was shot ten times. The reasons for the attack are not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 28 May 2021, in Sabaneta, Sabaneta, Antioquia, a man was killed in the Maria Auxiliadora neighborhood. According to the report, the victim had a criminal record. Authorities suspect the victim could be a member of an armed group. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 27 May 2021 (as reported), in Samaniego municipality, Narino, two suspects of committing a massacre were killed and their bodies were found in La Florida sector. They were wanted by the police for the killing of eight students in 2020. There is no clarification if they belonged or not to the ELN. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022) ESMAD: Mobile Anti-Disturbance Squadron
source: El Colombiano; El Pais (Colombia); El Heraldo (Colombia); Vanguardia Liberal; El Espectador; El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: On 27 May 2021, in Santiago de Cali municipality, Valle del Cauca, unidentified individuals attacked eight ESMAD officers, dressed as civilians, on the road from Cali to Palmira, in La Y sector. The group forced them to leave the vehicle, and tortured the officers, and set fire to the car they were at. Five officers were quickly released and two others were released later.

On 27 May 2021, in Santander de Quilichao municipality, Cauca, an unknown number of armed men on a motorbike shot and killed a Venezuelan woman in a drive-by shooting in San Jose vereda. It is not clear whether the victim was a prostitute. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 27 May 2021, in Quibdo municipality, Choco, three Inga indigenous brothers were shot in the De La Brisa settlement. Two of them died and the other injured. The motive of the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 2 fatalities.

Around 27 May 2021 (as reported), in the outskirts of Montelibano municipality, Cordoba, the municipal government secretary of La Apartada municipality was killed and his body was found bearing several wounds in a room located between Montelibano and La Apartada municipalities. The reasons for the attack are not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 27 May 2021, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a man was killed in the El Viejo Escobal neighborhood. A hitman opened fire at a man and was arrested moments later by local police. Several criminal groups operate in the area, including the ELN. 1 fatality.

On 27 May 2021, in Puerto Leguizamo municipality, Puerto Leguizamo, Putumayo, two indigenous men were killed in the vicinity of the Becocha reserve. The report does not provide further information on the attack. Several groups operate in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 26 May 2021, in Florida municipality (Valle del Cauca), two men on a motorcycle threw Molotov bombs at a bus that transported workers to a sugar field. The vehicle caught fire, resulting in nine people injured.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 26 May 2021, in the rural area of Quibdo municipality, Choco, unidentified armed individuals killed a former FARC member on the border between the municipalities of Quibdo and Bete. Perpetrators threw the victim's body into the river. The area is known for the presence of Gulf Clan members and ELN. 1 fatality.

On 26 May 2021, in El Penol, Penol, Antioquia, a man was killed and two women were injured in an armed attack. The reason for the attack is not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 26 May 2021, in La Macarena, Meta, a man was killed while he was having a drink at a bar. According to the report, the victim was subject to death threats in the past. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.
On 26 May 2021, in San Juan de Arama municipality, Meta, a man was killed in the Rosales vereda. No further details are provided in the report. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 26 May 2021, in the rural area Cucuta municipality, Norte de Santander, a man was killed in a drive-by shooting by two men on a motorcycle in El Dave vereda. According to the report, the victim was a former member of the Los Rastrojos gang. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 25 May 2021, in La Marina, Tulua municipality (Valle del Cauca), four people were killed and their bodies were found. Two of the victims were semi-naked and their bodies lied in the Los Caimos area, the other two bodies were found in the Portales del Rio neighborhood. Two victims were reported disappeared on Sunday after they departed towards the municipal seat. Threats against people who take an active part in the ongoing anti-government protests have been spread over the past few days. The area is known for the presence of FARC dissident factions and Aguilas Negras. 4 fatalities.

Around 25 May 2021 (as reported), in Albania municipality, (La Guajira), unidentified armed individuals killed two men from the Wayuu indigenous group in a drive-by shooting in the locality of Paradero. The victims were brothers and relatives of a recognized social leader from the Caracoli indigenous community. 2 fatalities.

Around 25 May 2021, in San Juan de Betulia (Sucre), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a group of civilians who hang out in the main square. Perpetrators claimed the group had breached a curfew rule introduced by an unidentified armed group. No fatalities or injuries occurred. The area is known for the presence of Gulf Clan members.

On 25 May 2021, in the rural area of Mindala corregimiento, Suarez municipality, Cauca department, unidentified armed individuals killed three men and their bodies were found in the Tamboral vereda. The victims were forced out of the house by the perpetrators and subsequently shot in the head. Several armed groups operate in the area. 3 fatalities.

On 25 May 2021, in a rural area of Ituango municipality, Antioquia, a man was killed by unknown perpetrators in Camelia Alta vereda. Later that day, another man was killed by unknown perpetrators in La Cubre vereda. The reasons for both attacks are unknown. Police investigates whether the crimes were related. Several armed groups operate in the area. 2 fatalities.

actor1: Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022) DIRAN: Anti-Narcotics Directorate
source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 24 May 2021, in Villagarzon municipality (Putumayo), Nasa indigenous people reported aggressions by police officers of the anti-narcotics department. Three members of the Guardia Indigena were beaten up and arbitrarily arrested.
