Victims claimed the attack is retaliation against Nasa indigenous people who participated in protests during the ongoing political unrest.

On 24 May 2021, in Santiago de Cali (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals killed a municipal government worker in a drive-by shooting in the La Union neighborhood. The victim was a member of the local cabinet for health affairs. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 24 May 2021, in Tumaco municipality (Narino), unidentified armed men opened fire in the FARC reintegration camp of La Variante. Though the intended victim fled unharmed, the attack prompted fears over lack of government protection for the more than 120 ex-combatants at the camp. No injuries or fatalities occurred.

Around 24 May 2021 (as reported), in El Plateado corregimiento, Argelia, Cauca, a person was killed and his body was found bearing several gunshot wounds. Several former FARC fronts and the ELN operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 24 May 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Puerto Gaitan municipality, Meta, a man was killed and his body was found bearing several gunshot wounds. According to the report, the victim was reported missing three days before the finding. The reasons for the attack are not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 24 May 2021, in a rural area of Ipiales municipality, Narino, an unknown number of armed men attacked the indigenous governor of the area. According to the report, the armed men broke into his private residence and shot and injured him. According to the report, the victim had received death threats in the past. Several armed groups operate in the area. There were no fatalities.

Around 24 May 2021 (as reported), in Tulua, Valle del Cauca, two men were killed and their bodies were found in the Los Caimos sector. Two other corpses were found in the Portales del Rio neighborhood. According to the report, the four victims were last seen on 23 May 2021 in La Marina corregimiento. The Aguilas Negras, Gulf Clan, and former FARC fronts operate in the area. 4 fatalities.
Around 23 May 2021, in Magangue (Bolivar), a trans-woman member of the T community was killed and her body was found. The victim was stabbed in several parts of her body. 1 fatality.

Around 23 May 2021 (between 22 - 23 May), in Monteria (Cordoba), a woman was killed and her body found with signs of torture in Villa Cielo sector. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
On 23 May 2021, in Cartagena (Bolivar), unidentified armed men shot and killed a youth in El Silencio neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
On 23 May 2021, in a rural area of Amaga municipality, Antioquia, a pig farmer was killed in the Malabrigo Parte Alta vereda. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 23 May 2021, in a rural area of Betulia municipality, Antioquia, there was an armed attack against people in a vehicle at the height of Arboleda vereda. According to the report, the victims were riding a truck when several armed men opened fire on them. Two people were killed and a baby was injured. The reasons for the attack are not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 23 May 2021, in Ciudad Bolivar, Antioquia, two armed men shot and killed a man and injured two others. The attackers were arrested moments later. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 23 May 2021 (as reported), in Medellin, Antioquia, a man was killed and his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition in the Belen Altavista neighborhood. According to the report, the victim's body bore gunshot wounds. The reasons for the attack are unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 23 May 2021, in Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca, an unknown number of armed men in a car carried out a drive-by shooting a group of people in the Miraflores neighborhood. According to the report, the perpetrators carried out the attack for no apparent reason. One person was killed and two were injured. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 22 May 2021, in Aguachica (Cesar), a youth was kidnapped by three unidentified perpetrators in a van after being tricked to leave the restaurant where he was eating by an unidentified man disguised as a police officer. The victim is the son of a businessman. The area is known for the presence of armed groups, including the Gulf Clan, although it is not known if they were involved in the event. The whereabouts of the victim are unknown.

Around 22 May 2021 (as reported), in Mulalo corregimiento (Valle del Cauca), multiple people were killed and their corpses found in the Cauca river. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. Unknown fatalities coded as 3.

source: El Universal (Colombia); El Heraldo (Colombia); El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: On 22 May 2021, in Buenos Aires vereda, Ovejas municipality (Sucre), unidentified armed men opened fire on a family of farmers driving in a truck, killing one and wounding five more. Subsequent investigations indicated that Gulf Clan members perpetrated the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 22 May 2021 (as reported), in Santa Rosa municipality (Bolivar), a farmer was killed by gunfire and machetes and his corpse found in Los Camarones sector. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
On 22 May 2021, in La Parada, Norte de Santander, unidentified armed men shot and killed a man, and injured another. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 22 May 2021, in Arauca, Arauca, a communal leader and member of the local JAC was killed in the Miramar neighborhood. According to the report, the victim was sitting outside a car repair shop when an attacker turned up and shot him dead. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality..

On 21 May 2021, in Soledad (Atlantico), a member of the LGBT community reported being sexually harassed and assaulted while being under police custody. According to the victim, a group of officers arrested him during a protest, subsequently, security forces beat him up and harassed him due to sexual orientation. The victim claimed that he was also sexually abused by other inmates at the police station, after officers persuaded other inmates to carry out the abuse.

Around 21 May 2021 (as reported), in the rural area Quilcace corregimiento, El Tambo, Cauca, four men were killed and their bodies were found in the Loma Larga vereda. The victims all belonged to the same family and two of them were hand-tied. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is a strong presence of armed groups in the area. 4 fatalities.

On 21 May 2021, in Medellin, Antioquia, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a lawyer in the Laureles neighborhood, in a drive-by shooting incident. Two bystanders were injured. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: Around 21 May 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Tame municipality, Arauca, a man was killed by FARC dissidents and his body was found on a site known as Las Tres Cruces. According to the report, a message was left next to the body stating 'This is because people use the name of the organization to intimidate and request money on behalf of the FARC' (El suceso es porque personas utilizan el nombre de la organizacion para intimidar y pedir dinero a nombre de las Farc Ep). 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 21 May 2021, in Popayan, Popaya, Cauca, a former FARC fighter was shot and injured in unreported circumstances. He was currently serving as escort of the National Protection Unit. According to the report, the victim went from Caldono to Popayan to run some errands at the moment of the attack.

On 21 May 2021, in Puerto Asis, Puerto Asis, Putumayo, a man who was attending a mass in the local church was killed by a lone gunman who entered the church and opened fire at him. The reasons for the attack are not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 20 May 2021, in Valledupar, Cesar, a woman was shot and killed in a drive-by shooting by unidentified individuals in 5 de Enero neighborhood. Police investigates the motivation of the crime. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 20 May 2021 (as reported), in Bosconia municipality, Cesar, a man was killed and his body was found with a note signed by Gulf Clan (AGC) in Pedras Azules. The note had 'traitor' written in it. 1 fatality.

Around 20 May 2021 (as reported), in Medellin, Antioquia, a man was killed and his corpse was found inside an empty water tank in the Comuna 8 area, La Tinajita sector. According to the report, the victim's body bore several bladed weapons wounds. The reason for the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 20 May 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of San Luis municipality, Antioquia, a woman was killed and her body was found bearing several gunshot wounds in La Tebaida vereda. The reason for the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 20 May 2021 (week of), in Quibdo municipality, Choco, an Embera youth was killed in the De la Brisa settlement. The motive of the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 19 May 2021, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a man was killed in a drive-by shooting by two men on a motorcycle. He was in his car with a woman, who was injured after the shooting. According to a source, they had been previously threatened by a man. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 19 May 2021, in a rural area of Caucasia municipality, Antioquia, military forces and police officers attacked an unknown number of Indigenous men and miners seeking shelter at a high school building. Several wounded were reported. The report states that there were children at the site who were caught in the crossfire. The reasons for the attack are not reported. Casualties unknown.

Around 19 May 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Segovia municipality, Antioquia, a man was killed and his body was found in the La Estrella area. The victim's body bore several gunshot wounds. The reason for the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.
On 19 May 2021, in Vegachi, Antioquia, a man was shot and killed in the La Paz neighborhood. The reason for the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 19 May 2021, in a rural area of Yarumal municipality, Antioquia, a man was shot and injured in the La Marconi sector. The victim died moments later in hospital. The reason for the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 19 May 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Santander de Quilichao municipality, Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found in San Pedro vereda. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 19 May 2021, in Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca, members of the La Local gang carried out two attacks. The first one in the Kennedy neighborhood and the second in del Aguacatico sector. Two people were killed. 2 fatalities.

Around 17 May 2021 (as reported), in Carolina del Principe municipality (Antioquia), two unidentified men entered the house of a professor and beat him up for his involvement with the National Strike. The victim had led a number of local protests in conjunction with the nationwide anti-government demonstrations called by the National Strike Committee. 1 wounded, no fatalities.

On 17 May 2021, in Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca department, unidentified individuals threw a grenade in the Sor Vasquez sector residential area, injuring eight people. The area is known for the presence of FARC dissident factions, ELN members, Gulf Clan members, and other armed groups. There were no fatalities.

On 16 May 2021, in Santiago De Cali (Valle del Cauca), unidentified, hooded armed men shot and killed a taxi driver in Los Pomos sector. Preliminary reporting suggests the attack may be related to illegal checkpoints erected by extortionists due to the deteriorating security condition in Cali. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 16 May 2021 (as reported), in Medellin, Antioquia, a man was killed and his body was found at the eco-park of the El Volador hill, seventh commune. According to the report, a cardboard message saying 'for a child rapist' ('por violador de ninos') was left alongside the corpse. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality

On 16 May 2021, in a rural area of Puerto Gaitan, Meta municipality, an unknown number of armed men shot and killed a man in his private residence in San Miguel vereda. According to the report, the assailants arrived on a ship across the Meta River. The reasons for the attack are not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 16 May 2021, in a rural area of San Juan de Arama municipality, Meta, a farmer and former candidate for a seat in the Granada Meta council was shot and killed in Trocha Once vereda. The victim had denounced extortion in the past. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 15 May 2021 (as reported), near Juan Frio (Norte de Santander), two men - at least one of whom was a Venezuelan citizen - were shot by presumed ELN militants and their bodies found on the side of the road. Reports indicate the victims may have been shot near Llano de Jorge (Venezuela) and then dragged across the border and left for dead in Colombia. 2 fatalities.

Around 15 May 2021 (month of), near Riohacha (La Guajira), police officers shot a Wayuu indigenous person in a suspected case of police brutality. Officers raided the house of the man and opened fire on the victim, injuring him. Subsequently, the officers involved in the incident offered to transport him to the hospital. Relatives claimed they were informed of the victim's death. The forensic report registered that the victim had 26 shot wounds and that police had reported him as killed in an armed clash, raising suspicion of officers tampering with evidence to cover the incident. 1 fatality.

On 15 May 2021, on the outskirts of Jamundi municipality (Valle del Cauca), two unidentified armed men shot and killed a member of the Guardia Indigena in the Caribes Quinta de Bolivar area. Locals report the presence of the Gulf Clan in the area. 1 fatality.

On 15 May 2021, in the rural area of Caceres municipality, Caceres, Antioquia, a man was shot and killed in the San Pablo vereda. According to the report, the victim had not received any threats before the attack; therefore, the reason for the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.
On 15 May 2021, in Tabacal corregimiento, Buritica, Antioquia, a man was shot and killed. The reason for the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 15 May 2021 (as reported), in the outskirts of Banco de Arenas corregimiento, Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a man was killed and his body was found in the El Infierno sector, Miraflores vereda. According to the report, the victim went missing on 12 May 2021. The ELN and the AGC operate in the area; however, police believe he was killed by the ELN given the fact that his head was covered with a blue shirt, a common practice of the above-mentioned group. 1 fatality.

Around 15 May 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Villa del Rosario municipality, Norte de Santander, two men were killed and their bodies were found in the La Escalera sector. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

Around 14 May 2021, near Leiva municipality, Narino department, a social leader, and member of a farmers' organization from the Villa Baja corregimiento, was killed and his body was found. The victim disappeared while driving his motorcycle on the route that connects Mojarras and Leiva municipalities. Subsequently, members of the organization searched the area, finding his body and vehicle hidden in the bushes. The victim was taking an active part in the ongoing political unrest. 1 fatality.

On 14 May 2021, in Tame, Arauca, a lawyer was killed in his office, located a few blocks away from the police station. According to the report, he was shot several times. The reason for the attack is not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 14 May 2021, in a rural area of Ricaurte municipality, Narino, a couple was killed by an unknown number of armed men. The reason for the attack is not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 13 May 2021, in the rural area of Miranda municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed individuals killed a former FARC member in a drive-by shooting. The attack took place in the Guatemala vereda. 1 fatality.

On 13 May 2021, in Puerto Belgica corregimiento, Caceres, Antioquia department, several armed men broke into a house and abducted a man. The victim is a miner. There is no further information on the details of the abduction. Several groups operate in the area. His whereabouts are unknown.

Around 12 May 2021, in Algeciras municipality, Huila department, unidentified armed individuals attacked two people in the La Parada vereda. Perpetrators dragged the victim out of his private residence before shooting him dead. A woman that was also in the house at the moment of the attack got injured. The area is known for the presence of a FARC dissidence group. 1 fatality.

Around 12 May 2021, in Aipe, Huila department, unidentified armed individuals killed a pharmacy owner. Perpetrators called the victim by his name before opening fire at least three times. Witnesses claimed the deceased was a former member of the JAC of the Santa Rita vereda. Within minutes of difference, the armed men then killed another store owner. The area is known for the presence of a FARC dissidence group. 2 fatalities.

On 12 May 2021, in Popayan, Cauca department, an underaged woman reported being sexually abused by police officers. The victim was arrested in the context of an anti-government demonstration. Witnesses claimed police used excessive force for her arrest, followed by subsequent allegations of sexual harassment while in police custody became public. The victim killed herself after reports of the attack became public. [women targeted: girls]

On 12 May 2021, in Caucasia, Antioquia, an unknown number of armed men shot and killed a man in the street. The details and the reasons for the attack are not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 12 May 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Don Matias municipality, Antioquia, two men were killed and their bodies were found inside a truck in La Piedrahita vereda. The corpses bore gunshots. Several armed groups operate in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 12 May 2021, in La Estrella, Antioquia, two men shot and injured a man in a drive-by shooting incident. Once the victim was down, a third attacker turned up and beat him. The reason for the attack is not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 injured.

On 12 May 2021, in Llanos de Cuiba corregimiento, Yarumal, Antioquia, an unknown number of armed men shot and killed a man in the El Coliseo sector. The reasons for the attack are not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Canon de Las Hermosas Communal Group (Colombia); Women (Colombia)
notes: Around 11 May 2021, in the rural area of Chaparral, Tolima department, a social leader of the Canon de Las Hermosas vereda was killed, and her body was found. The victim was the leading member of a women's organization. Residents searched and located her body after the victim left her house and never returned. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 11 May 2021, in Puerto Claver corregimiento, El Bagre, Antioquia, two people were shot and killed in a private residence in El Campo vereda. The same day, another person was killed in the same area. The reasons for the attacks are not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 3 fatalities.

Around 11 May 2021 (as reported), in El Mango corregimiento, Argelia, Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found bearing several gunshot wounds. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 11 May 2021 (as reported), in El Plateado corregimiento, Argelia, Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former AUC: United Self-Defence Forces of Colombia
notes: On 11 May 2021, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a former member of the AUC forces was shot and injured by a ELN member in the Gaitan neighborhood. There were no fatalities.

Around 10 May 2021 (as reported), in Manizales, Caldas department, an underage woman reported being sexually harassed by police forces in the context of ongoing political unrest. According to the victim, the officer inappropriately touched her during an arrest. [women targeted: girls]

source: UNOCHA; Arauca Hoy por Hoy; Cajon Araucano
notes: Around 10 May 2021 (as reported), in Arauca, Arauca, a man was killed and his body was found between the Flor de mi Llano and Brisas del Llano neighborhoods. The victim was a former prisoner and drug user. Police believe his killing might be related to a settlement of scores. 1 fatality.

On 10 May 2021, in El Bagre, El Bagre, Antioquia, an unknown number of armed men shot and killed a man at a commercial establishment. The reason for the attack is not reported. The Gulf Clan, BVP,A and ELN operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 10 May 2021 (as reported), in Puerto Claver corregimiento, El Bagre, Antioquia, a man was killed and his body was found in the El Campo sector. The reasons for the attack are not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 10 May 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of San Andres De Cuerquia municipality, Antioquia, a man was killed and his body was found in Loma Grande vereda. The reasons for the attack are not reported. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 10 May 2021, in San Cristobal corregimiento, Medellin, Antioquia, two men shot and killed an informal taxi driver. According to the report, the man was attacked by two men who pretended to be passengers. The corpse bore several gunshot wounds. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 10 May 2021, in the rural area San Cristobal corregimiento, Medellin, Antioquia, a man was shot and killed inside his car in San Jose de la Montana vereda. The reason for the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 10 May 2021, in Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca, an unknown number of men kidnapped two men from their homes. The report does not provide details of the abduction. Several armed groups operate in the area. Their whereabouts are unknown.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Ismael Ruiz Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Ismael Ruiz Front)
assoc_actor_2: Health Workers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: On 9 May 2021, in Santa Rita vereda (Huila), suspected members of the Ismael Ruiz Front of FARC Dissidents shot and killed two people, one of whom was a doctor, JAC member and drug store owner, while the other victim was a mechanic with a criminal record. 2 fatalities.

On 9 May 2021, in Sincelejo (Sucre), unidentified armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near Puerto Arturo and El Poblado neighborhoods. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 9 May 2021 (as reported), in Cali (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed men infiltrated ongoing anti-government protests in the city and shot at an ambulance and a medical van, wounding two health workers. In response, the Scouts of Colombia announced they would no longer be conducting medical missions in some parts of the city due to the risk to their employees. 2 injured, no fatalities.

On 9 May 2021, in Cartagena (Bolivar), police reportedly fired shots and violently assaulted atendees at a Mother's Day party that violated curfew measures implemented in response to the ongoing coronavirus pandemic, injuring multiple civilians. No fatalities occurred.

On 9 May 2021, in Barbosa, Antioquia, a man was killed in the El Porton sector, a few blocks away from town hall. Details of the attack are not provided. Several groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 9 May 2021, in rural area of Itagui municipality, Antioquia, several armed men shot and killed a man and injured another in Olivares vereda. Police stated that the victim had a criminal record. Several groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 9 May 2021 (as reported), in San Cristobal corregimiento, Medellin, Antioquia, a man was killed and his body was found in a creek. According to the report, the body was left in a plastic bag. Several groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 9 May 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Cucuta municipality, Norte de Santander, an unknown number of people shot at a house and injured a woman in the La Punta vereda. Several armed groups operate in the area. Armed clashes between armed groups were reported in the area. 1 injured.
Around 8 May 2021, in San Isidro vereda (Norte de Santander), a man was shot to death and his body found in Puente Amarillo sector. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 8 May 2021, in Villavicencio, Meta, an unknown number of armed men opened fire at a man in a commercial establishment in the Aguas Claras de Ocoa neighborhood. The victim was unharmed. Several armed groups operate in the area. No fatalities or injured occurred.

On 7 May 2021, in Medellin, Antioquia, several armed men killed two men in the Media Luna neighborhood, Santa Elena corregimiento. According to the report, the perpetrators arrived in a house and opened fire at the victims. One victim was an off-duty police officer and the other used to work in an organization dedicated to social, environmental, and gender sustainability. The reason for the attack is not reported. Several armed groups operate in the department. 2 fatalities.

Around 7 May 2021 (as reported), in Corinto, Norte de Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found bearing several gunshots to his head in the San Judas sector. Several groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 7 May 2021, between the municipalities of El Tambo and Timbio (coded to El Tambo), Cauca department, an unknown number of armed men shot and killed a woman in Limon vereda. According to the report, the perpetrators belong to an armed group that operates in the area. The reason for the attack is not reported. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: Around 6 May 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Cartagena del Chaira municipality, Caqueta, two men were killed in an unknown vereda. According to the report, the victims were killed by members of a former FARC front. The reasons for the attack are not reported. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: On 6 May 2021, in El Jagual corregimiento, Corinto, Cauca, a teenager was killed in unreported circumstances in San Luis Abajo vereda. According to the Indigenous and social leaders in the area, the victim was a child soldier recruited by FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos Front. 1 fatality.

On 6 May 2021, in Puerto Asis, Putumayo department, a local merchant was killed in the Tequendama neighborhood. According to the report, the victim was attacked by a lone gunman when leaving his house. The reason for the attack is not reported. Several groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 5 May 2021, in Cartagena, Bolivar department, a man reported being attacked by a group of six police officers following a peaceful anti-government protest. According to the victim, the officers chased a group of young people as they were leaving the area where a candle vigil had taken place. After reaching one of the men, officers beat him up. The victim got hospitalized for nearly 10 days due to the severity of the injuries.

On 5 May 2021, in Medellin - Southwest, Medellin, Antioquia, two men shot and killed a man in Manzanillo vereda, Altavista corregimiento. According to the report, the attackers knocked on the victim's door and, as he opened, he was shot several times. The attackers fled the scene. The reason for the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

On 4 May 2021, in Neiva (Huila), three unidentified armed militants on motorcycles used a sub-machine gun to attack a journalist, killing one of his bodyguards in a drive-by shooting. The identity of the perpetrators is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 May 2021, in Abrego (Norte de Santander), four unidentified armed men opened fire at a betting house in the Los Alpes neighborhood, destroying a number of computers. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. No injuries or fatalities occurred.

On 4 May 2021, in Piedecuesta (Santander), police forces arbitrarily detained and attacked a local lawyer who was also a human rights activist and social leader, who was carrying a mediation in the ongoing anti-government demonstrations. Police forces physically attacked the victim, causing several head injuries, subsequently, security forces detained the man for more than 10 hours. The victim had to receive medical attention due to the severity of his injuries.

assoc_actor_2: Former Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022); Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022)
notes: Around 4 May 2021 (as reported), in Tierralta (Cordoba), Gulf Clan gunmen shot and killed an off-duty police officer and a retired police officer at a house in the Villa Pineda neighborhood. 2 fatalities.

On 4 May 2021, in the rural area of the Arauquita municipality (Arauca), unidentified armed individuals killed a member of the Sikuani indigenous group. The victim did not report any threats previous to the attack. The area is known for the presence of FARC fronts and the ELN. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: Around 4 May 2021 (as reported),in La Holanda vereda, Tame, Arauca department, two men were killed and their bodies were found gagged, with their hands tied behind their back, and gunshot wound in the head. A message was left next to the bodies, signed by the FARC-EP. Authorities indicated that both victims were Venezuelan citizens. 2 fatalities.

On 4 May 2021, in Aguasclaras corregimiento, Ocana municipality, Norte de Santander department, an unknown number of men abducted a man in a car. There is no further information on the details of the abduction. Several groups operate in the area. His whereabouts are unknown.

Around 4 May 2021 (as reported), in the Guaramito corregimiento, Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a man was killed and his body was found. The corpse bore a gunshot wound. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 3 May 2021, in Monteria (Cordoba), two unidentified armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed the owner of a large motor taxi rental company in a drive-by shooting using a gun with a silencer. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 3 May 2021, in Buenaventura municipality (Valle del Cauca), a social leader was killed and her body was found. The victim was an activist and former teacher from her community. Her body was in the Las playas areas with several signs of torture. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 3 May 2021, in Restrepo municipality (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed men shot and killed six people at a bar in Riogrande vereda. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 6 fatalities.

On 3 May 2021, in Samaniego, Narino department, two armed men on a motorbike opened fire against three people in a drive-by shooting in the El Restrepo neighborhood. One victim was killed and two others were injured. Several groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 2 May 2021 (as reported), in La Gabarra corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a man was shot to death and his body found in an area known for the presence of armed groups. Police attribute the attack to either ELN or FARC Dissidents operating in the region. 1 fatality.

On 2 May 2021, in San Luis, Ituango, (Antioquia), two unidentified armed men shot and killed an activist in the El Miranda sector. The victim was a member of the Human Colombia movement and the nephew of the city's mayor. Family members claim the victim had been the target of threats by an unnamed paramilitary group. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: CR: Radical Change; Government of Colombia (2018-2022)
notes: On 1 May 2021, in the Yumbo municipality (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed men captured a senator of the Cambio Radical party and held him captive for eight hours. The victim was reportedly released, unharmed, due to pressure from a police rescue operation.

On 1 May 2021, in San Miguel (coded to La Dorada), Putumayo, unidentified armed individuals killed a teacher and social leader. The victim taught classes in a rural school in Las Lomas vereda. There are no further details about the attack. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 1 May 2021 (as reported), in Medellin, Antioquia department, a man was killed and his body was found in his house in the Manrique neighborhood. According to the report, the victim's body had its hands and feet tied up and a bag tied around his head. The reason for the attack is unknown. Several armed groups operate in the department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 1 May 2021, in El Litoral del San Juan municipality, El Litoral del San Juan, Choco, a former FARC fighter was killed by an unknown number of armed individuals. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 30 April 2021, in Santander de Quilichao municipality (Cauca), seven unidentified armed men shot and killed a former FARC combatant at his home in La Agustina sector. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 30 April 2021 (as reported), in Huisito corregimiento, Cauca, an indigenous woman was killed and her body was found with a gunshot wound. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

source: El Pais (Colombia); La Opinion (Colombia); El Tiempo (Colombia); Diario La Libertad
notes: On 29 April 2021, in Santiago De Cali, Valle del Cauca, a group of rioters tortured and sexually abused a female police officer inside the Aguablanca police station. The crowd started to throw rocks, sticks, bottles against the station and proceeded to burn it. They participated in an anti-government demonstrations called by the National Strike Committee over health, education, and security reforms against other things. [women targeted: government officials]

On 29 April 2021, in Bogota - Bosa (Bogota, D.C.), six police members abducted and attacked a civilian accused of stealing the belongings of one of the officers. Police forced the victim into a vehicle and drove in a private residence located in Cucunuba (Cundinamarca). Subsequently, officers tortured and beat up the man in order to get a confession of the robbery. The victim was able to escape and seek assistance from some local farmers.

Around 29 April 2021 (as reported), in Concordia (Antioquia), four unidentified armed men on motorcycles shot five teenagers, killing two and wounding three in a drive-by shooting in the Hoyo Frio neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 10th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (10th Front)
notes: On 29 April 2021, in Puerto Jordan (coded to La Pesquera), Arauca, FARC 10th front of dissidents killed a Venezuelan man and his body was found with a note. On the note, the perpetrators claimed the reason for the attack was that the victim was causing problems, claiming he was part of the organization. 1 fatality.

On 28 April 2021, in Los Medios vereda (Antioquia), unidentified armed men shot and killed a social leader on La Nubia bridge, which connects Antioquia with Aguadas municipality (Caldas). The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
On 28 April 2021, in Tibu (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men shot and killed a woman in her home in Barco neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 28 April 2021, on the road to Agualasal vereda (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men shot and killed a victim on the road. Reports suggest the attack may have been tied to the National Strike, and the area is also known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 28 April 2021, in the rural area of Aguadas (Caldas) unidentified armed individuals killed a farmer and social leader in his house. The victim was an active member of his community and promoted the land restitution program and small farming projects in the rural area of the municipality. A second victim was found in the area. There are no further details on the attack. 2 fatalities.

actor1: Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022) ESMAD: Mobile Anti-Disturbance Squadron
notes: Around 28 April 2021, in La Virginia, Risaralda department, a young man was reported disappeared following the intervention of ESMAD police forces during a demonstration in the municipality. The victim's body was found six days later in a river. Witnesses claimed ESMAD police officers were seen beating up the victim previous to his disappearance. Relatives claimed the man was not taking part in the rally. 1 fatality.

On 28 April 2021, in Taraza (Antioquia), two unidentified armed men shot and killed two people at a private residence in the Buenos Aires neighborhood. Another person was injured. Authorities note the area is known for a high homicide rate and the presence of armed groups. Police believe the attack was perpetrated by Gulf Clan (AGC) members. 2 fatalities.

On 28 April 2021, in the rural area of Tumaco municipality, Narino, unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle killed a man and injured two other people in a drive-by shooting in the Pambilar vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 27 April 2021, in Barranquilla (Atlantico), four unidentified armed men abducted a former army captain and held him for ransom in Paraiso neighborhood. The victim was rescued in a military and police operation two days later.

Around 27 April 2021 (as reported), in Cartago (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a lawyer, who was the city's secretary general, in a drive-by shooting in San Jeronimo neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022) DIRAN: Anti-Narcotics Directorate
source: UNOCHA; Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 27 April 2021, in Miranda municipality (Cauca), military forces clashed with members of the Dagoberto Ramos Front of FARC Dissidents. Similar operations occurred in four other areas of the department, resulting in the death of two militants, the wounding of three others, and ten arrests by state forces. 3 injured and 2 fatalities split across 5 locations.

Around 26 April 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Sincelejo municipality (Sucre), unidentified armed men killed a youth and his body was found mutilated and divided into a number of bags hidden in a field in San Miguel vereda . The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 26 April 2021, in the rural of San Roque municipality, Antioquia, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Alegria vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 25 April 2021, in San Pedro vereda (Tolima), unidentified armed men shot and killed a former FARC militant. 1 fatality.

On 25 April 2021, in Galeras municipality (Sucre), two unidentified armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting near Pelinku park. The victim's name had previously been threatened in a pamphlet circulated by unknown perpetrators, and the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
On 25 April 2021, in Arjona (Bolivar), two unidentified armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a youth in a drive-by shooting. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 25 April 2021, in Sabanagrande (Atlantico), police forces shot at a group of fleeing, unarmed civilians who were violating a curfew in place due to the ongoing coronavirus, allegedly injuring one person. Police justified their use of firearms because one of the curfew violators allegedly threw rocks at their vehicles. 1 injured, no fatalities.

On 25 April 2021, in Olaya Herrera (Narino), a police officer threw a glass bottle at a man while breaking up a party that violated curfew established during the coronavirus pandemic. The bottle shattered and blinded the man in one eye, whereupon the officer fled the scene. 1 injured, no fatalities.

On 25 April 2021, in La Chaparrala corregimiento (Antioquia), two unidentified armed men shot and killed five people at a farm and injured one other. A seventh potential victim is reported missing. Authorities suspect the attack was related to drug trafficking in the region, which is known for the presence of armed groups. 5 fatalities.

On 25 April 2021, in Sonson, Antioquia, unidentified armed men arrived at a house and shot and killed a couple in the La Calzada neighborhood. A child passing by was also killed by the shots. Several armed groups operate in this department. 3 fatalities.

Around 24 April 2021 (weekend of), in Ocana (Norte de Santander), two unidentified armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting in Colinas de la Provincia neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 24 April 2021, in Medellin - Southwest, Antioquia, unidentified armed men on a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting in Altavista corregimiento. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
notes: On 24 April 2021, near El Plateado corregimiento, Cauca, members of Carlos Patino FARC front of dissidents shot and killed a farmer in Puente Lata sector. According to police, a note was left with the victim's body which read that the attack was motivated by a violation. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Ivan Rios: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Ivan Rios Front)
notes: On 24 April 2021, in El Palmar corregimiento, Narino, members of the FARC Ivan Rios front killed an Awa indigenous man in a drive-by shooting in El Chambu sector. 1 fatality.

On 23 April 2021, overnight in Los Patios (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men shot and killed a man in La Cordialidad neighborhood in a possible drive-by shooting. Reports indicate the area is known for the presence of armed groups seeking to control territory. 1 fatality.

Around 23 April 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Caldas municipality, Antioquia, unidentified armed individuals killed a man and his body was found with hands tied up and torture marks in the El Raizal vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 23 April 2021, in Uribe corregimiento, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two people inside an establishment owned by one of the victims. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.
On 23 April 2021, in La Rica corregimiento, Puerto Libertador, Cordoba, an indigenous man from an Embera community was abducted by members of the Gulf Clan. The victim could escaped a month later.
On 23 April 2021, in Barranca de Upia, Meta, unidentified armed men killed a man in the San Ignacio neighborhood. His body was found the next day with signs of torture and beheaded. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 62nd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (62nd Front - Fernando Diaz)
assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 22 April 2021, in the rural area of Cartagena del Chaira municipality, Caqueta department, unidentified armed individuals killed three people in the El Aguila vereda. All victims were shot in the head by FARC 62nd dissident front members. One of the victims was a former FARC member. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.

On 22 April 2021, in the rural area of Mercaderes municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals killed a man in Arboleda corregimiento. A new armed group had been threatening the area. 1 fatality.
On 22 April 2021, in Maicao, La Guajira, unidentified armed men shot against four people in a car in a drive-by shooting. Two people were killed and two others were injured. 2 fatalities.

On 22 April 2021, in Tumaco, Narino, unidentified armed individuals killed a taxi driver and set his car on fire in the Villa Lola neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 21 April 2021 (as reported), in Antioquia department (coded to Medellin), a former FARC member was killed. There is no further information on the circumstances in which the attack occurred or potential perpetrators. 1 fatality.

Around 21 April 2021 (as reported), in El Mango corregimiento, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a farmer and his body was found in the La Delgadita vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 20 April 2021, on the road that connects Valledupar and la Junta, Cesar department, a couple was abducted by unidentified individuals. The victims are truck owners and worked in the area for several years. According to a relative, the victims had reported previous threats by ELN members. The whereabouts of the victims are still unknown.

On 20 April 2021, in Santiago De Cali, Valle del Cauca department, unidentified armed individuals injured a journalist in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators shot at the victim while he smoked in front of his house. According to the victim's testimony, the men called his name before opening fire.

On 20 April 2021, in Tiquisio, Bolivar department, a young woman was killed in alleged excessive use of force by police forces. The officers were reinforcing quarantine measures introduced due to the coronavirus pandemic when an argument erupted with a group in the Los Almendros neighborhood. One of the officers opened fire against the group without warning. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Women (Colombia); Nasa Indigenous Group (Colombia); La Laguna Siberia Communal Group (Colombia); Guardia Indigena (Colombia)
notes: On 20 April 2021, in Pescador corregimiento, Cauca department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead an indigenous female leader in the El Porvenir vereda. They opened fire from a nearby forest area. The victim was a leader from the La Laguna Siberia Nasa indigenous reserve land. One member of the Indigenous Guard, who was with the victim when the attack occurred, was injured. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

source: Diario La Libertad; El Tiempo (Colombia); UNOCHA
notes: On 20 April 2021, in Quibdo, Choco department, unidentified armed individuals killed an off-duty police officer in a drive-by shooting in the Las Americas neighborhood. Official sources connected the attack to Gulf Clan members. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
source: INDEPAZ; El Espectador; La Voz del Cinaruco
notes: On 20 April 2021, in the rural area of Fortul municipality, Arauca, unidentified armed individuals killed a former FARC member. Perpetrators abducted the victim from his residence. The victim's body was found the next day with several gunshot wounds. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 20 April 2021, in Quibdo (Choco), a former FARC member was killed. There is no further information on the circumstances in which the attack occurred. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 20 April 2021, in Ciudad Bolivar, Antioquia, two unidentified armed men killed a woman in a drive-by shooting in Manzanillo sector. A man, who was with her by the time of the attack, was injured and taken to hospital. Hours later, the victim's mother was also shot and killed in the city center. Relatives of the two victims had been killed in 2018 by members of Gulf Clan (AGC). Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: On 20 April 2021, in Corinto, Cauca, FARC dissidents of the Dagoberto Ramos front shot and killed a man in the Villa del Rosario neighborhood. Police believe that the attack was an ambush to attract officers to the crime scene. 1 fatality.
On 20 April 2021, in Santa Helena vereda, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a homeless man. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 20 April 2021, in Quibdo, Choco, members of Los Locos Gang tortured and killed three teenagers in the Buenos Aires neighborhood. Their bodies had machete and gunshot wounds. 3 fatalities.

On 20 April 2021, in Tumaco, Narino, two unidentified armed men killed two Venezuelan men in a drive-by shooting in the Comuna 1 neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

Around 19 April 2021, in Santa Marta, Magdalena department, a political activist, and founder of the UP political party was killed and his body was found beheaded inside his house in the city center. The victim was tightened and his body showed signs of torture. A close friend of the victim claimed online audios threatening members of left-wing political parties were sent to several city residents. 1 fatality.

Around 19 April 2021, in Covenas, Sucre department, an unidentified armed individual attack and injured a town's social leader. The victim had fled her house in 2018 after receiving death threats from the Gulf Clan, but returned last year. According to her testimony, the attack is related to recent public complaints about corruption. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Around 19 April 2021 (week of), in Huisito corregimiento, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals killed two people and their bodies were found in advanced state of decomposition. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

On 19 April 2021, in Barranca Lebrija corregimiento, Cesar, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men inside a private establishment. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 19 April 2021, in La Llanerita vereda, Meta, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a former FARC combatant. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 19 April 2021, in Villavicencio, Meta, unidentified armed individuals entered a house and shot against a group of people. One woman was killed, two men were injured. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 10th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (10th Front)
assoc_actor_1: FARC Dissident - 28th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (28th Front - Jose Maria Cordoba)
source: El Tiempo (Colombia); El Espectador; El Colombiano
notes: On 18 April 2021, in Saravena (Arauca), the 10th Front of FARC Dissidents abducted an off-duty army colonel. The victim was last seen in a hotel with a woman who may have been involved in his abduction. The perpetrators were later in contact with his family to demand ransom. Authorities later located and arrested seven 10th Front members implicated in the plot, while the victim was transferred to Venezuelan territory, where videos released by the 28th Front of FARC dissidents on 25 August and 5 September prove he is still alive and currently held captive by the 28th Front, despite claims by the Colombian military that he had been killed. Around 19 December, the victim was released to a humanitarian commission in the municipality of Arauquita (Arauca).
On 18 April 2021, in Guarumo corregimiento, Antioquia, an armed group killed a woman inside her home in El Puerto sector. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 18 April 2021, in the rural area of La Macarena municipality, Meta department, a former FARC member was killed and his body was found near the San Juan de Lozada vereda. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
On 18 April 2021, in Certegui, Choco, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two people, including an Embera Indigenous man. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

On 18 April 2021, in the rural area of Santa Rosa de Osos municipality, Antioquia, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the La Piedra vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department.

On 18 April 2021, in the rural area of Segovia municipality, Antioquia, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man and his body was found in the El Aporriado vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 18 April 2021, in Quibdo, Choco, unidentified armed men entered the house of the son of dean of Choco Technological University and shot against him several times. He was uninjured. Several armed groups operate in this department.

On 18 April 2021, in Ipiales, Narino, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed an LGBT Venezuelan man near the Autonomous University. Police investigates if it was a hate-motivated attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 18 April 2021, in Puerto Nuevo vereda, Narino, unidentified armed individuals killed a man after they arrived at his house. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz; UNOCHA
notes: On 17 April 2021, in the rural area of Mapiripan municipality, Meta department, five men sexually assaulted a girl member of the Jiw indigenous community in the Naexal Lajt indigenous reserve land. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. [women targeted: girls]

On 17 April 2021, in Quibdo, Choco, unidentified armed men entered the Choco Technological University's dean and shot against him several times. He was uninjured. Several armed groups operate in this department.

Around 17 April 2021 (as reported), in Quibdo, Choco, unidentified armed men shot against a teacher and entrepreneur in his bureau in the Medrano neighborhood. He was injured and taken to hospital. Police arrested four people, suspects of committing the attack, which are part of the Los Mexicanos gang. Authorities believe the action is related to extortion.

On 17 April 2021, in Villavicencio, Meta, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Porveniro neighborhood. He had been attacked before. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 17 April 2021, in the rural area of Samaniego municipality, Narino, two unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a couple in the Maranguay vereda. The man was a farmer. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

Around 17 April 2021 (between 15 April - 19 April), in Tumaco, Narino, a man was killed and his body was found in advanced state of decomposition in Bavaria dock. He went missing on 15 April, according to his relatives. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 16 April 2021, in the rural area of Miranda municipality (Cauca), a member of the LGBT community was killed in a knife attack in the Desbaratada vereda. The victim was stabbed several times and died due to the severity of his injuries. The victim was an activist for the rights of the LGBT community. 1 fatality.
On 16 April 2021, in Villavicencio, Meta, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in the Okvango neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 16 April 2021 (as reported), in Villavicencio, Meta, unidentified individuals killed a man and his body was found in the Parcela de Kipas sector. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 15 April 2021, in Fundacion (Magdalena), unidentified armed men shot and killed a transgender woman in her home in Los Laureles neighborhood. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 15 April 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of La Macarena municipality (Meta), the president of the local JAC was killed and his body found in the Nuevo Milenio vereda. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
On 15 April 2021, in Mandiva vereda, Cauca, unidentified individuals shot and killed a farmer in La Milagrosa property. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 15 April 2021, in Puerto Nuevo vereda, Narino, unidentified armed individuals killed a couple. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

On 15 April 2021, in Tumaco, Narino, two unidentified armed men on a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Tres Cruces neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 14 April 2021, in La Cristalina vereda (Meta), a former FARC militant was killed and his body found by community members. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 13 April 2021, in Valledupar (Cesar), four unidentified armed men shot and killed a young woman as she waited for friends in a car in Arizona neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 13 April 2021, in Barranquilla (Atlantico), armed members of Los Costenos (an offshoot of Los Rastrojos gang), abducted two men including a dockworker and held them for ransom. The men were later freed in a military and police operation.
On 13 April 2021, in a rural area of Algeciras municipality (Huila), unidentified armed men shot and killed an off-duty police inspector inside his home in Campina vereda. 1 fatality.

source: INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; Deutsche Welle; El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: On 13 April 2021, in Caucasia (Antioquia), unidentified armed men shot and killed a dentist who was the manager of Cesar Uribe Piedrahita hospital. The victim had recently filed claims about corruption in the hospital. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
On 13 April 2021, in Medellin, Antioquia, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 13 April 2021, in the rural area of Argelia municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men in the Puente Tierra zone. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities

On 13 April 2021, in the rural area of Suarez municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a woman in the Ovejas vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 13 April 2021, in Barranca de Upia, Meta, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men outside of one of the victim's house. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 13 April 2021, in the rural area of Florida municipality, Narino, a former FARC combatant was killed. His body was found in Plazuelas sector. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 12 April 2021, in the municipality of Juan de Acosta (Atlantico), unidentified armed men shot and killed a foreign mototaxi driver on KM4 of El Vaiven sector. 1 fatality.

On 12 April 2021, in Curumani (Cesar), unidentified armed men shot and killed an engineer and his bodyguard in Santisima Trinidad neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 12 April 2021, in a rural area of Puerto Santander (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men shot and killed a Venezuelan man on the road to El Diamante vereda in El Puente sector. The victim had previously fled Venezuela after receiving death threats. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 12 April 2021, in a rural area of Puerto Gaitan (Meta), unidentified armed men killed a fourteen year old girl in Alto Tillava vereda. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality. [women targeted: girls]

On 12 April 2021, in El Aserrio corregimiento (Norte de Santander), ELN militants illegally detained an ASCAMCAT leader, his brother, two members of International Peace Action (AIP), and their bodyguards for three hours. The victims were eventually released after the ELN seized their weapons, bulletproof vests, and both vehicles they were driving.

On 12 April 2021, in El Nevado sector (Antioquia), ELN militants hijacked and set fire to a public bus and fired shots at another bus, resulting in the injury of one teenager on the highway from Medellin to Caribbean coast.
On 12 April 2021, in Villavicencio, Meta, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man in the Las Gaviotas neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 12 April 2021, in Tumaco, Narino, two people were killed in different situations. The first victim was shot and killed by two unidentified armed inside an open establishment in La Bajada del Puente del Morro sector. The other was killed by two armed men in a drive-by shooting in La Carbonera sector. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

On 11 April 2021, in Cartagena corregimiento (Narino), unidentified armed men shot and killed two Venezuelan men. Authorities are investigating possible connections with death threats recently issued by 'Los Cuyes' in the municipality. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 11 April 2021, in Tierralta (Cordoba), two police officers allegedly assaulted an elderly woman after entering her home unannounced to arrest her son. The police insist they were attacked when they entered the house, and thus acted in self-defense. 1 injured, no fatalities. [women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons]
On 11 April 2021, in El Tablon vereda (Cauca), unidentified armed men shot at and killed two men and wounded another at a party. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia); Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 11 April 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Nuqui municipality (Choco), Gulf Clan members shot and killed an off-duty police inspector and an Afro-Colombian community leader in their own homes. Authorities believe the attacks were likely related to the recent capture of a Gulf Clan leader in the area. 2 fatalities.
On 11 April 2021, in Alfonso Lopez corregimiento, Antioquia, unidentified armed individuals killed a man. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 11 April 2021, in the rural area of El Penol municipality, Antioquia, unidentified armed individuals shot against the car of a city council in the Bonilla vereda. No one was injured.

Around 11 April 2021 (as reported), in Miranda municipality, Caica, unidentified armed individuals killed two people in the El Infiernito and San Antonio neighborhoods. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.
On 11 April 2021, in Acacias, Meta, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a couple. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.
On 11 April 2021, in Tumaco, Narino, unidentified armed men shot and killed a person in the El Camal neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 11 April 2021, in Potrerito corregimiento, Valle del Cauca, an unidentified armed man shot and killed a tourism leader in the region. He was known for organizing community activities in his neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 10 April 2021, in Cartagena (Bolivar), two unidentified armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the neighborhood of San Jose de los Campanos. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

source: RCN Radio; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: On 10 April 2021, in the municipality of Samaniego (Narino), unidentified armed men shot and killed two men as they left a bar in the city center. Authorities are investigating possible connections with death threats recently issued by Los Cuyes. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 10 April 2021, in the rural area of Popayan municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting on the highway from Popayan to El Tambo municipalities. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 9 April 2021, in Guaranda (Sucre), unidentified armed men shot and killed a man outside the Zacapa nightclub. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 9 April 2021, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), two unidentified armed men shot and killed a man in Atalaya Primera Etapa neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 9 April 2021 (as reported), in La Gabarra corregimiento (Norte de Santander), two men were killed and their bodies found in the Catatumbo river. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 9 April 2021 (as reported), in a rural area of Puerto Santander (Norte de Santander), a young girl was killed and her body found on the road to El Diamante vereda in El Puente sector. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality. [women targeted: girls]
On 9 April 2021, in the rural area of Alcala municipality, Valle del Cauca, unidentified armed individuals killed a man. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 9 April 2021, in Corinto, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the La Esmeralda de Corinto neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 9 April 2021, in Andalucia, Valle del Cauca, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 9 April 2021, in Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca, unidentified armed individuals shot a man to death in the Independencia neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 8 April 2021, in San Benito Abad, Sucre department, a communal local leader reported being attacked by a person that works for a private security company. The perpetrator broke into the victim's house and beat him up. The victim was transferred to a local hospital to treat the injuries. Sources claimed the attack was triggered due to his work with the community.

Around 8 April 2021 (as reported), in Tibu municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men killed a man and deposited his body on a bridge leading to El Tarra. The victim was found with a note claiming he was killed for theft and for his relationship with the police of Tibu. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 8 April 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Dabeiba municipality, Antioquia, unidentified armed men entered the house of an Embera indigenous shaman, in the Amparrado indigenous community. The suspects shot and killed the victim. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 8 April 2021 (as reported), in Medellin, Antioquia, unidentified individuals killed a man and his body was found in the Santa Cruz neighborhood. It is possible the attack was the result of a criminal event. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 8 April 2021, in Medellin, Antioquia, unidentified individuals killed a man with a cold weapon in the Caribe sector. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 8 April 2021, in Bocas de Satinga, Narino, unidentified armed individuals killed a Venezuelan man. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 8 April 2021 (between 6 April - 9 April), in the rural area of Tumaco municipality, Narino, unidentified armed individuals kidnapped three civilians, killed them, and their bodies were found. Several armed groups operate in this department. 3 fatalities.

Around 7 April 2021 (between 26 March - 20 April), in the rural area of Cucuta - Southeast, Norte de Santander, a meat smuggler went missing, was killed, and his body was found in an informal settlement between Villa del Rosario and San Antonio del Tachira (Venezuela). Police believe he was killed on the Venezuelan side of the border. 1 fatality.

source: UNOCHA; El Espectador; INDEPAZ; El Colombiano
notes: On 7 April 2021, in Mondomo corregimiento, Cauca department, unidentified armed individuals attacked a group of civilians in the Casacabel vereda. Three people were instantly shot dead and another died on the way to the hospital. One victim presented seven gunshot wounds. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 4 fatalities.
On 7 April 2021, in El Carmen De Atrato, Choco, Gulf Clan (AGC) members shot and killed two members of the Moltodo communal council. 2 fatalities.

On 6 April 2021, in the rural area of Dabeiba, Antioquia department, unidentified armed individuals raided the house of an Embera indigenous people leader. Perpetrators shot dead the victim, who was an activist of Embera indigenous culture and a spiritual leader in the Amparrado Popalito indigenous reserve land. Sources claimed that he had received previous death threats. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 6 April 2021, in the rural area of Minca, Santa Marta department, Magdalena department, two hooded men attacked an environmental activist who works for a natural conservation area. Perpetrators broke into the victim's office and subsequently beat him up. The victim is recovering from his injuries.

On 6 April 2021, in Valledupar, Cesar department, an unidentified armed individual raided the house of an Arhuaco indigenous woman leader in the Birwa neighborhood. The perpetrator shot three times at the victim, who was injured in the attack. The victim is recovering in a local hospital. Members of the community claimed unidentified men have been harassing other community members to find the victim's address. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 6 April 2021, in Anori, Antioquia department, a social leader from Anori town was stabbed and killed by an unidentified attacker. The victim was attacked on the back as he had gathered with friends in the town's square. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 6 April 2021, in Medellin, Antioquia, unidentified armed men fired shots against two men in the Estacion Villa neighborhood. One victim was killed and the other was injured and taken to hospital. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 6 April 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of El Plateado corregimiento, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man and his body was found. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 6 April 2021, in the rural area of Timbio municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed men attacked an indigenous social leader and his family inside their house in the Kiteki Kiwe indigenous reservation. No one was injured.
Around 6 April 2021 (as reported), in Olaya Herrera, Narino, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man and his body was found. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 6 April 2021, in Villavicencio, Meta, unidentified armed men shot and killed a merchant near the Okavango neighborhood. He had previously reported threats and extorsion requests against him. Several armed groups operate in the department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former AUC: United Self-Defence Forces of Colombia
notes: On 5 April 2021, in Santa Marta, Magdalena department, unidentified armed individuals opened fire on a former member of the AUC in a drive-by shooting. The victim was uninjured in the attack.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Ismael Ruiz Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Ismael Ruiz Front)
notes: Around 5 April 2021, in the rural area of Ataco municipality, Tolima department, suspected Ismael Ruiz FARC dissident faction members killed a resident. Perpetrators arrived at the house of the victim on two motorcycles. The victim was shot several times. 1 fatality.

Around 5 April 2021, in the rural area of Tibu, Norte de Santander department, two men were killed and their bodies were found in different sectors of the Campo Dos vereda. One of the victims was later identified as a resident of the area. There is a presence of Rastrojos, FARC dissidents factions, and ELN members in the area. 2 fatalities.

Around 5 April 2021, near La Gabarra, Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander department, a woman was killed and her body was found on the road that connects the town with the municipal seat. The victim's family claimed she was abducted by armed men who insisted she was stealing the belongings from other residents. There is a presence of Rastrojos, FARC dissidents factions, and ELN members in the area. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Ivan Rios: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Ivan Rios Front)
notes: Around 5 April 2021 (as reported), in Espriella corregimiento, Narino department, Ivan Rios FARC front dissidents carried out a drive-by shooting against a group of civilians who had gathered at a local bar in the Pulgrande vereda. One person was killed and five others were injured. 1 fatality.

On 5 April 2021, in the rural area of Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a truck driver in the La Cuatro vereda. The victim was intercepted by perpetrators who opened fire on the victim. There is a presence of Rastrojos, FARC dissidents factions, and ELN members in the Catatumbo subregion. 1 fatality.

Around 5 April 2021, in San Vicente Del Caguan, Caqueta, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man and his body was found in the Villa Ferro neighborhood. The man worked with cattle breeding. There have been recent threats in the region from FARC dissident groups, although perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 5 April 2021 (as reported), in Tibu, Norte de Santander, unidentified individuals killed a woman and her body was found on the La Gabarra highway. ELN and 3rd FARC Front of dissidents operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 5 April 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two men and their bodies were found on the highway from Campo Dos to Campo Giles and on the highway towards Campo Tres. ELN and 3rd FARC Front of dissidents operate in the area. 2 fatalities.

Around 5 April 2021 (as reported), in Santiago de Cali - Comuna 16, Valle del Cauca, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man and his body was found in the Antonio Narino neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 4 April 2021, in the rural area of Toribio municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals killed a person in the Tacueyo indigenous reservation. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 4 April 2021, in Quibdo, Choco, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
Around 4 April 2021 (between 2 April - 6 April), in Leiva, Narino, two Venezuelan civilians were shot and killed. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.
On 4 April 2021, in Tumaco, Narino, unidentified armed men entered a man's house in the Obrero neighbourhood and shot and killed him. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 4 April 2021 (as reported), in Puerto Asis, Putumayo, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man and his body was found in the 20 July neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 4 April 2021, in Puerto Leguizamo, Putumayo, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a couple in the 19th November neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

Around 4 April 2021 (as reported), in Santiago de Cali - Comuna 13, Valle del Cauca, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a woman. The victim's body was found on Charco Azul River channel. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 3 April 2021, in the rural area of La Plata municipality, Huila department, unidentified armed individuals killed three farmers who were members of the same family. Perpetrators arrived at the scene on motorcycles and subsequently shot dead the victims. There is a presence of FARC dissident factions in the area. 3 fatalities.

On 3 April 2021, in the rural area of Tumaco municipality, Narino department, unidentified armed individuals opened fire against a group of Awa indigenous people from the Piguambi Palangala indigenous reserve land. Perpetrators carried out the drive-by shooting from a pick-up truck passing near El Pulgante vereda, resulting in one indigenous person killed and six more injured. There is a presence of FARC dissident factions, Gulf Clan members, and other armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 3 April 2021, in the rural area of Tibu, Norte de Santander department, two men were killed and their bodies were found in the El Ambato vereda. The bodies had several gunshot wounds, some in the head. There is a presence of Rastrojos, FARC dissidents factions, and ELN members in the area. 2 fatalities.

Around 3 April 2021 (as reported), in Olaya Herrera, Narino, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a Venezuelan man and his body was found. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
