Around 2 April 2021, in Santiago De Cali, Valle del Cauca department, a community leader reported being beaten up by police forces during an identity check. The victim and her son received medical attention due to the severity of the injuries.

Around 2 April 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Bolivar municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed men shot and killed a man. The victim's body was found in the Morales vereda, Melchor corregimiento, with his hands tied up. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 2 April 2021, in the rural area of El Bordo municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed men shot and killed a farmer. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 2 April 2021, in the rural area of San Pablo municipality, Narino, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a couple in the Canada vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

Around 1 April 2021, in La Marina, Chaparral municipality, Tolima department, local authorities reported the forced recruitment of five people from the town by suspected members of the Segunda Marquetalia FARC dissident faction. Two of the victims are children. The whereabouts of the victims are still unknown.

Around 1 April 2021, in the rural area of the department of Choco (coded to Quibdo, Choco), Gulf Clan members forcibly recruited a young indigenous man who was working in a rural area. The armed men provided the victim with large quantities of alcohol and subsequently took him to the armed group's camp while he was under the influence of liquor. The men then told him that he could not leave again and forced him to continue to work for the armed organization. The victim was later released after being rescued by military forces on an unspecified date.

On 1 April 2021, in the rural area of Ricaurte municipality, Narino department, unidentified armed individuals opened fire against a group of Awa indigenous people who had gathered near a soccer field in the Palmar Imbi indigenous reserve land. Perpetrators arrived at the area with motorcycles and subsequently fled the scene running. Members of the indigenous community set the vehicles of the perpetrators on fire after the attack. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. No fatalities or injuries occurred.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 1 April 2021, in the rural area of San Vicente Del Caguan municipality, Caqueta department, a former FARC member was killed and his body was found near the La Chorrera vereda. The victim was choked to death. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 1 April 2021, in Barbacoas, Narino, unidentified armed men shot against a Humanitarian Commission composed by Awa indigenous people in Berlin Las Marias sector. The perpetrators ordered the group to stop and, after their refusal, the individuals started shooting. The commission was returning from recovering a woman's body. No one was injured.
Around 1 April 2021 (as reported), in Barbacoas, Narino, unidentified armed individuals killed an Awa indigenous woman. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 31 March 2021, in the rural area of Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander department, unidentified armed individuals killed a man in the La Cuatro vereda. The victim was intercepted by perpetrators while riding a motorcycle and subsequently shot at least seven times. There is a presence of several armed groups in the Catatumbo subregion. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Wayuu Indigenous Group (Colombia); Women (Colombia); Arronshy Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 31 March 2021, in the rural area of Uribia municipality, La Guajira department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a Wayuu indigenous woman who was a leader of the Arronshy community. Perpetrators chased the victim and her husband on a motorcycle, subsequently opening fire against the couple. The social leader was killed while her partner was uninjured. The victim had reported death threats previous to the attack. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 31 March 2021, in the rural area of Tumaco municipality, Narino, four unidentified armed individuals raided the house of an Awa indigenous leader, killing her and her partner in the Gran Sabalo indigenous reservation. The victim was a member of the indigenous reserve area Ulbi Alto Nunalbi. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 31 March 2021, in Santander de Quilichao, Cauca, an unidentified armed man shot against two people on a motorcycle in La Galera sector. The victims were both injured and taken to hospital. Several armed groups operate in this department.

On 30 March 2021, in Florencia, Caqueta, unidentified armed individuals killed a former governor in a drive-by shooting in the Torazo neighborhood. The victim had served a sentence for connections with paramilitary groups and had no previous threats. There is a presence of several FARC dissident factions in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 30 March 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Medellin municipality, Antioquia, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man, whose body was found in the San Cristobal corregimiento. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 30 March 2021 (week of), in Argelia, Cauca, a woman was killed and her body was found in La Planada sector. She went missing days earlier. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 30 March 2021, in Las Tallas corregimiento, Cauca, unidentified armed men stopped a car, forced the man to leave it, took him, and killed him. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 30 March 2021, in Santiago de Cali - Comuna 18, Valle del Cauca, the president of JAC was attacked with shots. He was severely injured and had been previously threatened on social media. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department.

Around 30 March 2021 (between 28 March - 30 March), in the rural area of La Apartada municipality, Cordoba, a man was killed and his body was found with torture marks. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 29 March 2021, in Florida, Valle del Cauca, unidentified armed individuals killed a union leader in a drive-by shooting. The perpetrator shot at the victim several times as the latter went for a walk with his pet. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

source: El Universal (Colombia); El Tiempo (Colombia); El Colombiano; UNOCHA
notes: On 29 March 2021, in the rural area of Valdivia municipality, Antioquia department, six ELN members set fire to two trucks and a bus of public service on the route that connects Medellin municipality to the Caribbean Coast. Perpetrators opened fire against a truck driver that did not stop, injuring two children who were in the vehicle.

Around 29 March 2021 (as reported), in Medellin, Antioquia, unidentified individuals shot and killed a woman, and her body was found with several gunshots in the Aranjuez neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 29 March 2021 (between 27 March - 2 April), in El Mango corregimiento, Cauca, unidentified individuals killed a man who went missing on 27 March and his body was found. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 29 March 2021, in Alto Baudo, Choco, unidentified armed men shot and injured an indigenous leader. Several armed groups operate in this department.

Around 29 March 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Fuente de Oro municipality, Meta department, a farmer was killed and his body was found with four gunshot wounds in the Alto Sardinata vereda. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Awa Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 28 March 2021, in the rural area of Guayacana corregimiento, Tumaco municipality, Narino department, two civilians were killed and their bodies were found. The victims were abducted from one of the victim's house by unidentified armed individuals, a day later residents found their bodies with several gunshot wounds. One of the victims was an Awa indigenous leader of the Panelero indigenous reserve land. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); Women (Colombia); Zenu Indigenous Group (Colombia); Health Workers (Colombia)
source: El Heraldo (Colombia); El Universal (Colombia); INDEPAZ; UNOCHA
notes: Around 28 March 2021, in the rural area of Tierralta municipality, Cordoba department, a Zenu indigenous woman was killed and her body was found. The victim was a member of the national program for crop substitution and worked as a nurse. The victim's body was dismembered and hidden inside a bag. 1 fatality.

On 28 March 2021, in the rural area of Toribio municipality, Cauca department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead an indigenous leader in the La Bodega vereda. Perpetrators attacked the victim at his house. There is a presence of several armed groups in the Cauca region. 1 fatality.

On 28 March 2021, in Villa Colombia corregimiento, Valle del Cauca, unidentified armed individuals opened fire against a group of civilians, killing a social leader, a bus driver, and a street-food saleswoman. Initial versions of the incident claimed the attack targeted the social leader. There is a presence of FARC dissident faction, Gulf Clan, and EPL members in the area. 3 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 28 March 2021, in the rural area of Popayan municipality, Valle del Cauca, a former FARC combatant was the target of shots while he was driving his a motorcycle in Cajete sector. He was not injured and perpetrators are unknown. Several armed groups operate in this department.

On 28 March 2021, in Espriella corregimiento, Narino, unidentified armed men kidnapped two men and took them in a boat on Caunapi River. One victim was released the next day. The whereabouts of the other victim are unknown. Several armed groups operate in this department.

Around 28 March 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Puerto Santander municipality, Norte de Santander, unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a man in Pacolandia sector, Banco de Arena corregimiento, and killed him. The victim's body was found in the El Diamante vereda. ELN, Gulf Clan (AGC), and the Los Rastrojos gang operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 27 March 2021, in the rural area of Puerto Santander municipality, Norte de Santander department, a farmer was killed and his body found. The victim, who worked in a local plot of land taking care of rice crops, was found dead in the El Diamante vereda with several gunshot wounds in the head. There is a presence of Rastrojos and ELN members in the area. 1 fatality.

source: UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; El Tiempo (Colombia); El Colombiano
notes: On 27 March 2021, in Cartago, Valle del Cauca, unidentified armed individuals opened fire at the local market in a drive-by shooting, killing two women and two men who were in the area. Residents claimed the Aguilas Negras as responsible for the attack, but authorities are yet to confirm this version. 4 fatalities.

Around 27 March 2021 (week of), in the rural area of Taraza municipality, Antioquia, unidentified armed individuals forced a man to get off his motorcycle and then killed and beheaded him. Perpetrators also set fire to his motorcycle. The victim was a relative of a JAC leader. At least 16 people were displaced in fear after the killing. Gulf Clan (AGC) and Los Caparros are disputing the zone. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 25 March 2021, in Mesetas municipality, Meta, FARC dissidents abducted two workers of an energy company in the La Argentina vereda. The victims were released the next day, following a military operation to rescue them. There were no reports of clashes and two people were arrested.
On 25 March 2021, in Bello, Antioquia, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed two people in the Molinares neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 25 March 2021, near La Esmeralda (Jujua), Arauca, FARC dissidents kidnapped three workers from Agustin Codazzi in La Primavera sector. The group was released after three hours of negotiations with the Government and Human Rights organizations.

Around 24 March 2021 (between 17 - 24 March), in San Jose de la Fragua municipality, Caqueta department, five civilians were killed and their bodies were found. Three victims were in the Zabaleta vereda, and two more in the Yurayako area. There is a presence of several FARC dissident Factions in the area. 5 fatalities.

Around 24 March 2021 (as reported), in Medellin, Antioquia a man was killed by unknown perpetrators and his body was found in the Carpinelo neighborhood. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 24 March 2021, in Medellin, Antioquia, unidentified individuals killed a man inside a house in the San Javier neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 24 March 2021, in Miranda municipality, Cauca, unidentified perpetrators shot and killed two people in the Campo Alegre vereda and the Suerte Cuarentena neighborhood. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

Around 24 March 2021 (as reported), in Samaniego, Narino, unidentified armed men shot against a group of people inside a establishment in the city. One man was killed and two women were injured. Police investigates if the attack is related to a massacre that took place in August 2020. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 23 March 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Andalucia municipality, Valle del Cauca, unidentified armed individuals abducted a farmer. The victim's vehicle was found burned down on a rural highway. He was released on the 28th April. There is a presence of several armed groups in the region.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 23 March 2021, in Puerto Asis municipality, Putumayo, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a former FARC member in a drive-by shooting in the La Pradera sector. The victim was on a motorcycle with a woman, who was injured in the attack. The victim was also a member of the National Program for Substitution of illegal crops. Sources claimed the man had protection measures assigned, but officers were not with the victim at the moment of the event. Another civilian was injured during the attack. 1 fatality.

On 23 March 2021, in Medellin, Antioquia, unidentified armed men shot against a taxi in the Prado Center neighborhood. The passenger was killed and the taxi driver was injured. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 23 March 2021, in the rural area of Taraza municipality, Antioquia, three people were killed in different circumstances, including one farmer who had been kidnapped. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attacks. Several armed groups operate in this department. 3 fatalities.

On 22 March 2021, in Inza municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals abducted four indigenous people from the San Andres de Pisimbala indigenous reserve land. Perpetrators killed one of the victims, who was a leader of his community and injured another. Two other victims ran away when the shooting began. There is a presence of several armed groups in the region. 1 fatality.

Around 22 March 2021 (as reported), in Cuaspud, Narino, a Venezuelan man was killed by unknown perpetrators and his body was found with signs of torture and multiple injuries in San Francisco Arellano sector. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 21 March 2021, in Maicao municipality, La Guajira department, a member of the Venezuelan military was killed and his body was found. The remains of the victim were hidden in a landfill. According to the source, the man was off-duty and was last seeing buying cleaning supplies on the Colombian side of the border. The body had torture marks. 1 fatality.

source: UNOCHA; El Heraldo (Colombia); El Tiempo (Colombia); El Universal (Colombia)
notes: On 21 March 2021, in Montelibano, Cordoba, two Gulf Clan members shot and killed an off-duty police officer in front of his family in the San Jose neighborhood. The suspects were later arrested and sent to jail. 1 fatality.

Around 21 March 2021 (as reported), in Guatemala vereda, Cauca, a person was killed by unknown shooters and their body was found with gunshot wounds. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 21 March 2021, in Sinai corregimiento, Cauca, unknown perpetrators shot and killed a man in the Sinai corregimiento. There is no information on the shooters. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 21 March 2021, in Leiva municipality, Narino, unidentified perpetrators shot and killed a man on the Leiva highway. The shooters mistook the victim for another person. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 20 March 2021, in Argelia municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the La Primavera vereda. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 20 March 2021, in Acacias, Meta, two unidentified armed men shot and injured a man in the Independencia neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department.

On 19 March 2021, in the rural area of Ocana municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed individuals abducted a poultry farmer. There is no further information on the events or the whereabouts of the victim. There is a presence of EPL, FARC dissidents, and ELN in the area.

Around 18 March 2021, in the rural area of La Gabarra corregimiento, Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander department, two men were killed and their bodies were found. One of the victims was shot at least seven times in the chest. There is a presence of ELN members and the 33rd FARC dissident front in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 18 March 2021, near San Jose de la Fragua municipality, Caqueta, unidentified perpetrators shot and killed three people along the Zabaleta River. One of the victims was a farmer. According to witnesses, the victims were on the way to a forced appointment with an armed group. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 3 fatalities.

Around 18 March 2021 (month of), in El Plateado corregimiento, Cauca, unidentified individuals killed a man and his body was found naked and in an advanced state of decomposition floating on the San Juan de Micay River. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 18 March 2021, in Convencion, Norte de Santander, unidentified armed men on a motorcycle forced a Venezuelan man and an unidentified person to get on the motorcycle in La Cadena sector. Their whereabouts are unknown. Several armed groups operate in this department.

On 18 March 2021, in Puerto Asis, Putumayo, unidentified perpetrators shot and killed a man in the Tolerancia sector. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Colombia (2018-2022); Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Women (Colombia)
notes: On 17 March 2021, in La Esmeralda vereda, Orito municipality, Putumayo, unidentified armed individuals killed a social leader. The victim was the mayor of the indigenous community Camentza Biya. Perpetrators intercepted the victim when she was driving on a motorcycle with her granddaughter, killing both of them. There is a presence of FARC dissident factions and other armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders][women targeted: politicians]

Around 17 March 2021 (week of), in the rural area of Argelia municipality, Cauca, unidentified perpetrators shot and killed five people. A sixth person went missing. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attacks. Several armed groups operate in this department. 5 fatalities

Around 17 March 2021 (as reported), in El Plateado corregimiento, Cauca, unidentified individuals killed a couple and their bodies were found with gunshot wounds. Several armed groups operate in the department. 2 fatalities.

On 17 March 2021, in Puerto Gaitan, Meta, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 16 March 2021, in the rural area of Caldono municipality, Cauca department, three people were killed and their bodies were found. Two of the victims were members of an indigenous community, and the third one was an Afro-Colombian woman. The bodies were found in different areas of the municipality. There is a presence of several armed groups in the Cauca department. 3 fatalities.

On 16 March 2021, in Soacha, Cundinamarca department, members of an LGBT collective reported sexual abuse against a non-binary member of the trans community. According to the report, the victim was arrested after inconsistencies in their ID number. Officers harassed the prisoner and subsequently sexually abused the victim.

Around 16 March 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Miranda municipality, Cauca, a person was killed and their body was found with several gunshot wounds in the Guatemala vereda. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 15 March 2021, in the rural area of Abrego municipality, Norte de Santander department, unidentified armed individuals abducted a man in San Miguel vereda and forced him into the forest area. The whereabouts of the victim are still unknown. There is a presence of EPL, FARC dissidents, and ELN in the area.

On 15 March 2021, in Jamundi municipality, Valle Del Cauca, unidentified armed individuals killed a coal mine owner and one of his workers in the Ampudia corregimiento. Witnesses reported the vehicle of the victims had burst on fire on a rural road. Subsequently, police found the bodies with gunshot wounds. There is a presence of Gulf Clan and FARC dissident factions in the area. 2 fatalities.

Around 14 March 2021 (as reported), in El Plateado corregimiento, Cauca, two people were killed and their bodies were found in the La Balastrera zone. The victims were members of an indigenous community and their bodies had signs of torture and the hands tight. One of them had recently finished his mandatory military service. There is a presence of several armed groups in the Cauca department. 2 fatalities.

On 14 March 2021, in Taraza, Antioquia, the Los Caparros gang shot and killed a teenage girl in the Maria Gaid neighborhood. Perpetrators attacked the victim in her house. She had reported threats by the armed group. 1 fatality. [women targeted: girls]

On 14 March 2021, in Arauca, Arauca, an off-duty soldier was killed in the Miramar neighborhood. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 14 March 2021, in the rural area of El Tambo municipality, Cauca, a man was killed with several shots in a drive-by shooting by unidentified armed men. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 14 March 2021 (as reported), near Carrillo corregimiento, Cordoba, a man was killed and his body was found, beheaded, floating on a river in the Sabananueva corregimiento. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 14 March 2021, in San Martin, Meta, a man was killed in the city center by unknown shooters. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 13 March 2021, in Barrancabermeja, Santander department, unidentified armed individuals shot at a former FARC member and two more people in a drive-by shooting. Three people were injured, one of them remains in the intensive care unit due to the severity of the injuries.

Around 13 March 2021 (as reported), in Esmeraldas corregimiento, Narino, a farmer was killed and his body was found with a gunshot in the head in the El Cable vereda. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 13 March 2021, in Samaniego, Narino, unidentified armed individuals killed a merchant at work in a drive-by shooting in the El Divino Nino sector. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 13 March 2021 (as reported), in Samaniego municipality, Narino, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man and his body was found with gunshot wounds in the Chuguldi corregimiento. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 12 March 2021, in Arauquita, Arauca, FARC dissidents kidnapped three private security workers. The victims were released two days later. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack.
Around 11 March 2021 (as reported), in Buritica municipality, Antioquia, Gulf Clan members kidnapped two men and a woman. They were later released during an operation conducted by military forces.

On 11 March 2021, in the rural area of Belalcazar municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed men arrived at a house in the Ricaurte indigenous reservation and killed an indigenous man. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 11 March 2021, in Belalcazar, Cauca, unidentified individuals shot and injured a man. Several armed groups operate in the department.

Around 11 March 2021 (as reported), in El Plateado corregimiento, Cauca, a person was killed and their body was found with shots to the head, chest, and leg. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 10 March 2021, in Medellin, Antioquia, an unidentified armed man entered a house and shot and killed a man with shots to his head in the Belalcazar neighbourhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 10 March 2021 (as reported), in El Recuerdo vereda, Cauca, two people were killed and their bodies were found with machete injuries in different locations in the vereda. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. There is an ongoing dispute between the ELN and FARC dissidents in the area. 2 fatalities.
On 10 March 2021, in Granada, Meta, an unidentified individual shot against a man outside the city's coliseum. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 9 March 2021, in the rural area of Campo Dos corregimiento, Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander department, a man was killed and his body was found. The victim was shot at least two times in the head. Near the body was found an ID from Venezuela, but the victim's identity is not yet confirmed. A sign claiming that 'he was killed for burgling' was found near the body. There is a presence of several armed groups in the Catatumbo subregion. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 9 March 2021 (as reported), in Honduras vereda, Cauca, a former FARC member was killed and his body was found. There is no information on the perpetrators of attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 9 March 2021, in Montelibano, Cordoba, unidentified armed men shot and killed a man in the Camino Correcto neighborhood. Los Caparros and Gulf Clan (AGC) operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 9 March 2021, in San Martin municipality, Meta, an unidentified armed individual entered a man's property in the Alto Rubiano vereda and shot him several times. The victim was killed. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 8 March 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Caucasia municipality, Antioquia, two people were killed and their bodies were found. One of the bodies had signs of torture. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 8 March 2021, in Arauca, Arauca, unidentified armed men entered the house of a social leader of the Monserrate sector and kidnapped him. They took the victim to Venezuelan territory. Police believe that FARC dissidents were the perpetrators of the abduction. The victim was released the following day, unharmed. The victim had been receiving death threats.

On 8 March 2021, in San Diego, Cesar, an off-duty police officer was attacked with several shots outside his house. He was uninjured. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department.
On 8 March 2021, in Puerto Gaitan, Meta, unidentified armed men shot and killed a man in the El Triunfo neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 8 March 2021 (as reported), in La Guayacana corregimiento, Narino, unidentified armed men shot and killed a farmer, and his body was found. He went missing on March 7th. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 7 March 2021, in Puerto Umbria corregimiento, Putumayo, unidentified armed individuals attacked a member of the Nasa indigenous community in the Jerusalen indigenous reserve land. Perpetrators waited for the victim to come out of his house to open fire against him, but the weapon did not work. The victim, who is the local coordinator of the Indigenous Guard, was uninjured. Members of the Frontier Command group are active in the area.

Around 7 March 2021 (as reported), in Girardota municipality, Antioquia, a person was killed and their body was found in the Medellin River. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 7 March 2021, in Medellin - Southwest, Antioquia, five unidentified armed men killed another man in Altavista corregimiento. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 7 March 2021 (as reported), in Lerma corregimiento, Cauca, unidentified armed men shot and killed a farmer, whose body was found the next day with several gunshot wounds. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 7 March 2021, in Caicedonia municipality, Valle del Cauca, unidentified armed individuals killed two men on a motorcycle with machetes in the Samaria corregimiento. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

On 3 March 2021, in the rural area of Taraza municipality, Antioquia, the Los Caparros shot and killed a city government construction worker in Los Mangos village. actor1: FARC Dissident - Gentil Duarte Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Gentil Duarte Front)

The government of Bogota claimed the killings were perpetrated by the FARC dissident faction Gentil Duarte. 2 fatalities.

On 2 March 2021, in Huamanga (Bolivar), military forces raided a local farmer's house after a military operation against the Gulf Clan (coded separately). Security forces had initially reported the incident as an armed confrontation, but later reports clarified that the victim was a civilian killed when security forces raided his house. 1 fatality.

A second source claimed three people died in the attack. 2 fatalities.

Around 1 March 2021 (as reported), in Medellin, Antioquia, a man was killed and his body was found half naked and gagged in a hotel in the 10th commune of La Candelaria neighborhood. Around 1 March 2021 (as reported), in Corinto, Cauca, unidentified armed men shot and killed a person in the Nuevo Horizonte neighborhood. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction

Seven of the victims were gradually released and found alive in the rural areas of Caceres (Antioquia). One of the victims subsequently died after his liberation due to a gastrointestinal infection suffered while in captivity. The whereabouts of the missing victim are still unknown.

There is a presence of ELN, Los Rastrojos, and Gulf Clan members in the area. 1 fatality.

On 25 February 2021, in Puerto Santander corregimiento, Norte de Santander department, unidentified armed individual shot dead two people in the Mi Ranchito area. There is a presence of ELN, Los Rastrojos, and Gulf Clan members in the area. 2 fatalities.

source: El Colombiano; Diario La Libertad; INDEPAZ

Around 13 February 2021, in the rural area of Rio Seco, Valledupar municipality, Cesar department, a businessman and his wife were killed and their bodies were found. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 13 February 2021, in Toribio (Cauca), a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting outside of his house in the Primero de Mayo neighborhood. The motive of the attack is unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 12 February 2021 (as reported), near the Tamacay corregimiento (Arauca), two men were shot and killed an their bodies were found next to the Tame - Fortul road. There is presence the ELN and FARC dissident groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)

Around 11 February 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Pueblo Rico municipality, Risaralda department, members of an indigenous community reported that military soldiers physically assaulted a teacher of the community. On 10 February 2021, in Convencion, Norte de Santander department, unidentified armed individuals opened fire against the house of a councilman. The victim was uninjured. There is a presence of several armed groups in the Catatumbo sub-region.

Around 9 February 2021, near Mojarras corregimiento, Mercaderes municipality, Cauca department, a Peruvian citizen was killed and his body was found. The victim's family reported his disappearance on 9 February. Subsequently, a video of men carrying out an interrogation to the victim and throwing him from a bridge was posted on social media platforms. On 20 February, his remains were found in Mojarras corregimiento. Authorities believed the incident is a xenophobic attack. 1 fatality.

Around 9 February 2021 (as reported), in La Dorada, Caldas department, two police officers physically assaulted a citizen during an identity control procedure. Police opened an official investigation after a video of the incident leaked to the press. No fatalities or injuries.

Around 9 February 2021 (as reported), in Cucuta - Southeast, Norte de Santander department, members of the ELN shot dead a civilian on one of the illegal crossings trail between Colombia and Venezuela. According to the source, the attack was related to the victim's relation to coca cultivation and cocaine manufacturing. 1 fatality.

On 9 February 2021, in the rural area of Caucasia municipality (Antioquia), members of an unidentified armed group killed and decapitated a man in El Toro vereda. The motive of the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 8 February 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Huisito corregimiento, El Tambo municipality, Cauca department, two men were killed and their bodies were found buried. On 8 February 2021, in Tado municipality (Choco), an indigenous woman was victim of sexual violence committed by unidentified armed individuals after being temporarily held alongside other two people by the perpetrators. There were no fatalities.

Around 8 February 2021 (as reported), in the area of Banco de Arenas corregimiento, Cucuta, Norte de Santander, two moto-taxi drivers were shot dead and their bodies were found on a road in Puerto Leon vereda. On 8 February 2021, in Cacayal vereda, Lejanias, Meta, the owner of a local business was killed in a drive-by shooting perpetrated by unidentified men on a motorcycle. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 8 February 2021 (as reported), in Buenaventura municipality, Valle del Cauca, a man an a woman were killed and their bodies were found in a mass grave in the rural area. On 7 February 2021, in Cartagena, Bolivar department, police forces opened fire against a group of civilians in the Le Estrella neighborhood. Around 7 February 2021 (month of), in Huisito corregimiento, El Tambo, Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds in an advanced state of decomposition. source: El Espectador; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; Vanguardia Liberal; El Colombiano

On 6 February 2021, in Buenaventura (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals shot at a group of people in the Pueblo Nuevo neighborhood. One man was killed and three more people were injured. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 5 February 2021 (month of), in Lopez municipality, Cauca, two people were shot dead and their bodies were found in an advanced state of decomposition floating on a river near vereda Agua Clara. On 3 February 2021, in the rural area of Caceres municipality, Antioquia department, suspected members of Los Caparros killed a local miner. The incident led to the displacement of more than 150 families from the Rio Man vereda.

On 3 February 2021, in Tierralta, Cordoba department, unidentified armed individuals raided the house of a social leader and member of a farmers' organization. The men opened fire several times against the building. The victim was not in the residence at the moment of the attack. No fatalities or injuries reported.

Around 3 February 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Betania municipality (Antioquia), a teenage girl was killed and her body was found with several gunshot wounds in a coffee farm in Palenque vereda. Initial investigations revealed that the woman was distributing drugs to the farmers. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality. [women targeted: girls]

On 3 February 2021, in Caucasia municipality, Antioquia, a man was shot dead by unidentified men between veredas El Tigre 2 and 3. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 3 February 2021 (as reported), in El Canon vereda, Miranda, Cauca, a man was shot dead and his body was found. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 2 February 2021, in the rural area of Curbarado, Choco department, suspected members of the Gulf Clan physically assulted a farmer and member of the Jiguamiando community. The victim was injured due to the attack.

On 2 February 2021, in the rural area of Herveo municipality, Tolima department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a social leader and former councilman in the Las Damas vereda. No further information on the incident was provided. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Farmers (Colombia); MP: Patriotic March
notes: On 2 February 2021, Corinto municipality, Cauca department, a social leader was abducted and subsequently killed by unidentified armed individuals in the rural area. The victim and his father were intercepted by the armed men on a rural road, his relative was released, while the body of the leader was found hours later with several shots near El Descanso vereda. The victim was member of a local JAC, the political movement MP, and a farmers' organizations. 1 fatality.

source: El Colombiano; UNOCHA; Alerta Paisa; INDEPAZ
notes: On 2 February 2021, in Taraza municipality, Antioquia department, members of Los Caparros killed three workers at a local mine in Tamaco vereda. The victims were two workers and the mine manager. According to the report, the attack is related to extortions. 3 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Farmers (Colombia)
notes: Around 2 February 2021 (as reported), in Taraza municipality, Antioquia department, unidentified armed individuals dragged a communal leader out of his house in the rural area and shot him dead near the river in the La Primavera vereda. The victim was a member of the JAC and a farmer activist for the program of substitution of illegal crops. There is a presence of Gulf Clan, Los Caparros and other armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 2 February 2021, in Totoro municipality, Cauca department, unidentified armed individuals opened fire against a councilman who is also indigenous leader in a drive-by shooting in the rural area. The victim hid in the bushes to avoid the attack. No fatalities or injuries occurred.

On 1 February 2021, in the rural area of Convencion municipality, Norte de Santander department, unidentified armed individuals abducted a woman in a private house in the Culebritas vereda. Perpetrators forced the victim into a vehicle and subsequently drove in away from the area. The woman was released on 4 February to a humanitarian mission from an NGO. No fatalities or injuries reported. There is presense of several rebel groups in the Catatumbo region

On 1 February 2021, in Yali, Antioquia department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a former mayor and political activist in a drive-by shooting in the Paraiso neighbourhood. The victim had been the target of two attacks in the past. 1 fatality.

On 1 February 2021, in San Luis municipality, Antioquia, a man and his son were shot dead by unidentified men while driving a motorcycle in the rural area. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

Around 1 February 2021 (as reported), in Caloto municipality, Cauca, a man was shot dead and his body was found in the rural area. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 31 January 2021, in El Plateado corregimiento, Argelia municipality, Cauca department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a former FARC combatant in the La Emboscada vereda. Perpetrators opened fire against the victim when the latter was returning to his house. There is a presence of FARC dissident groups and ELN members in the area. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: On 31 January 2021, in Caloto municipality, Cauca department, members of the Dagoberto Ramos FARC dissident Faction abducted a former councilman in the Huellas area. The victim was released on 9 February 2021 by a delegation of an international NGO.

On 31 January 2021, in Ituango, Antioquia, several armed men shot and killed a civilian. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 31 January 2021, in Puerto Gaitan, Meta, unidentified armed men killed a man in a drive-by shooting. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 31 January 2021, in La Llanada, Narino, unidentified armed men entered a house and killed a couple. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: Around 30 January 2021, in the rural area of San Agustin municipality, Huila department, unidentified armed individuals killed a social leader and member of the JAC in Los Andes vereda. Perpetrators raided into the house of the victim and opened fire against him. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
source: La Patria; UNOCHA; El Espectador; El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: Around 30 January 2021 (as reported), in Paez municipality [coded to Belalcazar], Cauca department, two citizens were abducted by unidentified armed individuals near Belalcazar corregimiento. The victims were in the area carrying a marketing study about fruit consumption and are citizens of Colombia- Canadian and Colombia-Italian nationality, respectively. A second source claimed the victims were tourists. Authorities suspect the FARC Dissident Faction Dagoberto Ramos is responsible for the abduction. Their whereabouts are unknown.

source: Vanguardia Liberal; INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; El Colombiano
notes: Around 30 January 2021 (as reported), in Roberto Payan, Narino department, unidentified armed individuals opened fire against a group of civilians inside a car in an illegal checkpoint, killing five people. Perpetrators hid the bodies in three different areas in the Fatima vereda. There is presence of several armed groups in the Narino department. 5 fatalities.

On 30 January 2021, in Valparaiso, Caqueta, health care workers were attacked. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. Casualties unknown.

On 30 January 2021, in Santander de Quilichao municipality, Cauca, armed men wearing military attire killed two men in the El Palmar vereda. The victims were related to the governor's wife. 2 fatalities.

On 30 January 2021, in Vistahermosa, Meta, a farmer was killed inside his house. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 29 January 2021, in the rural area of Las Flores corregimiento, Dibulla municipality, La Guajira department, unidentified armed individuals killed a farmer, and his body was found. Perpetrators dragged the victim out of his residence, subsequently shooting at him 500 meters away from his house. The body had gun and machete injuries. 1 fatality.

source: La Opinion (Colombia); El Universal (Colombia); El Espectador
notes: On 29 January 2021, in the rural area of Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander department, 17 armed individuals who identified themselves as Gulf Clan members opened fire against a group of farmers in Totumito-Carboneras hamlet. According to local witnesses, one of the victims is a Venezuelan national. No fatalities were reported, but at least 400 people fled the area following the event.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 29 January 2021 (as reported), in Yarumal municipality, Antioquia, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a social leader and member of the JAC of the Ochali corregimiento. Perpetrators shot at the victim several times and decapitated him. The group threw the head in the middle of the town's square. 1 fatality.

source: El Colombiano; INDEPAZ; Vanguardia Liberal; El Universal (Colombia)
notes: Around 29 January 2021 (as reported), in Policarpa municipality, Narino, the bodies of four civilians were found on the road that connects the town with El Ejido corregimiento. The victims' vehicle was found down a cliff, which made authorities believe it was a car accident. Further investigations showed the victims were shot several times. The driver had his limps tighten up, two of the victims were shot in the head, and another one had six gun impacts. One of the victims was a farmer. 4 fatalities.

On 29 January 2021, in Ituango, Antioquia, a man was shot and killed in a hitman attack. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 29 January 2021, in La Concha corregimiento, Antioquia, a man was shot and killed in the Puerto Nuevo sector. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 29 January 2021 (as reported), in Medellin, Antioquia, two people were killed in different locations of the city. The first one was killed with a cold weapon and found dead in the Bellen de Medellin neighborhood. The second case, armed men killed the victim in a drive-by shooting in Centro Oriente. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

Around 29 January 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Narino municipality, Antioquia, a man was killed and his body was found in the El Bosque vereda. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 29 January 2021, in the rural area of Suarez, Cauca, armed men shot and killed a man the Las Minas sector. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 29 January 2021, in Jamundi municipality, Valle del Cauca, four unidentified armed men killed two men in a drive-by shooting in the Villa Paz corregimiento. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

Around 29 January 2021 (as reported), in Jamundi municipality, Valle del Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found in the rural area. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 28 January 2021, in the rural area of Andes municipality, Antioquia, three people were shot and killed in the Quebrada Arriba vereda. Two of the victims were killed by armed men. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 3 fatalities.

On 28 January 2021, in El Tambo municipality, Cauca, a farmer was shot and injured in the Monte Oscuro vereda. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department.

On 27 January 2021, in Rincon Hondo, Chimichagua municipality, Cesar department, an unidentified armed individual shot dead a former councilman. The perpetrator then ran away and a person on a motorcycle picked him up minutes after the attack. 1 fatality.

On 27 January 2021, in Taraza, Antioquia, armed men entered a civilian house in the El Turista de Taraza neighbourhood and killed the sister-in-law of the city's secretary of government and former city mayor. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality. [women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons]

On 27 January 2021, in Villavicencio, Meta, a man was shot and killed in the La Reliquia neighborhood. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 26 January 2021 (as reported), near El Doce, Antioquia, unidentified armed individuals abducted two civilians from a bus. Perpetrators stopped the vehicle and forced the victims out of the car. The victims were fleeing the area due to increasing clashes between the Los Caparros and the Gulf Clan. Their whereabouts are still unknown.
On 26 January 2021, in the rural area of Curillo municipality, Caqueta, armed men that identified themselves as FARC dissidents shot and killed a man. 1 fatality.

On 26 January 2021, in Patia municipality, Cauca, a person was shot and killed in the La Palma vereda. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 25 January 2021, in El Carmen de Bolivar municipality, Bolivar department, a livestock farmer was abducted and killed and his burnt body was found. The victim disappeared as he visited a plot of land in the rural area of the municipality. There is a presence of several armed organizations in the Montes de Maria sub-region.

Around 25 January 2021 (as reported), in Timba corregimiento, Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds in the Palmichal vereda. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 25 January 2021, in Lejanias, Meta, two men were killed and notes were found next to their bodies between the veredas Cafetales and Guarumal. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

Around 24 January 2021, in Puerto Caldas corregimiento, Pereira municipality, Risaralda department, unidentified armed individuals threw a grenade against the brother of a social leader killed in the previous week. The victim, who is an internally displaced person, survived the attack. No fatalities reported.

On 24 January 2021, near Palmor corregimiento, Cienaga municipality, Magdalena department, unidentified armed individuals raided a meeting of a Kogui indigenous community in the Palestina vereda. Perpetrators asked for the location of a community leader. Subsequently, after receiving no answers, the men battered members of the group. No fatalities or injuries reported.

On 24 January 2021, in the rural area of Turbaco municipality, Bolivar department, unidentified armed individuals wearing black hoods opened fire against a group of civilians who were recreationally fishing in the Los Volcanes village. One of the victims died due to the injuries. There is a presence of several armed groups in the Bolivar department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Mobile Column: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Adan Izquierdo)
source: UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; El Colombiano; El Universal (Colombia); El Pais (Colombia)
notes: On 24 January 2021, near Chambimbal - La Campina corregimiento (Valle del Cauca), four members of the FARC Dissident group Adan Izquierdo Front shot dead five people in a private summer home in Cerro Rico vereda. Perpetrators raided the place where the group was celebrating. Five people were killed and two more were injured. Two perpetrators of the attack were arrested on 22 July 2022. 5 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia)
notes: On 24 January 2021, in Tumaco, Narino, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a former FARC member, who is also an Afro-Colombian man, in the Panama neighborhood. Another person died in the attack and a third was injured. 2 fatalities.

On 24 January 2021, in Corinto, Cauca, a person was shot and killed near the La Paila River. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 24 January 2021, in Lopez vereda, rural area of Toribio municipality, Cauca department, a person was shot by a rifle and killed in the Tacueyo reservation. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 23 January 2021, in the rural area of Puerto Santander municipality, Norte de Santander department, a resident was killed and his body was found. The victim was shot 12 times. A letter found near the body stated that the victim was killed for commiting robberies. There is a presence of several armed groups such as ELN and Rastrojos in the Catatumbo sub-region. 1 fatality

Around 23 January 2021, in the rural area of Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander department, a resident was killed and his body was found with four gunshot injuries in Beltrania vereda. A letter found near the body stated that the victim was killed for commiting robberies. There is a presence of several armed groups in the Catatumbo sub-region. 1 fatality

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 23 January 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of San Andres de Cuerquia municipality, Antioquia, unidentified armed individuals abducted a former FARC combatant. Subsequently, his body was found. The victim was driving his motorcycle when the perpetrators forced him to stop and then put him inside a pick-up truck. 1 fatality.

On 23 January 2021, in Santiago de Cali, Valle del Cauca, unidentified armed individuals killed a social leader in a drive-by shooting. Perpetrators on a motorcycle arrived where the victim was with family and friends and shot him six times. The victim was a young social leader whose work focused on providing legal work for residents of the Los Chorros neighborhood. 1 fatality.

Around 23 January 2021 (as reported), in San Joaquin corregimiento, Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found with several gunshot wounds in the Loma Alta vereda. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 23 January 2021, in San Martin, Meta, a farmer was shot and killed. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
Around 23 January 2021 (between 8 January - 14 February), in Caracol vereda, Sucre, a man was kidnapped and killed by unidentified men. His body was found buried on the February 14th. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Embera Indigenous Group (Colombia); Government of Colombia (2018-2022); Guardia Indigena (Colombia); Teachers (Colombia)
notes: On 22 January 2021, in Bellavista, Choco, Gulf Clan (AGC) members detained 16 people, including the governor, indigenous guards, Embera indigenous people, and teachers. The group seized food from the victims' houses, claiming the food was used as supplies to ELN.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 22 January 2021, in San Jose del Guaviare, Guaviare, military forces assaulted a former FARC combatant and a social leader, who were both injured.

On 22 January 2021, in Teorama municipality, Norte de Santander, armed men shot against the former mayor of Teorama after he refused to stop at an illegal checkpoint in the Llano Grande vereda. He was not injured. Several armed groups operate in this department.

On 21 January 2021, in El Tarra municipality, Norte de Santander department, unidentified armed individuals abducted a social leader and teacher. The victim had police protection, but the officers were off-duty when the abduction took place. On 24 May 2021, relatives reported that victim was released by the perpetrators. There is a presence of Los Caparros, ELN, Gul Clan, and other armed groups in the Catatumbo sub-region.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Women (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: Around 21 January 2021, in Dosquebradas, Risaralda department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a woman social leader and human rights advocate, in Bombay 3 neighbourhood. The victim was an active member of the National confederation of Council of Communal Action (JAC). 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Around 21 January 2021 (as reported), in San Vicente Del Caguan municipality, Caqueta, a person was killed and their body was found with a note claiming the victim was a robber in Las Americas vereda. Jorge Briseno FARC front of dissidents operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 21 January 2021 (month of), in the rural area of Argelia municipality, Cauca, two people were killed and their bodies were found. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

On 20 January 2021, in Puerto Caldas corregimiento, Pereira municipality, Risaralda department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a social leader. The victim was an advocate for victims of the Colombian conflict, as he was an IDP himself. Over the past month, the victim reported that police took away his security guards despite having several death threats. 1 fatality.

On 20 January 2021, in Barrancabermeja municipality, Santander department, two unidentified armed individuals opened fire against an environmental leader. The perpetrators attacked the woman when she was in front of her private residence. No fatalities or injuries reported. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]
Around 20 January 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Patia municipality, Cauca, a farmer was tortured and killed. The motivation of the attack and perpetrators are unknown. 1 fatality.
On 20 January 2021, in Bojaya, Choco, ELN members abducted a teenager in Santa Lucia de Pogue community. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

source: UNOCHA; El Heraldo (Colombia); INDEPAZ; El Colombiano
notes: On 19 January 2021, in Guarumo sector, Antioquia, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a female social leader and active member of a farmers' organization. The victim carried out several political activities in the rural communities of the municipality. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]
On 19 January 2021, in Providencia, Narino, ELN members attacked residents of the area, firing several shots and damaging schools and houses in the city. No fatalities or injuries occurred.

On 18 January 2021, in San Juan Del Cesar, La Guajira department, unidentified armed individuals opened fire against a group of members of the political party Citizen Force in a drive-by shooting. No fatalities or injuries reported.

On 18 January 2021, in Palmor town, Cienaga municipality, Bolivar department, five unidentified armed individuals broke into the house of a social activist in the Sierra Morena village. Perpetrators choked the victim and told her to flee the area if she did not want to die. The victim is an activist and advocate for the peace process of 2016. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 18 January 2021, in Ciudad Bolivar municipality, Bolivar, four unidentified individuals entered a farmer's house, took him, and shot him three times in Angostura vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 18 January 2021, in Corinto, Cauca, hooded unidentified armed individuals killed a woman in a drive-by shooting in the La Paz neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 18 January 2021 (as reported), in El Tambo municipality, Cauca, a farmer was killed and his body was found in Baraya vereda. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 18 January 2021, in Villavicencio, Meta, unidentified armed men shot and killed a man in Los Libertadores sector. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz; UNOCHA
notes: On 17 January 2021, near the Alto Guayabal village, Choco, eight members of the Gulf Clan abducted an Embera indigenous leader. Perpetrators tortured the victim by covering his head with a plastic bag, accusing him of being an ELN member. Hours later, perpetrators released him.

On 17 January 2021, in Popayan, Cauca, an unidentified armed individual opened fire against a group of people who had gathered in a soccer field in the Recuerdo neighborhood. Three people were killed. There is a presence of several FARC dissident factions and other armed groups in this area. 3 fatalities.

On 17 January 2021, in Argelia municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals shot against a group of people in Campo Bello vereda. Two people were killed and another one was injured. 2 fatalities.
On 17 January 2021, in Argelia, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals killed a farmer in La Belleza sector. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 16 January 2021, near Banco De Arenas town, Norte de Santander, two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle killed a social leader in a drive-by shooting in the La Punta village. The victim had reported several times the presence of armed groups in the area. Days after the attack, the ELN drew graffiti in all houses of the village, but it is unclear whether the group was responsible for the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 16 January 2021 (month of), in Timbiqui, Cauca, a person was killed and their body was found in an advanced state of decomposition on the Tutelar River. There is no information on the perpetrator of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Colombia (2018-2022); PLC: Colombian Liberal Party; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 15 January 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of El Plateado municipality, Cauca department, members of the ELN abducted and killed a social leader and councilman for the Liberal Party. Perpetrators forced the victim into a vehicle. Subsequently, the community found his body in the rural area of the municipality. He was investigating the clashes between ELN and FARC dissidents. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 15 January 2021, in Yondo municipality, Antioquia department, unidentified armed individuals killed a social leader and the president of the local JAC in Cano Bonito vereda. The victim was an activist for the program for the substitution of illegal crops. There is a presence of several armed groups in this area. 1 fatality

Around 15 January 2021 (month of), in Bello, Antioquia, a person was killed and their body was found in advanced state of decomposition on La Garcia dam. There is no information on the perpetrator of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 15 January 2021 (as reported), in Tulua, Valle del Cauca, a man was killed and his head was found in the city center. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack nor on the identity of the victim. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: El Heraldo (Colombia); Blu Radio; INDEPAZ; UNOCHA
notes: On 15 January 2021, in La Apartada municipality (Cordoba), Gulf Clan members shot dead an Afro-Colombian social leader of the San Basilio de Palenque area in a drive-by shooting in Puente San Jorge corregimiento. The victim was visiting the region as part of his work as a social activist. 1 fatality.

On 14 January 2021, in Titiribi, Antioquia, unidentified armed men on a motorcycle killed two people in a drive-by shooting after they shot against a car with four passengers. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

On 14 January 2021, in the rural area of Santander de Quilichao municipality, Cauca, two people were killed in an attack in Ardovela farm. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

Around 14 January 2021 (as reported), in Guachinte, Valle del Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found in a cane field. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 13 January 2021, in Barranco De Loba, Bolivar department, six unidentified armed individuals on three motorcycles opened fire against a store in the middle of the town in a drive-by shooting. Two people were killed and two more injured. The victims had recently moved to the municipality. There is a presence of ELN members in the area, but their responsibility for the attack is not yet confirmed. 2 fatalities.

On 13 January 2021, in Puerto Belgica corregimiento, Antioquia, Los Caparros members kidnapped a minor in an attempt to recruit them for the organization. Military forces found him uninjured on June 2th in the rural area of Caucasia municipality.

On 12 January 2021, in Barbacoas municipaliy, Narino department, ELN members attacked Afro-Colombian residents of the El Cocal village. At least 256 people were internally displaced due to the attack. No fatalities were reported by the sources.

source: UNOCHA; El Colombiano; Vanguardia Liberal; El Universal (Colombia)
notes: On 12 January 2021, in Mosquera municipality, Narino department, unidentified armed individuals abducted a group of 11 farmers who were working in the La Pampa vereda. The victims are mostly residents from nearby towns such as Buchelli and Llorente, in Tumaco municipality, but carried out daily labors in the area. Two of the victims were later found dead and another one claimed to have escaped the captors. The whereabouts of the other victims remained unknown. 2 fatalities.
On 12 January 2021, in Belalcazar municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a farmer in Risaralda vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 12 January 2021, in El Jagual vereda, Cauca, unidentified armed individuals killed a farmer. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 12 January 2021, in Guapi, Cauca, a girl was killed and her body was found with signs of torture and sexual violence. She went missing in the Santa Monica neighborhood and was found near the residence she lived in. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality. [women targeted: girls]

On 12 January 2021, in Santiago de Cali - Comuna 10, Valle del Cauca, armed men arrived at Santa Elena gallery and shot against a group of people, killing three people. Several armed groups operate in this department. 3 fatalities.

Around 11 January 2021 (as reported), in the rural area of Jardin municipality, Antioquia department, two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle killed a coffee farmer and social leader in a drive-by shooting. The victim had an active role organizing social projects with other members of the community. 1 fatality.

On 10 January 2021, in the rural area of Macayepos, Carmen del Bolivar municipality, Bolivar department, a worker of a local farm was shot dead by unidentified armed individuals. The plot of land belongs to a prominent social leader from the area. The victim, who had lived in the region for four months, was shot several time in the head. 1 fatality.

Around 10 January 2021, near Caceres municipality, Antioquia department, unidentified armed individuals abducted and killed a farmer and a social leader. Both were kidnapped from a private house. Subsequently, one of the victim's remains were found in the Cauca River. The other disappeared but he is considered dead. 2 fatalities.

source: UNOCHA; El Universal (Colombia); La Patria; Vanguardia Liberal
notes: On 10 January 2021, in the rural area of Florencia municipality, Caqueta, unidentified armed individuals raided into a cockfight ring in the Mochilero community and fired shots against civilians. Four people were killed and seven others were injured. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 4 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: CR: Radical Change; Former Government of Colombia (2018-2022)
notes: On 10 January 2021, in Guadalajara de Buga municipality, Valle del Cauca, unidentified armed individuals killed a former councilman for CR party and social leader in Cerro Rico vereda. Perpetrators broke into his private house of the victim and opened fire against him. The victim's brother was injured in the attack and taken to hospital. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 10 January 2021, in Caldono, Cauca, unidentified armed men on a motorcycle carried out a drive-by shooting against a group of people, killing one indigenous man. The Indigenous Guard had reported a previous attack in the same city by armed men. 1 fatality.
On 10 January 2021, in San Martin, Meta, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a man near a night establishment. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 10 January 2021, in Guayabal vereda, Valle del Cauca, unidentified individuals killed a government employee. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 9 January 2021, in Ituango municipality, Antioquia, the JAC president of the Los Cuatro vereda was kidnapped. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several groups operate in this department.
On 9 January 2021, in Bolivar municipality, Cauca, a truck driver was shot and killed by an armed man in Los Rastrojos corregimiento. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

source: INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; El Colombiano; El Nuevo Dia (Colombia); El Universal (Colombia)
notes: Around 8 January 2021 (as reported), in Sevilla municipality, Valle Del Cauca, a social leader and environmental activist was killed and his body was found in La Union vereda. The victim worked for a local organization that protects birds and their eco-systems. His remains were found on 11 January 2021 in the La Union area. 1 fatality.

On 8 January 2021, in Puerto Gaitan, Meta, an unidentified individual shot and killed a man. The victim was taken to hospital but could not survive the injuries. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 7 January 2021, near Montelibano municipality, Cordoba department, unidentified armed individuals raided a private house in the San Isidro neighborhood and abducted a woman. The victim was the daughter of a councilman of Montelibano. Her body was found with several bullet wounds on a rural road of the same municipality. 1 fatality. [women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons]

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 7 January 2021, in Santiago de Cali - Comuna 18 (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed individuals killed a former FARC member in the Alto de Los Chorros neighborhood. Perpetrators shot at the victim several times. He had been previously threatened and had to escape from Caloto due to intimidation actions. 1 fatality.
On 6 January 2021, in Santander de Quilichao, Cauca, two unidentified armed men shot and killed a man while he was entering a house. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 5 January 2021, in the rural area of San Pablo municipality, Bolivar department, four armed individuals that identified themselves as ELN members killed two brothers in the area Y. In a public statement, the ELN denied any connection with the attack. No further details about the motive for the killing were reported. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
source: Vanguardia Liberal; El Tiempo (Colombia); El Pais (Colombia); UNOCHA
notes: On 5 January 2021, in the rural area of Guachene municipality, Cauca department, FARC dissidents abducted a teacher and members of the local teachers' union. The victim was driving in the area of El Silencio when armed men forced the vehicle to stop. Subsequently, the perpetrators forced the victim into a different car and drove away. The victim was released on 8 January 2021 in the rural area of Corinto, Cauca department.

Around 5 January 2021 (month of), in Barbosa municipality, Antioquia, three people were killed and their bodies were found on Medellin River, in La Primavera, Molino Viejo, and las Lajas veredas. Two of the bodies were in advanced stage of decomposition. Several armed groups operate in this department. 3 fatalities.
On 5 January 2021, in Rio Man vereda, Antioquia, unidentified armed men shot against two men. One of them died. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 4 January 2021 (as reported), in Argelia municipality, Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds in Santa Clara vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 4 January 2021, in Santa Cruz vereda, Cauca, a farmer was killed by unidentified armed men. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 4 January 2021, in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, unidentified armed men kidnapped and killed a an off-duty military officer in the Area Libre vereda. 1 fatality.

Around 4 January 2021 (as reported), in Buga (coded to Guadalajara de Buga) ,Valle del Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found with several gunshot wounds inside a house in the La Revolucion neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 3 January 2021, in Angostura municipality, Antioquia, two men were killed with several shots in Tenche Algodon vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 3 January 2021, in San Vicente Del Caguan, Caqueta, FARC dissidents kidnapped a civilian. Hours later, military forces found the victim and retrieved the vehicle used by the perpetrators. Dissidents asked for COP 50 million to return the vehicle.

Around 3 January 2021 (as reported), in Tumaco, Narino, two women were killed and their bodies were found in two different locations in the city. The first victim was a Venezuelan sex worker and was found in El Manglar area. The second victim was found dead insider her house. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Teachers (Colombia); FECODE: Colombian Federation of Education Workers
notes: Around 2 January 2021, in the rural area of Yopal municipality, Casanare department, a teacher was killed and his body was found. The remains of the victim had several knife injuries. The teacher was a member of the teachers' union FECODE. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
source: El Colombiano; UNOCHA; Diario La Libertad; INDEPAZ
notes: On 2 January 2021, in Cartagena Del Chaira, Caqueta, an unidentified armed individual killed a former FARC member in the Antioquia neighborhood. The victim was shot dead while leaving from a local store. 1 fatality.
