On 1 January 2021, in Ibague, Tolima department, police forces opened fire against a civilian while carrying and identity control on the streets. The police version claimed the victim was violent against the officer. The victim died in the event. There is not indication in reports that he was armed. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Women (Colombia)
notes: On 1 January 2021, in Briceno municipality, Antioquia department, an unidentified armed individual shot dead a female former FARC dissident and her sister in the Travesias area. The victim was a member of the reincorporation space ETCR La Plance. 2 fatalities.

On 1 January 2021, in La Caucana corregimiento, Antioquia, a woman was taken from her house by unidentified armed men and killed outside the corregimiento. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 1 January 2021, in Tumaco, Narino, one person was killed and another was injured in two different attacks in the Comuna Dos and Union Victoria neighborhoods. In the second case, an unidentified individual shot against the victim outside his house and the man was taken to hospital. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 31 December 2020, in the rural area of Cucuta municipality, Norte de Santander, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a former ELN member. Perpetrators shot at least four times at the victim near his house. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 31 December 2020, in Arauca (Arauca), two men were shot and killed by an unidentified armed individual in the Los Libertadores neighborhood. The perpetrator fled crossing the border with Venezuela. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

Around 31 December 2020 (as reported), in El Plateado corregimiento, Argelia, Cauca, a farmer was shot dead and his body was found. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 30 December 2020, in Los Patios, Norte de Santander department, a director of a local school and social leader was killed and her body was found at her private house. The victim was stabbed several times. The son of the victim was reported injured. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 30 December 2020, in Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca, unidentified armed individuals killed six residents and injured one more while patrolling the town on a motorcycle. The men drove around the town for several hours killing their victims. In Buenaventura there is territorial disputes involving several armed groups, including La Empresa, La Banda Local, the Gulf Clan, ELN, and the Gente del Orden gang. 6 fatalities.

On 30 December 2020, in Popayan, Cauca department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a farmer and members of the Argelia's Farmer Association. Perpetrators intercepted the victim in La Ladera area. The victim had reported previous death threats by the FARC dissident Faction Carlos Patino. 1 fatality.

On 30 December 2020, in Yolombo municipality, Antioquia, unidentified men intercepted and shot at an ambulance on the road to Cisneros. A nurse was killed and the driver was injured. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 30 December 2020 (month of), in Puerto Rico municipality, Meta, a farmer was killed and his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition in La Reforma vereda. The victim was known for his participation in pacific demonstrations regarding farmers' rights. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 December 2020, in Villavicencio, Meta, two men were shot by two unidentified armed men in Vainilla neighbourhood. The victims survived the attack severely injured. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department.

Around 30 December 2020 (as reported), in Tres Esquinas corregimiento, Tulua, Valle del Cauca, an underage man was shot dead and his body was found. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Oliver Sinisterra Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Oliver Sinisterra Front)
notes: Around 29 December 2020, on the road that connects Llorente and Pasto, Narino department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a social leader. Perpetrators forced the victim off a taxi and then shot at him. Further version claimed videos of the victim being tortured by the group have been sent to residents, but this version is still being investigated. Sources suspected the Oliver Sinisterra FARC faction perpetrated the attack. 1 fatality.

On 29 December 2020, in Caloto municipality, Cauca, an indigenous leader and member of the Nasa community and Huellas indigenous reserve was attacked in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men in El Limonar vereda. The victim, who was inside his house when the attackers shot at his property, survived the attack with no injuries. Motives of the attack are unknown.

Around 29 December 2020 (as reported), in El Tambo municipality, Cauca, a farmer was killed by unidentified men in San Juan del Micay corregimiento. The attack follows the killing of two farmers a day ago in the same location by FARC dissidents. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 December 2020, in Suarez, Cauca, three people, including an underage woman, were shot by two unidentified men in front of a house. A man was killed and two more people were injured. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 29 December 2020 (as reported), in Tierralta municipality, Cordoba, an indigenous man who lived in the Caracarado indigenous community was killed and his body was found in the rural area. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 December 2020, in Villavicencio, Meta, a man was shot dead by unidentified men in Guayabal neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
notes: Around 28 December 2020 (as reported), El Tambo municipality, Cauca, two farmers were killed by members of Carlos Patino dissident FARC front in San Juan del Micay corregimiento. One of the victims was shot dead after the armed group stopped him in an illegal check point and the other was killed during an incursion of the group to the community. 2 fatalities.
Around 27 December 2020, in Tumaco, Narino department, an Afro-Colombian social leader was killed and his body was found. Circumstances of death were not reported. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
source: INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; El Colombiano; Vanguardia Liberal
notes: Around 27 December 2020 (as reported), in Miranda municipality, Cauca department, a former FARC member was killed and his body was found in the rural area. The victim, who was a member of the reintegration area ETCR-Monte Redondo, was naked and with several signs of torture in his body, including a broken skull. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Women (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: El Colombiano; Vanguardia Liberal; INDEPAZ; UNOCHA
notes: Around 26 December 2020 (as reported), in Montecristo municipality, Bolivar department, five members of a family were killed and their bodies were found in the Quebrada Honda area. One of the victims was a woman former FARC member from the reintegration area ETCR-Juan Carlos Castaneda. The victim was a co-founder of a social organization in the area. Authorities reported the ELN is the main suspect to perpetrate the attack. 5 fatalities. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 26 December 2020, in Toribio, Cauca department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a Nasa indigenous man and member of Tacueyo indigenous reserve in a drive-by shooting. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 December 2020, in Uribe municipality, Meta department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a social leader on the road to Mesetas. The victim reported cases of land grabbing and deforestation and had requested police protection in the months previous to the attack. 1 fatality.

On 25 December 2020, in Caucasia, Antioquia, two people were shot in Villa Arabia 2 neighbourhood. One of the victims was killed and the other was injured. Information on the attackers is unknown. The department is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 25 December 2020, in Santander de Quilichao municipality, Cauca, two Venezuelan people were shot dead and their bodies were found on a road in Guabos vereda. The authorities rule out that the motives are related to robbery, since the victims had all their belongings on them. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 25 December 2020, in Puerto Gaitan municipality, Meta, a man was shot dead in Alto del Yucao rural area. According to the source, the victim was driving with two of his friends when he was attacked by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 24 December 2020, in Santa Marta, Magdalena department, a police officer shot six times at an unarmed civilian during a street fight. Police reports claimed the victim slapped the officer on the face, to which the official responded by opening fire. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Colombia (2018-2022); PCC: Colombian Conservative Party
notes: On 24 December 2020, in Carrillo corregimiento, San Pelayo, Cordoba department, unidentified armed individuals killed a councilman affiliated to the Conservative party in a drive-by shooting in the rural area. Perpetrators shot dead the victim while the latter was having lunch in a restaurant. 1 fatality.

Around 24 December 2020 (as reported), in El Plateado corregimiento, Argelia, Cauca, a man was killed and his body was thrown to Micay river. The source reported that the victim's relatives are still looking for the body which was carried by the river. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 24 December 2020, in El Tambo, Cauca, a farmer was shot dead in a recreational centre. The victim was previously attacked by unidentified men in the same place. Motives are unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
On 24 December 2020, in Santa Marta, Magdalena, two men and a woman were shot dead by an unidentified man in Las Cruces area. Motives of the attack are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 24 December 2020, in the rural area of Guadalajara de Buga, Buga, Valle del Cauca, two men were attacked in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men in La Guira area. One of the victims was killed and the other was injured in the attack. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 23 December 2020, in the rural area of Guayacana, Tumaco municipality, Narino department, unidentified armed individuals abducted from his house a social leader of the Awa indigenous community that worked with victims of the Colombian conflict. His body was found days later near the place of the abduction. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
source: La Opinion (Colombia); El Espectador; Vanguardia Liberal
notes: Around 23 December 2020, in the rural area of Neiva, Tolima department, three people were killed and their bodies were found in the area of Chapinero. Among the victims, there is a former FARC member. 3 fatalities.

Around 23 December 2020 (as reported), in Pueblorrico municipality, Antioquia, two men were killed and their bodies were found in Corinto B vereda. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

On 23 December 2020, in Bodega Central corregimiento, Morales, Bolivar, a social leader's son was kidnapped by unidentified men. The victim was found and rescued the same day by members of the community in Los Playones de la Isla area.

On 22 December 2020, in Buenaventura municipality, Valle del Cauca, three fishermen were kidnapped for several hours by unidentified men while they were fishing between Juan Chaco and Ladrilleros area. The victims were rescued by the authorities the same day. No fatalities or injuries occurred.

On 21 December 2020, in Santiago De Cali, Valle Del Cauca department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a journalist and injured another person in a drive-by shooting. The victim had previous threats due to his work as a journalist. The victim died in the hospital two days later after the attack. 1 fatality.
On 21 December 2020, in Bolivar municipality, Cauca, a farmer was shot dead by unidentified men in Mata de Puro vereda. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 21 December 2020 (as reported), in Los Llanos vereda, Mercaderes, Cauca, two men, one of them was Venezuelan, were killed and their bodies were found by the authorities on a rural road. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 21 December 2020, in Villavicencio, Meta, a man was shot by unidentified men. The victim survived the attack with injuries in his head and in one of his legs. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the department.

On 20 December 2020, in Sabanalarga municipality, Antioquia, a farmer was kidnapped and killed by unidentified men in Llano del Oro vereda. The victim had been previously displaced from his home due to armed conflicts. Information on the attackers is unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 20 December 2020 (as reported), in Segovia municipality, Antioquia, a woman was killed and her body was found in Matuna vereda. The victim had several injuries in her head and arms. Motives of the attack are unknown. The department is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 20 December 2020, in Balboa, Cauca, a man was shot dead by unidentified men in his house in Bella Vista neighbourhood . The victim was the husband of a councilwoman who, according to the source, was the original target of the attack. According to the authorities, there is presence of the Carlos Patino dissident front of FARC in the area. 1 fatality.

On 20 December 2020, in Tulua, Valle del Cauca, a man was shot dead by an unidentified man in a barber shop in Salesiano neighbourhood. Another person was also injured in the attack. Motives are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 20 December 2020 (month of), in Santiago de Cali, Valle del Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found dismembered in an advanced state of decomposition inside plastic bags in Llano Verde neighbourhood. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Wayuu Indigenous Group (Colombia); Private Security Forces (Colombia)
notes: On 19 December 2020, in Riohacha, La Guajira department, unidentified armed individuals killed a private guard in a drive-by shooting. The victim was a member of the Wayuu indigenous group and was off-duty at the moment of the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 19 December 2020 (as reported), in Altamira corregimiento, Betulia, Antioquia, 12 coffee growers were kidnapped by the Gulf Clan in Las Brisas vereda. The farmers were rescued by the authorities. Three Gulf Clan members were arrested for the abduction.

Around 19 December 2020 (as reported), in La Munda vereda, Miranda, Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found next to Guengue river. According to the source, the victim was kidnapped by unidentified men who latter shot him. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 19 December 2020 (as reported), in Pan de Azucar vereda, Morales, Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found on the road with his hands tied. According to the source, the attackers would be members of an unidentified armed group. Also, the victim was being accused of pretending to be a government official. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; FARC: Common Alternative Revolutionary Force
notes: On 18 December 2020, in Soledad, Atlantico department, unidentified armed individuals opened fire against a former FARC fighter and active member of the FARC political party. The victim was uninjured, but his son remains in critical condition in a local hospital due to the attack.

On 18 December 2020, in the rural area of Banco De Arenas, Norte de Santander department, unidentified armed individuals killed a resident of the area. The victim was dragged off from his private residence by the men that then shot him in the head. Clashes between the ELN and the Rastrojos have been reported over the past days, and authorities suspect one of these groups is connected to the attack. 1 fatality.

On 18 December 2020, in Convencion, Norte de Santander department, unidentified armed individuals abducted a local businessman. Perpetrators searched for the victim at his private residence. The victim was released 30 hours later the news were reported. No further information on perpetrators is known. There is presence of several armed groups in the Catatumbo area, which often abduct civilians to demand ransom.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
source: UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; Vanguardia Liberal; La Patria
notes: On 18 December 2020, in La Macarena municipality, Meta department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a former FARC member. The victim was driving with his motorcycle in La Y de Guayabero vereda when the perpetrators opened fire at least three times. Subsequently, the men set fire to the vehicle of the victim. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 17 December 2020, in San Jose corregimiento, Andes, Antioquia department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead a social leader and member of the JAC of the La Esperanza vereda. Perpetrators attacked the victim when he was at his house. An adult was also injured. 1 fatality.

Around 17 December 2020 (as reported), in Totoro municipality, Cauca department, a farmer was killed by unidentified perpetrators in La Marquesa area. The victim was driving his truck on a road to Inza when the attackers intercepted the vehicle and attacked him. The farmer was recently a target of extortion. Information on the attackers is unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 17 December 2020 (as reported), in Morales municipality, Cauca, a person was killed and the body was found with the hands tied and bullet injuries on a road to La Cordillera area. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 16 December 2020, in Chinchina, Caldas department, unidentified armed individuals shot at the house of a local journalist. The victim had reported several cases of gender-based violence cases in the municipality. No fatalities or injuries reported.

Around 16 December 2020, in Cartagena, Bolivar department, police officers beat up and threatened an American citizen with a gun, during a police approach in the city center. The man, an actor, is an activist of the Black Lives Matter (BLM) movement in the United Stated. Police claimed the victim was aggressive against officers, a version debunked by witnesses. A video of the attack was later posted on the press.

On 16 December 2020, in Santander De Quilichao municipality, Cauca department, unidentified armed individuals killed an Afro-Colombian female leader on the road to Timba corregimiento. The victim was shot dead while driving her motorcycle in the rural area of the municipality. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Around 16 December 2020 (as reported), in Betania municipality, Antioquia, a man was shot dead in Las Animas vereda. Also in this municipality, another man was killed in Travesias vereda. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

On 16 December 2020, in Corinto, Cauca, unidentified men who arrived in a car shot a group of people in La Playa neighbourhood. A man was killed and another was injured in the attack. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 15 December 2020, in the rural area of Lopez de Micay municipality (coded to Lopez), Cauca department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead three civilians in the La Nayita and Agua Clara veredas. The incident resulted in the displacement of at least 76 residents. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 3 fatalities.

actor1: Military Forces of Venezuela (1999-) GNB: Venezuelan National Guard
notes: On 15 December 2020, in the rural area of Villa del Rosario, Norte de Santander department, suspected members of the Venezuelan National Guard abducted a Colombian soldier who was off-duty. The victim was on a bicycle ride with a nephew in the rural area of the municipality when a pick-up truck crossed the border and abducted both victims. The child was released one day later in the official border crossing with Colombia, while the whereabout of the other victim is still unknown.

On 15 December 2020, in Caucasia municipality, Antioquia department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead three farmers that were taking care of private properties located in the area Parcelas La Uribe. Perpetrators arrived in the area by boat through the Cauca River. A message that connects the attack to the Los Caparros gang was found near the bodies. 3 fatalities.

On 15 December 2020, in Itagui municipality, Antioquia, a man was shot dead by several unidentified men in Santa Catalina sector. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 15 December 2020 (month of), in Arauca municipality (Arauca), a person was killed and their body was found in the Brisas del Puente sector. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 15 December 2020, in Saravena, Arauca, a man was shot dead on the street by guerrilla members. The attackers left a message accusing the victim of stealing motorcycles. Information on the exact group associated to the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 15 December 2020 (as reported), in El Tambo municipality, Cauca, ELN members killed three people in the rural area. The group also threatened the community with continuing the attacks during the following days. Due to this threat, around 40 families from Nayita and Agua Clara veredas were forced to leave their home. 3 fatalities.

Around 14 December 2020, in Arauca, Palestina municipality, Caldas department, a member of the LGBT community was killed by unidentified perpetrators. The victim, a transexual woman, was stabbed several times in the thorax. 1 fatality.

On 14 December 2020, in the rural area of the municipality of Tibu, Norte de Santander department, armed men that identified themselves as ELN members abducted a soldier and another member of his family. The victim was off-duty at the moment of the event. The two victims were released hours after.

On 14 December 2020, in Caucasia municipality, Antioquia, a taxi driver was killed in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men on the road to El Bagre. Two other people were also injured in the attack. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 14 December 2020, in Itagui, Antioquia, a man was shot dead by an unidentified man in Las Margaritas neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. The department is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 14 December 2020, in Balboa municipality, Cauca, a man driving a car on the road to Pureto vereda was attacked by unidentified armed men. The victim was killed and the attackers managed to escape. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 13 December 2020, in Cuturu, Caucasia, Antioquia department, a group of nearly 50 armed individuals opened fire in the middle of the town. Perpetrators used military gear, including uniforms. Witnesses claimed the men were members of the Gulf Clan. Four people were reported dead and five more injured. According to the reports, the attack was carried out in retaliation for the death of four Gulf Clan members on the previous days. One of the victims was a gold miner. 4 fatalities.

source: INDEPAZ; El Universal (Colombia); El Espectador; UNOCHA
notes: On 13 December 2020, in Guadualejo vereda, Paez, Cauca department, unidentified armed individuals killed a member of the Nasa indigenous community. The victim was an active member of the Guardia Indigena. There is a presence in this area of FARC dissident groups, ELN, EPL, among others. 1 fatality.

On 13 December 2020, in Maicao, La Guajira department, four people were killed and three more injured in a drive-by shooting perpetrated by two unidentified armed individuals in the Luisa Perez neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. 4 fatalities.

source: UNOCHA; La Patria; INDEPAZ; El Colombiano; El Heraldo (Colombia)
notes: On 13 December 2020, in Maicao municipality, La Guajira department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead four Wayuu indigenous people from the Alakat community. Perpetrators raided the place where the group was celebrating a funeral. Among the victims, there is a social leader of the community. 4 fatalities.

Around 13 December 2020 (between 11 - 16 December), in El Tambo municipality, Cauca, two men were killed and their bodies were found with their hands tied in the rural area of 20 de Julio. The victims were kidnapped on 11 December 2020 by unidentified men. According to the source, the victims were killed when the kidnappers did not receive the money they were asking for. The bodies were found on 16 December. Information on the groups responsible is unknown. There is presence of the ELN and FARC dissident groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 13 December 2020, in Villavicencio, Meta, a man and his son were attacked in Quinta Etapa La Madrid neighbourhood in a drive-by shooting. The man was killed and the child was severely injured and taken to the hospital. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 13 December 2020, in Tulua, Valle del Cauca, a local business man was shot dead by unidentified men. The victim had reported having been victim of extortions months ago. A woman was also injured in the attack. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 13 December 2020, in Venecia corregimiento, Trujillo, Valle del Cauca, three farmers were shot dead in a local business by an unidentified man who broke in. Motives of the attack are unknown. 3 fatalities.

On 12 December 2020, in El Escobal, Norte de Santander department, a group of 15 armed men that identified themselves as members of a Venezuelan guerrilla group broke into the house of a resident to drag him out. The victim was executed with a shot in the head. Subsequently, the perpetrators crossed back to the Venezuelan side of the border. 1 fatality.

On 12 December 2020, in Albania municipality, La Guajira department, a female social leader, and active member in the land restitution process was attacked and injured in a drive-by shooting by two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle in the rural area. The victim has received several threats due to her work with victims of the armed conflict. No fatalities or injuries occurred. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 12 December 2020, in San Pablo, Narino, the director of the municipality's registration office was shot on the street by an unidentified man. The victim, who survived the attack in a critical state, was taken to the city of Pasto to receive medical attention. Motives of the attack are unknown. According to the source, there is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. [women targeted: government officials]

On 11 December 2020, in Puerto Colombia, Atlantico department, a woman was killed in a drive-by shooting by two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle. Authorities linked the attack to the Gulf Clan, as the victim is witnesses in an ongoing case against members of this organization. Her partner was injured. 1 fatality.

On 11 December 2020, in Narino department (coded to San Juan de Pasto), unidentified armed individuals shot at a member of the National Registrar and the National Electoral Council. The victim, who worked in the municipality of San Pablo, Narino, was shot three times, and is in the intensive care unit due to the severity of the injuries.

On 11 December 2020, in Yolombo municipality, Antioquia department, unidentified armed individuals killed a social leader and women's right activist in the rural area of El Atajo. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]
On 11 December 2020, in Taraza, Antioquia, two men were shot and killed in a night club by members of Los Caparros Gang. 2 fatalities.

Around 11 December 2020 (as reported), in Puerto Tejada municipality, Cauca, a Venezuelan man was killed and his body was found on a road to Cali. A message threatening immigrants in the municipality was also found next to the victim. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 11 December 2020, in Granada municipality, Meta, a man driving a car on the road to San Martin was killed in a drive-by shooting perpetrated by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 11 December 2020, in Santiago de Cali, Valle del Cauca, a female social leader was shot on the street by an unidentified man. The victim survived the attack with injuries in her neck. Motives are unknown [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

actor1: FARC Dissident - 1st Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (1st Front - Armando Rios)
notes: Around 10 December 2020 (as reported), in Gualandayes, San Jose del Guaviare, Guaviare department, three people were killed and their bodies were found. The victims were shot in the head and their remains laid next to a pick-up truck. Authorities suspect the attack was perpetrated by the FARC dissident 1st Front. 3 fatalities.

Around 10 December 2020 (month of), in Ituango municipality, Antioquia, a man was shot dead and his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition in the rural area. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 10 December 2020 (as reported), in El Plateado corregimiento, Argelia, Cauca, a farmer was shot dead and his body was found with his hands tied nearby the cemetery. Information on the attackers is unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 10 December 2020 (as reported), in the area of San Joaquin corregimiento, Mercaderes, Cauca, a man and his son were killed and their bodies were found in El Placer vereda. The victims worked selling ice cream on a motorcycle when they were attacked. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 9 December 2020, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander department, two unidentified armed individuals shot dead a criminal lawyer in charge of taking the cases of demobilized members of the AUC. Perpetrators shot at least 17 times against the victim, who did not have reports of previous threats. 1 fatality.

Around 9 December 2020 (as reported), in El Bagre, Antioquia department, a leader of the LGBT community was killed by two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle, in a drive-by shooting. Another person was reported injured in the attack. 1 fatality.

On 8 December 2020, in Pescador corregimiento, Caldono, Cauca, a shop owner was killed inside his business by unidentified armed men. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 8 December 2020, in Cabuyaro municipality, Meta, a man was tortured and beheaded in El Viso vereda. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. According to the source, there is presence of the Gulf Clan in the area. 1 fatality.

On 8 December 2020, in El Diviso, Barbacoas, Narino, a man was shot dead on the road to Pasto in a drive-by shooting perpetrated by unidentified men on a motorcycle. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: On 7 December 2020, in Tauramena, Casanare department, unidentified armed individuals killed a social leader and member of the JAC. Perpetrators opened fire against the victim when the latter was opening his store. 1 fatality.

On 7 December 2020, in the rural area of Sabana De Torres municipality (Santander), unidentified armed individuals abducted a livestock farmer near his property in the San Rafael de Lebrija area. Perpetrators intercepted the victim's vehicle and drove away with him. The man was released around 15 June near Aguachica municipality (Cesar) after the victim's family paid for the rescue demanded by the perpetrators. The area is known for the presence of armed groups.

On 7 December 2020, in San Martin, Meta, a man was shot dead in Pedro Daza neighbourhood. The victim was previously mentioned in a pamphlet. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 7 December 2020, in Villavicencio, Meta, a man was shot dead in Los Libertadores neighbourhood. Information on the attackers is unknown. The department is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 6 December 2020, in Bogota-San Cristobal, Bogota D.C., a nurse was injured when a police officer opened fire while trying to prevent a robbery attempt against a taxi driver, in La Victoria neighbourhood. Police version claimed one of the robbers was armed, leading the officer to use his weapon. Meanwhile, this version was debunked by the witnesses who claimed the officer hastened to shot against the group. The victim remains in the ICU in a local hospital.

Around 6 December 2020 (between 5 - 7 December), in Guayacana corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino department, a member of the Awa indigenous community and the indigenous guard of Inda Sabaleta was killed and his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition in the rural area. The victim was abducted on 5 December in La Vina vereda, two days later his body was found on a road that connects Tumaco and Pasto. 1 fatality.

On 6 December 2020, in the area of Cisneros corregimiento, Dagua, Valle del Cauca, unidentified armed individuals killed a social leader of the Afro-Colombian community in vereda El Cedro. The victim was shot several times by the perpetrators. 1 fatality.

Around 6 December 2020 (as reported), in Medellin, Antioquia, a man was shot dead and his body was found in El Rosario vereda, Santa Elena corregimiento. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Jaime Martinez: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Jaime Martinez)
notes: On 6 December 2020, in Pan de Azucar vereda, Morales, Cauca, a farmer was shot dead by unidentified armed men. The victim was with his son in a local bar when the attackers arrived and took him and killed him nearby a bridge. According to the community, the attackers would be members of the Jaime Martinez dissident front of FARC. 1 fatality.

On 6 December 2020, in Riosucio, Choco, two men were killed by unidentified men in El Paraiso neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

On 6 December 2020, in Guayacana corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, a underage man, member of the Awa indigenous community and the indigenous guard of Inda Sabaleta was kidnapped by unidentified men in La Vina vereda. Motives of the abduction are unknown. His whereabouts are unknown.

On 6 December 2020, in Guayacana corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, a member of the Inga indigenous community was shot dead in his house in La Vina vereda by unidentified armed men. The victim's wife was the president of the Council of Communal Action of La Vina vereda. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Nasa Indigenous Group (Colombia)
notes: On 5 December 2020, near Talaga indigenous reserve, Paez, Cauca, a social leader and member of the Nasa community was killed by unidentified armed individuals. The attack was reported in the rural area of Minas, between the municipalities of Belalcazar and Talaga. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia)
source: El Espectador; Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz; INDEPAZ; UNOCHA
notes: On 5 December 2020, in Buenos Aires municipality, Cauca department, one Afro-Colombian social leader was killed by unidentified armed individuals in the rural area. The victim had recently reported threats from a FARC dissident faction and he was under the protection of the National Protection Unit (UNP). 1 fatality.

On 5 December 2020, in Caloto, Cauca department, unidentified armed individuals killed a social leader of the Nasa indigenous group and son of a former member of the Association of Indigenous Councils of Northern Cauca (ACIN). The victim was killed in Los Tanques neighbourhood in the urban area. 1 fatality.

source: La Patria; El Colombiano; AFP; UNOCHA
notes: On 5 December 2020, in Toribio municipality, Cauca department, unidentified armed individuals abducted a Spaniard citizen at an illegal checkpoint. The victim is a worker for an NGO that provides food-assistance and supports sustainability projects in the region. Perpetrators released the victim two days later.

Around 5 December 2020 (as reported), in Betulia municipality, Antioquia, a man was shot dead and his body was found in Las Brisas vereda. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 5 December 2020 (as reported), in Hispania municipality, Antioquia, a man was shot dead in La Armenia vereda. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. The department is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 5 December 2020, in Honduras corregimiento, Buenos Aires, Cauca, a man working for the National Unit for Victims of Colombia was killed. There is no information on the perpetrators. The victim was previously threatened by unidentified men. 1 fatality.

On 5 December 2020, in Santander de Quilichao, Cauca, two unidentified men shot at a group of people in a local business, killing four people and injuring three more. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 4 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 5 December 2020, in El Tarra, Norte de Santander, a social leader and member of the Council of Communal Action of Brisas de Villa Esperanza neighbourhood was shot in front of his house by two unidentified armed men. The victim survived the attack with injuries. Motives of the attack are unknown.

On 4 December 2020, in Santiago De Cali, Valle Del Cauca, unidentified armed individuals abducted a member of the workers' union of the public companies of Cali EMCALI. The victim was forced off his office by the perpetrators. The victim was released on 21 December 2020. There is no further details of the liberation.
On 4 December 2020, in El Plateado corregimiento, Argelia, Cauca, two afro-Colombian men were shot dead. Information on the attackers is unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 4 December 2020 (as reported), in Montelibano municipality, Cordoba, a man was killed and his beheaded body was found in El Poblado area. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 4 December 2020, in Puerto Narino vereda, Mesetas, Meta, a man was killed by unidentified armed men. The victim was driving his motorcycle when he was shot by the attackers. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.
On 4 December 2020, in Puerto Frazadas corregimiento, Tulua, Valle del Cauca, a farmer was shot dead nearby his house. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers is unknown. 1 fatality.

source: La Opinion (Colombia); Contagio Radio; INDEPAZ; El Espectador; El Colombiano
notes: On 3 December 2020, in the rural area of Bahia Solano (coded to Ciudad Mutis), Choco department, a leader of the Embera indigenous group was killed and his body was found. The victim was abducted from his house by armed men that identified themselves as members of the Gulf Clan. One day later, the community found his decapitated body in the rural area of the municipality. The event triggered a massive displacement of more than 1,000 indigenous people. 1 fatality.

On 3 December 2020, in La Carbonera corregimiento, Bolivar, Cauca department, a group of the unidentified armed individual opened fire against a family of farmers that were returning to their house. Perpetrators were hooded men armed with rifles. A man and his son were killed in the attack. 2 fatalities.

On 3 December 2020, in La Macarena municipality, Meta department, the coordinator of the Regional Environmental Agency (Cormacarena) was killed by two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle, in a drive-by shooting. The victim worked to preserve the Cano Cristales Natural Park. There is the presence of FARC dissident factions and other armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 3 December 2020, in Angelopolis, Antioquia, three people were attacked by unidentified armed men. A woman was killed and two men were injured in the attack. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 3 December 2020, in Montelibano, Cordoba, a member of the Zenu indigenous community was shot dead in El Tiempo neighbourhood. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 3 December 2020 (as reported), in Cali municipality, Valle del Cauca, a business man was killed and his body was found in the trunk of a car on a road to Pichinde corregimiento. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
notes: Around 2 December 2020 (as reported), in El Plateado vereda, Argelia, Cauca, a teenager was killed and his body found. Near the body was a placard that claimed the victim was killed for being an informant to the government, with a signature from the FARC dissident front Carlos Patino. According to the report, the victim was wearing military gear, including an Army shirt and boots. 1 fatality.

On 2 December 2020, in Medellin, Antioquia, a female social leader who advocate for women's rights, was stabbed by an unidentified man. The victim survived the attack with injuries. Motives of the attack are unknown. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 2 December 2020, in Guayabal vereda, El Tambo, Cauca, a woman was shot dead by unidentified armed men. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 2 December 2020, in Quibdo, Choco, a man and his son were shot by unidentified armed men. The man was killed and his son was injured. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 2 December 2020, in San Martin municipality, Meta, an underage man who was the son of a local business man was kidnapped by unidentified armed men. The victim was rescued by the police hours later. There is presence of several armed groups in this department.

On 1 December 2020, in the rural area of Ricaurte, Narino department, a leader of the Awa indigenous group was killed by 10 unidentified armed individuals. The victim was driving on the road that connects the areas of Llorente and Guayacana when perpetrators forced him to stop and shot him dead. 1 fatality.

Around 1 December 2020 (month of), in San Francisco vereda, San Pedro de los Milagros, Antioquia, an underage man was killed and his body was found inside a bag in an advanced state of decomposition. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 1 December 2020, in Argelia municipality, Cauca, two men were killed by unidentified men nearby La Emboscada corregimiento. The first victim was killed and his body was abandoned by the attackers on a road. Hours later, a relative of the victim who was looking for him, was killed by the same perpetrators. Motives for the attacks are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

On 1 December 2020, in Santiago de Cali - Comuna 7, Valle del Cauca, a transgender woman who was a recognized social leader and member of the LGBT community, was shot dead by an unidentified man in Alfonso Lopez neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 30 November 2020, in the rural area of the municipality of Manaure, La Guajira department, a group of 15 unidentified armed individuals raided and opened fire on members of the Wayuu indigenous people community. Victims were at a party when the attack took place. Eight people were reported injured.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Farmers (Colombia)
notes: On 30 November 2020, in Maicao, La Guajira department, a former FARC member was killed by unidentified armed individuals. The victim worked as an independent farmer and, according to the FARC Party, this is the 244th demobilized fighter killed since the 2016 peace agreements. 1 fatality.

On 30 November 2020, in Quibdo, Choco department, an environmental activist and social leader was killed by two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle, in a drive-by shooting. The victim worked to preserve the natural areas of the municipality. 1 fatality.

Around 30 November 2020 (as reported), in Suarez municipality, Cauca, a leader of the Nasa indigenous group, from the Cerro Tijeras reserve, was killed and his body was found in the rural area. The victim was last seen at a family meeting. His body was found in the rural area of the municipality with several gunshots. 1 fatality.

On 30 November 2020, in Aquitania corregimiento, San Francisco, Antioquia, a man was shot dead by an unidentified armed man. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 30 November 2020, in La Caucana corregimiento, Taraza, a barber was killed at work by unidentified armed men. According to the source, the attack is related to extortion and payments demanded by an unidentified armed group in the area. 1 fatality.

On 30 November 2020, in Saravena, Arauca, an off-duty police officer was killed in a drive-by shooting conducted by two unidentified men. The victim had been previously attacked and injured by an unidentified sniper. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 November 2020, in Toribio municipality, Cauca, two men were kidnapped by unidentified individuals on the road from Popayan to Pitalito municipalities, Huila department. There is presence of the ELN in the area.

On 30 November 2020, in Roberto Payan, Narino, two men were killed in the urban area in a drive-by shooting by unidentified armed men. Motives of the attack are also unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.
On 29 November 2020, in Saravena municipality, Arauca, a man was killed by members of an unidentified insurgent group near the border with Venezuela. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 November 2020, in Lerma corregimiento, Bolivar, Cauca, unidentified armed men shot a man in the head and killed him. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 29 November 2020, in Llorente corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, a member of the Camawari - Awa indigenous community and member of the Guardia indigena was shot dead by unidentified armed men in the El Pinde vereda. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 November 2020, in Puerto Santander municipality, Norte de Santander, the ELN attacked an informal settlement near the Venezuelan border, firing their guns and throwing grenades. A Venezuelan man was killed in the attack. 1 fatality.

On 29 November 2020, in the rural area of Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, a man was shot dead by unidentified armed men in the Higuerones sector. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 29 November 2020 (as reported), in Tulua, Valle del Cauca, three men were attacked in a drive-by shooting by unidentified armed men in the Municipal neighbourhood. Two victims were killed and another was injured. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

On 29 November 2020, in Tulua, Valle del Cauca, a man was killed in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified armed men. A Venezuelan woman was also injured in the attack. Motives are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 28 November 2020, in the rural area of Caucasia municipality, Antioquia, a man was shot dead by two unidentified armed men in the Pensilvania vereda. There is presence of different armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 28 November 2020 (as reported), in El Hatillo corregimiento, Barbosa, Antioquia, a man was killed and his body was found inside a bag. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 28 November 2020 (month of), in Los Mangos vereda, Caucasia, Antioquia, a man was shot dead and his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
On 28 November 2020, in Rionegro, Antioquia, a man was shot dead by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.
On 28 November 2020, in Urrao, Antioquia, a man was shot dead in the urban area. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 28 November 2020, in Argelia municipality, Cauca, four people were killed and their bodies were found in the rural area. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 4 fatalities.

Around 28 November 2020 (month of), in Morales municipality, Cauca, a farmer was killed and his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition in the San Isidro vereda. The victim was kidnapped by unidentified men on 22 November 2020. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 November 2020, in Tumaco, Narino, a man was shot dead in the San Felipe neighbourhood by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 28 November 2020, in the rural area of Tulua municipality, Valle del Cauca, a man was shot dead by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are also unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.
On 27 November 2020, in Cartagena Del Chaira, Caqueta, a social leader and farmer was killed by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 27 November 2020, in El Plateado corregimiento, Argelia, Cauca, the ELN shot and killed three civilians. The armed group recently established a curfew in the south side of the Cauca department. 3 fatalities.

On 27 November 2020, near Gualtal corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, a couple were killed in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men on a motorcycle on the road between Pasto and Tumaco municipalities. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the municipality. 2 fatalities.

On 26 November 2020, in Santa Cruz de Lorica, Cordoba, a man was shot dead in the Alto Kennedy neighbourhood. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 26 November 2020, in the rural area of Santiago de Tolu municipality, Sucre, a man was killed with shots to his head by unknown shooters in the Punta Piedra farm. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

source: INDEPAZ; Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 25 November 2020, in the rural area of the municipality of Puerto Asis, Putumayo, department, suspected members of the CDF Frontier command shot dead a communal leader in the road between the communities of Mansoya 1 and Aguila. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: Looting: On 25 November 2020, in Tame municipality, Arauca, FARC dissidents intercepted a truck transporting humanitarian aid on the road to Saravena. The group held the workers hostage and demanded ransom. The armed group later released the driver and the vehicle.

On 25 November 2020, in Lopez municipality, Cauca, three people on a boat were shot by unidentified armed men in Salto de Gurumendy area. The victims survived the attack with injuries. There is presence of different armed groups in the area.
On 25 November 2020, in El Toro vereda, Puerto Lopez, Meta, a man was killed by a Gulf Clan member, who also robbed the victim. 1 fatality.

On 25 November 2020, in Tumaco, Narino, a man was killed in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men on a motorcycle in the San Martin neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 25 November 2020 (as reported), in the rural area of Tulua municipality, Valle del Cauca, three people who were travelling to work in La Moralia corregimiento were kidnapped by an unidentified group. The victims were rescued by military forces on 25 November.

On 24 November 2020, in Banco De Arenas, Norte de Santander, six unidentified armed individuals abducted and killed a farmer in the area El 25. The victim was dragged by the perpetrators out of his house, minutes later relatives found the body near the house. There is presence of the ELN in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 24 November 2020 (as reported), in Arauca, Arauca department, unidentified armed individuals abducted two relatives of the former city mayor. Perpetrators forced the victims out from their house. The woman was released three days after the attack was reported. On 12 December, media outlets reported the release of the remaining victim.

On 24 November 2020, in Puerto Claver corregimiento, El Bagre, Antioquia, two people were shot dead at a local business establishment by unidentified armed men. The attack occurred near the local police station. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

On 24 November 2020, in Taraza, Antioquia, a man was killed on the street by unidentified armed men. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 24 November 2020, in the rural area of Valdivia municipality, Antioquia, a coca grower was killed by military forces. The victim was opposing to eradication of coca crops in the area. After the attack, famers blocked the road and set military equipment on fire. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Women (Colombia)
notes: Around 24 November 2020 (as reported), in the rural area of Quibdo municipality, Choco, a woman and former FARC member who was taking part in the implementation of the peace process was killed by unidentified armed men. Motives of the attack are also unknown. 1 fatality.

On 24 November 2020, in Granada, Meta, a man was killed in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men on a motorcycle in the El Bosque neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 24 November 2020, in the rural area of Abrego municipality, Norte de Santander, an ambulance driver and a nurse attending a call in Santa Rita vereda were held captive for three hours by unidentified armed men. The abductors demanded the payment of money to release the victims and the vehicle. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department.

assoc_actor_2: Teachers (Colombia); FECODE: Colombian Federation of Education Workers
notes: Around 23 November 2020, in the municipality of La Virginia, Risaralda department, unidentified armed individuals killed a teacher affiliated to FECODE. There is no previous record of threats or attacks against the victim. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Farmers (Colombia)
notes: On 23 November 2020, in the rural area of Puerto Caicedo, Putumayo department, one social leader and one member of a local JAC and a farmer and member of the National Crop Substitution Program of the area were killed by unidentified armed individuals. Victims were driving on the road that connects the area of San Pedro Arizona when perpetrators opened fire. 2 fatality.

source: Consejo Regional Indigena del Cauca; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ
notes: On 23 November 2020, in Tumaco municipality, Narino department, a leader of the Awa indigenous group was killed by unidentified armed individuals. The victim was driving on the road that connects Tumaco an Pasto. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 November 2020, in Buenos Aires municipality, Cauca, two men, including a minor who was a member of Las Delicias indigenous reserve, were killed in the El Mandarino vereda in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men on a motorcycle. Motives of the attack are unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 23 November 2020 (as reported), in Ansermanuevo, Valle del Cauca, a person was kidnapped by unidentified men. Motives of the abduction were related to extorsion. The victim was latter rescued by police forces on 23 November.

source: UNOCHA; La Opinion (Colombia); El Colombiano; Vanguardia Liberal
notes: On 22 November 2020, in the rural area of Betania municipality, Antioquia department, armed individuals opened fire against a group of farmers. 10 people were killed. The victims were farmers working in the harvest season of coffee beans, some of them of Venezuelan nationality. Authorities claimed that the attack was perpetrated by the Gulf Clan while looking for drug traffickers in the area. 10 fatalities.

On 22 November 2020, in the rural area of the municipality of Ocana, Norte de Santander department, unidentified armed individuals abducted a civilian. Perpetrators identified themselves as members of the EPL. The whereabouts of the victim remain unknown.
On 22 November 2020, in Morales municipality, Cauca, a farmer was kidnapped from a local business in the San Isidro vereda by unidentified men. Motives of the abduction are unknown.

On 22 November 2020, in the rural area of Abrego municipality, Norte de Santander, a man driving his car in Casa de Teja vereda was shot dead by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)

On 21 November 2020, in Itagui municipality, Antioquia, a construction worker was killed while at work by an unidentified man in the Los Gomez vereda. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 21 November 2020, in Puerto Belgica corregimiento, Caceres, Antioquia, Gulf Clan members fired their guns against a truck. The truck driver was violating the curfew set by the armed group in the area. Casualties unknown.

On 21 November 2020, in Monoguete, Solano, Caqueta, a medical mission of the municipal government was attacked by unidentified armed men. The armed group intercepted the boat in which the health workers were travelling and threatened the occupants after shooting their guns. No fatalities or injuries occurred.

On 21 November 2020, in Tumaco, Narino, two men were shot dead by unidentified armed men inside a bar. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the municipality. 2 fatalities.

On 20 November 2020, in the rural area of Linares municipality, Narino department, a communal leader was killed by unidentified perpetrators. The victim had an active role in promoting the rights and programs for victims of the armed conflict. 1 fatality.

On 20 November 2020, in the rural area Argelia municipality, Cauca, a man was killed by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

There is presence of FARC dissident factions in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 19 November 2020 (as reported), in Betania municipality, Antioquia, two brothers were killed and their bodies were found in the Pedregal Abajo vereda. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

Around 18 November 2020 (as reported), in Argelia municipality, Cauca, a teenage boy was killed and his body was found in the El Bombillal vereda with his hands tied up, shots to the head, and bearing signs of torture. On 18 November 2020, in Barbacoas municipality, Narino, unidentified men fired their guns against house belonging to an Awa indigenous family in the El Pailon vereda. There were five people in the house when the attack occurred. One underage boy was injured. No fatalities occurred.

Around 18 November 2020 (as reported), in Guayacana corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, a couple were shot dead and their bodies were found on a rural road in the La Nupa vereda. On 18 November 2020, in San Pedro, Valle del Cauca, a man was killed in the El Porvernir neighbourhood in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men on a motorcycle. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 17 November 2020 (as reported), in the rural area of Argelia municipality, Cauca, two farmers were killed and their bodies were found in the La Emboscada sector. Information on the attackers is unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 16 November 2020 (as reported), in Argelia municipality, Cauca department, members of an unidentified armed group opened fire against a group of civilians in the San Juan del Micay corregimiento. assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 16 November 2020, in the rural area of Florencia municipality, Caqueta, a former FARC member was killed by unidentified armed individuals. assoc_actor_2: Awa Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 16 November 2020, in Barbacoas municipality, Narino, unidentified men fired their guns against the house of an Awa indigenous leader in the El Gran Sabalo indigenous reserve. No fatalities or injuries occurred.

Around 15 November 2020 (month of), in the department of Magdalena (coded to Santa Marta, Magdalena), unidentified armed individuals opened fire on the vehicle of a trans woman who is also an LGBT social leader in a drive-by shooting. The trans-woman had received death threats for her work as an LGBT activist and her land restitution activities. The victim fled the attack uninjured. There were no fatalities. assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 15 November 2020, in Bocas del Negua (Choco), a former FARC member was killed by Gulf Clan members. The victim was part of the peace agreement of 2016. According to the FARC Party, this is victim number 239. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 15 November 2020, in Vistahermosa municipality, Meta, three men were kidnapped by FARC dissidents in Las Palmeras vereda. The victims were later rescued by military forces on 17 November 2020.

source: UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; Consejo Regional Indigena del Cauca
notes: On 14 November 2020, in Tumaco municipality, Narino department, unidentified armed individuals killed a member of the Awa indigenous people in the Guacaray area. The victim was well-known among the community. 1 fatality.

On 14 November 2020, in the rural are of Caceres municipality, Antioquia, eight farmers were kidnapped by members of the Gulf Clan. The victims were injured while held captive. After pressure from the community, the armed group set six of the victims free on 20 November and kept two more captive.

source: UNOCHA; El Espectador; INDEPAZ; El Universal (Colombia)
notes: Around 13 November 2020 (as reported), in the rural area of Tierralta municipality, Cordoba department, three members of the same family were killed and their bodies were found. On 13 November 2020, in Suarez municipality, Cauca, two men, including a farmer, were killed by unidentified armed men. Motives of the attack are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 13 November 2020, in La Tigra vereda, Puerto Rico, Meta, two members of the local community were chased by members of the military forces, who fired their guns against the victims and accused them of being members of the guerrillas. No fatalities or injuries occurred.

On 13 November 2020, in Barbacoas, Narino, a man was shot dead in front of a hospital by unidentified men. Motives of the attack could be related to settlement of accounts between organized criminal groups. There is presence of different armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 12 November 2020, in the rural area of Alto Baudo, Choco department, an Embera indigenous leader was abducted and killed by armed individuals. The victim was forced out of his house and two days later his body was found near the indigenous reserve with several marks of torture. There is presence of the Gulf Clan and other armed organizations in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 12 November 2020 (month of), in Tumaco municipality, Narino department, a teacher, member of a teacher's union, and militant of the Colombia Humana political party, and another person were abducted by unidentified armed individuals. The victim's partner was released hours later, while the body of the teacher was later found in La Brava vereda in an advanced state of decomposition. 1 fatality.

source: UNOCHA; Consejo Regional Indigena del Cauca; INDEPAZ
notes: On 12 November 2020, in the rural area of Ricaurte municipality, Narino department, unidentified armed individuals opened fired against the house of members of the Awa indigenous people. One woman was killed in the event. 1 fatality.
On 12 November 2020, in Ricaurte, Narino, unidentified armed men shot at a local councilman on the street. The victim survived the attack with no injuries. Motives are unknown.

On 12 November 2020, in Tulua, Valle del Cauca, a man and a woman were attacked in a drive-by shooting carried out by unidentified men on a motorcycle. The man was killed and the woman survived with injuries. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 11 November 2020, in Puerto Guzman, Putumayo department, three unidentified armed individuals killed a social leader and member of the JAC of the Jose Maria community. Perpetrators raided the victim's house and shot him dead. 1 fatality.

source: UNOCHA; Consejo Regional Indigena del Cauca

On 11 November 2020, in Tumaco municipality, Narino, a man was killed inside the Afro-Colombian collective territory of La Nupa. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the municipality. 1 fatality.

Around 10 November 2020 (as reported), in Tamesis municipality, Antioquia, three people were killed by unidentified armed individuals in Palermo corregimiento. No further details of the event were reported. Several armed groups operate in this department. 3 fatalities.

source: INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; Consejo Regional Indigena del Cauca
notes: On 10 November 2020, in Guayacana corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino department, unidentified armed individuals killed two members of the Awa indigenous people. 2 fatalities.

On 10 November 2020, in Betania municipality, Antioquia, a Venezuelan man was killed in a drive-by shooting by two armed men on a motorcycle in the Travesias vereda. Police stated the attack was linked to drug trafficking. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 10 November 2020, in Caceres, Antioquia, a woman was killed by unidentified armed men who invaded her home in the Jardim de Tamana corregimiento and fired shots to her head. The officers claimed that they were looking for another farmer who was not at the house and started to beat the men to force them to contact the farmer that they were looking for. The officers took radio equipment. No fatalities occurred.

Around 10 November 2020, in Llorente corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, an underage girl was killed and her body was found on a rural road. On 9 November 2020, in Argelia, Cauca, three men, including a minor, were shot dead in the urban area by unidentified men. There is no information on the perpetrators. On 9 November 2020, in Concordia, Antioquia, two men were shot by unidentified men in Salazar neighbourhood. One of the victims was killed and the other was severely injured. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 7 November 2020, in El Diviso corregimiento, Barbacoas, Narino, a man on a motorcycle was killed in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men in a vehicle. Motives of the attack are ton clear. There is presence of different armed groups in the municipality. 1 fatality.

On 3 November 2020, in Sabaletas, Valle Del Cauca department, one person was killed and two more were injured by unidentified armed individuals. Perpetrators set fire to 3 motorcycles during the attack. There is presence of armed groups in the area. No further information was provided. 1 fatality.

On 3 November 2020, in Salgar, Antioquia, unidentified armed men wearing masks attacked a group of people in the urban area, resulting in one underage man killed and another injured. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 3 November 2020, in the rural area of Llorente corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, a man was shot dead and his body was found on a rural road to the Mira River. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers is unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)

Perpetrators set fire to four civilian houses and abducted one resident. 2 fatalities.
On 1 November 2020, in El Plateado, Cauca, a farmer was shot dead in 7 de Agosto neighbourhood. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 1 November 2020, in San Martin, Meta, a man was shot dead in front of the fire station in the Cra 6 community. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers is unknown. There is fear in the community due to a social media publication mentioning that a social cleansing would take place in this town. Authorities have not commented on the matter. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 31 October 2020, in Puerto Rico municipality, Meta, seven farmers who were on their way to participate in a protest against operations of eradication of illegal crops, were arrested and subsequently beaten and mistreated by police in the La Reforma vereda. No fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
notes: Around 30 October 2020 (as reported), El Plateado, Argelia municipality, Cauca department, members of the FARC dissident faction Carlos Patino abducted a local farmer. The attack followed an armed clash against an unidentified group near the town. The whereabouts of the victim remain unknown.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
notes: Around 30 October 2020 (as reported), in El Plateado, Cauca, an indigenous person who worked as a traditional healer was killed by members of the Carlos Patino dissident FARC faction. The perpetrators dragged the victim out of his house and shot him dead in front of the community. 1 fatality.

On 30 October 2020, in the rural area of Mercaderes, Cauca department, unidentified armed individuals shot dead three people in El Vado vereda. The victims include the sister of a social leader killed on 29 April. The motive and circumstances of the attack are not reported. 3 fatalities.

According to the report, the victim was threatened by this group days before the attack. The ELN accused him of being part of the Los Rastrojos Gang, but this information was not confirmed by the report. 1 fatality.

source: El Colombiano; El Tiempo (Colombia); UNOCHA; INDEPAZ
notes: Around 29 October 2020 (as reported), in Nuqui, Choco department, a community leader and environmental activist was killed and her body was found with a gunshot injury, in front of the local police station. The victim strongly opposed the construction of a port in the area of Tribuga raising environmental concerns for the natural reserve area. Subsequent information reported that the Gulf Clan perpetrated the attack. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

assoc_actor_2: Government of Colombia (2018-2022); Indigenous Group (Colombia); MAIS: Indigenous and Social Alternative Movement

On 28 October 2020, in the rural area of San Martin, Cesar, ten unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a rancher from his private house in the community Los Angeles. Several armed organizations are present in the area. Around 23 November 2020, in the rural area of El Carmen municipality, Norte de Santander department, military forces and police members released the man. No exchange of fire was reported during the state operation.

On 28 October 2020, in the rural area of Montecristo, Bolivar, a former ELN fighter was killed in the vereda La Culebra of the corregimiento El Paraiso. The circumstances of the death are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 27 October 2020, in Malambo, Atlantico department, a councilman was attacked by unidentified perpetrators. The armed men opened fire against the vehicle drove by the politician. The victim was unharmed.

notes: On 24 October 2020, in Balboa, Cauca department, a demobilized FARC member was killed by two unidentified armed individuals in the La Pampa neighbourhood. 1 fatality.

notes: On 24 October 2020, in the rural area of San Marcos, Sucre department, four communal leaders and a human rights lawyer were killed by unidentified perpetrators, who invaded a community meeting. The victims were farmers and social leaders in a land restitution process in the rural areas of Sucre and Cordoba departments. One leader of the Zenu indigenous community was also taking part in the meeting but survived the attack. The event triggered the forced displacement of eight people one week after the attack. 5 fatalities.

On 21 October 2020, in El Bagre, Antioquia, two hitmen of the Gulf Clan went into a hotel and shot at a woman. No fatalities.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz; Noticias RCN; UNOCHA

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction

On 30 September 2020, in a rural area of Vistahermosa municipality, Vista Hermosa, Meta department, a military officer attacked a farmer. The victim was injured. The report does not provide details of the assault.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction

On 25 September 2020, in Sahagun, Cordoba, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and injured a man in a drive-by shooting in the Nueva Granada neighborhood. 1 fatality.

The trans woman died and other passengers were not injured. 1 fatality.

On 24 September 2020, in Segovia, Segovia, Antioquia, several armed men shot and injured a woman in an urban area. The details of the attack are not provided. Several groups operate in the area. 1 injured.

He was found on 25 September 2020. Several groups operate in the area.

Around 23 September 2020 (as reported), in Villavicencio, Meta, a man was killed by unknown perpetrators and his body was found in the Las Colinas neighborhood. The reasons for the attack are unknown. Several armed groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

The victims were departing from a bar when the armed men arrived in two trucks and three motorcycles, threw grenades, and opened fire against them. Around 20 September 2020 (as reported), in a rural area of Mosquera municipality, Narino department, four men were killed and their bodies were found in the Pampa vereda. Police believe the attack could be a reckoning between armed groups. Several groups operate in the area. 4 fatalities.
