Around 20 September 2020 (as reported), in Barranca de Upia, Meta, a man was killed and his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition in the Algarrobo vereda. A few hours later, another corpse was found in the same spot. Several groups operate in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 19 September 2020, in Betulia municipality, Antioquia, Gulf Clan members shot and killed two men in the Quebrada Arriba vereda. According to the report, the victims were in charge of distributing gas per pipette. Several armed groups operate in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 19 September 2020, in Cerete, Cordoba department, an unknown number of armed men arrived on a motorcycle and shot and killed a man inside his car repair shop in the La Esperanza neighborhood. 1 fatality.

On 18 September 2020, in Aguasclaras corregimiento, Ocana, Norte de Santander, an unknown number of unidentified armed men arrived at a local store and opened fire. Three men were killed. The ELN, ELP, and 33th FARC dissident front operate in the area. 3 fatalities.

On 17 September 2020, in a rural area of Taraza, Antioquia department, three men were killed by unidentified armed men in the Matecanas community in El Guaimaro village. The victims were the owner of a farm, his son, and the farm's foreman. Several groups operate in the area. 3 fatalities.

Around 16 September 2020 (as reported), in Itagui, Antioquia, a man was killed and his body was found in the Villa Carlota neighborhood. Several groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 17 August 2020 (as reported), in a rural area of Payan, Magui Payan municipality, Narino department, members of the Gulf Clan tortured and dismembered two men, in the La Tortuga hamlet (vereda). On 16 August 2020, in the Puerto Santander municipality, Norte de Santander, unknown assailants killed two farmers in the border area with Venezuela. 2 fatalities.

actor1: AUC: United Self-Defence Forces of Colombia
assoc_actor_2: Indigenous Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 16 August 2020, in San Antonio municipality, Tolima, armed men shot at the house of a leader of the Tolima Regional Indigenous Council in the rural hamlet (vereda) Villahermosa de San Antonio in the San Antonio de Calarma indigenous reserve. The social leader managed to escape shortly before the attack because someone tipped him off that the men were coming. The attackers painted a message on the walls of his house in which they alluded to the AUC. No fatalities.

On 16 August 2020, in Medellin, Antioquia department, a group of police officers beat up a man to death, in Comuna 13 neighbourhood. Witnesses claimed the officers asked for the man's cell phone during a patrol search, and that the victim was beaten up when he refused to give it to them. 1 fatality.

actor1: AUC: United Self-Defence Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 15 August 2020 (month of), in the rural area of San Antonio municipality, Tolima department, armed individuals opened fire against the house of a social leader and human rights activist in the locality of Villahermosa. The victim is a member of the Association of Traditional Authorities of the Regional Indigenous Council of Tolima (Crit). The perpetrators painted messages on the walls alluding to the AUC. No injured were reported.
On 15 August 2020, in the rural area of Tame, Arauca, two Venezuelan men were killed. In the area the ELN: National Liberation Army and FARC dissident groups are active. 2 fatalities.

On 15 August 2020, in a rural area in Samaniego municipality, Narino department, eight people were killed and various individuals were injured by unidentified armed individuals in a gathering in the hamlet of Santa Catalina (vereda). Various members of FARC dissident groups and the ELN are fighting to control the area. 8 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 40th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (40th Front - Jacobo Arenas)
notes: On 14 August 2020, in Granada municipality, Meta, four armed men belonging to the FARC Dissident 40th Front abducted two people. One of the victims was a merchant and the other one was a bus driver. They were released by the military ten days later.

assoc_actor_2: Former Government of Colombia (2018-2022); Journalists (Colombia); Nasa Indigenous Group (Colombia)

Two individuals, including a former governor, were injured. 2 fatalities.
Around 13 August 2020, in Sincelejo, Sucre department, unidentified armed individuals attacked a member of the LGBT community with machetes. The victim lost one of his arms because of the attack.

The victims were members of the Argelian Workers' Peasant Association, an association that has received threats from the Carlos Patino FARC front. 2 fatalities.

On 12 August 2020, in the rural area of Pailitas, Cesar department, unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a rancher from his private house. The perpetrators used military gear. The victim is the father in law of the director of the UARIV-National agency for reparation of victims of armed conflict. Subsequently, the vehicle used for the attack was found burned down. The victim was released in December 2020.

Around 12 August 2020 (as reported), in the Caucasia municipality, Antioquia, a minor who was the daughter of a demobilized FARC-fighter was killed. Her body was found with signs of having been stabbed and then beheaded in a farm. The mother of the victim had received previous threats against her life. 1 fatality. source: INDEPAZ; Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz

On 11 August 2020, in Santiago de Cali, Valle del Cauca department, five Afro-Colombian minors were killed and their bodies found with gunshot wounds in the Llano Verde neighborhood. Locals claimed armed groups in the area kill people in vulnerable situation. 5 fatalities

Around 9 August 2020 (as reported), in a rural area of La Argentina municipality, Huila department, a member of the LGBT community was killed and his body found in Santa Helena community. On 9 August 2020, in Leiva, Narino, gunmen killed two schoolchildren in Sant Lucia. According to residents, the perpetrators were members of a paramilitary group. 2 fatalities.

Around 7 August 2020 (as reported), in the rural area of Trujillo, Valle del Cauca, unknown individuals killed a farmer. His body was later found with at least 10 gunshot wounds. 1 fatality.

Around 6 August 2020, near Caucasia municipality, Antioquia department, unidentified armed individuals abducted two civilians. There is a presence of Gulf Clan and Caparros members in the Bajo Cauca subregion.

notes: On 6 August 2020, in a rural area of the El Cairo municipality, Valle del Cauca department, a former FARC member was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals, in a road to La Italia rural district (corregimiento). 1 fatality.

Around 2 July 2020 (as reported), in Puerto Guzman municipality, Putumayo, a person was killed and his body was found in the river Putumayo. The corpse bore signs of violence. There is presence of several armed groups in Putumayo department. 1 fatality.

On 1 July 2020, in Algeciras municipality, Huila, an unknown number of armed men shot and killed a man in his house in the rural hamlet (vereda) Andes Altos. He was the cousin of a communal action leader who was killed in January. 1 fatality.

Around 1 July 2020 (as reported), in Puerto Guzman municipality, Putumayo, a man was killed and his body was found in the rural hamlet (vereda) El Vergel, alongside the Caqueta river. The area is being disputed between the FARC Dissident Carolina Ramirez Front and the FARC Dissident Front 48th. 1 fatality.

Around 30 June 2020, in Santa Marta rural area, Magdalena department, members of the Wiwa indigenous group, armed with melee weapons, threatened and captured two farmers, over a land dispute in El Naranjal and El Carmen areas of Sierra Nevada. One of the farmers was handed over to the Military forces, and the other one was missing.
Around 30 June 2020 (as reported), in Santa Lucia, Putumayo, a male carrier was kidnapped by two armed men who demanded a ransom for his release. The victim was released by military forces.

On 29 June 2020, in Medellin, Antioquia department, a trans woman was attacked and killed by unidentified armed individuals. Between January 1st and March 31st, 13 women have been killed, among them 2 trans women. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Labour Group (Colombia)
notes: On 29 June 2020, in San Juan De Pasto (Narino), a taxi driver and a former FARC member were killed by an armed man, who then fled with an accomplice on a motorcycle, in the same event. The former FARC member died from his injuries on 7 July, while the taxi driver died on the spot. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators. 2 fatalities

On 28 June 2020, in the rural area of Morales, Cauca department, one female social leader and one farmer were killed by unidentified armed individuals, in San Isidro rural hamlet (vereda). The victims were attacked when they were at a checkpoint established in the area to prohibit the entrance of people to the community due to the coronavirus outbreak. 2 fatalities.

On 28 June 2020, in the municipality of Simiti, Bolivar, a former councilman was shot dead in Santa Lucia rural district (corregimiento). There is no information regarding the perpetrators. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 28 June 2020, in El Hacha, Putumayo, a former FARC member of the 49th Front was shot dead. There is no information regarding the perpetrators. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 27 June 2020, in a rural area in the Putumayo department, a former FARC member was killed by unidentified armed individuals, in a farm where he worked in Tallambi. The victim worked promoting fish farming projects in the municipality. 1 fatality.

On 27 June 2020, in the rural area of Macayepo municipality (Bolivar), a trade union leader was beaten to death by unidentified men while at his house. The victim was a retired worker and the leader of the Ecopetrol Trade Union, the largest oil company of Colombia. He had move to his rural house during the coronavirus pandemic, since he was in the risk group. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators. 1 fatality
On 27 June 2020, in Florencia, Caqueta department, a farmer and social leader was killed by unidentified armed individuals. 1 fatality.

On 27 June 2020, in Teorama municipality, Norte de Santander department, a young farmer and social activist was killed by soldiers in the Filo Guamo community. The motive of the attack is not reported. Residents saw a group of four soldiers leaving the area after hearing shots. The military officer in charge of the area denied that the officers who killed the man were within his division. 1 fatality.

Around 27 June 2020 (as reported), in a rural area of San Jose del Guaviare (Guaviare), a male farmer was killed and his body found near Picalojo village, in Guayabero region. The victim was the leader of several demonstrations that took place in May, against the forced eradication of illicit crops without a proper implementation plan. 1 fatality.

actor1: AUC: United Self-Defence Forces of Colombia
notes: On 27 June 2020, in El Carmen De Bolivar, Bolivar, 2 men were shot dead by members of the AUC in the Cano Negro sector. The reason for the attack is not known. 2 fatalities.
On 27 June 2020, in Santiago de Cali, Valle del Cauca, a woman was abducted. The same day the woman was released by the police and three people were arrested. One of the kidnappers is a policeman.

On 26 June 2020, in Nuevo Escobal, Norte de Santander department, a man from Venezuela was attacked and killed by unidentified armed individuals, in a trail between Colombia and Venezuela. The attack occurred in front of the victim's brother. Armed groups such as La Linea and El Tren de Aragua are in these trails killing people who refuse to pay extortion. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Embera Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 25 June 2020, in the rural area of Bajo Baudo municipality (Choco), an Embera indigenous leader was killed by unidentified armed men, near Agua Clara village. His body was found on 27 June, with 17 gunshot wounds and signs of torture. A few days before, the victim had reported the killing of a traditional indigenous leader. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators. 1 fatality

On 25 June 2020, in the municipality of Carloto, Cauca (coded to Toez), two indigenous people in a car were chased and shot in a drive-by shooting by armed individuals on a motorcycle between Toez and Huellas. No injuries were reported.
On 25 June 2020, in Pizarro, Choco, a man was attacked by members of the ELN who had threatened him. There were no casualties.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 24 June 2020, in Convencion, Norte de Santander department, a social leader and member of the JAC of the area San Isidro (Miraflores) was kidnapped by suspected ELN members. The victim was released in the month of 10 October 2020.

On 24 June 2020, in the rural area of Convencion, Norte de Santander department, a farmer and communal leader was killed by unidentified perpetrators, in El Hoyo de Convencion village. The victim worked as a mediator of the community. 1 fatality.

On 24 June 2020, in Puerto Tejada, Cauca, a woman and a man were shot dead in Antonio Narino neighborhood. The woman was the daughter of a social leader and former candidate for the Council for Radical Change. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: UNOCHA; La Opinion (Colombia); El Tiempo (Colombia); INDEPAZ
notes: On 23 June 2020, in a rural area in the Convencion municipality (Norte de Santander), a male social leader was killed in his house by an ELN member, because he would not provide information to the perpetrator. The victim was a leader of the conciliation committee and was a member of the board of directors of the Council Communal Action Board (JAC) of the village of El Hoyo. According to the Farmers Association of Catatumbo (Ascamcat), more than 50 leaders have received threats in the department of Norte de Santander. 1 fatality.
On 22 June 2020, in a rural area of the Algeciras municipality, Huila department, unidentified armed individuals killed a coffee collector. 1 fatality.

On 22 June 2020, in a rural of the Pueblo Rico municipality, Risaralda department, seven soldiers raped a 12-year-old Embera Indigenous girl from the Santa Cecilia village. The soldiers were arrested. [women targeted: girls]

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: On 22 June 2020, in a rural area of the Florida municipality, Valle del Cauca department, an indigenous woman and member of the Kwe'sx YU'Kiwe reserve was killed in La Cumbre rural hamlet (vereda) by armed individuals from the FARC dissident group Dagoberto Ramos. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 22 June 2020, in the rural area of Frontino municipality, Antioquia, armed members of the Gulf Clan shot and injured the president of the JAC of the Panatanos de Murri vereda.
Around 22 June 2020 (as reported), in Quibdo, Choco, a former ELN member was killed by members of the Gulf Clan and his body was found in the Cabi neighborhood. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 48th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (48th Front - Pedro Martinez)
notes: Around 21 June 2020 (as reported), in San Antonio del Comboy, Putumayo, a male commissioner of the government program for the benefit of the communities (PBC) was killed and his body was found. The attack was perpetrated by members of the FARC Dissident 48th Front. 1 fatality.

On 20 June 2020, in Cumbal (Narino), an indigenous leader from the Gran Cumbal indigenous reserve area was attacked by police officers for breaking the quarantine rule introduced due to the coronavirus pandemic. According to the report, officers attacked the victim when he opposed the arrest. Subsequently, the man suffered additional abuse inside the police precinct. Police release the victim the next day, but he had to be transferred to a hospital due to poor health condition and head trauma. The victim died on 29 June due to the severity of the wounds. 1 fatality.

On 20 June 2020, in Albania municipality, La Guajira, a Wayuu indigenous person was shot dead and two other Wayuu indigenous people were shot and injured by armed individuals near the indigenous community of El Brazil in El Abra rural district (corregimiento). 1 fatality, 2 injured.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 36th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (36th Front - Jair Aldana Baquero)
notes: On 19 June 2020, in El Llano, Antioquia, a farmer was killed by members of the 36th front of a FARC dissidents who operate in the area. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 36th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (36th Front - Jair Aldana Baquero)
notes: On 19 June 2020, in Toledo, Antioquia, a farmer was killed by members of the 36th front of a FARC dissidents who operate in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former AUC: United Self-Defence Forces of Colombia
notes: On 17 June 2020, in Soledad, Atlantico, a former AUC member was shot dead by armed individuals on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting in the neighborhood Villa Carla. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 16 June 2020, in a rural area in Puerto Asis, Putumayo department, a former member of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia (FARC) was killed by unidentified armed individuals. This killing is the 201 in which a former FARC member is attacked after the 2016 peace accord signed between the Government of Colombia and FARC. 1 fatality.

On 16 June 2020, in the rural area of Samaniego municipality (Narino), one social leader and one local teacher were shot dead by unidentified armed men in the same event, in El Placer village. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators, circumstances of death, or crime motivation. 1 fatality

assoc_actor_2: CUT: Central Union of Workers; Labour Group (Colombia)
notes: On 16 June 2020, in the department of Choco (coded to Quibdo), in the early hours of the morning, armed men broke into the house of the CUT leader in Choco and attacked him. The victim was unharmed.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 16 June 2020 (between 15 - 18 June), in the rural area of Guapi municipality (Cauca), one Afro-Colombian social leader member of the Alto Guapi Community Council was killed by armed men, while in a boat crossing a river near Cerda area in the Yantin sector. His body was found on 17 June. According to investigations, his killing could be either attributed to a FARC dissident group or to the Gulf Clan (Gaitanistas). 1 fatality

actor1: FARC Dissident - 36th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (36th Front - Jair Aldana Baquero)
notes: On 16 June 2020, in La Loma, Antioquia, a farmer was killed by members of the 36th front of a FARC dissidents who operate in the area. 1 fatality.
On 16 June 2020, in Riohacha, La Guajira, the 10th Commune Councillor was shot in his home by two armed individuals who arrived on a motorcycle. The victim was unharmed.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 15 June 2020, in a rural area of Taraza, Antioquia department, a social leader was killed in the Urales community by unidentified armed individuals. The victim was the coordinator of the Conciliation Committee of the Urales Council Communal Action (JAC) board. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 15 June 2020, in Campo Giles, Norte de Santander department, a former member of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia (FARC) was killed by unidentified armed individuals. The victim was collaborating with the Agency for Reincorporation and Normalization. 1 fatality.

Around 14 June 2020 (as reported), in a rural area of the Morales municipality, Cauca department, unidentified armed individuals took an indigenous leader, who was in a checkpoint created by residents to avoid the spread of the coronavirus. Later, the victim's body was found in El Playon, La Fortaleza Community Council. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: On 13 June 2020, in the rural area of Caloto municipality (Cauca), an indigenous man was killed by seven armed men from the FARC dissident group Dagoberto Ramos, in the Huellas reserve. The perpetrators were captured and arrested right after the attack by members of the Guardia Indigena, with no clash reported. 1 fatality
On 13 June 2020, in Barranquilla, Atlantico, a man was shot dead by unknown armed individuals. The victim was a teacher who also was a human rights defender. 1 fatality.

On 12 June 2020, in the Mesetas municipality, Meta department, the son of a former FARC member was killed by unidentified armed individuals, in the Territorial Reintegration and Training Area (ETCR) Mariana Paez. 1 fatality.

On 12 June 2020, in El Plateado, Cauca, two men were shot dead by armed individuals. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators, circumstances of death, or crime motivation. The area is known for the presence of armed groups, including FARC dissident members of the Carlos Patino front and members of the ELN. 2 fatalities.
On 11 June 2020, in Puerto Asis, Putumayo, a motorcycle salesman was shot dead in a motorcycle workshop by two armed individuals. Two La Constru Gang members were arrested as suspects. 1 fatality.
On 10 June 2020, in Puerto Leguizamo municipality, Putumayo, an indigenous man was killed by members of the New Sinaloa Guerrilla group in the indigenous community of Cecilia Cocha. 1 fatality.

Around 9 June 2020 (as reported), in San Faustino, Norte de Santander, a woman was killed and her handcuffed body was found with a shot in the head. According to the report the woman was killed by the ELN. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 48th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (48th Front - Pedro Martinez)
assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: On 8 June 2020, in the rural area of San Miguel municipality (coded to La Dorada, Putumayo), a social leader was killed by armed men in San Juan del Bosco village. The victim, who was the president of the local JAC, had recently reported threats from the 48th FARC Dissident Front, after they complained about the strict coronavirus quarantine measures imposed by the dissident group. He was under the protection of the National Protection Unit (UNP). Other sources reported La Mafia Gang (Border Command) as the perpetrator. 1 fatality.

On 7 June 2020, in a rural area of the Ituango municipality in the Antioquia department, members of the Gulf Clan attacked people in the Quebrada del Medio village, close to the Territorial Space for Reincorporation and Training (ETCR) Roman Ruiz. 3 people were killed, among them two minors and the son of a former FARC member. The FARC political party rejected the attack. 3 fatalities.

On 7 June 2020, in the municipality of Jambalo, Cauca, unidentified armed men shot and threw explosive devices at members of the indigenous guard who were near a checkpoint established to control the entry to the territory due to the coronavirus outbreak in El Trebol sector. Five of the perpetrators were detained by the indigenous guards. The area is known for the presence of several armed groups, including the FARC.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: On 7 June 2020, in the municipality of Puerto Asis, Putumayo (coded to Puerto Asis), a social leader was attacked by 6 armed men. The victim who was unharmed is the current secretary of the Communal Action Board of the Vereda Monta Bello in Pinuna Blanco.

On 6 June 2020, in a rural area of Caloto, Cauca department, unidentified armed individuals started to shoot at a group of civilians who were at the Santa Rita village, Toez reserve. Two indigenous people were injured. Allegedly, the attack occurred because the group of people were breaching the implemented quarantine due to the coronavirus pandemic. No fatalities reported.

On 6 June 2020, in Saravena, Arauca, an off-duty female military officer was abducted. The ELN claimed responsibility for the kidnapping in a statement. Her whereabouts are unknown. [women targeted: government officials]
Around 4 June 2020 (as reported), in a rural area of Cienaga, Magdalena department, a farmer was killed in the La Trampa sector in San Pedro by unidentified armed individuals. 1 fatality.
On 4 June 2020, in Tierralta, Cordoba department, a member of the Guardia Indigena and the Kapupodo community was killed by unidentified armed individuals. 1 fatality.

On 4 June 2020, in Fonseca, La Guajira, an unknown number of armed individuals shot at the house of a teacher and representative of the municipality's labor association in the Las Delicias neighborhood. No injuries were reported.

On 3 June 2020, in the rural area of Puerto Asis municipality (Putumayo), a farmer was killed by unidentified armed men in Kilili village. The victim was part of the National Program for the Substitution of Illicit Crops. The area is known for the presence of armed groups, including one called the Mafia. 1 fatality

On 3 June 2020, in Algeciras municipality, Huila, an armed individual shot and injured two women and a man, all of them identified as local peasants, in Las Brisas rural. The male victim is the president of the Cooperative of Beekeepers of the municipality and one of the women is the president of the Women Head of Household Peace Managers Association. The perpetrator asked about the farmer before carrying out the attack. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Around 3 June 2020 (as reported), in the rural area of Santander de Quilichao municipality (Cauca), a social leader and human rights activist was killed and his body found on a road in Taminango area. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators, circumstances of death, or crime motivation. The victim received threats in December 2019. 1 fatality

Around 3 June 2020 (as reported), in the rural area of Valle del Guamuez municipality, Putumayo (coded to La Hormiga), an indigenous man was killed and his body found in Santa Teresa village. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators, circumstances of death, or crime motivation. The area is known for the presence of armed groups, including one called the Mafia. 1 fatality

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 1 June 2020, in Florida municipality, Valle del Cauca department, a social leader and general secretary of the Council of Communal Action (JAC) was killed in the area of Pueblo Nuevo by unidentified armed individuals. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: On 1 June 2020, in rural areas of Puerto Libertador municipality, Cordoba department, two farmers were killed in two separate events, in Rio Sucio and Villanueva areas. In both events, the victims were taken from their houses and shot dead. One of the victims was a member of the Council of Communal Action (JAC). 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
notes: On 1 June 2020, in El Plateado rural district (corregimiento), Cauca, two men were shot dead by armed individuals from the FARC dissident group Carlos Patino. Also, another person was killed by armed members of the Carlos Patino FARC front. The victims had been declared military targets by the FARC for collaborating with other armed groups. 3 fatalities.

Around 1 June 2020 (as reported), in the La Uribe municipality, Meta (coded to Uribe), a man was killed and his body was later found in the rural area. In the area FARC dissident groups have been active recently. 1 fatality.
On 1 June 2020, in Cumbitara, Narino, two men and a woman were killed by members of the ELN. 3 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 31 May 2020, in Pueblo Nuevo, Valle del Cauca, unknown gunmen shot and killed the secretary of the Council of Communal Action in front of his house. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: On 30 May 2020, in Toribio Municipality, Cauca (coded to Tacueyo), members of the Dagoberto Ramos Front shot and killed two Venezuelan migrants and injured other two. According to reports, the victims were attacked most likely because they failed to comply with the coronavirus restrictions imposed by this group. 2 fatalities, 2 injured.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 30 May 2020, in Campoalegre, Huila department, a former Revolutionary Forces of Colombia (FARC) member was killed by an unidentified armed individual in the Alfonso Lopez neighbourhood. No threats were known against the victim. 1 fatality.

Around 30 May 2020 (as reported), on a road between Pasto and Tumaco, Narino department, two staff members of the Office of the Prosecutor were attacked by unidentified armed individuals. It is that this armed action would be in retaliation to the constant and significant investigative and judicial work carried out by the Office of the Prosecutor against organized armed groups that commit crimes in the area. The victims survived the attack.
On 29 May 2020, near Corinto, Cauca, two indigenous doctors of the Nasa indigenous group were tortured and killed by heavily armed individuals in the Paez indigenous reserve. 2 fatalities.

On 27 May 2020, in Algeciras municipality (Huila), a farmer and social leader was killed by unidentified armed men, between the villages of El Guayaboand Lbano Occidente, while on his farm. The victim was the president of the local Parents' Association. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators or crime motivation. 1 fatality

Around 27 May 2020 (as reported), in Orito municipality, Putumayo, a taxi driver who had previous convictions for several crimes including narcotics trafficking, was killed. His body was found with two gunshot wounds in the rural hamlet (vereda) San Andres. In the area the 48th Front of FARC Dissidents has a presence, as does the criminal group La Constru. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Second Marquetalia: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Segunda Marquetalia)
assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
source: El Colombiano; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: On 27 May 2020, in Neiva municipality (Huila), two members of the Second Marquetalia FARC Dissident group killed a former Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia (FARC) member in the El Diamante rural hamlet (vereda). 1 fatality.

On 26 May 2020, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander department, a female social leader was stabbed inside a public bus by an unidentified armed individual. The victim survived the attack. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 26 May 2020, in a rural area of Tiquisio municipality, Bolivar department, a miner leader was killed in his house by unidentified armed individuals. Prior to the attack, the victim informed that a social leader had disappeared on May 21 in the San Pablo rural area. 1 fatality.

On 26 May 2020, in Timbiqui, Cauca, two men were killed by unknown armed men. In the area since 22 May armed clashed between the ELN: National Liberation Army and FARC Dissidents have been reported. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 26 May 2020, in Jurado, Choco, a former FARC-EP combatant in the process of reintegration was attacked by unknown individuals. The victim was injured. No fatalities.
On 25 May 2020, in Algeciras, Huila, a social leader was killed by unidentified armed individuals in San Juanito neighbourhood. There have been 110 social leaders who were killed in 2020. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Indigenous Group (Colombia)
notes: On 24 May 2020, in the Caloto municipality, Cauca, at least ten armed individuals arrived to the Lopez Adrentro indigenous reserve and opened fire indiscriminately on a crowd in which two former FARC fighters were present, hitting one indigenous man and killing him. They then fled. 1 fatality.

On 23 May 2020, in Santander de Quilichao municipality (Cauca), one indigenous person was killed. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators, circumstances of death, or crime motivation. 1 fatality

assoc_actor_2: ANZORC: National Association of Peasant Reserve Zones; Farmers (Colombia)
notes: On 23 May 2020, in Bogota, Bogota, D.C., unknown individuals shot at the headquarters of the National Association of Peasant Reserve Zones, located in the city centre. Nobody was hit. No fatalities.

On 23 May 2020, in San Jose de Ure, Cordoba department, a former candidate of the Independent Social Alliance Movement (ASI) was killed by unidentified armed individuals. The attack occurred during a curfew implemented in the municipality. 1 fatality.

Around 23 May 2020 (as reported), in Frontino, Antioquia, unidentified assailants killed three men who were first detained by this group. The victims' bodies were dumped outside of the urban area. In this region there are ongoing territorial disputes between the Gulf Clan, the FARC and ELN. 3 fatalities.

On 22 May 2020, outside El Ramal, Cauca, six armed men shot and killed a farmer and his son while they were harvesting coffee. FARC dissidents of the Carlos Patino front are active in this area. 2 fatalities.

On 22 May 2020, in Orito, Putumayo, two people were killed in the Heliconia neighbourhood. the victims were killed after they violated the restrictions imposed by an armed group to prevent the spread of coronavirus. 2 fatalities.
On 21 May 2020, in Munguido, Choco, ELN fighters shot and killed a former ELN member who was in the process of reintegration near his home. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Women (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: On 21 May 2020, in the rural area of Cumaribo municipality (Vichada), a female social activist was shot dead by an ELN member while inside her house, in Puerto Narino vereda. She was the former president of the local JAC. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 20 May 2020, in a rural area of the Litoral del San Juan municipality, Choco department, a former FARC member was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals, in the Munguido community. 1 fatality.

Around 20 May 2020 (as reported), in Tumaco, Narino, two men were killed by unknown individuals. It is reported that the killing was related to ongoing clashes between the Oliver Sinisterra FARC Dissident front and the Los Contadores Gang in the area. 2 fatalities.

source: El Espectador; INDEPAZ; Noticias Caracol; UNOCHA
notes: On 20 May 2020, in a rural area of Anori, Antioquia, a group of military officers detained farmers and killed one of them in Tenche Bajo rural district (corregimiento). The area is part of the National Crop Substitution Program. The motive of the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 May 2020, in Puerto Tejada, Cauca department, two police officers physically assaulted two civilians for breaking quarantine measures introduced in the municipality amid the coronavirus pandemic. One of the victims was beaten up with a stick to the head and left arm. He died due to the severity of his injuries, after suffering a head trauma. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 19 May 2020 (as reported), in Becerril municipality, in Cesar department, a social leader was killed and his body was found inside his property in the Canada rural hamlet (vereda) in the Estados Unidos rural district (corregimiento). The victim was the president of the Council of Communal Action (JAC). 1 fatality.
On 19 May 2020, in Puerto Echeverry, Choco, members of the ELN abducted a boat driver. He was released a day later.

On 18 May 2020, in Morales Municipality, Cauca, unknown individuals shot and killed a pregnant minor in the San Roque district. At the site the killers left a sign saying that she was an informant for an armed group. the girl had been a victim of sexual abuse by members of an armed group. 1 fatality. [women targeted: girls]

actor1: FARC Dissident - Carlos Patino Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Carlos Patino Front)
assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 18 May 2020, in Puerto Rico, Cauca department, a former member of the Revolutionary Forces of Colombia (FARC) was killed by members of the Carlos Patino dissident front. The victim had been receiving threats by this front. 1 fatality.

Around 18 May 2020 (as reported), in a rural area of Cucuta, Norte de Santander department, a farmer was killed and two other farmers were injured by military forces. The attack occurred in the Vigilancia rural hamlet (vereda). A national farmers' organization informed that this was an attack while military records stated that they clashed with farmers when they tried to avoid military forces to eradicate illicit crops. 1 fatality.

source: INDEPAZ; Colombian Commission of Jurists; UNOCHA
notes: Around 18 May 2020 (as reported), in a rural area of Ricaurte municipality, Narino department, an indigenous person from the reserve Palmar Imbi, was killed by unidentified armed individuals. On 5 February 2020, a memo was issued warning of the risk of forced displacement due to threats from armed groups in the Palmar Imbi reserve. 1 fatality.
On 17 May 2020, in Popayan, Cauca department, a former National Liberation Army (ELN) member was killed in the Maria Oriente neighbourhood by unidentified armed individuals. 1 fatality.
On 16 May 2020, in Santiago de Cali, Valle del Cauca department, a social leader and environmentalist was killed by unidentified armed individuals. 1 fatality.
On 16 May 2020, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander department, a social leader was killed inside his house by unidentified armed individuals. The perpetrators left the scene on a motorcycle. 1 fatality.

On 15 May 2020, in the rural area of Argelia municipality (Valle del Cauca), an Embera indigenous man was killed by unidentified armed men, in the Bania Chami indigenous reserve. He was the member of the local Guardia Indigena. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators. 1 fatality

On 14 May 2020, in Corinto, Cauca department, three men were killed by unidentified armed individuals inside a house in Gustavo Mejia neighbourhood. The motive of the attack is unknown but in previous days, neighbors received death threats for those who break the obligatory isolation implemented during the coronavirus outbreak. 3 fatalities.

Around 14 May 2020 (as reported), in the rural area of Tumaco, Narino, three men were killed and their bodies were later found wrapped in tape. There is presence of several armed groups in Tumaco area. 3 fatalities.

On 14 May 2020, in Barranquilla, Atlantico department, armed men on motorcycles in a drive-by shooting killed three people in the Pinar del Rio neighbourhood. One of the victims was a social leader who helped displaced people get their land back. 3 fatalities.

On 13 May 2020, in Argelia municipality, Cauca, two men were killed by unknown assailants in the Nuevo Horizonte rural hamlet (vereda). FARC dissidents and the ELN are disputing the control of the area. 2 fatalities.

On 11 May 2020, in La Julia, Meta, gunmen on a motorcycle shot and killed a man who was a farm worker in a drive-by shooting. In the area where the attack took place FARC dissident groups have been active. 1 fatality.

Around 10 May 2020 (as reported), in Santa Cruz Mompox, Bolivar department, a leader of the LGBT community was attacked inside a hostel by unidentified armed individuals. The victim survived the attack. No further information.
On 10 May 2020, in Payan, Narino, unidentified gunmen shot and killed an off-duty police officer. He had also been beaten with a blunt object. 1 fatality.

On 9 May 2020, in Bojaya municipality, Choco, members of an unidentified armed group kidnapped two members of the Embera indigenous community in the Salinas community. On the same day of this kidnapping, members of the ELN and the Gulf Clan clashed in the area (coded separately).
On 9 May 2020, in Nuevo Olivo, Choco, two men of the Embera indigenous group were kidnapped by unknown individuals. The whereabouts of the victims is unknown

The United Nations Verification Mission condemned the attack. 1 fatality.

On 7 May 2020, in the rural area of Suarez municipality, Cauca, an indigenous person was shot dead in front of his house by armed men who fled on a motorcycle in Come Dulce hamlet (vereda) of Bellavista rural district (corregimiento). According to investigations, the man might have been killed for refusing to transport members of an armed group, since the victim was a bus driver. 1 fatality
Around 6 May 2020 (as reported), in a rural area in Barbacoas, Narino department, an Awa Indigenous person was killed by unidentified armed individuals in the area Los Telembies. 1 fatality.

Around 5 May 2020 (as reported), in Cartagena, Bolivar department, a man threw a liquid against the face of a female health worker who was walking on the street with her uniform. The liquid did not cause burns to her face. Attacks on doctors and nurses are reported to have increased in recent days as a consequence of the coronavirus pandemic.

On 4 May 2020, in Plato, Magdalena department, a man was killed by unidentified armed individuals. There are two versions. One version indicated that the man was killed during the looting toward several local stores and that 7 people were arrested during the looting. Another version indicated that the victim was attacked by unidentified armed individuals but the victim was not participating in the looting. 1 fatality.

The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 15 March 2020, in Bogota-Ciudad Bolivar (Bogota DC), a member of the Guardia Indigena and of the Wounaan community was killed. He was originally from Bajo Baudo Bizarro, Choco, and had been displaced to Bogota due to constant threats against his community. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators, circumstances of death, or crime motivation. 1 fatality

Around 15 March 2020 (as reported), in Abrego (Norte de Santander), EPL militants shot and killed two people in La Inmaculada neighborhood. A note attributed to the EPL was found next to their bodies, justifying the attack. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)

Around 15 March 2020 (as reported), in a rural area of Puerto Guzman municipality (Putumayo), a man was shot death and his body was found in El Paujil vereda. Reports indicate the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 15 March 2020 (as reported), in Pradera vereda (Putumayo), two people were killed and their bodies found with gunshot wounds. Reports indicate the area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 14 March 2020 (between 10 - 17 March), in San Antonio corregimiento (Cauca), unidentified armed men killed a youth and his body was found near the riverside in San Diego neighborhood. The youth had been reported missing on 10 March 2020 and his body was found with signs of decomposition on 17 March 2020. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 14 March 2020 (weekend of), in Chachajo corregimiento (Choco), armed Gulf Clan members decapitated five people. As a result, around 1300 people were displaced and another 2192 confined to their homes by the ensuing panic. 5 fatalities.

Around 14 March 2020 (as reported), in a rural area of Albania municipality (La Guajira), unidentified armed men abducted a farmer from his land in Marcelo Ranchos vereda. His whereabouts are unknown.

Around 13 March 2020 (as reported), in Morales municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed men shot and killed the owner of a cell phone store. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
Around 13 March 2020 (as reported), in Buenaventura municipality (Valle del Cauca), two unidentified men abducted a youth. The area is known for the presence of armed groups.

The group demanded a ransom of roughly $82,000 USD but ultimately released him, unharmed, three days later due to intense military and police pressure in the area.

Around 11 March 2020, in Algeciras, Huila department, a man was killed by unidentified armed individuals, in his house in Siglo XXI neighbourhood. The victim was a former member of the Patriotic Union (UP) party and was also the son of a man who was captured years ago in the middle of a military operation called 'Aurora'. In this prior operation, the Teofilo Forero front of the Farc was disintegrated. 1 fatality.

One individual died and another one was injured during the attack. Authorities informed that in the place of the attack there were Front 18- FARC graffiti. 1 fatality and 1 injured.

On 27 February 2020, in Puerto Asis, Putumayo, two men on motorcycles shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in Playa Brisas del Hong Kong neighborhood. The fatality was the owner of a local bar. Three people were injured. 1 fatality. 3 wounded.

The armed individuals entered the house asking for a package. Local authorities informed that the area is known for armed clashes for the control of drug sales between armed groups. No further information. Four fatalities reported.

On 26 February 2020, in Valle del Guamuez municipality (coded to La Hormiga), Putumayo, a civilian was injured by the Colombian military forces in the rural hamlet (vereda) El Maizal. The circumstances of the attack are not reported. 1 injured.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz

Soldiers accused the victims of being members of armed groups and obliged them to take off their shoes and shirts. Soldiers taped a video where the victims were saying that they have received good treatment by soldiers who are in the area. No further information.
On 25 February 2020, in Cucuta municipality, Norte de Santander, a farmer was abducted by members of the ELN in Los Cambulos rural area. His whereabout is unknown.

On 24 February 2020, in Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca, five men on motorcycles attacked a social leader and human rights defender in a drive-by shooting in Kennedy neighbourhood. The armed men shot at the car driving the social leader. There were no casualties.

On 24 February 2020, in Calle Larga corregimiento (Cauca), ELN members abducted three civilians on a boat, including two employees of Energizar SAS and the boat's driver. All three victims were confirmed to have been released on 26 March.
On 24 February 2020, in Huisito, Arauca, a former fifth in command of the ELN was killed. The circumstances around his killing are not reported. 1 fatality.

On 24 February 2020, in Mondomo, Santander de Quilichao, several armed men shot and killed one man and injured other four. According to reports, days before the attack threatening pamphlets from FARC dissidences against people who stay in the streets at night were circulated. 1 fatality.

Around 24 February 2020 (as reported), in Bellavista, Bojaya, indigenous authorities reported the abduction of an Indigenous leader. The report does not state the perpetrators and the circumstances around the abduction.
On 24 February 2020, in Villa Del Rosario municipality, Norte De Santander, the ELN: National Liberation Army kidnapped a person. This person was released in May 2020 for humanitarian reasons.

On 22 February 2020, in Puerto Leguizamo municipality, Putumayo, a member of the Witoto indigenous group from the Murui ethnic group was killed in the Indigenous reserve of Agua Negra. The circumstances around his killing are not reported. 1 fatality.

As reported on February 21, 2020, in Segovia, Antioquia department, a young leader was killed by unidentified armed individuals. On 12 February 2020, in Hacari municipality, Norte de Santander, two unidentified men killed, with eight gunshots, a peasant in the village El Valle. There is no information about the perpetrators and the reason is unknown.

On 11 February 2020, in the rural area of Toribio municipality (Cauca), an indigenous man was shot dead by unidentified armed men, in Tacueyo reserve. On 11 February 2020, in a rural area of Certegui municipality (Colombia), an unidentified group abducted a merchant in La Toma vereda. Military and police forces secured release of the victim the following day.
