On 3 November 2019, in a rural area of Toribio municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed men attacked the indigenous local coordinator for the Guardia Indigena of Tacueyo corregimiento in La Playa vereda. The victim survived the attack. No fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); MP: Patriotic March; Coccam: National Coordinating Committee of Coca, Marijuana and Poppy Cultivators
notes: As reported on November 2, 2019, in Santa Rosa, Patia, Cauca, the leader of a peasant community was abducted from his house by unidentified armed men. The farmer is a member of the Peasant Movement of Coca Cultivators (Coccam) and the Patriotic March. The victim was later found dead. The motive of the attack is not reported. One fatality reported.
On 2 November 2019, in Arabia, Pereira, Risaralda, the recently elected mayor of the village was killed in his home. An armed man on a bicycle shot at him four times and fled.

assoc_actor_2: Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022) UNP: National Unit for Protection
notes: On 2 November 2019, in Altamira vereda (Cauca), unidentified armed men abducted and hours later killed an off-duty UNP guard from his girlfriend's home. The guard was assigned to protect a local indigenous leader. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
assoc_actor_2: Government of Colombia (2018-2022); Guardia Indigena (Colombia); Indigenous Group (Colombia)
notes: On 2 November 2019, in a rural area of Corinto municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed men attacked the indigenous town hall, injuring two members of the Guardia Indigena before fleeing on a motorcycle in Cabildo vereda. Two injuries, no fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 2 November 2019, in a rural area of Toribio municipality (Cauca), an 18-year-old indigenous youth not known to be an activist was shot dead by FARC dissidents members. Several other attacks by FARC dissidents were reported in the Cauca region in the same week. 1 fatality.

Around 2 November 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Cabuyaro municipality (Meta), unidentified armed men killed a man who failed to pay them extortion money. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 1 November 2019, in Florida, Valle del Cauca, a 24-year-old LGBT youth was beaten and injured by unidentified people. The youth was found in a sports court, with signs of torture and sexual violence.

On 31 October 2019, in the neighbourhood of Aranhuez, Medellin, two men were shot dead by two men in a motorcycle. The attackers took advantage of a motorcade of around 800 people masked for Halloween.
On 31 October 2019, in Chigorodo, Antioquia, a member of the indigenous group Embera Eyadbida was murdered in Polines.

On 31 October 2019, in the Sierra Nevada de Santa Marta, Aracataca, Magdalena department, the body of a Wiwa indigenous person was found. Next to the body, members of the Aguilas Negras left pamphlets threatening people and authorities from the WIWA community. One fatality recorded.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: Around 31 October 2019 (as reported), in Santa Helena, Corinto ,Cauca, four people were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture and cut necks. The victims who were part of a team of topographers surveying the area with the use of drones, were killed by FARC dissident members. No arrests were reported. 4 fatalities.

On 31 October 2019, in Sibundoy, Putumayo, two indigenous people were killed by unidentified armed individuals in Tabonoc neighbourhood. The motive of the attack is not reported. The department is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: Around 31 October 2019 (as reported), in Huasano vereda, Caloto, Cauca, an indigenous man was killed and his body was found. The victim was killed by members of the Dagoberto Ramos FARC Dissident Front. 1 fatality.

Around 31 October 2019 (as reported), in Valledupar municipality, Cesar, a member of the Kankuamo indigenous community was killed in Kankuamo reserve. A message signed by Las Aguilas Negras group was found next to the body. 1 fatality.
On 30 October 2019, in Cali (Valle Del Cauca) a dismembered body was found inside a suitcase in the neighbourhood of Villa del Lago. No arrests were reported.

On 30 October 2019, in Toribio (Cauca), a civilian was shot to death by unidentified suspects, who assaulted him from a motorbike. The victim was an indigenous man, founder of the Indigenous Association 'Avelino UI', and also member of other socio-political groups in the region. No arrests were reported.

On 30 October 2019, in San Calixto municipality, Norte De Santander, the designated registrar for the municipal elections was kidnapped by a group of armed suspects in La Cantina area. The victim was released on the same day, and the identity of the perpetrators was still unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in this department.

Around 29 October 2019 (as reported), in Corinto, Cauca a human rights advocate was killed under unknown circumstances. Family members reported the victim was abducted, tortured and killed by members of the Military Forces. Conversely, authorities reported the advocate was killed by a stray-bullet in the middle of an armed clash between FARC dissidents and the Army. No arrests were reported. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: On 29 October 2019, in Toribio municipality, Cauca department, FARC dissidents of the 6th Front ambushed a van and shot and killed five passengers and injured five more in a drive-by shooting in La Luz vereda. One victim was a Nasa indigenous leader and four victims were from the Guardia Indigena. The motive of the attack is not reported. No arrests were made. 5 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 28 October 2019, in Curillo (Caqueta), a former FARC dissident was shot and killed by a hooded suspect who broke into his residence. No arrests were reported.

Around 27 October 2019 (as reported), in Villa Del Rosario municipality, Norte De Santander, a man was killed and his body was found on a rural road. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 26 October 2019 (as reported), in La Parada, Villa Del Rosario, Norte de Santander, a man was killed and his body was found on a road known as Los Mangos. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: PU: Social Party of National Unity
notes: On 25 October 2019, in El Agrado, Huila, a council candidate from the U Party was attacked and injured with a sharp weapon, by unidentified men.

Around 25 October 2019 (as reported), in Puerto Asis, Putumayo, a teacher who worked in the National Learning Institute (SENA) was killed and his body was found in his house. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. The department is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Government of Colombia (2018-2022)
notes: On 24 October 2019, in Mesetas, Meta, a former FARC member who was working as state contractor and was the husband of a FARC councilor, was shot dead by two unidentified armed men, while he was at a Territorial Training and Reintegration Area (ETCR). The attack happened three days before the local elections in the country. 1 fatality.

On 23 October 2019, in Soledad, Atlantico, three women were shot and injured by unidentified armed men, in Villa Karla neighbourhood. They were in the balcony of a house when two men arrived in a motorcycle, stepped down, and shot at them. One man was arrested.

On 23 October 2019, in Miramontes, Tibu, Norte de Santander, the body of a man was found with a shot in the head. A message was left saying 'killed for being an addict and a thief'. The police suspects the man is Venezuelan.

assoc_actor_2: PU: Social Party of National Unity
notes: On 23 October 2019, in Arauca, Arauca, unidentified men on a motorcycle carried out a drive-by shooting against a house used as a campaign headquarters by a candidate of the PU party running for mayor. No fatalities or injuries occurred. No armed group has claimed the attack yet.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 23 October 2019, in Santa Cruz corregimiento, Patia, Cauca, two men, including a former member of FARC who was taking part in the implementation of the peace process, were killed. Information on the attackers is unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 23 October 2019, in San Calixto municipality, Norte de Santander, a farmer was shot dead on a road to Piedecuesta vereda. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. 1 fatality.
On 22 October 2019, in El Campo, Florencia, Cauca, a mayorship candidate from the Radical Change party was attacked by armed men while on a car in a rural road. No injuries were reported.
On 22 October 2019, in Chorillos, Caloto, Cauca, six armed men abducted three indigenous men who were being investigated under the Special Indigenous Jurisdiction.

On 22 October 2019, in La Vega municipality, Cauca, armed men who arrived on a motorcycle shot at the mayoral candidate for La Vega in La Empinada vereda. The victim survived the attack with no injuries. Information on the attackers is unknown.

On 20 October 2019, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, the body of a Venezuelan man with gunshot wounds to the head and abdomen was found in Viejo Escobal neighbourhood, near the border with Venezuela. He had been kidnapped by around 30 men while at the bar hours before. Locals claimed hooded men from the ELN were seen in the area.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Colombia (2018-2022); PDA: Alternative Democratic Pole
notes: On 20 October 2019, in Yolombo municipality, Antioquia, a congressman from the PDA party was attacked by several armed men while on the highway from Segovia to Medellin. Other three people were in his car. No one was injured. According to the report, the victim had been receiving threats for the past three months. Information on the attackers is unknown.
On 19 October 2019, in Monteria, Cordoba, the body of a woman was found in a sewage. The body was dismembered, inside a black plastic bag, and in advanced stage of decomposition.

On 19 October 2019, in Santa Risa de Cabal, Risaralda, Caqueta department, the coordinator of a political candidate's campaign was killed by unidentified armed individuals. Another man was also killed during the attack. One of the victims received threats in previous days. The motive of the attack is not reported. Two fatalities recorded.

On 19 October 2019, in Riohacha, La Guajira, a member of the Wayuu indigenous community was killed in front of his house in Buenos Aires neighbourhood by unidentified armed individuals. The victim was the brother of the traditional authority in the area. Another person was injured during the attack. The motive of the attack is not reported. 1 fatality.
On 19 October 2019, in Toledo, Norte de Santander, armed men shot at the car of a mayoral candidate from Toledo Avanza movement while he was leaving a meeting. No fatalities or injuries occurred.
On 18 October 2019, in Llorente, Tumaco, Narino, a journalist and broadcaster was shot dead by two armed men while on his work at a community station.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Jaime Martinez: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Jaime Martinez)
notes: Around 18 October 2019 (as reported), in Guachinte, Jamundi, Valle del Cauca, FARC dissident members of the Jaime Martinez front executed four men and one woman. Authorities believed the victims were buying drugs from this dissident front, but this hypothesis was not confirmed. 5 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 18 October 2019, in San Antonio vereda, Santander de Quilichao, Cauca, a member of Niguala community council was killed by unidentified armed individuals. According to the authorities, motives of the attack are related to settling of scores. 1 fatality.

Around 18 October 2019 (as reported), in El Cedro corregimiento, Yarumal, Antioquia, members of the community reported the incursion of 20 ELN members in the community. The armed men shot at the houses and vehicles. No fatalities or injuries occurred.

On 18 October 2019, in Riohacha municipality, La Guajira, unidentified men on a motorcycle carried out a drive-by shooting against a female candidate running for the regional council of environment (CorpoGuajira) on a road to Valledupar. The victim was members of the Wayuu indigenous community. The victim survived the attack. Motives of the attack are unknown. [women targeted: candidates for office]
As reported on 17 October 2019, in Medellin, Antioquia, the body of a woman was found in the Medellin River. The victim had her hair shaved and was shot four times in the back of her head.
On 17 October 2019, in a rural road near Calarca, Quindio, unidentified perpetrators killed a political leader of the Embera community.

As reported on 17 October 2019, in Pereira, Risaralda department, an unidentified armed man, allegedly member of an illegal armed organization, broke into the house of a political candidate for the AV party. Her daughter was in the house at the moment of the attack. No injuries or fatalities were reported. [women targeted: candidates for office][women targeted: girls]

assoc_actor_2: Wayuu Indigenous Group (Colombia); Women (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 17 October 2019, in Riohacha, La Guajira department, two armed men on a motorcycle killed a social leader of the Wayuu community in a drive-by shooting. Four more people were reported injured in the attack. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Around 17 October 2019 (as reported), in Toribio municipality, Cauca, unidentified men shot at the vehicle of a Nasa indigenous leader and member of the Guardia Indigena on a rural road nearby El Palo corregimiento. The victim survived the attack with no injuries.

On 16 October 2019, in Santiago de Cali, Valle del Cauca, an unidentified armed man shot several times against the official headquarters of the candidate of the Green Party running in the local elections. No injuries or fatalities occurred.

On 16 October 2019, in Abrego municipality, Norte de Santander, a man was shot dead on a road to Ocana. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 15 October 2019, in Totoro, Cauca, armed individuals attacked and shot two members of the Guardia Indigena from the Indigenous Reserve Polindara. Both victims were injured and transported to hospital. No fatalities occurred.

assoc_actor_2: Former AUC: United Self-Defence Forces of Colombia
notes: On 15 October 2019, in Valledupar, Cesar, a former member of the AUC was killed in Altos de Pimienta neighbourhood. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 14 October 2019 (as reported), in Cartagena, Bolivar, a man was stabbed to death by members of the Gulf Clan in El Mirador neighbourhood. His body was found along with a message accusing the victim of snitching. 1 fatality.

On 13 October 2019, in Buenavista, Narino department, an armed man killed the secretary of an Awa community in this area. The woman was a recognized leader of the community and worked for the restitution of indigenous territories. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

assoc_actor_2: PU: Social Party of National Unity
notes: On 13 October 2019, in Santa Cruz de Lorica municipality, Cordoba, two unidentified armed men killed a political member of the PU party in a drive-by shooting in Tierraltica corregimiento. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 October 2019, in Tacueyo, Toribio, Cauca, unidentified armed men killed a Nasa indigenous man, member of the Guardia Indigena. The group claim the attack is a retaliation for the prohibition of drugs inside indigenous territories.
As reported on 12 October 2019, in the rural area of Medellin, Antioquia, the remains of a dismembered body were found. The body parts were near a road inside plastic bags.

On 12 October 2019, on a rural road of Ocana, Norte de Santander department, the vice-president of a worker's union and active member of the CR Party was attacked by two unidentified armed men. The perpetrators shot over eight times against the victim's car. No fatalities or injuries occurred.

Around 12 October 2019 (as reported), in Caldas municipality, Antioquia, a man was killed and his body was found dismembered inside plastic bags on a road known as 'la variante'. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 11 October 2019, near Carmen Del Darien (Choco), members of the Gaitanist Self-Defence Forces of Colombia (AGC)/Gulf Clan broke in the private residence of an Embera indigenous leader with the two hostages they had abducted the day before. One of them was released and exchanged for the indigenous leader. Both capitives were released by their captors on October 11.
As reported on 11 October 2019, in Bogota, unidentified men attacked with Molotov bombs and firearms the headquarters of FARC Party. No injuries or fatalities were reported

assoc_actor_2: PCC: Colombian Communist Party; UP: Patriotic Union
notes: As reported on 11 October 2019, in Teusaquillo, Bogota, unidentified men attacked with Molotov bombs and firearms the headquarters of the left parties the Colombian Communist Party and the PU Party. No injuries or fatalities were reported

As reported on October 10 2019, in Alto Andagueda, Choco, bordering with the department of Risaralda, members of the National Liberation Army (ELN) have attacked members of the indigenous Embera Katio communities. It is reported that 220 people from the Embera Katio communities have moved to Pereira fleeing the National Liberation Army.

On 10 October 2019, in La Buitrera ( Valle del Cauca), two decapitated and dismembered bodies were found on the banks of the Melendez river in state of decomposition. Officials reported that the decapitated heads were wrapped 100 metres away from the trunks and limbs of the victims. The identity of the suspects nor the motives behind the crime were unknown. No arrests were reported.

As reported on October 10, 2019, in El Palo, Caloto, Cauca department, a social leader was killed in a public area by unidentified armed individuals. The motive of the attack is not reported. One fatality recorded.

As reported on October 10 2019, in the Las Palmas, Cali sector, two bodies were found with signs of torture. It is reported that both bodies, that of a man and a woman, were dismembered. The reasons for the attack, the identification of the victims or that of the perpetrators are not reported.

On 10 October 2019, near El Alizal, Pamplona, Norte de Santander, armed men shot at the car of a mayorship candidate from the Liberal Party while she was on her way to a rural area. No injuries reported. [women targeted: candidates for office]

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz; UNOCHA
notes: On 10 October 2019, in El Carmen Del Darien, Choco, two Embera indigenous men were abducted by members of the Gaitanist Self-Defence Forces of Colombia (AGC)/Gulf Clan near the Ancadia river. The hostages were tortured and taken the day after to the residence of an indigenous leader. No further information was reported. According to the report, the victims were accused by the Gulf Clan of helping members of the ELN.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 18th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (18th Front)
source: El Universal (Colombia); Diario La Libertad; UNOCHA; El Colombiano
notes: On 10 October 2019, in Ituango municipality, Antioquia, three town-hall employees of this municipality were abducted by members of the FARC Dissident 18th Front on a road. Dissidents were demanding the municipality a total sum of 300 million pesos for their release. The Military Forces launched air and land operations in the northern area of the department to locate the group, eventually liberating the hostages on October 12th. No arrests were reported.

On 9 October 2019, in Tumaco, Narino, several armed men arrived in a boat and entered several homes to attack civilians. It is reported that seven people were taken to a sports court and five were killed. The reasons for the attack or the identification of the perpetrators are not reported.

Around 8 October 2019 (as reported), in the rural area of Canalete municipality, Cordoba, members of the Gulf Clan attacked and killed three individuals of Venezuelan nationality in the El Tomate corregimiento. It is reported that one of the victims showed signs of abuse. The reasons for the attack are not reported. 3 fatalities.

On 7 October 2019, in Puerto Wilches (Santander), a political candidate for the municipal council (PLC) was stabbed by an unidentified armed man aboard a motorcycle. Neither the identity of the suspect nor the motives behind the crime were known. The condition of the victim was stable.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 7 October 2019, in Balboa, Cauca, a former FARC member was attacked by an armed individual in the neighborhood Bolivar. The victim was in the process of reintegration as a former FARC member. Cauca is considered an increasingly unsafe department for former FARC members. One injured person.

Around 7 October 2019 (as reported), in Hacari, Norte de Santander, a Venezuelan national and a Colombian citizen were killed during an attack. The reasons for the attack or the identification of the perpetrators are not reported, but the department of Norte de Santander has presence of several armed groups.

On 6 October 2019, in Santander de Quilichao, Cauca, a lawyer and aspiring candidate for the municipal council (PLC) was attacked and killed by two armed individuals in a local public establishment in the neighborhood Mirador. 1 fatality.

Around 6 October 2019 (as reported), in the municipality of Tibu, Norte de Santander, a Venezuelan man was shot and killed and his body was found on a road in the La Libertad vereda. There are no reports of the identity of the perpetrators, circumstances of death, or crime motivation. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 5 October 2019, in the Viallabel sector, Floridablanca, Santander, a man, owner of a mechanical workshop, was attacked by several armed individuals aboard a motorcycle. The man was killed and the perpetrators fled. Police officers managed to arrest three individuals involved in the murder. The motives of the attack are unknown.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 4 October 2019, in Iscuande (Narino), a former FARC dissident was killed by gunmen aboard a motorcycle. The reasons behind the crime were unknown, and there were no arrests reported.

On 4 October 2019, in the rural area of Toribio, Cauca department, an indigenous artist was killed by unidentified suspects. After the attack, several pamphlets were distributed in the area with intimidating messages, which authorship is vested in Sinaloa Cartel, a Mexican drug-trafficking group that has intensified its presence in cocaine-producing areas in Colombia. No arrests were reported. One fatality recorded.
On 4 October 2019, in Tame, Arauca, a former public official was attacked and injured when he was accompanying a current mayoral candidate in the La Union neighbourhood.
On 4 October 2019, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander department, the president of a union for taxi drivers was attacked and shot by an armed individual. The victim was transported to hospital.

Around 3 October 2019 (between 2 October - 4 October), in the Miraflores neighborhood, Cali, a university student who kidnapped by two armed men on 2 October 2019 was killed. It is reported that the student was in a car in the company of three friends. On 4 October 2019, the student's body was found with burns and gunshot wounds. The reasons for the attack are unknown.

On 3 October 2019, in the village of Huasano, Corinto municipality, the bodies of two indigenous men were found. The two indigenous men were killed and their bodies presented signs of torture. It is reported that in recent weeks, several indigenous people have been killed in two regions of El Cauca.

As reported on 2 October 2019, in Carraipia (La Guajira), an Wayuu man was shot to death by unidentified suspects, who were also Wayuu. The reasons behind the crime were unknown, and no arrests were reported.

As reported on 2 October 2019, in the rural area of Cucuta (Norte De Santander), two corpses were found with shots and signs of violence, inside black plastic bags, near the Venezuelan border. Neither the identity of the perpetrators nor the reasons behind the crime were known. The area is known for the disputes over the domain of smuggling routes and extortions with irregular crossings.

On 1 October 2019, in Cucuta (Norte De Santander), a Venezuelan street vendor was shot to death by unidentified suspects in the neighbourhood of Cerro Norte. The reasons behind the crime were unknown, and there were no arrests reported.
Around 1 October 2019 (as reported), in the Talaga municipality, Cauca department, an indigenous man was killed and his body was found along a road from Paez Belalcazar and Taravira. 1 fatality.

On 30 September 2019, in Buenos Aires, Cauca, an indigenous leader was kidnapped by an armed man. It is reported that the victim was tortured by five people. Supposedly, the victim was kidnapped due to a kidnapping that happened in previous days. The victim was left tied on a pole alive.

On 30 September 2019, in La Caucana corregimiento, Taraza, Antioquia, several armed men broke into a bar and opened fire, killing three farmers and injuring six others. The fatal victims worked for the Taraza Cocoa Association and were part of the coca crop substitution program. There is no information on the identity or the affiliation of the attackers. In the territories of this location were known for being in dispute between Clan del Golfo and Los Caparros. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 3 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); MP: Patriotic March
notes: On 30 September 2019, in the rural area of Toribio, Cauca department, armed individuals attacked and killed an indigenous community member in the La Despensa vereda, resguardo San Francisco. The victim was a member of the Patriotic March and the founder of the Indigenous Associations Avelino UI, which seeks to defend the rights of indigenous groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 28 September 2019, in La Gabarra corregimiento, Tibu, a former FARC member was killed. According to reports, he was shot several times. There is no information on the attackers or the circumstances of the attack. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 28 September 2019, in Segovia municipality, Antioquia, armed men shot and killed three men who were in a bar in La Bomba sector. According to reports, the victims were miners. There report does not provide further detail of the attack. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 3 fatalities.

On 27 September 2019, in El Tarra, Norte de Santander, a farmer was killed. According to reports, three hooded men entered his house, took him out, and killed him. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 26 September 2019, in the rural area of the municipality of Paez (coded to Belalcazar), Cauca department, four unidentified armed men killed a member of the Guardia Indigena of Talaga reserve. According to reports, armed men broke into his house, opened fire and killed him. The week before the attack, the victim held a member of a FARC dissident front. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 26 September 2019, in the rural area of the municipality of Caloto, Cauca, a former FARC militant was killed in an area called Juntas, in the Huellas indigenous reserve. According to reports, he had received threats before. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Indigenous Group (Colombia); Farmers (Colombia); Coccam: National Coordinating Committee of Coca, Marijuana and Poppy Cultivators; ANZORC: National Association of Peasant Reserve Zones; MP: Patriotic March
notes: On 26 September 2019, in Patia municipality, Cauca, an indigenous leader was killed. According to reports, he was shot to death at height KM 37 on the route to El Estrecho corregimiento. He was a member of Coccam, the National Agricultural Unitarian Trade Union Federation, FENSUAGRO; National Association of Peasant Reserve Zones, Popular Unity Process of the Colombian Southwest, PUPSOC; and the Social and Political Coordination Cauca Patriotic March. There is no information on the identity or the affiliation of the attackers. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 25 September 2019, in Tierradentro, Inza municipality, Cauca department, a Nasa indigenous person and also member of the Guardia Indigena was killed by four unidentified armed individuals. Witnesses informed that the attack occurred after the victim captured a FARC dissident in the area. The motive of the attack is not reported. One fatality recorded.
As reported on 24 September 2019, in the rural area of Cali, Valle del Cauca department, the remains of three unidentified adult men were found. The victims were killed with gunshots.

assoc_actor_2: Indigenous Group (Colombia); Military Forces of Colombia (2018-2022)
notes: On 24 September 2019, near Cohetando, Paez, Cauca department, an unknown number of armed men killed two indigenous persons in the La Union vereda. According to reports, the men were killed after leaving a football match. One of the victims was an off-duty officer of the Military Forces of Colombia. There is no information on the identity or the affiliation of the attackers. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 2 fatalities.
As reported on 23 September 2019, in the rural area of Solano, Caqueta department, the remains of an indigenous leader were found. The body had several signs of torture.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 23 September 2019, in Caldono, Cauca department, unidentified armed men killed three adult men in the community of Pescador. One of the victims was a former member of the FARC.

assoc_actor_2: PU: Social Party of National Unity
notes: On 23 September 2019, in Isiacuri, Atlantico department, unidentified armed man beat a running candidate for the local elections of the municipality for the PU party.

On 23 September 2019, in Banco de Arena, Norte de santander department, the remains of a former soldier were found. Authorities claimed the victim was potentially killed in Venezuela and his body was later returned to Colombia. No further information about perpetrators was provided.

As reported on 22 September 2019, in the rural area of Puerto Santander, Norte de Santander department, a dismembered body was found. According to authorities a turf war between the EPL and Los Rastrojos Gang is taking place, however it is unclear if the killing is related to it.
On 21 September 2019, in a rural area of Banco de Arena, Norte de Santander department, alleged members of the EPL killed a man accused of abusing a kid in the community of Puerto Leon.

On 20 September 2019, in Corinto, Cauca, unidentified armed men abducted the brother of the mayor of the municipality of Corinto, while he was riding his motorcycle in the Pedro Leon neighborhood. There is no information on the abductors. His whereabouts are unknown.

On 20 September 2019, in Silvia municipality, Cauca, four indigenous people were abducted from the Guambia reserve. According to reports, armed men arrived in the community, and took the men with them. The victims had been sentenced by the community's authorities for homicide and were waiting to be taken to the Popayan prison. Their whereabouts are unknown.

As reported on September 19, 2019, in the Cancun neighborhood, in Montelibano, Cordoba department, a member of the LGBTI community was shot dead by unidentified armed individuals. The victim was threatened days before. The motive of the attack is not reported. One fatality recorded.

As reported on 19 September 2019, in the rural area of Paez, Cauca department, unidentified armed men attacked a group of members of the Guardia Indigena when the latter recovered a vehicle reported stolen. No casualties/injuries reported.

assoc_actor_2: Private Security Forces (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 19 September 2019, close to Pamplona, Norte de Santander department, soldiers attacked a political leader of Arauca. The political leader was inside a van with her bodyguard. The bodyguard was killed during the attack. Soldiers' version was that it was a mistake. The attack was due to the fact that soldiers had mistaken the vehicle of the political leader for one that had been stolen in La Lejia. The political leader's version was that soldiers had identified them before they attacked them. One fatality recorded.

On 18 September 2019, in the rural area of Fonseca municipality, La Guajira, ten armed men abducted a man affiliated with the CD party in Las Iguanas vereda. There is no information on the abductors. His whereabouts are unknown.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 16 September 2019, in Pinuna Blanco, Putumayo department, unidentified armed men attacked a member of the Nasa community in his house. The victim sustained serious injuries.
On 16 September 2019, In La Playa, Norte de Santander department, unidentified armed men killed a local farmer in the community of San Pedro. Perpetrators shot at the victim over seven times.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 16 September 2019, in Jamundi, Valle del Cauca, the campaign advisor for the Liberal Party candidate for mayor for the Jamundi, was abducted by FARC dissidents. There is no information on the affiliation of the abductors. The victim was rescued on 24 October.

Around 16 September 2019 (as reported), in the rural area of Alto Baudo municipality, Choco department, members of the ELN killed a man. Residents of the community were displaced after the killing. The report does not provide further detail on the killing. 1 fatality.
On 15 September 2019, in Medellin, Antioquia department, two unidentified armed men killed two Venezuelan migrants.

As reported on 15 September 2019, in the hamlet La Perla, municipality Puerto Guzman, Putumayo department, the remains of two unidentified men near the urban area of the hamlet were dropped. No further information about the victims was provided. The incident happened after the new Sinaloa Guerrillas announced that they were assuming control of the territory.

On 15 September 2019, in Tibu, Norte de Santander, a running candidate for mayor of the Colombian Conservative Party was killed. According to reports, the victim was about to get on a canoe with his team when unidentified armed men arrived, opened fire, and killed him. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.
On 15 September 2019, in Quibdo, Choco, two indigenous people from the Embera community were killed. There is no information on the attackers. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former ELN: National Liberation Army; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 13 September 2019, in Santa Rosa del Sur, Bolivar department, a former member of the National Liberation Army (ELN) was killed by unknown armed individuals. The victim was a member of the association Santa Rita and the Corporacion Sembrando Futuro de Paz. The motive of the attack is not reported. One fatality recorded.

On 13 September 2019, in Paez municipality (coded to Belalcazar), Cauca department, an indigenous man was killed in a drive-by shooting in front of his wife and kid by two unidentified armed individuals in Vitonco indigenous reserve. The perpetrators were riding a motorcycle at the time of the attack. The motive of the attack is not reported. 1 fatality.

On 13 September 2019, on the road that connects Maicao and Riohacha, La Guajira department, unidentified armed men killed a social leader of the Wayuu indigenous group. According to reports, the victim was in his car when he was intercepted by the armed men, who opened fire and killed him. 1 fatality.
On 13 September 2019, Puerto Guzman municipality, Putumayo department, members of The New Sinaloa Guerrilla killed three local farmers in Las Perlas vereda. 3 fatalities.
On 13 September 2019, in Potosi, Narino, a mayoral candidate of Radical Change, was abducted by unknown men. According to reports, the victim had not received threats before.

On 12 September 2019, in Bagado municipality, Choco department, members of an unidentified armed group opened fire against members of the Guardia Indigena of the Embera community in Alto Andagueda reserve. According to reports, one member of the Guardia indigena was injured. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 injured.

On 12 September 2019, in La Vega, Cundinamarca department, unidentified armed men attacked a running candidate for the local elections. The victim, member of the PLC party, resulted unharmed in the event. The attackers fled the scene. No fatalities or injuries occurred.

Around 12 September 2019 (week of), in Arauquita municipality, Arauca, a former military officer was abducted by an unidentified armed group. There is no further information on the circumstances of the abductions. There is no information on the affiliation of the abductors. His whereabouts are unknown.

On 12 September 2019, in Santander de Quilichao municipality, Cauca, two armed men shot and killed a man in El Aguila vereda. According to reports, the victim was a military officer who was on leave and belonged to the Canoas reserve. There is no further information on the attackers. Several groups have a presence in the area. 1 fatality.

On 11 September 2019, in Paz de Ariporo municipality, Casanare, six armed men abducted a recognized farmer, in his house located between Paz de Ariporo and Hato Corozal. According to reports, the victim was departing with his family when the men arrived and took him. There is no information on the identity of the abductors. His whereabouts are unknown.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
assoc_actor_2: Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022) UNP: National Unit for Protection
notes: On 10 September 2019, in Saravena, Arauca, an FARC dissident group abducted an off-duty officer of the UNP. According to reports, he was abducted while having lunch in his house. After seven hours, he was released to a humanitarian commission in a rural area of the municipality.

Around 10 September 2019 (as reported), in Paez municipality (coded to Agua Bendita), Cauca, a member of Guardian Indigena was killed and his body was found with signs of violence, in his house in the Avirama reserve. According to reports, the victim was beaten to death. No further information about potential perpetrators was provided. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: As reported on 09 September 2019, in Morales, Cauca, a soldier of the military forces of Colombia was abducted by a FARC dissident Faction. The remains of the victim were found two days later in the rural area of San Roque. The soldier was off-duty at the moment of the attack.

assoc_actor_2: CR: Radical Change; Government of Colombia (2018-2022)
notes: On 9 September 2019, in Caucasia, Antioquia, unidentified armed men attacked the private residence and the car of a running candidate of Radical Change who is also the president of the Council of Caucasia. The men shot several times at the victims' house. No fatalities or injuries occurred.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 9 September 2019, in Quibdo, Choco, a former member of the FARC was killed in the Las Margaritas neighborhood. There is no information on the attackers or the circumstances of the attack. 1 fatality.
On 8 September 2019, in Cristales, Caqueta department, unidentified armed men killed a social leader of the community in his private residence.

On 8 September 2019, in the rural area of Chimichagua in Cesar, three unidentified armed individuals shot dead a farmer and social leader in his house. The motive of the attack is not reported. One fatality recorded.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; ASCAMCAT: Catatumbo's Peasant Association; Farmers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 8 September 2019, in Teorama, Norte de Santander, ELN members abducted the Chairman of the JAC of Puente Azul who is also a member of ASCAMCAT. His whereabouts are unknown.
On 7 September 2019, in Toledo municipality, Antioquia, an unidentified armed man killed a running candidate for the CD party in the local elections in the Morales Toro vereda. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 06 September 2019, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander department, two unidentified armed men attacked a group of former FARC members in the lobby of a local hotel. Two of the victims were killed and one more injured.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Coccam: National Coordinating Committee of Coca, Marijuana and Poppy Cultivators; Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: On 6 September 2019, in Llorente, Tumaco, Narino, a communal leader was killed. According to reports, the victim was watching a football match in a bar, when he was shot and killed. He was the chairman of a Council of Communal Action and member of the National Coordination of Cultivators of Coca. There is no information on the perpetrators. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.
On 05 September 2019, in Cali, Valle del Cauca, two unidentified armed men killed a professional soccer player. The hitmen waited for the victim near his private residence.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); Guardia Indigena (Colombia); Nasa Indigenous Group (Colombia)
notes: On 5 September 2019, in the rural area of Villa Colombia corregimiento (Valle del Cauca), a Nasa indigenous person was shot dead and a farmer was injured by military soldiers in the La Esperanza area. One of the victims was a member of the Guardia Indigena. Witnesses mentioned that the body of the dead victim was transported by perpetrators to another place and a gun was placed next to the body. Military reports reported that the victim died during an armed clash. The motive of the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 05 September 2019, in Jamundi, Valle del Cauca department, military forces of Colombia attacked two members of the Guardia Indigena in the hamlet of Villa Colombia. They claimed soldiers attempted to modify the scene of the attack. One Guardia Indigena member was killed and one more injured.

assoc_actor_2: Santa Fe De Antioquia Communal Group (Colombia); Farmers (Colombia)
notes: On 5 September 2019, in La Milagrosa, Santa Fe de Antioquia, Antioquia, armed men shot and killed two farmers and local communal group leaders. There are no further details of the attack. 2 fatalities.

On 4 September 2019, in Tame, Arauca, unidentified perpetrators killed an indigenous leader of the Makaguan community. The victim was decapitated in her house. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 4 September 2019, in San Antonio vereda, Maceo, Antioquia, an unidentified armed man killed a social leader who advocated for the protection of natural resources. According to reports, the victim was departing with his family when the armed man arrived, opened fire, and killed him. 1 fatality.

On 4 September 2019, near Mondomo, Santander de Quilichao, Cauca department, a group of four armed men abducted a man on the highway, at the height that connects with the Mandiva vereda. The men forced the victim into a pickup truck. The victim was the owner of profitable companies in Santander de Quilichao. There is no information on the affiliation of the abductors. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. His whereabouts are unknown.

On 3 September 2019, in Guapi, Cauca, a social leader was killed by unidentified armed individuals. The victim was a member of the Junta Directiva del Consejo Comunitario de Chanzara. The motive of the attack is not reported. One fatality recorded.

Around 3 September 2019 (as reported), in San Carlos municipality, Cordoba, two men were killed and their bodies were found in the Cienaguita sector, Villa Maria farm. According to reports, the men worked in the farm when they were attacked, and their killing could be related to extortion. 2 fatalities.
On 01 September 2019, in Corinto, Cauca, the bodies of three men tied with barbed wires and their faces covered with black plastic bags were found.

Around 1 September 2019 (as reported), in La Betulia, Suarez, Cauca department, six people, including two running candidates for popular elections of the PLC party, were killed and their bodies were found burned, inside a burned truck. According to reports, one of the running candidates was reported missing over the weekend. Police stated that an unidentified armed group attacked the vehicle of the victims with gunshots and subsequently set the car on fire. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. One of the candidates had received threats in the past. 6 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Embera Indigenous Group (Colombia); Former ELN: National Liberation Army
notes: On 31 August 2019, in the rural area of Murindo, Antioquia, AGC/Gulf Clan members beat up an Embera indigenous in the community of Chajerado. The victim is a former member of the ELN, and the perpetrators demanded information about this armed group.

Around 31 August 2019 (as reported), in Bahia Solano municipality, Choco, a person was killed, and his beheaded body was found in a rural area. According to reports, the corpse bore signs of torture. Clashes between the Los Chacales gang and the Gulf Clan were reported in the area. 1 fatality.

On 31 August 2019, in Abejales vereda (Norte de Santander), two ELN members shot and killed a farmer in front of his daughter. A third member later disfigured the corpse, cutting out an eyeball. 1 fatality.

As reported on 30 August 2019, in Guachaca, Atlantico department, a member of the military forces of Colombia shot at a bus of public service. The bus driver tried to avoid a military checkpoint on the road. The action was strongly criticized considering the bus transported civilians at the moment of the event.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 30 August 2019, in a rural area of Remedios municipality (Antioquia), armed FARC Dissidents kidnapped a farmer and social leader from his farm. The victim was held overnight with another captive and released the following day.

On 29 August 2019, in the Buenos Aires neighborhood, Quimbaya, Quindio department, a member of the Union Patriotica and Alianza con Quimbaya was shot dead by unidentified armed individuals. The victim was killed right after he finished campaigning for a political candidate. The motive of the attack is not reported. One fatality recorded.

Around 29 August 2019 (as reported), in Rio Negro vereda (Cauca), unidentified armed men killed an indigenous local. The area is known for the presence of armed groups, and authorities have not ruled out the possibility that the victim may have been a member of one. 1 fatality.
On 28 August 2019, in Carmen de Bolivar, Bolivar department, two masked men shot at a group of civilians. One man was killed and two more were injured.

Around 28 August 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Alto Baudo municipality (Choco), heavily armed ELN members invaded and kidnapped six people from the indigenous community of Andeudo. Their whereabouts are unknown.

Around 28 August 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Caicedonia municipality (Valle del Cauca), an older man was shot dead and his body found on the side of the road. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 27 August 2019, in Villa Del Rosario (Norte De Santander), unidentified armed men shot and wounded three Venezuelans in a makeshift dwelling near the International Highway. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 wounded, no fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: As reported on 26 August 2019, in Puerto Asis, Putumayo department, unidentified armed men killed a JAC social leader and a former FARC member.
On 26 August 2019, in El Palo corregimiento (Cauca), unidentified armed men killed an indigenous youth from Lopez Adentro indigenous reservation. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 18th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (18th Front)
notes: On 26 August 2019, in La Granja corregimiento (Antioquia), four members of the 18th Front FARC Dissidents abducted a female farmer. The victim was reported to still be in captivity a week later. Her whereabouts are unknown.

Around 26 August 2019, in Medellin - Southwest (Antioquia), two youths were killed and their bodies found in Altavista corregimiento with signs of torture three days after being reported missing. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

Around 26 August 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Suarez municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed men shot at a bus full of women, children, and farmers from Cerro Tijeras indigenous reserve. The attack damaged the vehicle, but not its passengers. No injuries or fatalities occurred.

Around 26 August 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Tibu municipality (Norte de Santander), a Venezuelan man was shot dead and his body found with a note implying he was killed for being a rapist in Matecoco vereda. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
On 25 August 2019, in a rural area of Segovia municipality (Antioquia), Gulf Clan members killed four civilians: Three of the victims were Venezuelans, while one was a Colombian youth. 4 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former Government of Colombia (2018-2022); PLC: Colombian Liberal Party
notes: On 24 August 2019, in Alto Baudo municipality (Choco), a running candidate of the PLC party for the local government was abducted by ELN members in the rural area of Andeudo. On 5 November 2021, ELN forces contacted a local religious authority to confirm that the victim had drowned in captivity while crossing a river and provide the location of the body.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: On 24 August 2019, in a rural area of Gigante municipality (Huila), unidentified armed men shot and killed a social leader and president of the JAC in Alto Cachaya vereda. 1 fatality.

On 24 August 2019, in Tame (Arauca), two unidentified armed men shot and killed a former soldier in the Villa del Prado residential area of Brisas de Satena neighborhood. The attack also wounded the victim's wife. 1 injured, 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 24 August 2019, upon leaving the city of Mesetas (Meta), unidentified armed men shot at two former FARC members-turned-social leaders on their way back to a reintegration zone in the municipality. No injuries or fatalities occurred.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 23 August 2019, in Murindo, Antioquia, AGC members abducted a social leader and a governor of the indigenous community La Isla. The whereabouts of the victims remain unknown.

Around 23 August 2019 (as reported), in Aspasica corregimiento (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men shot and killed a man. Sources indicate that Los Pelusos has a strong presence in the area. 1 fatality.

On 22 August 2019, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men shot and killed a local government worker in Chapinero neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Fishermen (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 22 August 2019 (as reported), in Puerto Olaya corregimiento (Santander), unidentified armed men shot the president of the Cimitarra Fishermen Association, wounding him. The victim is also a social leader and president of the local Communal Action Council. 1 wounded, no fatalities.

As reported on August 21, 2019, unidentified perpetrators killed five people, three men and two women, in the rural area of the municipality of Manizales, Caldas. The victims were camping at the moment of the attack and none of their belongings were missing.
On 20 August 2019, two hitmen killed a former criminal in the town and municipality of Floridablanca, Santander. No arrests were reported.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 28th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (28th Front - Jose Maria Cordoba)
notes: On 20 August 2019, in Paz de Ariporo (Casanare), members of the 28th Front of FARC Dissidents killed a youth as part of a self-declared 'operation against organized crime.' 1 fatality.

Around 20 August 2019 (as reported), in a rural area near Bellavista in Bojaya municipality (Choco), ELN militants abducted an indigenous person. The captive was held for at least one day before being released due to community pressure.

assoc_actor_2: Embera Indigenous Group (Colombia); Farmers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz; UNOCHA
notes: On 19 August 2019, in Alto Guayabal (Choco), Gulf Clan members attacked an Embera indigenous farmer and communal leader engaged in environmental protection work. The victim was injured.
On 18 August 2019, in La Sierra, Medellin, Antioquia department, the body of a social leader was found. The motive of the attack is not reported. One fatality recorded.

On 17 August 2019, in Arauca (Arauca), unidentified armed men shot and injured two Venezuelans in Los Libertadores neighborhood. Authorities suspect the shooting may be related to guerrilla groups operating on the border between Arauca department and the Venezuelan state of Apure. 2 wounded, no fatalities.

On 17 August 2019, in Villa Del Rosario (Norte De Santander), unidentified armed men driving a car and a motorcycle perpetrated a drive-by shooting against a taxi driver and his Venezuelan passenger, injuring the former and killing the latter. 1 wounded, 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: PU: Social Party of National Unity; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 16 August 2019 (between 15 - 18 August), in a rural area of Achi municipality (Bolivar), unidentified armed actors killed a social leader and candidate for the local PU party. His body was found on the banks of the Cauca river three days after he was reported missing. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 16 August 2019 (month of), in Villa Del Rosario (Norte De Santander), a man was killed and his decomposing body found on a trail on the Colombia-Venezuela border. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 15 August 2019, in Anori (Antioquia), unidentified armed men shot and killed an off-duty police officer in his home in Los Angeles neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Colombia (2018-2022); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 15 August 2019 (as reported), in Payan (Narino), a local government worker and social leader was killed and his body found early in the morning. The victim was also known to be working on a local election campaign. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 15 August 2019 (as reported), in an unspecified area of Zaragoza municipality (Antioquia), unidentified armed men shot and killed a taxi driver, a merchant, and a miner. Fear generated by these killings has caused the displacement of 44 people from Zaragoza to Medellin. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.
On 14 August 2019, in La Caucana corregimiento (Antioquia), unidentified armed men shot and killed an Embera indigenous farmer at his home. 1 fatality.

Around 14 August 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Remedios municipality (Antioquia), unidentified armed men on motorcycles carried out a drive-by shooting against a family in Llanos de Cordoba corregimiento, killing four and injuring two more including three youths. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 wounded, 4 fatalities.

Around 14 August 2019 (as reported), in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a Venezuelan merchant in a drive-by shooting. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
On 13 August 2019, unidentified armed men attack the residents of a farm in the rural area of the municipality of Remedios, Antioquia. Four people were killed and two others were injured.

On 13 August 2019, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men shot and killed a youth in Trigal del Norte neighborhood after he received death threats. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 13 August 2019, in Los Chancos corregimiento (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed men shot and killed a local government employee of San Pedro municipality. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 13 August 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Zarzal municipality (Valle del Cauca), three men were killed and their bodies found in a grave. The victims went missing when they were on their way from Buenaventura to Cali on 26 July 2019. Their relatives reported having received calls from unknown people telling them that the men had been killed. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 3 fatalities.

As reported on August 12, 2019, the remains of a teacher of a rural school were found in the area El Jagual, Corinto Cauca. According to the reports, the victim was abducted earlier that day by two unidentified armed men.

On 12 August 2019, in an area of Betania municipality (Antioquia), members of Los Caparros shot and killed a Radical Change party candidate for the city council in Taparto vereda. A youth was also injured in the attack. 1 wounded, 1 fatality.
Around 12 August 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Caucasia municipality (Antioquia), a farmer was killed and his body found tied up on the side of the road to El Toro vereda. 1 fatality.

Around 11 August 2019 (as reported), in La Caucana corregimiento (Antioquia), unidentified armed men shot and killed an evangelical pastor at his home. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 11 August 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Convencion municipality (Norte de Santander), a Venezuelan youth was killed and his body found on the side of the road near Llano Grande vereda. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 10 August 2019, in La Caucana village, Taraza, Antioquia department, an evangelical pastor was killed by unidentified armed individuals. The body of the victim showed multiple shots. The victim was part of the Movimiento Misionero Mundial. The motive of the attack is not reported. One fatality recorded.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 10 August 2019, in a rural area of Caloto municipality (Cauca), four FARC Dissidents shot at a caravan of Indigenous Guard members of the Nasa indigenous community, killing two and wounding five on the road to Toribio in Los Chorros corregimiento. 5 injured, 2 fatalities.

Around 10 August 2019 (as reported), in Convencion (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men shot and killed a young athlete in La Quebradita neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 10 August 2019, in Los Patios (Norte de Santander), an unidentified armed man shot and killed a father in front of his children before fleeing with an accomplice from the corner of 5th and 12th street. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 9 August 2019, in the indigenous community of Amparrado Alto, Dabeiba municipality, Antioquia department, an Embera indigenous person and member of the Guardia Indigena was killed by three unidentified armed individuals. In the attack, other two individuals were killed and one was injured. The motive of the attack is not reported. Three fatalities recorded.

On 9 August 2019, on the road from Torbio to Caloto municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed men fired on a vehicle transporting members of the Indigenous Guard of the Nasa indigenous community. The victims were on his way to attend a report of explosives placed in the rural area of Pajarito. No injuries or fatalities occurred.

On 9 August 2019, in Saravena (Arauca), three unidentified armed men shot and killed an off-duty army soldier in front of his family's home in San Luis neighborhood. The area is known for a heavy presence of ELN and FARC Dissidents. 1 fatality.

On 9 August 2019, in Saravena (Arauca), unidentified armed men kidnapped an engineer, contracted to work on the Cano Limon Covenas oil pipeline, outside a store in the city. The abduction is similar to others conducted by ELN forces in the area, though it could also be the work of FARC dissidents who are also present in the area.

Around 9 August 2019 (as reported), in Los Patios (Norte de Santander), an unidentified armed man shot and killed a woman in San Nicolas II neighborhood. The woman's partner had been similarly killed in La Gabarra corregimiento (Tibu, Norte de Santander) four months previously. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); Guardia Indigena (Colombia); Zenu Indigenous Group (Colombia)
notes: On 8 August 2019, in Versalles corregimiento (Cordoba), members of Los Caparros gang killed a farmer - who was also a member of the Zenu indigenous guard - and lit his house on fire. A similar incident occurred in the area only a month prior. 1 fatality.

Around 8 August 2019 (as reported), in Llorente corregimiento (Narino), unidentified armed actors killed two Venezuelan youths and injured an afro-Colombian adult. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities, 1 wounded.

As reported on August 7, 2019, the remains of three adult men were found in the rural area of the municipality of Ocana, Norte de Santander. One of the victims was a Venezuelan national. The perpetrators remain unidentified.

Around 6 August 2019 (as reported), in an unidentified area of Puerto Asis municipality (Putumayo), a man was killed and his body was found. According to the reports, the victim was killed by the ELN after having been accused of raping and killing a young girl in Sande indigenous reserve. 1 fatality.

Around 5 August 2019 (as reported), in the rural area of Zarzal municipality (Valle Del Cauca), three men were killed and their bodies found. Police Forces uncovered a grave with the remains of three adult men reported missing on July 26, 2019. The victims were from Buenaventura and according to the family were on a trip to Cali for working purposes. Police believe the victim had ties with a criminal group, but this version was not confirmed. 3 fatalities

On 5 August 2019, in a rural area of Tibu municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men shot and killed a man in Cooperativa vereda. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Nasa Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 4 August 2019, in Tacueyo indigenous reserve (Cauca), two unidentified armed men shot and killed a Nasa indigenous community leader. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 4 August 2019 (as reported), on the road between Tibu and La Gabarra (Norte de Santander), a woman was shot and killed and her body found near KM20 of the road. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
Around 4 August 2019, in San Isidro vereda (Norte de Santander), a man was shot and killed and his body found. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Nasa Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 3 August 2019, in El Jagual vereda (Cauca), unidentified armed men shot and killed an indigenous Nasa agricultural community leader, who was also a JAC member in El Vergel vereda. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 3 August 2019, in a rural area of Manzanares municipality (Caldas), two unidentified armed men shot and killed a former FARC fighter participating in a reintegration program. The victim had reported poor conditions in the Territorial Area for Training and Reintegration (ETCR) of the municipality. 1 fatality.

Around 3 August 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Versalles municipality (Valle del Cauca), unidentified armed men shot and killed a Democratic Center political candidate in Arabia vereda. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 2 August 2019 (as reported), in an unidentified area of Santa Cruz de Lorica municipality (Cordoba), unidentified armed men on a motorcycle killed a man and injured a five-year-old girl in a drive-by shooting. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 injured, 1 fatality.

On 1 August 2019, in Barranquilla, Atlantico department, a LGBT person was killed inside his house by unidentified armed individuals. The victim was a member of an organization that is raising awareness of LGBTI rights. The motive of the attack is not reported. One fatality recorded.

On 1 August 2019, in Huellas indigenous reserve (Cauca), unidentified armed men attacked two members of the Guardia Indigena of the Nasa indigenous community on a road that leads to Toribio municipality, killing one and wounding another. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 1 August 2019, in Puerto Narino (Arauca), a youth was killed and his body found tied up 500 meters outside the village. The youth had disappeared some days previously. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 1 August 2019, in Villa Del Rosario (Norte De Santander), two unidentified armed men attacked a supermarket, killing a customer and a worker. The perpetrators are reported to have initially targeted the store owner's daughter for failing to pay extortion money, but the gun jammed. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 31 July 2019, alleged members of the AGC/Gulf Clan forcibly disappeared a farmer in the rural area of the Litoral del San Juan, Choco. Locals claimed the armed group killed the victim, but no remains have been found.
Around 31 July 2019 (month of), in a rural area near Nueva Esperanza vereda (Choco), Gulf Clan militants abducted and killed a coca farmer in Bella Flor Remacho vereda. 1 fatality.

Around 29 July 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Bagado municipality (Choco), unidentified armed men shot and killed an indigenous leader of the Conondo community in his home. The victim was known to work on environmental protection projects in areas dominated by the mining industry and a heavy ELN presence. 1 fatality.

On 27 July 2019, one civilian was killed when he trespassed on a military base in the town and municipality of Barrancabermeja, Santander. Military version assures that the victim illegally broke into the compound, while some witnesses claimed the soldiers forced the civilian into the military facilities.

On 27 July 2019, in Puerto Rico (Caqueta), unidentified armed men shot and killed a social leader and her husband after she dismissed death threats made against her. 2 fatalities. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]
Around 27 July 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Becerril municipality (Cesar), three farmers were killed and their bodies found on Batacua farm in Zocomba vereda. 3 fatalities.

On 27 July 2019, in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men on a motorcycle killed a Venezuelan man inside a shop in a drive-by shooting in Agua Clara Centro neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 26 July 2019 (as reported), in Convencion (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men on a motorcycle killed a woman in a drive-by shooting in Villa Cotes neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 23 July 2019, unidentified armed men killed an indigenous person of the Zenu community in the town and municipality of Caceres in Antioquia. No group has claimed the event.

On 22 July 2019, in Serpentino vereda (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men shot and killed a Venezuelan man. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
Around 22 July 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Puerto Asis municipality (Putumayo), unidentified armed men attacked farmers engaged in the eradication of illicit crops. Casualties unknown.

Police Forces of Colombia released the victim during an operation and revealed the involvement of the officials in the event.

Around 20 July 2019 (as reported), on the road to La Gabarra corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a man was shot and killed and his body found at KM20 of the highway. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
Around 19 July 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Riosucio municipality (Choco), ELN militants abducted a merchant near the Penas del Olvido indigenous reserve. His whereabout are unknown.

As reported on July 18, 2019, the remains of an adult man were found in Cucuta, Norte de Santander. Witnesses claimed the body was abandoned by a white pick-up truck. The event appears to be related to a social cleansing by an armed organization.

Around 16 July 2019 (as reported), in Cucuta (Norte de Santander), a man was killed and his dismembered body found at the intersection of 10th street and 8th avenue in La Florida neighborhood of the Juan Atalaya section of the city. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 15 July 2019, a civilian was found killed in the town Ricaurte, rural area of the district of Cucuta, Norte de Santander. The victim worked in a local farm. No group has claimed the event.

According to the source, state forces broke violently into the houses, shooting, breaking the doors and causing damage to the homes and forced civilians out while threatening them. The police claim that the people arrested were members of the ELN, version denied by residents.

Around 15 July 2019 (month of), in Bocas Del Ele corregimiento (Arauca), three people were shot and their bodies found in a state of advanced decomposition. The victims were one man, one woman, and a youth. The area is known for the presence of ELN and FARC dissidents. 3 fatalities.

Around 15 July 2019 (as reported), in Santander de Quilichao (Cauca), a youth and drug user was shot and killed and his body found in El Porvenir neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups and for threats of 'social cleansing'. 1 fatality.

On 15 July 2019, in a rural area of San Jose del Guaviare (Guaviare), five unidentified armed men fired on the clearly marked vehicle of a candidate who was running for governor as he passed through the Raudal sector. The area is known for the presence of FARC dissidents. No fatalities.

On 14 July 2019, unidentified armed men abducted a businessman from the town and municipality of Jamundi, Valle del Cauca. The remains of the victim were later found in the rural area of Santander de Quilichao, Cauca. No group has claimed the attack.

On 8 July 2019, in Montelibano (Cordoba), an LGBT person was abducted and killed. Hours after his abduction, his body was found dismembered in the 27 de Julio neighborhood. 1 fatality.

Around 8 July 2019 (as reported), in Palmarito vereda (Arauca), unidentified armed men shot and killed an unarmed civilian. Reports suspect the involvement of ELN and/or FARC dissident groups known to operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 7 July 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of San Jose de Ure municipality (Cordoba), unidentified armed men killed and decapitated a farmer and set his house on fire in El Cerro vereda. The region is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 7 July 2019 (as reported), in the area around Villa Del Rosario (Norte De Santander), an unarmed Venezuelan was shot and killed and his body discovered on the side of the road in Trocha Chaparral. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 7 July 2019, in La Floresta vereda (Cauca), unidentified perpetrators shot and killed two miners who had previously been targeted by death threats. The region is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

The authorities claimed that Los Pelusos are the perpetrators of this attack since, days before the victim was found dead, three members of the Los Pelusos gang were looking for her. 1 fatality. [women targeted: girls]

On 11 May 2019, in San Agustin municipality, Huila department, unidentified armed men shot and killed a university professor in the Los Yalcones neighborhood. The victim worked in the Anthropology faculty of the local university. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 11 May 2019, in Cucuta - East, Norte de Santander department, an armed gang attack a group of illegal traders in the El Escobal neighborhood, border area between Colombia with Venezuela. One person without documentation was killed. The area is known for the presence of Los Bota de Caucho gang, La Linea gang, and Venezuelan colectivos, who fight one another for territorial control of the region and tax passers-by with illegal fees. 1 fatality.
On 11 May 2019, in Medellin, Antioquia department, two men were shot and killed by unidentified armed men in the Juan XXIII neighborhood. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 10 May 2019, in El Bagre municipality, Antioquia department, members of the Gulf Clan killed a doctor. The victim worked at the local hospital. As a consequence of the attack, 14 of his colleagues had resigned claiming a lack of security to work in the area. Two days after the attack, police claimed that they captured the perpetrator. 1 fatality.

source: El Universal (Colombia); UNOCHA; Front Line Defenders
notes: On 10 May 2019, in the Micoahumado corregimiento, Morales municipality, Bolivar department, a social leader and member of a local union of drivers was shot and killed by ELN members. 1 fatality.

Around 10 May 2019 (as reported), in Bello municipality, Antioquia department, a man was killed and his body was found dead inside a freezer in the Niquia neighborhood. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

In the week of May 9, 2019, the remains of a person were found in Corocito, municipality of San Pelayo in Cordoba. According to witnesses, the victim was a local thief. Authorities believe that the victim was killed potentially for blackmailing local businesses in the name of illegal groups. No group has claimed the event.

Around 9 May 2019 (as reported), in Quicharo vereda, in Litoral del San Juan municipality, Choco, a doctor was tortured and killed. The victim's body was found dead. The doctor dedicated to natural medicine had been abducted on 15 April 2019 while working. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 9 May 2019, in La Esmeralda (Jujua) (Arauca), an unidentified armed group shot and killed a film producer that worked on a documentary about victims of the armed conflict in Colombia. The man was attacked in the urban area of La Esmeralda of the municipality of Arauquita in Arauca. One assistant of the project was also injured in the attack. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: PU: Social Party of National Unity
notes: On 8 May 2019, in the Micoahumado corregimiento, Morales municipality, Bolivar department, armed men shot and killed a candidate of the local Council. The victim was a member of the PU Party. Local authorities claim the attack was perpetrated by the ELN. 1 fatality.

On 7 May 2019, in Cucuta - East (Norte de Santander), Venezuelan colectivos fired several shots against civilians at an illegal crossing path that connects the neighborhood El Escobal to Urena municipality, Venezuela. One person died in the attack and three others were injured. The victims are potentially illegal commodity traders from Venezuela. No group has claimed the attack. 1 fatality.
On 7 May 2019, in Bello municipality, Antioquia, a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed men in the Niquia Camacol neighborhood. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 7 May 2019 (as reported), in Villa del Rosario municipality, Norte de Santander department, a man was killed by unidentified armed men and his body was found dead in the La Parada neighborhood,. There is presence of Colectivos and criminal gangs fighting over the control of the territory. 1 fatality.

On 6 May 2019, in Bogota city, Bogota, D.C., a political leader was attacked by armed men near her private residence. The victim is known for her work with victims of sexual violence in the Colombian conflict. No fatalities or injuries occurred.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 6 May 2019, in Ituango municipality, Antioquia, a former FARC member was shot and killed by unidentified armed men. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 6 May 2019 (as reported), in the Huasano vereda, Caloto municipality, Cauca department, a man was tortured and killed. The victim's body was found dead on a road. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
