On 6 May 2019, near Santander de Quilichao municipality, Cauca department, a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed men. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 6 May 2019 (as reported), in the Obando municipality, Valle del Cauca department, a female teacher was killed by unidentified armed men. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 5 May 2019, in the Manizales corregimiento, Caceres municipality, Antioquia department, three men were shot and killed by unidentified armed men. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 3 fatalities.

On 5 May 2019, between Inza and La Plata municipalities (Cauca), a group of people were attacked by unidentified armed men. One person was killed, two were injured, and one person was reported as disappeared. There is presence of FARC dissident groups in the area.

On 5 May 2019, in Piamonte municipality (Cauca), a woman was shot and killed by unidentified armed men. The victim was recognized as the sister of a worker of the city hall. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality. [women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons]

On 5 May 2019, in Puerto Tejada municipality (Cauca), two men were killed by an unidentified armed group for 'trespassing invisible borders' that had been established by armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: MAIS: Indigenous and Social Alternative Movement
notes: On 5 May 2019, near Piedrancha, in Mallama municipality, Narino, a candidate of the MAIS political party was shot and killed by unidentified armed men. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 4 May 2019, unidentified armed men killed a police officer that was out of duty in the municipality of Tame in Arauca. No group has claimed the attack but official sources believe a FARC faction or ELN member could have perpetrated the attack.

source: Diario La Libertad; UNOCHA; Front Line Defenders
notes: On 4 May 2019, in the Llerasca corregimiento, Codazzi municipality, in Cesar department, unidentified armed men shot and killed a social leader. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
On 4 May 2019, in the Llorente corregimiento, Tumaco municipality, Narino department, a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed men. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 3 May 2019, unidentified armed men attacked civilians in an illegal crossing between Colombia and Venezuela. One woman, Venezuelan national, was injured in the attack. No group has claimed the event.
On 3 May 2019, in Suarez municipality, Cauca department, a woman was shot and killed by unidentified armed men. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 2 May 2019, military forces of Colombia killed two men near the town of Tame in Arauca. The families and witnesses claim that the victims were residents in the area and had no association with illegal armed groups, contradicting the version the militaries in which claimed the civilians were killed in an armed clash.

On 2 May 2019, in the Iscuande sector, Santa Barbara municipality, Narino department, armed men abducted three civilians. Days later, the remains of the three victims were found near the town of Buenavista, Narino department. One of the victims was a recognized social leader of the community and the other two victims were members of the Iscuande River Protection Council. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 3 fatalities.

On 2 May 2019, in the Quebrada del Medio vereda, Ituango municipality, Antioquia, a social leader was killed by unidentified armed men. There is presence of the Gulf Clan and the FARC dissident group in the area. 1 fatality.
On 2 May 2019, in Saravena municipality (Arauca), a man was shot and killed by members of the ELN. The ELN was performing a 'social cleansing' in the municipality. 1 fatality.
On 2 May 2019, in the Osiris vereda, Orito municipality, Putumayo, two men were shot and killed by unidentified armed men. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 1 May 2019, near San Jose del Palmar, Choco, unidentified armed men shot and killed an indigenous woman of the community Embera Chami in the rural area of Campo Alegre. A child was injured in the attack. The event lead to the displacement of 40 people to the urban area of San Jose. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 1 May 2019 (as reported), in La Pesquera rural area, Puerto Jordan, Arauquita municipality, Arauca department, a Venezuelan woman was sexually assaulted by a member of the military forces. According to the victim, the events occurred near the military checkpoint.
On 1 May 2019, in Convencion, Norte de Santander, a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed men in the 19 de Febrero neighborhood. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 30 April 2019, in Granada, Meta, an unknown number of armed men shot and killed a professional military officer in his house in the Montoya Paba neighborhood. According to the report, the military officer was departing in his house with his family. The military officer was off-duty at the moment of the attack. It is not confirmed if the officer was involved in counterintelligence operations. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 1st Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (1st Front - Armando Rios)
notes: On 29 April 2019, in the outskirts of Bogota, D.C., Bogota, D.C., members of the FARC Dissident 1st Front abducted two people on the highway Bogota-Saravena, height unknown. According to the report, the victims were driving a van-like vehicle that belongs to a private carrier company at the time of the abduction. The victims were rescued on 6 May 2019 in a joint operation of the Military Forces of Colombia and the National Police.

On 29 April 2019, Cajibio municipality, Cauca, two men were shot and killed. One of the men was killed in Las Delicias vereda, and the other, in Las Casitas vereda. According to the report, pamphlets threatening young men have been circulating in the area. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 29 April 2019, in El Bordo, Patia, Cauca, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the Calle Nueva neighborhood. The reasons behind the attack are unknown. There is a presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 29 April 2019 (as reported), in San Antero municipality, Cordoba department, a moto-taxi driver was killed and his body was found alongside the road in El Porvenir corregimiento. The reasons behind the attack are unknown. There is a presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Kogui Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 28 April 2019, in Guachaca, Narino, unidentified armed men killed a social leader and member of the JAC 'El Sauce'. The victim advocated for indigenous Kogui rights in the country. No group has claimed the attack. 1 fatality.

On 28 April 2019, in a rural area of Abrego municipality, Norte de Santander department, four armed men in two motorcycles shot and killed three men in a drive-by shooting. According to the report, the victims were driving in two trucks from San Vicente trail to the Monterredondo area when four armed men in two motorcycles intercepted them. One victim was killed at the height of the La Instancia sector. The other two victims were killed in the El Tarrita sector. ELN and Los Pelusos Gang have a presence in the area. 3 fatalities.

On 28 April 2019, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander department, a man was killed in the Gaitan neighborhood. According to the report, the corpse bore six gunshot wounds. There is a presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 28 April 2019, in Sincelejo, Sucre, two men on a motorcycle shot and injured a social leader in the Policarpa neighborhood. According to the report, the victim was shooting a video in the street when two men on a motorcycle intercepted him, opened fire, and shot him five times. The victim, who is a defender of moto-taxis drivers, had received threats before the attack. 1 injured.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 27 April 2019, in the outskirts of La Macarena municipality, Meta department, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed one man and injured another in a drive-by shooting. The attack was carried out on the road that connects La Macarena with San Vicente del Caguan, in the La California vereda. According to the report, the victims were also on a motorcycle at the moment of the attack. The fatality was a former FARC member. Authorities suspect a FARC dissident front perpetrated the attack. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Farmers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: UNOCHA; Noticias Caracol; Prensa Rural (Colombia); INDEPAZ
notes: On 26 April 2019, in Bajo Ingles, Antioquia, a farmer and social leader was shot dead. members of the Gulf Clan were the perpetrators. The victim was an active member of the JAC. The motive of the attack is not reported. 1 fatality.

source: INDEPAZ; Noticias Caracol; UNOCHA; Diario La Libertad
notes: On 26 April 2019, in Maceo municipality, Antioquia, armed men killed a social leader in La Union vereda. The victim was a human rights defender and worked with the elderly population in the region. 1 fatality.

On 26 April 2019, outside Jardin, Antioquia, gunmen shot and wounded two indigenous girls on the road to Andes. It is believed that the girls were not the intended target. No fatalities. [women targeted: girls]

Around 26 April 2019 (as reported), in Pinalito, Cordoba, a rancher was killed in his farm and his body was later found. The circumstances of the death are unclear but it is he was killed. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 26 April 2019, in Los Patios municipality, Norte de Santander, Los Pelusos Gang kidnapped a man. The report does not state the circumstances or the exact location of the abduction. The kidnappers demanded 1,500 million pesos for his release. The victim was a taxi driver and a pre-candidate for the Los Patios council. He was rescued on 29 April 2019, in an operation during which three kidnappers were arrested, and one was killed (coded separately).

actor1: Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022) ESMAD: Mobile Anti-Disturbance Squadron
notes: On 25 April 2019, ESMAD police forces attacked a journalist that was covering the protest held by social organizations in Bogota. The victim was injured in the face.
On 25 April 2019, in Monteria, Cordoba, gunmen shot and killed a man who was visiting the city on a holiday trip. 1 fatality.

On 24 April 2019, in Cerete, Cordoba, armed men on a motorcycle carried out a drive-by shooting at a betting company after having threatened them to close. According to reports this attack was due to the lack of payments of an extortion. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. No fatalities.
On 24 April 2019, in Barbacoas, Narino, a girl went to hospital for help after having been sexually violated by a man who is a member of an armed group. [women targeted: girls]

On 24 April 2019, in Santiago de Cali - Comuna 3, Valle del Cauca, a councilman from El Patia municipality was shot at by gunmen in the Santa Rosa neighbourhood. The councilman was injured. He had previously already been attacked by grenade, supposedly by members of the ELN. No fatalities.

assoc_actor_1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 23 April 2019, outside Fortul, Arauca, armed men shot and killed a farm worker in a drive-by shooting on the road between Fortul and Tame in a region called El Acuario, by gunmen belonging to ELN and FARC Dissidents, who fled afterwards. 1 fatality.

On 23 April 2019, in Santander De Quilichao, Cauca, gunmen shot two men in a drive-by shooting while they were on a motorcycle in the El Porvenir neighbourhood. Both were seriously wounded. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. No fatalities.

Around 22 April 2019 (as reported), in the rural area of Palmarito, Norte de Santander, a man was killed and his body was found on the road outside the village with the hands tied and with 15 gunshot wounds. In this area the Los Pelusos Gang is active. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 22 April 2019, in Convencion, Norte de Santander, a civilian and former FARC member was killed supposedly by the military forces of Colombia. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: MP: Patriotic March; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Farmers (Colombia)
source: INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; Front Line Defenders; El Espectador
notes: On 22 April 2019, in the rural area of La Dorada municipality, Putumayo, unidentified armed men killed a political and social leader while he was working on his farm in the Tres Islas vereda. The victim was an active member of the MP. 1 fatality.

On 22 April 2019, in the rural area of the municipality of Puerto Asis, Putumayo department, two men were killed in the Santana vereda. The circumstances of the attack are unknown. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

Around 22 April 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Orito, Putumayo department, a man was killed and his body was found in the Santa Helena vereda. According to the report, the body bore several gunshot wounds. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
On 21 April 2019, in Palo Blanco, Antioquia, members of the Gulf Clan shot and killed a local taxi driver. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: ASCAMCAT: Catatumbo's Peasant Association; Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 20 April 2019, near San Calixto, Norte de Santander, a member of the board of directors of ASCAMCAT: Catatumbo's Peasant Association, and the Vice President of the Council of Communal Acton of Tocoroma were on a motorcycle when they were shot at by military forces in La Tocoroma vereda. Upon identifying themselves as civilians, the military shot again and ordered them to turn around. No fatalities.

In the week of April 19, 2019, the remains of a woman were found in the rural area Algodonal of the municipality of Ocana in Norte de Santander. Crimes against civilians have increased particularly in these areas of Norte de Santander. No group has yet attributed this event.

On 17 April 2019, in La Parada, Norte de Santander, six gunmen approached a man and called his name. When he approached, he was shot in the face and killed. The men fled across the border with Venezuela. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 17 April 2019 (between 17 - 18 April), in Samaniego, Narino, armed men in a truck drove up to a group of young men and forced them aboard. Two men were killed and their bodies were found the following day on the road outside the town. Two others were injured but were able to escape. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

Around 17 April 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a Venezuelan man was killed and his body was found in a narrow sidewalk, on the road to a forest area of the trail El Tato. According to the report, the victim was a gasoline smuggler and was reported missing on 13 April 2019. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

In the week of April 16, 2019, two young men disappeared in the area of Bajo Cauca in Antioquia. The last information is that one of them was in the rural area of La Caucana in the municipality of Taraza. Authorities announced that several armed groups are operating in this area. No group has yet claimed this event.

assoc_actor_2: AICO: Indigenous Authorities of Colombia; Awa Indigenous Group (Colombia); Indigenous Group (Colombia); Lawyers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 16 April 2019, in Guachucal municipality, Narino, an Awa indigenous leader of the Los Pastos ethnic group was shot and injured in the Colimba reserve. The victim was a member of the AICO political party and a lawyer of the Los Pastos and Quillasingas Tribunal for Justice. No fatalities.

On 15 April 2019, the remains of an indigenous leader were found in a rural road of the municipality of Corinto in Cauca. This attack is registered days after pamphlets threatening local leaders and offering a reward for their murder were distributed in the area. The document was signed by the Aguilas Negras (Black Eagles) but the authorship of the attack remains unknown.
On 15 April 2019, a businessman was killed in the municipality of Convencion in Norte de Santander. The man denied paying an illegal 'war tax' demanded by the AGC/Gulf Clan.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: Around 15 April 2019 (month of), in Caloto municipality, Cauca, a man who was abducted on 28 December 2018 by members of the Dagoberto Ramos dissident front of FARC was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds on a road to El Palo area. 1 fatality.

Around 15 April 2019 (between 13 - 17 April), in the outskirts of Cucuta, Norte de Santander, two men were killed and their bodies were found on 17 April in an advanced state of decomposition in El Aguila trail. According to the report, the men were kidnapped on 13 April 2019 in the El Escobal area. Authorities believe they were killed the day they were kidnapped after the car wash owner did not pay the ransom demanded by the kidnappers. It was also reported that the victims were also gasoline smugglers. Their corpses were found on 17 April 2019 along with a note that accused them of working for the ELN and EPL. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 14 April 2019, an unidentified armed group killed a woman in the municipality of Taraza in Antioquia. The victim's family claimed that the armed men were searching for the victim in her private residence, while official authorities assured the murder occurred during an armed clash. The event caused the displacement of several residents of Taraza. No group has attributed this event.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Wayuu Indigenous Group (Colombia)
notes: On 14 April 2019, in a rural area of Maicao, La Guajira municipality, a former FARC member and his wife were injured, and two other people were killed, including their seven-month-old baby, in a rural area, in Monte Lara Caserio. According to the report, the family was visiting relatives when armed men broke into the house and opened fire against the group for more than 10 minutes. The victims are part of the Wayuu indigenous group. 2 fatalities, 2 injured.
On 14 April 2019, near Miranda, Cauca, a man was shot and killed in the La Elvira vereda by unknown gunmen. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 13 April 2019, a civilian disappeared after traveling from Envigado to Caucasia to trade with gold. The remains of the victims were found one week later in the neighborhood El Padro of the municipality of Caucasia in Antioquia. It is believed the man was attacked by armed groups that operate in the area.

On 13 April 2019, in Fortul municipality, Arauca, a Venezuelan man was killed in Nuevo Fortul sector and a sign left on his body said that he was killed for being a thief. According to reports, the ELN and FARC dissidents have committed similar crimes in this area in recent times. 1 fatality.

Around 12 April 2019 (as reported), in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a man was killed and his body was found with a sack over his head and his legs bound together in a car in Rudesino Soto. Wounds on his body seemed to indicate that he had been tortured. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
On 12 April 2019, near Timbiqui, Cauca, three armed individuals kidnapped a teacher while he was traveling to Guapi by boat. His whereabouts are unknown.

On 12 April 2019, in Bogota - La Candelaria, Bogota, D.C., a Zenu indigenous leader was attacked by unidentified men with a knife after he attended a meeting with several representatives of indigenous organizations. The victim ended severely injured. A computer with information about the social indigenous movement was stolen. No fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Embera Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: Front Line Defenders; INDEPAZ; ProtectDefenders.eu; Colombia Reports
notes: On 12 April 2019, in the Riosucio municipality, Choco, an indigenous leader was attacked and killed. The man was a leading figure in indigenous protest movements. Local sources name the AGC/Gulf Clan as a potential perpetrator, as the victim had received threats from them in 2018. 1 fatality.

On 11 April 2019, in Santa Cecilia, Norte de Santander, gunmen shot and killed the coordinator of a mine in the area while he was on his way home. His motorcycle was next to his body and nothing was missing from his belongings so authorities rule out that it was a robbery. 1 fatality.
On 11 April 2019, near La Macarena municipality, Meta department, a communal leader was shot and killed by unidentified armed men. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 10 April 2019, in an area between Ocana and Sardinata municipalities (coded to Ocana, Norte de Santander), EPL members shot and killed a man. There is no information about the motive of the attack. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Indigenous Group (Colombia); ASCAMCAT: Catatumbo's Peasant Association; Farmers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: Colombia Reports; INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; Front Line Defenders
notes: On 10 April 2019, in El Plateado, Cauca, an indigenous leader and member of the ASCAMTA died after armed men attacked him. The victim was a leader of the social protest carried out by indigenous communities during May 2018. No group has yet claimed this attack. 1 fatality.
On 10 April 2019, near Belen, Magdalena, two gunmen shot and killed a farm worker in the San Isidro vereda. 1 fatality.

On 10 April 2019, in San Miguel municipality, Putumayo department (coded to La Dorada), a man was killed in La Nueva Cristalina vereda, near the border with Ecuador. The corpse bore several gunshot wounds. There is no further information on the circumstances of the attack. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 10 April 2019, in the outskirts of Villagarzon, Putumayo department, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the industrial area of Villagarzon. According to the report, the man was inside a local store. There is a presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
On 9 April 2019, in Ricaurte municipality, Narino department, an Awa indigenous person was killed by unidentified armed individuals. The motive of the attack is not reported. One fatality recorded.

On 8 April 2019, in Convencion, Norte de Santander, members of the Gulf Clan shot and killed a merchant who refused to pay money that was being extorted from him as a 'war tax'. A letter had been circulating in which the Gulf Clan gave merchants in the area until 4 April to pay the 'war tax'. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Women (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 8 April 2019, in Curillo municipality, Caqueta, a female community leader was shot and killed by unknown attackers in the La Novia vereda. The victim was the secretary of the Council of Communal Action of the vereda. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]
On 8 April 2019, in Bolivar municipality, Cauca, an armed man shot and killed a farmer in the Santa Ana vereda. 1 fatality.

On 7 April 2019, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, two gunmen on a motorcycle carried out a drive-by shooting against a car with Venezuelan license plates between the Trigal Norte and La Concordia neighbourhoods. 2 fatalities.
On 7 April 2019, in Arjona, Bolivar, two gunmen shot and killed a man on the same day that a flyer was distributed threatening that the area would be 'cleaned'. 1 fatality.

On 7 April 2019, in Santander De Quilichao, Cauca, armed men shot and killed a man who was selling raffles at a market. It is unclear why he was killed. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 7 April 2019, in Samaniego, Narino, armed men shot and killed a man outside of a sports hall and fled on a motorcycle. It is unknown why he was killed. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
On 7 April 2019, in El Prado, Cesar, a farmer was shot and killed men under unknown circumstances. There is no information about the perpetrators. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former Government of Colombia (2018-2022); PCC: Colombian Conservative Party
notes: On 7 April 2019, in El Cairo, Valle del Cauca, two hooded men killed the former mayor who was currently the mayoral candidate of the Conservative Party inside a public establishment. 1 fatality.

On 6 April 2019, unidentified armed men abducted and killed a farmer in the rural area Cotoprix, municipality of Riohacha in La Guajira department. The victim was later found with signs of torture. No group has yet attributed this event.

On 6 April 2019, in the rural area of Tibu, Norte de Santander, a group of gunmen on motorcycles shot and killed a street vendor in a drive-by shooting on the road that leads to El Tarra. The killing took place in an area where police can not go due to security concerns. 1 fatality.

On 6 April 2019, in the rural area of Samaniego, Narino, armed men took a man from his home and killed him in the Salado Alto vereda. It is unknown why he was killed. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 5 April 2019, in Villa Del Rosario, Norte De Santander, a group of gunmen shot and killed an off-duty soldier in the Colinas de Vista Hermosa neighbourhood. The motivations of the killing are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 April 2019, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, an unknown gunman shot and killed a man in front of his home. In Norte de Santander several armed groups are fighting over control of territory. 1 fatality.
On 4 April 2019, near Cumbal municipality, Narino, armed men attacked a Raizal indigenous leader in the Cuaical vereda. The victim died on 1 May 2019 due to the injuries. 1 fatality.
On 4 April 2019, in El Troncal, Arauca, unidentified men shot and killed a man. The event took place in the center of a coca producing zone where ELN and FARC dissidents are active. 1 fatality.

On 2 April 2019, in the rural area of Sabana De Torres municipality (Santander), a farmer was abducted by armed men near the Puerto Limon vereda. Subsequent investigations stated that the ELN was responsible for the kidnapping. The victim was released 3 days later in a police operation. No confrontations or arrests were reported.

actor1: Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022) ESMAD: Mobile Anti-Disturbance Squadron
notes: On 2 April 2019, in the Minga for Live camp, in the municipality of Cairo, Valle del Cauca department, Mobile Anti-Disturbance Squadron (ESMAD) officers attacked and killed an indigenous farmer from the Resguardo Indigenous Community. During the attack, two other people were shot dead. The motive of the attack is unclear. The national government condemned the attack. Three fatalities recorded.

On 2 April 2019, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, gunmen shot and killed a man in the village Puerto Villamizar. In Norte de Santander several armed groups are fighting over control of territory. 1 fatality.
On 2 April 2019, near Abrego, Norte de Santander, armed men killed a moto-taxi driver in the rural area El Puente. No armed group has yet claimed the event. 1 fatality.

Around 2 April 2019 (as reported), in the rural sector of the Corinto municipality, Cauca, three men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture. All three bodies had their hands bound and were shot in the head. In this area armed groups are fighting for territorial control. 3 fatalities.

On 2 April 2019, in Planeta Rica municipality, Cordoba, armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a taxi driver in a drive-by shooting in the El Revolcado vereda. There has been an increase in killings of taxi drivers in the area after threats were made by the Los Caparros gang. 1 fatality.

On 2 April 2019, outside San Cayetano, Norte de Santander, the Los Pelusos Gang kidnapped a woman on the road between San Cayetano and the Las Palmas vereda. The kidnappers demanded 1,500 million pesos for her release. She was rescued later that month by the police in an operation during which four kidnappers were arrested.

On 1 April 2019, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a man on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in the 8 de Diciembre neighborhood. The victim worked for the local government. In Norte de Santander several armed groups are fighting over control of territory. 1 fatality.

On 31 March 2019, in a rural zone of Corinto municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed men shot and killed one civilian while injuring another in Crucero de Miravalle corregimiento . The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 31 March 2019 (as reported), in Santander De Quilichao (Cauca), unidentified perpetrators shot and killed a youth in El Arroyo neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 30 March 2019, in a rural area of Cucuta municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men shot and killed a Venezuelan man in front of his family at their home in the Colinas del Tunal settlement. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
On 29 March 2019, in Arauca (Arauca), unidentified perpetrators shot and killed a business owner in Las Americas neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 29 March 2019 (as reported), in Carretero vereda (Arauca), two Venezuelans were killed and their bodies found on the banks of the Arauca river. It is that the victims were killed by armed groups operating in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 29 March 2019, in Ardovelas vereda (Cauca), unidentified perpetrators shot and killed a miner while injuring his companion. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 wounded, 1 fatality.

On 29 March 2019, in Santander De Quilichao (Cauca), two unidentified armed men shot and killed a homeless man and apparent drug user on the street. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
On 28 March 2019, in the city of Saravena (Arauca), unidentified armed perpetrators shot and killed a popular radio announcer in the 6 de Octubre neighborhood. 1 fatality.

On 28 March 2019, in the city of Tumaco (Narino), unidentified perpetrators shot and killed a fisherman in the Medellin neighborhood near the Morro beaches. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 28 March 2019, in the city of Tibu (Norte de Santander), unidentified perpetrators abducted and killed a youth from the Largo neighborhood, leaving his body in the Campo Yuca sector with a note stating 'death to all thieves.' The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 27 March 2019, armed men, likely ELN members, killed a civilian and injured another one in the area Monterredondo, municipality Bochalema, Norte de Santander. According to the sources, the victims attempted to evade an illegal checkpoint settled in the road by the armed group.

assoc_actor_2: Nasa Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 27 March 2019, in a rural area of Puerto Rico municipality (Caqueta), unidentified armed perpetrators shot and killed an indigenous leader in Nasa indigenous reserve in Villanueva vereda. 1 Fatality.
Around 27 March 2019 (as reported), in Agua Viva vereda (Arauca), a young man was killed and his body found. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 27 March 2019, in Tame (Arauca), unidentified perpetrators on a motorcycle shot a taxi driver three times in a drive-by shooting, injuring him, before fleeing. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

Around 27 March 2019 (as reported), in an unidentified area of Argelia municipality (Cauca), unidentified perpetrators kidnapped three youths. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. Their whereabouts are unknown.

Around 27 March 2019 (as reported), in Tumaco (Narino), a youth was killed and his body found the day after having been abducted from Nuevo Milenio neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: Around 27 March 2019 (as reported), on the road from Cucuta to Abrego (Norte de Santander), a FARC dissident group attacked civilians on the road, killing one of them and injuring another at an illegally constructed checkpoint on the road. The ELN and Los Pelusos are present in the area. 1 fatality.

On 26 March 2019, a man was allegedly killed by ELN members during an illegal checkpoint set up in the area of Monterredondo, municipality of Bochalema in Norte de Santander. According to the reports, another civilian that was injured was remitted to a hospital.
Around 26 March 2019 (as reported), in Corinto municipality (Cauca), two people were killed and their bodies were found. One of the victims was recognized as a local social leader. 2 fatalities.

On 26 March 2019, in Santander de Quilichao (Cauca), unidentified armed perpetrators shot and killed a man at the intersection of 10th and 16th streets in La Victoria neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
On 26 March 2019, in a rural area of Gonzalez municipality (Cesar), unidentified armed perpetrators entered a farmhouse and killed a young farmer near Cerro Azul vereda. 1 fatality.

Around 26 March 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Uribia municipality (La Guajira), unidentified assailants attacked an indigenous man of the Wayuu indigenous group, the son of an assassinated community leader, in Camino Verde community. The man was able to escape without serious harm. No fatalities.

On 25 March 2019, in Sevilla, Valle Del Cauca, the brother of a social leader was shot dead in Belen neighbourhood. The victim was also a member of the Network of Popular Artists of the Suroccidente (RAPSO) and the Hip-Hop Network of Sevilla.
Around 25 March 2019 (as reported), on the road to Caucasia (Antioquia), unidentified perpetrators killed an army soldier who was on leave at the time of the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 25 March 2019 (between 22 - 25 March), in an unspecified location in San Jose de Ure municipality (Cordoba), a farmer, who was one of three kidnapped by Gulf Clan operatives on 22 March, was killed. His body was found on 25 March. 1 fatality.

Around 25 March 2019 (as reported), in El Portico vereda (Norte de Santander), two people were killed and their bodies were found with sings of torture. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 24 March 2019, in Campo Dos corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a palm farm businessman and two of his workers disappeared, kidnapped by unknown perpetrators. The area is known for the presence of ELN and Los Pelusos.
On 24 March 2019, in Betoyes (Arauca), unidentified armed men on a motorcycle killed an indigenous person in drive-by shooting. 1 fatality.
On 24 March 2019, in El Cairo vereda (Putumayo), unidentified armed men shot and killed a man. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 23 March 2019 (between 22 - 23 March), in Viera Abajo vereda (Cordoba), two farmers, who were abducted by the Gulf Clan on 22 March, were killed. Their bodies were found with signs of torture. 2 fatalities.
On 22 March 2019, in Versalles corregimiento (Cordoba), three farmers were kidnapped from their homes by Gulf Clan operatives. Their whereabouts are unknown.

Around 22 March 2019 (as reported), in Tumaco (Narino), an unidentified armed group stormed into a school, taking one student hostage in the Exporcol urban sector. The student was later released, unharmed, in a nearby neighborhood. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. No fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Farmers (Colombia)
notes: On 22 March 2019, on the road to La Gabarra (Norte de Santander), a demobilized former FARC militant was shot and killed in a drive-by shooting by two attackers on a motorcycle. The victim had transitioned to a life of farm work and had previously received death threats from the ELN. 1 fatality.

Around 22 March 2019 (as reported), in La Hormiga (Putumayo), unidentified armed men shot and killed two civilians in Villa de Leiva neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 21 March 2019, in Santander de Quilichao (Cauca), an unidentified armed man on a motorcycle carried out a drive-by shooting, firing indiscriminately into a crowd in Morinda neighborhood, injuring two adults and a child. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. There were no fatalities.

Around 21 March 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Policarpa municipality (Narino), two men previously reported missing were killed by unidentified armed men. Their bodies were found showing signs of torture in Santa Lucia vereda. The area is known for the presence of armed groups.

On 20 March 2019, a professional soldier was abducted apparently by the EPL when he was in vacation in the rural area El Llanito from the municipality of Santander de Quilichao (near the municipality Florida) in Cauca department.

Around 20 March 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Policarpa (Narino), unidentified armed men kidnapped two farmers. The region is known for ELN, FARC dissident, and Gulf Clan activity. The victims' whereabouts are unknown.

Around 20 March 2019 (as reported), in San Faustino corregimiento (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men shot and killed the son of a local social leader. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 19 March 2019, on the road to Cucuta (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men forcibly stopped and set fire to a bus, forcing the driver and passengers to flee the scene on foot. There were no fatalities.
On 18 March 2019, unidentified armed men killed a recognized social leader of the municipality of Sonson in Antioquia department. The event happened in the rural area of San Miguel.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 18th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (18th Front)
assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 18 March 2019 (as reported), in Vega del Ingles vereda (Antioquia), two men were killed and their bodies were found in a newly dug grave. One of the victims was a former FARC militant who was a registered ex-combatant. Authorities believe the 18th Front of FARC dissidents, which is known to operate in the area, is responsible for the attack. 2 fatalities.

Around 18 March 2019 (as reported), in Manzanares corregimiento (Cordoba), a man was killed and his body was found with multiple gunshot wounds. The victim was recognized as a man who was travelling in a group with two other men and were reported as missing and later found dead in other locations. There is no information about the perpetrator, the area is known for the presence of armed groups including FARC dissidents, ELN, and the Gulf Clan. 1 fatality.

Around 18 March 2019 (as reported), in an area of Miranda municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed perpetrators killed a man in the Simon Bolivar zone. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 18 March 2019 (as reported), in Las Palomas corregimiento (Cordoba), a man was killed and his body was found with multiple gunshot wounds. The victim was recognized as a man who was travelling in a group with two other men and were reported as missing and later found dead in other locations. There is no information about the perpetrator, the area is known for the presence of armed groups including FARC dissidents, ELN, and the Gulf Clan. 1 fatality.

Around 18 March 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of San Jose de Ure municipality (Cordoba), two brothers were killed and their bodies were found in La Ilusion vereda. The victims were working in coca cultivation. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

Around 18 March 2019 (as reported), in Tierralta municipality (Cordoba), a man was killed and his body was found with multiple gunshot wounds. The victim was recognized as a man who was travelling in a group with two other men and were reported as missing and later found dead in other locations. There is no information about the perpetrator, the area is known for the presence of armed groups including FARC dissidents, ELN, and the Gulf Clan. 1 fatality.

On 18 March 2019, on the road to Guamalito in El Carmen municipality (Norte de Santander), unidentified armed men fired on a passenger bus and injured the driver. Though no attribution was made, the area is known for ELN activity. No fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Farmers (Colombia)
notes: On 17 March 2019, in La Guayacana vereda (Narino), an unidentified armed group killed a community leader who had been at the forefront of a local coca substitution program and who was also the president of the JAC. Two others were also injured in the attack. 1 fatality, 2 wounded.

On 17 March 2019, on the road to Esmeraldas (Narino), two traders were kidnapped by unidentified perpetrators in La Tigresa sector. According to some reports, three others have also disappeared from that area in recent days. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. The victims' whereabouts are unknown.

On 17 March 2019, in a rural area of Puerto Asis municipality (Putumayo), unidentified armed men shot and killed a woman and her mother in Campoquemado vereda. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Oliver Sinisterra Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Oliver Sinisterra Front)
notes: Around 17 March 2019 (as reported), near San Juan (Rio Mira) (Narino), two civilians were killed in a double homicide attributed to the FARC Dissidents of the Oliver Sinisterra Front (re-named Alfonso Cano Front in 2020). This dissident front and Los Contadores Gang are known to be fighting an ongoing war in the area. 2 fatalities.

Around 16 March 2019 (as reported), in an unidentified area of Corinto municipality (Cauca), two youths were shot and killed while riding a motorcycle. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.
Around 16 March 2019, in a rural area of Tumaco municipality (Narino), a woman was decapitated and her body found in the Ibili river. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

In March 2019, militaries announced that two dissidents were killed during armed clashes in the area of Tumaco, Narino. Witnesses claim that soldiers attacked the house of the victims during the evening and shot the unarmed men, contradicting the military's version. The case is reported as a potential boosting of army statistics in the war against illegal armed organizations.

Around 15 March 2019 (as reported), in El Bordo (Cauca), a local woman was shot and killed in her home by unidentified armed men in Los Estudiantes neighborhood. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
On 15 March 2019, in rural community near Bellavista in Bojaya municipality (Choco), members of the Gulf Clan abducted an Indigenous man from the Egorokera community. His whereabouts are unknown.

Around 15 March 2019 (as reported), in Barbacoas (Narino), a Venezuelan man was shot and killed in a drive-by shooting perpetrated by unidentified armed men on a motorcycle in La Loma neighborhood. A pamphlet threatening 'social cleansing' was circulated in the area, which is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 15 March 2019 (as reported), in Tumaco (Narino), unidentified armed men shot and killed a young taxi driver in the Brisas del Aeropuerto neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 14 March 2019, on the road to Sabana De Torres (Santander), armed members of the Los Pelusos Gang kidnapped two traders and attempted to hold them for ransom. Government forces liberated the pair in a raid the following month. No fatalities.
Around 14 March 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Sacama municipality (Casanare), unidentified armed men shot and killed a communal leader in La Casirva vereda. 1 fatality.
On 14 March 2019, in a rural area of San Juan Nepomuceno (Bolivar), four unidentified armed men kidnapped two brothers from their farm in La Playa vereda. Their whereabouts are unknown.

Around 14 March 2019 (as reported), in Monteria (Cordoba), unidentified armed men on a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting in Cantaclaro neighborhood. The victim was known for having refused to pay extortions to armed groups present in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 13 March 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Corinto municipality (Cauca), five people were killed and their bodies were found in Miravalle vereda. Also in the rural area of Corinto, two civilians were killed and their bodies found in Los Andes corregimiento, not far from another attack registered in Miravalle vereda earlier. There is presence of several armed groups who have control over illegal coca crops in the area. 7 fatalities.
Around 13 March 2019 (as reported), in Huisito (Cauca), a coca farmer was shot and killed by unknown perpetrators. 1 fatality.
Around 13 March 2019 (as reported), in Uribe (Cauca), a farmer was shot and killed by unknown perpetrators. 1 fatality.

On 13 March 2019, on the road from Tibu to La Gabarra corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a youth was shot and killed while driving in a van. There is no information about the perpetrators. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 12 March 2019 (as reported), in La Maria vereda (Cauca), unidentified armed men on a motorcycle killed a youth in a drive-by shooting. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 12 March 2019, in Montelibano (Cordoba), two armed men on motorcycles killed a woman in a drive-by shooting near a local bakery. The victim was believed to be the sister of a man whose dismembered body was found in La Apartada vereda a few days earlier. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality. [women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons]

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 12 March 2019, in La Esmeralda vereda (Tolima), unknown armed men shot and killed a former FARC combatant who had recently surrendered his weapons to participate in the reintegration process. This was the third ex-FARC militant killed in the rural areas of Planadas municipality so far this year. 1 fatality.
Around 10 March 2019 (as reported), in La Apartada (Cordoba), a man was killed and his mutilated body found in an empty lot. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.
On 10 March 2019, in Tumaco (Narino), unidentified armed men shot and killed a taxi driver in the 11 de Noviembre neighborhood. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 9 March 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Bolivar municipality (Cauca), two youths were killed and their bodies found near the border with San Pablo municipality (Narino). The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 8 March 2019, two truck drivers were assaulted in the road that connects Tame and Fortul in the Arauca department. The men were forced out of their vehicles by ELN members, who later blocked the road with the carriers.
On 8 March 2019, in a rural area of Miranda municipality (Cauca), unidentified armed men shot and killed an indigenous leader in El Progreso vereda. 1 fatality.

Around 8 March 2019 (as reported), in Saravena (Arauca), ELN forces killed an engineer and left his body on the street. The engineer had been reported missing for some days before he was found dead. 1 fatality.
On 8 March 2019, in Guaduas (Cundinamarca), unknown assailants shot and killed a government attorney known for prosecuting local criminal groups. 1 fatality.

Around 8 March 2019 (as reported), in Payan (Narino), unidentified armed perpetrators shot and killed a merchant in front of his shop. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality
On 7 March 2019, the remains of a civilian allegedly kidnapped by the ELN were found on the streets of Saravena in Arauca department.

On 7 March 2019, members of the military forces of Colombia attacked a group of farmers who were playing soccer in the area Micoahumado, municipality of Morales, Bolivar. One civilian died in the event.

Around 7 March 2019 (between 6 - 7 March), in a rural area of Purisima de la Concepcion municipality (Cordoba), unknown perpetrators shot and killed two indigenous Zenu men in Buijio vereda. 2 fatalities.

On 7 March 2019, on the border of Carmen Del Darien municipality (Choco), members of the Gulf Clan abducted four children fishing on the Curvarado river. The children were released more than eight hours later after they were forced to guide the group through a nearby jungle. No fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: PU: Social Party of National Unity
notes: Around 6 March 2019 (as reported), near Andagoya in Medio San Juan municipality (Choco), a PU politician and two other men were killed and their bodies were found floating in the San Juan river, in an area known for frequent ELN activity. The politician was reported missing since 3 March, along with three others. 3 fatalities.
On 6 March 2019, in a rural area of San Jeronimo municipality (Antioquia), Gulf Clan militants killed a civilian during a failed kidnapping attempt in El Cabuyal vereda. 1 fatality.

On 5 March 2019, in a rural area of Argelia (Cauca), unidentified armed perpetrators shot and killed a merchant in El Plateado corregimiento. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 5 March 2019 (as reported), in Andagoya (Choco), a student was shot and killed and his body left to be found on the Los Pandales de Andagoya beach. There is no information about the perpetrators or their motive. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 6th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (6th Front)
notes: On 4 March 2019, in the city of Miranda (Cauca), four unarmed civilians were shot and killed by four armed men in La Castellana neighborhood. The perpetrators are members of the 6th Front of FARC dissidents, led by alias 'Harry,' who is known to operate in the area. 4 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 4 March 2019, in a rural area of Arauquita municipality (Arauca), FARC dissidents kidnapped a Colombian soldier who was on leave visiting his girlfriend in the area. His whereabout is unknown.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: Around 4 March 2019 (as reported), in Puerto Toledo (Meta), FARC Dissidents shot and killed a shopkeeper who often sold meat to local army and police forces. 1 fatality.

On 3 March 2019, in the city of Arauca (Arauca), unidentified perpetrators gunned down an unarmed woman in front of her children in front of a fast food restaurant in the 12 de Octubre neighborhood. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 2 March 2019 (weekend of), in a rural area of San Jeronimo municipality (Antioquia), Gulf Clan militants killed two civilians in El Cabuyal vereda. The attack was in retaliation for the pair reporting an attempted kidnapping to police two months earlier. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: FARC: Common Alternative Revolutionary Force; Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 2 March 2019, in Cajibio (Cauca), two unknown assailants on a motorcycle carried out a drive-by shooting against a member of the FARC Party about a kilometer from his house. The victim, who was also a former FARC militant, was injured and transported to Popayan for treatment and is expected to make a full recovery. One wounded, no fatalities.
Around 2 March 2019 (as reported), in a rural area of Mapiripan municipality (Meta), an unidentified armed man shot and killed a farmer in an unspecified vereda. 1 fatality.

On 28 February 2019, in Barbacoas (Narino), unidentified armed perpetrators on a motorcycle shot and killed a youth in a drive-by shooting in the Guayabal neighborhood. In the Bello Horizonte neighbourhood, another man was shot dead by unidentified perpetrators. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 27 February 2019, in Santander de Quilichao, Cauca, an underage man was shot dead in Belen neighbourhood. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 27 February 2019, in Banco de Arenas community, Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a man who was the son of a social leader was shot dead by two unidentified armed men. Before the attack, the victim had participated in an argument against a group of people who broke in the area of Cerro Morro and were being accused of illegal logging. 1 fatality.

On 26 February 2019, civilians volunteering on transporting human aid to Venezuela at the frontier between Colombia and Venezuela were assaulted by Venezuelan military forces. The military forces burned the 2 trucks containing aid. No one was injured.
On 26 February 2019, in Saravena, Arauca, a man was shot dead in his house backyard. The area is known for the presence of FARC dissident groups. 1 fatality.

On 26 February 2019, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a man was killed in Guaimaral neighbourhood. Information on the attackers is unknown. Also in Cucuta, a person a person was killed nearby the City's bus station by unidentified armed men. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 2 fatalities.

On 25 February 2019, in the road from Guaramo to Caucasi, Antioquia, a LGBT woman was shot dead while on her motorcycle with her nephew. The victim was an activist of the LGBT cause. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]
On 25 February 2019, unidentified armed group, fighting for territory in Cali, murdered 2 civilians.

On 25 February 2019, in Bucaramanga, Santander, a board member of the SUTIMAC trade union for workers in the construction industry was shot dead by two people on motorcycles outside his house in a drive-by shooting. 1 fatality.

Around 25 February 2019 (as reported), in Tumaco, Narino, a man was killed and his body was thrown from a moving car in Exporcol neighbourhood. The victim had several gunshot injuries and a message on his back. Information on the attackers is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 25 February 2019, in Ocana, Norte de Santander, a man was shot dead in El Dorado area. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 25 February 2019, in Puerto Asis municipality, Putumayo, three members of a family, including a child, were kidnapped in a rural area by members of a FARC dissident group. The victims were held captive in Puerto Colombia vereda and were rescued by the authorities on 2 March 2019.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Farmers (Colombia)
notes: Around 25 February 2019 (as reported), in Planadas municipality, Tolima, a former FARC member who was taking part in the peace process in Tolima was killed in his farm between Los Mangos and San Isidro veredas. After the attack, other former combatants living in the area have denounced threats by unidentified men. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Women (Colombia); Health Workers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 24 February 2019, in Puerto Asis, Putumayo, a female doctor was shot dead by unidentified armed men in Los Chiparos neighborhood. She was planning to run for the upcoming local elections and was an activist for women's rights. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 24 February 2019, in Valledupar, Cesar, a man was shot dead by two men on a motorcycle while he was arriving to his house in Los Musicos neighbourhood. Motive of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 24 February 2019, in Valledupar, Cesar, a former congressman who was attending a funeral was shot dead by unidentified men on a motorcycle. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 24 February 2019, in Campoyuca vereda, Norte de Santander, a man was shot dead by two unidentified men wearing masks. The attackers managed to escape the scene. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 24 February 2019, in Villagarzon, Putumayo, a woman who was working in a local shop was killed by two unidentified men. Also in Villagarzon, another women who was working in a store was killed by unidentified armed men. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); ANZORC: National Association of Peasant Reserve Zones; Farmers (Colombia)
notes: Around 23 February 2019 (as reported), in Puerto Asis, Putumayo, two social leaders and members of the ANZORC were killed. One of the victims was found with bullet injuries on 23 February 2019 and the other was found on 27 February 2019. 2 fatalities.

Around 23 February 2019 (as reported), in Sucre municipality, Cauca, a man was killed and his body was found in Buena Vista vereda. According to the report, the victim was shot 20 times and his body was found on a rural road to Guachicono. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 23 February 2019 (as reported), in Riosucio municipality, Choco, a man was killed and his body was found nearby Atrato river. A note with a victim's relative phone number was found next to the body which seems to be a way of threatening relatives of the victim. Two similar attacks were registered in the same area on 5 February 2019 and 10 February 2019. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 22 February 2019, in Planeta Rica, Cordoba, a butcher who was previously threatened and attacked was shot dead by members of Los Caparros gang. According to the report, the victim refused to pay an extortion demanded by the attackers. 1 fatality.
On 22 February 2019, in Tribuga corregimiento, Nuqui, Choco, three brothers were kidnapped by members of the Gulf Clan. Motives of the abduction are unknown. The victims' whereabouts are unknown.

Around 22 February 2019 (as reported), in Medio Atrato, Choco, a member of Tutumaco afro community who was kidnapped by members of the National Liberation Front was killed. His body was found near Atrato River. The community has been receiving threats from an armed group that operates in the area. 1 fatality.
On 21 February 2019, a man was assaulted by the police during a traffic stop in Santo Tomas town (Atlantico).

Around 21 February 2019 (as reported), in La Silla, Norte de Santander, a Venezuelan man was shot dead and his body was found on a rural road. Information on the motives and the attackers are unknown. There is presence of several armed men in this department. 1 fatality.

On 21 February 2019, in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, an informal bus driver was killed by two unidentified armed men while he was working on the road to Cucuta. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 20 February 2019, in Remedios municipality, Antioquia, a miner and social leader was killed by members of the National Liberation Army in Panama 9 vereda. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 20 February 2019, in Abrego municipality, Norte de Santander, four people were kidnapped by unidentified men on the road that goes from Ocana to that municipality. Motives of the abduction are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. The whereabouts of the victims are unknown.

assoc_actor_2: Wayuu Indigenous Group (Colombia); Teachers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: Front Line Defenders; UNOCHA; Diario La Libertad; INDEPAZ
notes: On 19 February 2019, in Riohacha, Guajira, a leader and ethnic teacher of the indigenous group Wayuu was shot and killed in a drive-by shooting by unknown gunmen in a car. Information on the attackers is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 February 2019, in Caceres municipality, Antioquia, three people were shot by military forces after skipping an official check point. Two of the victims were killed and one other was injured. According to the report, the attack was an excessive use of force by the authorities. 2 fatalities.

Around 18 February 2019 (as reported), in Caucasia municipality, Antioquia, three of four people who went missing after heading from Monteria to Caucasia on 15 February were killed and their bodies were found. Motives of the attack are unknown. The area is known by the presence of Los Caparros gang. 3 fatalities.

On 18 February 2019, in Campo Seis vereda, Norte de Santander, a Venezuelan man was shot dead on the road to El Tarra. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 18 February 2019 (as reported), in Campo Seis vereda, Norte de Santander, a man was killed and his body was found nearby Guachiman vereda. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of several armed men in this department. 1 fatality.

On 18 February 2019, in Convencion municipality, Norte de Santander, unidentified armed men intercepted two men who were in a vehicle on a road to La Vega vereda. One of the victims was a local farmer who was shot dead by the armed men while the other victim was abducted. The motives of the attack are unknown. The whereabouts of the other victim are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 18 February 2019, in Tibu, Norte de Santander, two men, one of them who was a citizen from Venezuela, were shot by two unidentified men who arrived on a motorcycle. The Venezuelan man was killed and the other man survived with injuries. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 February 2019, The ELN abducted four journalists and a social leader in the rural area of the municipality of Teorama in Norte de Santander. According to the version the group was released hours later due to military pressure.
On 16 February 2019, a civilian in the rural areas of the municipality of Abrego in Norte de Santander department was kidnapped. He was released on March 3.

source: Diario La Libertad; Colombia Reports; UNOCHA; La Opinion (Colombia)
notes: On 16 February 2019, in Aguachica, Cesar, four people were shot and killed in a home when unidentified armed men arrived to the house and started shooting. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 4 fatalities.

source: INDEPAZ; Front Line Defenders; UNOCHA; El Colombiano
notes: On 16 February 2019, in Caucasia, Antioquia, a youth social leader was shot dead in Las Brisas neighborhood. He was the president of the Municipal Youth Platform of Caucasia. The victim had an active role in his community. Further investigations linked the attack with members of the Los Caparros gang. 1 fatality.

On 16 February 2019, near Versalles corregimiento, Cordoba, a man was shot dead by unidentified men in Brazo Izquierdo vereda. The area is known by the presence of armed groups. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 Fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 15 February 2019, in Guamalito vereda, Arauca, civilians were abducted by members of a FARC dissidence operating in the area. Their whereabouts are unknown.

On 15 February 2019, in Tame municipality, Arauca, two armed men attacked a group of workers of the state oil company ECOPETROL in an oil field in Altos de Tamacay vereda. The workers survived the attack and were rescued by the military forces that arrived after the attack was perpetrated. There were no fatalities.

On 15 February 2019, in Carmen del Darien municipality, Choco, a man who was leaving his house with his family was killed by members of the Gulf Clan in Bella Flor Remacho vereda. The victim was the son of a local social leader. 1 fatality.

On 15 February 2019, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a man was shot dead in Escobal area by two unidentified men who managed to escape. Motives of the attack are unknown. Authorities believe that this attack might be related to other attacks perpetrated by La Linea gang in the area. 1 fatality.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 14 February 2019, the AGC/Gulf Clan killed the son of a restitution land activist of Choco. The event was registered in the municipality of Belen de Bajira, Rio Sucio, Choco.

On 14 February 2019, in Samaniego municipality, Narino, an indigenous woman member of the indigenous guard of Pastos village was shot dead while driving to her house. Information on the attackers and motives of the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 14 February 2019, in Argelia municipality, Cauca, a man was killed in La Emboscada corregimiento by unidentified armed men. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is known by the presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
On 14 February 2019, in Mercaderes municipality, Cauca, a farmer was shot dead inside his house by several unidentified men in in La Florida vereda. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 48th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (48th Front - Pedro Martinez)
notes: On 14 February 2019, in San Miguel municipality (coded to La Dorada), Putumayo, two farmers were kidnapped by seven members of the FARC dissident front No 48 in La Union vereda. The victims were rescued by the authorities days after the abduction. There were no fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: USO: Union of Workers of the Oil Industry; Labour Group (Colombia); Women (Colombia)
notes: On 13 February 2019, in Aguachica, Cesar, a female local leader of the USO was kidnapped and beaten by unidentified men on her way to a restaurant. The victim was found a few hours later alive with her hands tied. Information on the group associated to the abduction is unknown. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Around 13 February 2019 (as reported), in Puerto Libertador municipality, Cordoba, a bar owner was killed and his body was found on a road known as Pica Pica. According to the report, the attackers would be related to Los Caparros Gang. Days after the victim was killed, a message threatening local merchants who refused to pay extortion, mentioning the victim and signed by the this gang was found. 1 fatality.

Around 13 February 2019 (as reported), in Cucuta - Southeast, Norte de Santander, a man was killed and his body was found in the Bocono neighbourhood, with his hands tied floating on the Tachira River near an illegal trail that connects to Urena in Venezuela. Information on the attackers and the motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.
On 13 February 2019, in La Parada, Norte de Santander, a man was shot dead in a restaurant by three unidentified men. A Venezuelan man was also injured in the attack. Motives are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 February 2019, in La Gabarra, Norte de Santander, a man was killed while being transferred in an ambulance to the municipality of Tibu. The vehicle was stopped by armed men that took the victim with them. It is believed that the event was committed by the ELN or the EPL. Whereas there is still not certainly of who were the perpetrated this action.
On 12 February 2019, in Las Mercedes corregimiento, Norte de Santander, a farmer was shot dead. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 12 February 2019, in Mocoa, Putumayo, unidentified armed men shot at the house of the municipality's former mayor in Los Pinos neighbourhood. The victim was previously threatened with a message ordering him to leave politics. There were no fatalities.
On 11 February 2019, in Barbosa, Antioquia, a social leader was attacked by an unidentified armed man. The victim survived the attack with no injuries. Motives are unknown.

Around 11 February 2019 (between 28 January - 11 February), in Yolombal corregimiento, Antioquia, a rancher was killed and his body was found in a can nearby his farm. The victim was reported missing by his wife on 28 January 2019 after he was going to the bank to make a deposit. Information on the attackers is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 11 February 2019, in Valledupar, Cesar, a trans woman who was a human rights defender was stabbed in the face by a man. The victim survived the attack. According to the victim, the attacker has expressed his rejection for her work in the community before. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Around 11 February 2019 (as reported), in Riosucio, Choco, a man was killed and his body was found in Riosucio cemetery. The body was being protected by members of the Gulf Clan. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 11 February 2019 (as reported), in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, a Venezuelan rural worker was killed on his way to work in a drive-by shooting by two unidentified men on a motorcycle. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 10 February 2019 (as reported), in Riosucio municipality, Choco, a man was killed and his body was found nearby Atrato river. A note with a victim's relative phone number was found next to the body which seems to be a way of threatening relatives of the victim. A similar attack was registered in the same area on 5 February 2019. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.
On 10 February 2019, in Bolivar municipality, Cauca, two men were shot dead in a house by unidentified men in Cabuyal vereda. The area is known by the presence of armed groups. 2 fatalities.

On 10 February 2019, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a Venezuelan man was shot dead in a drive-by shooting carried out by unidentified men who arrived on a motorcycle in Amelia square. One of the attackers was later captured by the authorities. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 9 February 2019, in the municipality of Abrego, Norte de Santander, unidentified armed men killed a man in the rural area Las Rojas. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. No group has yet claimed the event.
On 9 February 2019, in San Antonio vereda, Cauca, an indigenous activist of the Raizal ethnic group was killed. The victim was shot several times by unidentified armed men. 1 fatality.

On 9 February 2019, in Argelia municipality, Cauca, a man who arrived to La Emboscada corregimiento looking for a job was shot dead by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are unknown. The area is known by the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 8 February 2019, in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, a social leader and member of the JAC of the area T-25 Los Patios was killed in the vereda Los Patios. The victim was shot several times by armed men. No group has yet claimed this event. 1 fatality.
On 8 February 2019, in Piedrancha, Narino, a farmer was shot dead on the street by unidentified armed men. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 February 2019, in the corregimiento La Gabarra, Norte de Santander, a woman was shot dead by several unidentified men in a farm. The attackers latter threw the body to a river. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

Two civilians were killed in the area El Plateado in the municipality of Argelia in Cauca. No group has yet claimed this event that happened the same week that two FARC militants were also killed. The event was reported on February 7th, 2019.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 6 February 2019, in Guamal municipality, Magdalena, the president of the Council of Communal Action of the corregimiento Santa Teresa was beaten by several unidentified men. The victim survived the attack with injuries and was taken to the hospital by members of the community. According to the authorities, the victim was not the main target of the attack. Motives are unknown.
On 5 February 2019, in Bugalagrande, Valle Del Cauca, a member of the SINALTRAINAL, a worker's union, was shot dead in Portales neighbourhood. He was also a worker at the Nestle factory.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 5 February 2019, in El Mango, Cauca, unidentified armed men killed two former FARC militants. No armed group has yet claimed this event. 2 fatalities.

Around 5 February 2019 (as reported), in Corinto municipality, Cauca, unidentified armed men shot at the indigenous guard of the Corinto Indigenous reserve. One woman was injured in the attack. Six members of the armed group were captured latter by the indigenous authorities. There were no fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 5 February 2019 (as reported), in Riosucio municipality, Choco, a former member of FARC was killed and his body was found nearby Atrato river. The phone number of a victim's relative was found in the victim's clothes which seems to be a way of threatening relatives of the victim. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 5 February 2019, in San Jose del Palmar municipality, Choco, a farmer was shot dead by members of the National Liberation Army. The victim's body was found in the rural area of Badea. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 February 2019, in Medellin, Antioquia, a political advisor working for a deputy of the Colombian Liberal Party of Puerto Nare municipality was shot dead by an unidentified man. The attacker managed to escape on a motor bike. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On February, 3rd, the remains of a police officer who had been abducted were found in the rural area of the municipality of Fortul in Arauca. Although the authorities claimed the ELN as directly responsible, this group denied its responsibility for this event.
On 3 February 2019, in El Palo corregimiento, Caloto, Cauca, a member of the peasants association and labour union, ASTRAZONACAL, was shot dead by unidentified armed men.

Around 3 February 2019 (as reported), in Buenos Aires municipality, Cauca, a farmer was shot dead and his body was found in the vereda Mary Lopez. Information on the attackers and the motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Oliver Sinisterra Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Oliver Sinisterra Front)
notes: On 3 February 2019, in Llorente, Narino, members of the FARC dissidence Oliver Sinisterra front attacked a group of people inside a house. A man and a woman were killed and an underage girl was injured. Motives of the attack are unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 3 February 2019 (as reported), in Cucuta municipality, Norte de Santander, a man was killed and his body was found dead nearby Tonchala river. According to the report, the victim was executed with two bullets to the head. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former AUC: United Self-Defence Forces of Colombia
notes: On 2 February 2019, in Medellin, Antioquia, a former leader of the United Self-Defence Forces of Colombia was shot dead by an unidentified man in Hector Abad neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 2 February 2019, in Arauca department, an off-duty military officer who was travelling by bus to Bogota was killed by unidentified men. According to the authorities, the area is known for the presence of the National Liberation Army. 1 fatality.

Around 1 February 2019 (as reported), in Cucuta - Southeast, Norte de Santander, a man was killed in the Bocono neighbourhood and his body was found by the authorities. According to the report, the victim was shot twice in the head and was brought from Venezuela. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 31 January 2019 (as reported), in San Jose de Ure municipality, Cordoba, a community leader was killed and his body was found in the Mejor Esquina corregimiento, a rural area. According to reports, he was a mayoral pre-candidate for this municipality. 1 fatality.

Around 30 January 2019 (as reported), in Puerto Lleras, Saravena, Arauca, a man was killed and his body was found. The corpse bore several gunshot wounds. Attackers left a note next to the body. Several armed groups have a presence in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 30 January 2019 (as reported), in Saravena municipality, Arauca, a man was killed and his body was found in the La Union neighborhood in the Sarare region. The corpse bore several gunshot wounds. Attackers left a note next to the body. Several armed groups have a presence in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former Government of Colombia (2018-2022); Independent Politicians (Colombia)
notes: On 30 January 2019, in Buenos Aires, Valle del Cauca, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a former mayor of El Cerrito in a drive-by shooting, a few meters away from the local prosecutor's office. According to reports, he was visiting some relatives at the moment of the killing. He was going to re-run as candidate in the elections. 1 fatality.

Around 30 January 2019 (as reported), in La Union municipality, Narino, a man was killed and his body was found bearing two gunshot wounds in a rural area. He was a farmer in the Alto Quiroz vereda. 1 fatality.
