source: UNOCHA; Front Line Defenders; INDEPAZ; El Espectador
notes: On 29 January 2019, in La Betulia corregimiento, Suarez, Cauca, a farmer was killed. According to reports, he was riding his motorcycle when he was intercepted by an armed man in a car who opened fire and killed him in a drive-by shooting. He was a member of a farmer's association Asocordillera and a member of the Farmer's guard. 1 fatality.

Around 29 January 2019 (as reported), in Rio Viejo municipality, Bolivar, a farmer was killed and his body was found on a farm called La Bonita. According to reports, several ELN members shot and killed him. 1 fatality.

On 29 January 2019, in Buenos Aires, Cauca, a local merchant was shot and killed in the San Francisco vereda of the Timba corregimiento. There is no information about the perpetrators. According to the report, residents of the area have reported extortions and threats made by armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 29 January 2019, in Llorente, Tumaco, Narino, two men were killed in a drive-by shooting by unidentified armed men on a motorcycle. The attackers fled the scene. No armed group has claimed this event. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 2 fatalities.
Around 28 January 2019 (as reported), in Caceres, Antioquia, a man was killed and his body was found in vereda El Vaquero. Authorities suspect the victim was killed by the ELN. 1 fatality.

Around 28 January 2019 (month of), in Caceres municipality, Antioquia, two people were killed and their bodies were found in an advanced state of decomposition in the Nogales sector. There is no information on the identity of the victims. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 2 fatalities.

Around 28 January 2019 (as reported), in Arauquita municipality, Arauca, a farmer was killed and his body was found in Playa Rica area. The corpse bore signs of torture and was tied. A message saying 'rapist' was left next to the corpse. 1 fatality.

Around 28 January 2019 (as reported), in Asnazu, Suarez, Cauca, a person was killed and his body was found bearing several gunshot wounds. According to reports, the victim was a minor. There is no information on the circumstances of the killing. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Women (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 28 January 2019, in Corinto municipality, Cauca, the female vice president of the Council of Communal Action of El Crucero La Secreta vereda, was abducted by FARC dissidents who arrived in town the night before. Abductors were looking for the President of the Council of Communal Action, but they abducted her as they could not find him. The area is being disputed between a FARC dissident front and Pelusos del EPL group. Her whereabouts are unknown. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 28 January 2019, in Los Patios, Norte de Santander, armed men shot and killed two people in the La Cordialidad neighborhood. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 2 fatalities.

A farmer member of the land restitution programme was killed in the rural area of Rio Viejo in Bolivar on January 27th, 2019. Men attacked the victim near his house. Sources name the ELN as possible responsible, but this version is to be proven by local authorities.

Around 27 January 2019 (month of), in Zaragoza municipality, Antioquia, members of Los Caparros gang kidnapped a group of 17 people. According to the report, some of them were raped. Military forces rescued them a month after the kidnapping in the Moncholo vereda. No fatalities occurred.

On 27 January 2019, in Tame, Arauca, two armed men on a motorcycle killed an off-duty military officer and injured two people in a drive-by shooting in the 20 de Julio neighborhood. According to reports, the victims were departing in a bar when the armed men arrived and opened fire. The attackers fled the scene. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

On 27 January 2019, in Montelibano, Cordoba, a man was killed. The victim was pointed as a target in a pamphlet issued and distributed by the Los Caparros gang in the area days before the killing. No further details are provided. 1 fatality.

On 27 January 2019, Llorente, Tumaco, Narino, armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by incident in the street. The attackers fled the scene. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 27 January 2019 (week of), in Tumaco municipality, Narino, two people were killed in the Vaquerio sector. The attack was reported by social organizations acting in the area. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 2 fatalities.

On 26 January 2019, in Cartago, Valle del Cauca, hitmen shot and killed a local social leader near his house in the San Fernando neighbourhood. He was working on housing projects for people in need and authorities are investigating if his killing is related to his social work. 1 fatality.

Around 26 January 2019 (as reported), in Tumaco municipality, Narino, a farmer was killed and his body was found in the La Playa sector. The body bore two gunshots wounds. He was reported missing a few days before the finding. 1 fatality.

On 26 January 2019, in El Tarra, Norte de Santander, armed men shot and killed one person and injured another in Largo neighborhood. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 26 January 2019, in Villa Del Rosario, Norte De Santander, a man with a mask and a hat on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in the street, in a drive-by shooting. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 25 January 2019, in Puerto Santander municipality, Norte de Santander, a woman was killed in Cuatrovientos sector. According to reports, the area is being disputed between ELN and Los Pelusos. The report states the woman could have been killed on the Venezuelan side of the border. 1 fatality.

On 25 January 2019, in Convencion, Norte de Santander, a man was shot and killed in the 12 de Enero neighborhood. According to reports, an unknown number of men intercepted the victim and opened fire. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.
On 24 January 2019, in El Penol, Antioquia, a youth leader was stabbed to death by two unidentified men in a local store. He had recently reported corruption schemes in the city. 1 fatality,

On 24 January 2019, in Norosi municipality, Bolivar, a moto-taxi driver was shot and killed by ELN members. According to reports, the victim was carrying a passenger to corregimiento Puerto Rico and was asked to stop by ELN members at an illegal checkpoint, but as he did not stop by, the armed men shot at him. 1 fatality.

Around 24 January 2019 (as reported), in Santa Genoveva de Docordo, Litoral del San Juan, Choco, a woman was killed and her dismembered was found inside a barrel. The crime could be related to the clashes between the ELN and paramilitary forces. 1 fatality.

On 24 January 2019, in Los Patios, Norte de Santander, two men were killed by an unidentified armed group in the Villa Ansep neighborhood. The victims were drinking beer in a bar when two men arrived on a motorcycle. One of them stepped down, opened fire, and killed the men. The attackers fled the scene. No armed group has claimed this event. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 2 fatalities.

Around 24 January 2019 (as reported), in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, a man was killed and his body was found in the Minero vereda. According to reports, the corpse was left on the highway and bore several gunshot wounds. No further information is reported. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Oliver Sinisterra Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Oliver Sinisterra Front)
assoc_actor_1: GUP: United Guerrillas of the Pacific
notes: 513 have been displaced in the rural area of the municipality of San Andres de Tumaco. Apparently, the event is due to increasing confrontations between the Oliver Sinisterra Front and the GUP, culminating with 2 murders in the last 7 days. The event was reported by local media on January 24th.
On 23 January 2019, in Toribio municipality, Cauca, two men shot and killed a farmer inside his house. The armed men had their faces covered, opened fire and fled the scene. 1 fatality.

Around 23 January 2019 (as reported), in La Union, Narino, a man was killed and his body was found in the vereda El Guabo. According to reports, the body bore signs of torture, gunshots and his head was wrapped with plastic bags. There was a letter inside his pocket accusing him of snitching. There is presence of several armed groups in Narino department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: PU: Social Party of National Unity
notes: On 22 January 2019, armed men killed the running candidate for the majors' office of the municipality of El Cerrito in Valle del Cauca. No group has attributed yet this event.

On 22 January 2019, in Guamo municipality, Tolima, three armed men shot and killed a man in vereda Canada Baja. The men fled the scene. According to reports, the victim was an off-duty soldier. 1 fatality.

On 21 January 2019, in Hacari, Norte de Santander, men on a motorcycle killed a man in a drive-by shooting La Parilla neighborhood. Also, one bystander was killed. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

On 20 January 2019, in Valledupar municipality, Cesar, two armed men abducted a farmer in the vereda Camperucho. According to reports, his car was found burned moments after the abduction. The ELN has control in the area. His whereabouts is unknown.

On 19 January 2019, in Planeta Rica, Cordoba, armed men on a motorcycle carried out a drive-by shooting against a man in the Los Angeles neighborhood. It is believed they were killed for not complying with the prohibition of circulation after 7 pm established by an armed group. In the area there is presence of the Gulf Clan and Los Caparros gang. 1 fatality.

On 19 January 2019, in Campo Dos corregimiento, Tibu, Norte de Santander, a man was killed while riding his motorcycle in the Puerto Reyes area. The report does not state further circumstances of the attack and the perpetrators. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 19 January 2019, in Argelia, Valle del Cauca, hooded people shot at three men in El Porvenir neighborhood. One of the men was killed and the other two, injured. No information on the affiliation of the attackers. According to the report, after the demobilization of FARC the attacks against civilians have increased in this municipality. 1 fatality, 2 injured.
On 18 January 2019, in Puebloviejo municipality, Magdalena, two men on a motorcycle shot and injured a social leader in a drive-by shooting in the corregimiento Soplador. 1 injured.

On 18 January 2019, in Planeta Rica, Cordoba, armed men shot and injured three people. It is believed they were attacked for not complying with the prohibition of circulation after 7 pm established by an armed group. In the area there is presence of the Gulf Clan and Los Caparros gang. 3 injured.

On 18 January 2019, in Tumaco municipality, Narino, two farmers were killed by an unidentified armed group in La Vuelta Larga vereda. According to reports, the armed men were seeking extortion and, as the men refused to give one, they were killed. The victims were siblings. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 2 fatalities.

The social leader and activist of the programme for restitution of illegal crops died after being tortured by unidentified armed men in the area of Las Mercedes in the municipality of Sardinata in Norte de Santander. The family of the victims claims the perpetrators are armed groups that operated in this area of the department. The event was on January 17th 2019.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 10th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (10th Front)
notes: On 17 January 2019, in Saravena, Arauca, a humanitarian worker was kidnapped by members of the 10 FARC Front dissidents who took him to a rural area and set him free hours later. There were no casualties.

On 17 January 2019, in Guayacana corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, an unidentified armed group killed a man while he was riding his motorbike. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.
Around 17 January 2019 (as reported), in Sardinata municipality, Norte de Santander, a community leader was killed by unidentified armed men in the corregimiento Las Mercedes. 1 fatality.
On 16 January 2019, in Patia municipality, Cauca, a farmer was killed in the corregimiento Brisas. There is no information about the perpetrators or motivation behind the attack. 1 fatality.

Armed men killed a worker of the National Parks of Colombia in the rural area Perico Aguao in Santa Marta Magdalena on January 15th. National parks alleged that its workers are continually threatened by armed groups in the area. No group has claimed this event.

source: Front Line Defenders; UNOCHA; El Espectador
notes: On 15 January 2019, in Montecristo municipality, Bolivar, a member of the social organization Aheramigua was killed in the vereda Puerto Guamo. The victim had been threatened in the past by the ELN. The social organization declared this group as responsible for this action. 1 fatality.
On 15 January 2019, in Planeta Rica, Cordoba, two men were shot and killed by armed men inside a bar. Threatening pamphlets had circulated in the area days before the attack. 2 fatalities.

A man died during a police operation in the area San Javier in Medellin on January 14th. There are two different versions of the event. The official authority report mentioned that this person died during an armed clash, but local human right organizations claimed that the victim was unarmed.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Women (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 14 January 2019, in Alto Agua Clara corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, a female social leader was attacked by unidentified armed individuals. She was the president of the Council of Communal Action of Agua Clara. The victim died in a hospital on 24 January 2019. The motive of the attack is not reported. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Armed men attacked the member of the JAC of the area Ciudadela Bonanza in Turbaco Bolivar, Manuel Echeverri on January 13th. The victim survived the attack. Later the police captured the perpetrators.

On the evening of January 13th armed men attacked a social leader of the Nasa community in the area of Tacueyo, municipality of Toribio. The victim survived the attack after local authorities arrived in the area. No group has claimed this event.

On 13 January 2019, in Riosucio, Choco, two armed men shot and killed a man in his house in the El Centro neighborhood. The armed men are members of the Gulf Clan, who had threatened the victim before. 1 fatality.

On 12 January 2019, in El Tarra municipality, Norte de Santander, several armed men shot and killed two men, while they were driving a motorcycle between El Tarra and Filo El Gringo. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

On 12 January 2019, in San Calixto municipality, Norte de Santander, three armed men shot and killed a man in the vereda Potrero Grande. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

A private helicopter of a company was attacked by EPL members in the municipality of Hacari in Norte de Santander on January 11th. The pilot had an emergency land after they were shot. Then armed men arrived in the area of landing in San Jose del Tarra, Hacari and stole a high amount of money behind transported. The family denounced three crew members that were in the helicopter disappeared after the attack and it is believed that were kidnapped by the armed group. The EPL and the ELN attributed separately the attack. Nevertheless, the ELN has confirmed that they have the flight crew.

Around 11 January 2019 (as reported), a group of journalists was harassed by armed men in a motorcycle while they were reporting the targeting of social leaders in the town El Salado in Carmen de Bolivar in Bolivar.

Around 11 January 2019 (as reported), in Jamundi, San Antonio, Valle del Cauca, four men were killed and their bodies were found on the streets. The victim were abducted elsewhere and their corpses were thrown from a car. According to witnesses, the EPL carried out the attack. The EPL and other armed groups have a presence in the area. 4 fatalities.

On 11 January 2019, on the road that connects Palmira with Pradera in Valle del Cauca, the truck in which the female leader and member of an organization that advocates for the defense of extrajudicial killing victims was shot three times and injured by two armed men on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting. Moments before, she had received a death threat call. Castillo is a primary witness against the military forces of Colombia. There were no fatalities.

Around 11 January 2019 (as reported), in El Rosario municipality, Narino, a man was killed and his body was found in the vereda El Placer. He was a farmer's leader and was reported missing on 26 December 2018. 1 fatality.
On 11 January 2019, in Tumaco municipality, Narino, unidentified armed men attacked a former councilmember in the vereda Chilvi during a family meeting. Two people were injured. 2 injured.

On 11 January 2019, in Los Patios, Norte de Santander, a man was killed by two armed men on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 10 January 2019, a man was executed by unidentified armed men in the area Potrero Grande in the municipality of San Calixto in Norte de Santander. He died after the attack. No group has yet claimed this event.
On 10 January 2019, in Ricaurte municipality, Narino, a group of unidentified men arrived at the Cuascabi reserve, of the Awa indigenous group, and shot and killed an indigenous leader. 1 fatality.

On 10 January 2019, in Chimichagua municipality, Cesar, a woman was abducted one kilometer away from the La Vega corregimiento. According to reports, the victim and her husband arrived in his farm Oro Mina when armed men abducted her. The husband of the victim and the farm employees were left in the farm hand-tied. No armed group has yet claimed this event. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. Her whereabouts are unknown.

On 10 January 2019, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, two armed men on a motorcycle carried out a drive-by shooting and injured two men in the street. There is presence of armed group in the area. 2 injured.

On 10 January 2019, in Tibu, Norte de Santander, armed men intercepted two men on a motorcycle. The men were held, hand-tied, shot multiple times and killed in the area known as Cano Victoria. The dissident FARC Front 33, Los Pelusos, and the ELN have a presence in the area. 2 fatalities.
On 9 January 2019, in Montelibano, Cordoba, a man was killed in the street. He was a newspaper salesman. According to reports, the Gulf Clan and the Caparros are present in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 9 January 2019 (as reported), in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a man was killed and his body was found in the street with a bullet in his neck. There is presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 9 January 2019, in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, a group of armed men took a man from the farm where he was working at and killed him in the Guachiman sector. There is no information on the circumstances of the killing. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 8 January 2019, in Montelibano, Cordoba, an unknown number of men shot at a motorcycle sales shop in the city center. At the moment of the attack, a worker was inside the store. According to reports, it is possible this action was in retaliation for not paying extortion. The area is being disputed between the Gulf Clan and Los Caparros. No fatalities occurred.

As reported on January 7, 2019, at the Jorge Gaitan Duran bridge in Cucuta, Norte de Santander department, a civilian was killed by a police officer. The attack occurred when the victim was inside a taxi. The taxi driver did not stop while police officers were conducting a security operation. One fatality recorded.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
source: INDEPAZ; El Tiempo (Colombia); UNOCHA; Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 7 January 2019, in Cartagena del Chaira, Caqueta, several unidentified armed individuals killed a social leader in his house. He was the President of the Community Action Board of the La Victoria neighborhood and had received threats before. 1 fatality.

On 7 January 2019, in Villa Del Rosario municipality, Norte De Santander, armed men abducted a member of the military forces of Colombia in a rural area. According to reports, the man was on his day off at the moment of the abduction, and it is believed the abductors took him to the border with Venezuela. No group has yet claimed this event but authorities believe the ELN abducted the man. His whereabouts are unknown.

On 7 January 2019, in Mapoy vereda, Tame, Arauca, armed men arrived in the Canta Rana farm and abducted the owners, a couple. According to reports, one of the victims was a former Secretary of Infrastructure of the government of Arauca. There is no information about the perpetrators. His whereabouts are unknown.

On 6 January 2019, in Caucasia, Antioquia, two men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man and injured a woman. According to reports, the men on the motorcycle spotted the couple, one of them stepped down and opened fire. Also, in Caucasia, two men shot and killed a man in the Las Malvinas neighborhood. According to reports, the men were walking down the street, saw the victim and opened fire. The Gulf Clan, and Los Caparros gang have a presence in the area. 2 fatalities, 1 injured.
On 5 January 2019, a social leader and active member of the program for illegal crop restitution was killed by an unidentified armed group in the rural area of the Cajibio in Cauca.

source: ProtectDefenders.eu; Front Line Defenders; El Espectador
notes: On 5 January 2019, in Bonda, Santa Marta, Magdalena, a female social leader and member of a victims' organization that advocates for the restitution of land was attacked near her house. There is no information about the perpetrators or motivation behind the attack. No group has yet claimed this event. She died for the injuries in the morning of January 7th. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 5 January 2019, in Fortul, Arauca, a man was shot and killed by a guerrilla group in Nuevo Fortul area. According to reports, a message was left next to his body, stating he was killed for being a thief. 1 fatality.

Around 5 January 2019 (as reported), in Puerto Leon, Norte de Santander, a couple was killed and their bodies were found with several gunshots in El Infierno area. There is presence of armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

The son of a recognized social leader of Santander de Quilichao in Cauca disappeared on January 4th. The man left his house in the morning but he never returned. It is believed the event was perpetrated by armed groups that operated in this area.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); MP: Patriotic March; ANZORC: National Association of Peasant Reserve Zones
source: Caracol Radio; El Colombiano; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; ProtectDefenders.eu
notes: On 4 January 2019, near El Carmelo, Cauca, four armed men shot and killed a human rights defender in La Independencia vereda. The victim was member of Marcha Patriotica, the Farmers Association of Cajibio, the ANZORC and National Coordinator for Coca, Marijuana and Poppy Growers. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 4 January 2019, in Hacari, Norte De Santander, the president of the association of communal councils (JAC) and member of the CISCA: Social Integration Committee of Catatumbo militant, was shot in a drive-by shooting carried out by unidentified armed men on a motorcycle. The victim survived the attack and was taken to hospital. 1 injured.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: UNOCHA; Front Line Defenders; ProtectDefenders.eu; El Espectador
notes: On 4 January 2019, in Hacari, Norte de Santander, a social leader and member of the JAC was attacked by armed men in the vereda los Cedros. The victim died later in the hospital. No group has claimed this event, but the area is controlled mostly by the ELN and EPL. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: Front Line Defenders; INDEPAZ; Caracol Radio; UNOCHA; ProtectDefenders.eu
notes: On 4 January 2019, in Zaragoza municipality (Antioquia), a social leader and president of the JAC of Vereda La Vera de Puerto Jobo was shot and killed by unidentified armed actors in his house. No armed group has claimed this event. 1 fatality.

On 3 January 2019, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a man was killed in Chapinero neighborhood. According to reports, the victim was intercepted by armed men. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 3 January 2019 (as reported), in the area of the corregimiento La Gabarra, Norte de Santander, a man was killed and his body was found in the vereda El 60. Also in La Gabarra, a man was killed and his body was found in La Serena area. According to reports, there was a note left on top of the corpse saying 'he died for being a motorcycle thief and we will continue'. There is presence of armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

On 2 January 2019, in Fortul, Arauca, two men shot and injured a man in the El Centro neighborhood inside his store. According to reports, the men arrived, asked for a drink, opened fire, wounding the man, and fled the scene. The victim died moments later. There is reported presence of FARC dissident fronts, ELN, and other armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 2 January 2019, near Guayacana corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, armed men entered a house and held a man hostage in the Verde vereda. His corpse was found hours later, bearing several gunshot wounds, on the highway. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia)
notes: On 1 January 2019, in Suarez, Cauca, a social leader and cultural activist from the afro-colombian community was killed by an unidentified armed group.
On 1 January 2019, unidentified armed men killed a woman in the area Capitan Largo, municipality of Abrego, Norte de Santander. No group has yet claimed the attack.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 31 December 2018, a 24-year-old embera indigenous was assaulted by 2 members of Gulf Clan while walking towards Jiguamiando river, in Indigenous Resguardo Alto Guayabal (Choco). ACG members intimidated him, asking questions about the location of ELN fighters, and held him for half an hour.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 31 December 2018, in La Macarena, Meta, a community leader and JAC member was found stabbed to death on a road.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 31 December 2018, in Caicedonia, Valle del Cauca, the president of the JAC and social leader was killed in a store. There is no information about the perpetrators or motivation behind the attack. The victim had reported to the authorities several events, such as corruption cases or the sale of drug in his neighbourhood, one of the possible hypothesis for the reasons behind his killing. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 31 December 2018, in Feliciano vereda, Arauca, a man was kidnapped by FARC dissidents. The victim was released by Venezuelan authorities on 3 January 2019 in El Amparo, Venezuela.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 31 December 2018, in San Jose del Guaviare, Guaviare, a former member of FARC was shot dead. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 30 December 2018, in Los Caracoles, Cordoba, a man and his 2 sons were shot dead by unidentified armed men. The man was killed when he was on his way to pick up his son's body, killed by the same armed med before he was attacked. In the area, there is presence of FARC dissidents, Gulf Clan and Los Caparros. 3 fatalities.

On 29 December 2018, a 22-year-old Embera indigenous leader belonging to Santa Maria de Condoto community, was shot dead by members from AGC (Clan del Golfo) when walking with her partner, who managed to escape, in El Valle (Bahia Solano, Choco).
On 29 December 2018, a man was killed by unidentified armed actors as he was arriving to his house in Montelibano (Montelibano, Cordoba).

On 17 April 2019, the remains of a civilian were found in the rural area El Palo of the municipality of Caloto in Cauca. The victim was one of the two businessmen abducted by unidentified armed actors in Corinto (Corinto, Cauca) when they were promoting the Superior Technical Institute (ITS) in the area on December 28, 2018.

On 28 December 2018, in Barbacoas municipality, Narino, the Awa indigenous governor of Pingullo Sardinero indigenous reserve and his wife were attacked by unidentified armed men in the area of this indigenous reserve. Their six children were present but didn't result injured. Both survived, but were severely injured.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Dagoberto Ramos: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Dagoberto Ramos)
notes: On 28 December 2018, in Corinto, Cauca, two were abducted by members of the Dagoberto Ramos dissident front of FARC when they were promoting the Superior Technical Institute (ITS) in the area. One victim was rescued by indigenous authorities on 16 May 2019. The other victim was killed and found dead on April 2019 (coded separately).

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); Government of Colombia (2018-2022); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 27 December 2018, in El Doce area, Taraza, Antioquia, a community leader and a government worker were shot dead by unidentified armed men while driving on a motorcycle on a road. The community leader was also a member of the Rural Association of Bajo Cauca (ASOCBAC), member of the Council of Communal Action of Ocabajo and was taking part of the coca substitution process in the area. The second victim was also the sister of a council man in Taraza. 2 fatalities.

Around 27 December 2018 (as reported), in El Bagre, Antioquia, a man was killed and his head was found on the street. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of Los Caparros Gang in the area. 1 fatality.

A farmer leader was found dead in the area El Placer, rural area of the municipality of El Rosario in Narino on January 10th. The victim had disappeared on December 26th. The family reported that he was supposedly killed by an armed group that operates in the area.

On 26 December 2018, in Santander de Quilichao, Cauca, a mas was shot dead by an unidentified man in La Joyita neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 25 December 2018 (as reported), in the area of La Gabarra corregimiento, Tibu, Norte de Santander, two men were killed and their bodies were found along with a threatening message left by he attackers in Cano Guaduas vereda. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: Around 22 December 2018, a public servant at Valle del Cauca Governorate, was shot dead by unidentified armed actors on the road between Alcala (Alcala, Valle Del Cauca) and Quimbaya. The casues and actors behind the event are currently under investigation.

On 20 December 2018, a woman was shot dead by an unidentified armed man while travelling on a bus in Bucaramanga (Bucaramanga, Santander). The causes behind the event are still under investigation, but one of the hypothesis is that she could be a witness for a case investigated by the Prosecutor in Santander.

assoc_actor_2: ACIN: Association of Indigenous Councils of North Cauca; Indigenous Group (Colombia)
notes: On 20 December 2018, in Vilachi vereda, Santander de Quilichao, Cauca, a human rights defender who was member of the Indigenous Guard and members of the ACIN: Association of Indigenous Councils of North Cauca, was attacked by unidentified armed men in his house. The perpetrators tried to shoot him and ended up injuring him with a knife. The victim is also the brother of a congress man. Motives of the attack are unknown.

On 20 December 2018, in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, a man was shot dead by unidentified men in Cano Raya rural area. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of the ELN and Los Pelusos Gang in the area. 1 fatality.

On 20 December 2018, in Tibu, Norte de Santander, a man driving his motorcycle was killed in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men in El Largo neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of the ELN and Los Pelusos Gang in the area. 1 fatality.

On 20 December 2018, in Sabana de Torres, Norte de Santander, a member of the Victims of Forced Displacement of Sabana de Torres organization was killed by unidentified men. The organization has reported constant threats by an unidentified group. 1 fatality.

On 19 December 2018, 2 youths were allegedly attacked by police officers after one of the youths called one of the police officers 'tombo' (derogatory term to refer to a police officer) when they were stopped by a police patrol in La Estancia neighbourhood in Ciudad Bolivar (Ciudad Bolivar, Antioquia).

On 19 December 2018, the Police Forces forcibly evicted, shooting pellets and destroying around 300 shacks, a group of people that had occupied Alfonso Gomez settlement (belonging to a private company), in Anillo Vial sector, San Jose De Cucuta (Cucuta, Norte De Santander).

assoc_actor_2: Government of Colombia (2018-2022); Labour Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; El Espectador; Caracol Radio
notes: On 19 December 2018, in Mina Blanca, San Vicente del Caguan, Caqueta, a psychologist at the ARN: Agency for Reintegration and Normalization, and a, trader and social leader, were killed by unidentified armed actors. The reasons and authors behind the killings are still under investigation, but the mayor of San Vicente Del Caguan accuses FARC dissidents and a former FARC leader. The Police believe it was related to personal conflicts. 2 fatalities.

On 19 December 2018, in Cucuta - Cementerio, Norte de Santander, two businessmen were abducted by unidentified armed men in the urban area. According to the source, the victims would have been taken to Puerto Santander municipality. Information on the armed group responsible is unknown. The victims' whereabouts are unknown. Several armed groups operate in this department.
On 18 December 2018, a chiva bus owner was abducted by 6 unidentified armed individuals in El Recuerdo (El Tambo, Cauca). He was released on 21 December 2018 in El Rosario (Cajibio, Cauca).

actor1: FARC Dissident - 3rd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (3rd Front - Oswald Patino)
notes: On 18 December 2018, a mechant was abducted by dissidents from FARC's 3rd 'Oswaldo Patino' Front during a meeting with several merchants set up by FARC dissidents in San Antonio (Cajibio, Cauca). He was released by the Military Forces and the Colombian Air Force on 19 December 2018.

On 18 December 2018, in Cartagenita corregimiento, Convencion, Norte de Santander, a man was shot dead by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 18 December 2018, in Mapiripan municipality, Meta, six people, including a minor, were shot dead between the veredas of San Luis and El Recuerdo. There is no information on the perpetrators. According to the authorities, the motives of the attack might be related to a settlement of scores between coca paste merchants. There is presence of Los Puntilleros Gang in the area. 6 fatalities.

On 17 December 2018, a 19-year-old member of the LGBTIQ  community, was found dead in her apartment in Santiago De Cali (Cali, Valle Del Cauca). The causes and actors regarding her death are currently under investigation.

On 17 December 2018, in the rural area of Aguasclaras corregimiento (Norte de Santander), a farmer was abducted by five armed men who identified themselves as guerrilla fighters in his El Uvito farm. The victim was released on 21 March 2019. This was the first time the victim was abducted by armed men; he was abducted again in July 2020 (coded separately) and in June 2022 (coded separately).
On 17 December 2018, in Riohacha, La Guajira, a journalist was shot dead by two unidentified armed men in his house in Los Nogales neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 December 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, a Venezuelan man was shot dead by unidentified men in Ciudadela 2000 neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 17 December 2018 (as reported), in Convencion municipality, Norte de Santander, a man was killed and his body was found in El Comercio area. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 17 December 2018, in Convencion, Norte de Santander, a man was kidnapped from his house and killed by unidentified men. The victim's body was latter found in a sugar cane crop. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.
On 17 December 2018, in Hacari municipality, Norte de Santander, a farmer was shot dead by unidentified men in Aguablanca vereda. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 17 December 2018, in Teorama municipality, Norte de Santander, an underage woman was killed in San Juancito corregimiento. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality. [women targeted: girls]

On 16 December 2018, a primary school teacher in Vegachi (Vegachi, Antioquia), was shot dead by unidentified armed actors while riding a motorbike in Vegachi. The other person on the motorbike resulted injured.

assoc_actor_2: AV: Green Alliance; Government of Colombia (2018-2022)
notes: On 16 December 2018, in Santiago de Tolu, Sucre, the councilman of Santamaria, Huila for the Green Alliance party, and his half brother, were shot dead by unidentified armed men when they were visiting the city. The reasons behind the attack are unknown. 2 fatalities.
On 15 December 2018, a 24-year-old stabbed priest Alirio Bedoya during mass in Jardin (Jardin, Antioquia), injuring him.

On 15 December 2018, the former city mayor of Riohacha, was abducted by unidentified armed actors while riding his vehicle on a road in Maicao (Maicao, La Guajira). He was found, tied up and without his vehicle, by the authorities.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 15 December 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, a community leader and president of La Chorrera vereda Council of Communal Action was shot dead by unidentified men in Villas de Alcaravan neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 15 December 2018 (between 15 - 16 December), in El Gallinazo area, Puerto Guzman, Putumayo, two brothers, both farmers, were abducted by unidentified armed actors from their house. They were found dead on 16 December 2018 in El Gallinazo. Motives of the attack are unknown. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 15 December 2018, in Mesetas, Meta, a former FARC member who was taking part in the reintegration process was shot dead by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.
On 15 December 2018, in Convencion municipality, Norte de Santander, a farmer was killed by unidentified men in the rural area. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 December 2018, 10 Venezuelan youths, including 4 minors, were kidnapped by unidentified armed actors in La Gabarra (Tibu, Norte De Santander). The Director of Fundacion Progresar claims that 2 of them were killed.
Two engineers were kidnapped by an unidentified arm group on December 13 were released on January 8th.

On 13 December 2018, in Ituango, Antioquia, a woman was shot dead inside her house by an unidentified man in El Carmelo neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 13 December 2018 (as reported), in Buenavista municipality, Cordoba, two men were killed and their bodies were found inside a car in Bellavista vereda. According to the source, the victims would have been killed in a different location and their bodies were taken to that municipality. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

On 13 December 2018, in Planeta Rica municipality, Cordoba, a farmer was tortured and shot dead by unidentified men who arrived on horses and motorcycles in Los Almendros corregimiento. Also in Planeta Rica, a farmer was hanged from a tree, beaten and killed by unidentified men in the rural area. Motives of the attacks are unknown. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 33rd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (33rd Front)
notes: Around 12 December 2018, in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, a social leader and members of the community reported that members of the FARC 33rd dissident front were killing people involved in drug dealing and consumption. Information on the exact number of people killed by the armed group is unknown. Casualties unknown.

On 12 December 2018, in Guayacana corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, a man was killed in a drive-by shooting conducted by two unidentified men on a motorcycle. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
On 11 December 2018, in Villavicencio, Meta, a community leader and member of the Association of Peasant Families for Peace (ADESPROPAZ) was killed by unidentified people.

On 11 December 2018, security personnel at La Paz de Itagui prison in Itagui (Itagui, Antioquia) beat 7 prisoners who asked for food, as they had been waiting at the courtyard from 9am to 2.30pm without receiving any food during a confiscation operation in their cells by the security personnel.

On 11 December 2018, in La Playa municipality, Norte de Santander, a car mechanic was killed in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men on a motorcycle. A pedestrian passing through was also injured in the attack. Motives are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Aid Workers (Colombia); Women (Colombia); UN: United Nations
notes: On 10 December 2018, 'one female UN staff member was sexually assaulted in Bogota'.

On 10 December 2018, in Guayacana corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, an underage man was killed by unidentified men. The attackers also tried to attack the victim's mother. The community of Guayacana has reported threats, forced disappearance, kidnapping, and killings in the area. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 10 December 2018 (as reported), in La Gabarra corregimiento, Tibu, Norte de Santander, 10 Venezuelan men were abducted by unidentified men. According to the source, two victims were killed by the abductors. The perpetrators were involved in armed groups. The whereabouts of other victims are unknown. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

Around 10 December 2018 (as reported), in La Gabarra corregimiento, Tibu, Norte de Santander, 10 Venezuelan men were abducted by an armed group. Two hostages were killed (coded separately). The whereabouts of other victims are unknown. Several armed groups operate in this department.
On 10 December 2018, in Miraflores vereda, Convencion, Norte de Santander, a farmer was shot dead by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.
On 9 December 2018, 5 coffee growers and pickers were attacked by alleged AGC (Clan del Golfo) members in San Miguel (Andes, Antioquia), resulting in 1 civilian dead and 5 other injured.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Militia (Colombia); MP: Patriotic March
notes: On 9 December 2018, in Los Andes corregimiento, Corinto, Cauca, a human rights defender, member of ASTRAZONAC: Corinto - Cauca Farmer Reserve Workers Association, and representative of Marcha Patriotica, was shot dead by an unidentified armed man on a rural road. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
source: UNOCHA; Saravena Radio; La Voz del Cinaruco
notes: On 9 December 2018, in Tame municipality, Arauca, a former FARC combatant was shot dead by an unidentified armed man on a road to Puerto Rondon. According to the source, the attackers would be members of a guerrilla group. However, this information has not been confirmed by the authorities. 1 fatality.

source: Local Source; El Espectador; Blu Radio
notes: On 8 December 2018, ELN: National Liberation Army members attacked a tractor-trailer driver, shooting and injuring him, forcing him to stop the vehicle in Crucecitas (Valdivia, Antioquia), on the road between Puerto Valdivia and Valdivia, and torching the vehicle. The injured tractor-trailer driver, died on 12 December 2018 as a result of the injuries.

On 8 December 2018, in Cumbal municipality, Narino, an indigenous person belonging to Cumbal indigenous reserve, was shot dead by ELN: National Liberation Army members in the rural area, after being tortured together with his family, including a 9-year-old. 1 fatality.

On 8 December 2018, in Ricaurte, Narino, unidentified armed men shot the female Indigenous Governor of the Awa peoples at Alto Cartagena reserve. The victim survived the attack with no injuries. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

assoc_actor_2: Former AUC: United Self-Defence Forces of Colombia
notes: On 8 December 2018,in San Cayetano municipality, Norte de Santander, the former leader of the Fronteras front of the AUC was killed. The victim was previously threatened by unidentified men. Information on the group responsible for the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 December 2018, in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, a man was shot dead by two unidentified men in the rural area of Guachiman. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Nasa Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 7 December 2018, in El Palo corregimiento, Caloto, Cauca, a communal leader and Nasa member of San Francisco reserve was killed by unidentified armed men. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 December 2018, in Suarez municipality, Cauca, two indigenous people belonging to Cabildo de Jambalo, in Loma Pueblito community, were kidnapped by unidentified armed men while they were working at a farm in the indigenous reserve of Cerro Tijeras. They were freed on 14 December 2018 by the Indigenous Guard and the local authorities. Information on the group responsible for the abduction is unknown.

On 7 December 2018, in Caloto municipality, Cauca, the Nasa governor of Huellas reserve was killed by unidentified armed men in La Buitrera area, on the road towards El Palo corregimiento. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 December 2018, in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, two men on a motorcycle were attacked in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men on a trail to Petrolea area. One of the victims was killed and the other was injured in the attack. Motives for the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
On 6 December 2018, workers from Caribu LTDA (palm oil company) were attacked by unidentified armed men in Guamachito (Zona Bananera, Magdalena), killing 2 and severely injuring a minor.

On 6 December 2018, in Puerto Santander, Norte de Santander, two Venezuelan men were shot dead by unidentified armed men. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of Los Pelusos and Los Rastrojos Gangs in the area. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 6 December 2018, in Samaniego, Narino, a former member of FARC participating in the reintegration process was shot dead in his house by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.
On 5 December 2018, an Afro-Colombian, was shot dead by unidentified armed individuals in Huellas (Caloto, Cauca), following threats against her person due to her alleged cooperation with the Army.

On 5 December 2018, in Tumaco municipality, Narino, a man was shot dead by unidentified men in La Espriella corregimiento. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 5 December 2018, in La Gabarra corregimiento, Tibu, Norte de Santander, a Venezuelan man was killed. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 4 December 2018, a man belonging to the indigenous Resguardo Nuestra Senora La Candelaria de La Montana and husband of one of the daughters of the governor from Resguardo Canamomo Lomaprieta, was shot dead by unidentified armed actors when he was riding his motorbike in El Oro (Riosucio, Caldas).

On 4 December 2018, in Nueva Frutera neighbourhood, Cienaga (Cienaga, Magdalena), unidentified armed actors shot the house of the president of the Councillors' Association of Cienaga and community leader. No injuries were reported.

On 4 December 2018, in La Agustina vereda, Mondomo, Santander de Quilichao, a student was kidnapped by unidentified armed men who broke into his house. He was freed on 15 December 2018 in Silvia municipality, Cauca. Several armed groups operate in this department.
On 3 December 2018, a 19-year-old medicine student and son of a renowned trader, was kidnapped by 5 unidentified armed men in a house in La Agustina, Mondomo (Santander De Quilichao, Cauca).

assoc_actor_2: Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022) UNP: National Unit for Protection; PRE: Ethnic Reivindication Party; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 3 December 2018, in Cartago, Valle del Cauca, seven people were attacked in a drive-by shooting perpetrated by unidentified men on a motorcycle in Isleta neighbourhood. Two of the victims, including a local social leader, were killed in the attack. On the other hand, five more people, including a candidate of the PRE party running for mayor of Cartago, and a member of the UNP were injured. 2 fatalities.

On 3 December 2018, in La Jagua De Ibirico, Cesar, a candidate running for mayor of that municipality was beaten by unidentified armed men who broke into his hose. The attackers threatened the victim to leave the municipality and drop his candidacy.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 33rd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (33rd Front)
notes: Around 3 December 2018 (as reported), in Ocana municipality, Norte de Santander, the owner of a gas station and one of his employees were kidnapped by members of the 33rd dissident front of FARC on the road to El Carmen municipality. The victims were reported rescued by the authorities on 3 December 2018.
On 2 December 2018, a 16-year-old, from Resguardo Tortugana Telembi, was kidnapped and shot dead by unidentified armed men in La Guayacana (San Andres de Tumaco, Narino).

On 2 December 2018, in El Palo, Caloto, Cauca, a man belonging to the Nasa Indigenous group was killed by unidentified armed men on the road that connects Caloto with Toribio and Corinto, less than 100m from a military checkpoint. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: Front Line Defenders; INDEPAZ; El Tiempo (Colombia); ProtectDefenders.eu
notes: On 2 December 2018, in Palmar reserve, Ricaurte, Narino, one of the founders of the indigenous organization CAMAWARI and his son who was elected on that same day as governor for the Palmar Medio Imbi indigenous reserve, were killed by unidentified armed men. Both victims belonged to the Awa indigenous Group. Four other indigenous people were severely injured. 2 fatalities.

On 2 December 2018, in Tumaco municipality, Narino, a man was killed in Restrepo Rio Mira vereda. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 2 December 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, a man was attacked in a drive-by shooting perpetrated by unidentified men on a motorcycle in the urban area. The victim survived the attack with injuries in his neck. Motives are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area.
On 1 December 2018, police forces shot indiscriminately into a gathering of Afro-Colombian youth in Ciudad Bolivar. One person was killed.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 1 December 2018, in Taraza municipality, Antioquia, a farmer leader, and coca collector, was shot and injured by counter narcotics police officers, after he and another three people refused to follow police orders and ran towards coca crops. The victim was also a member of La Union's Community Action Committee and a member of ASOCBAC: Bajo Cauca Farmer Association. Marcha Patriotica and family members claim to have been by police officers at the hospital where the victim was transferred.

On 1 December 2018, in Guayacana corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, a female Awa indigenous minor was kidnapped and shot dead by unidentified armed men. Her body was found hours after she was kidnapped in La Vina sector. 1 fatality. [women targeted: girls]

Around 1 December 2018 (as reported), in Lomitas Abajo sector, Santander de Quilichao, Cauca, a man and a woman were killed and their bodies were found in an advanced state of decomposition. The victims were reported missing eleven days ago in the municipality of Jamundi, Valle del Cauca. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 30 November 2018, in Capellania, Norte de Santander, unidentified armed men shot the car of Convencion municipality's mayor after the mayor passed by an illegal checkpoint set by an armed group. No one was injured. Several armed groups operate in this department.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 33rd Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (33rd Front)
notes: On 29 November 2018, the owner of a petrol station in Ocana, and his employee were kidnapped by dissidents from FARC's 33rd Front in Ocana (Ocana, Norte De Santander). They were freed on 1 December 2018 in El Carmen (El Carmen, Norte De Santander).

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; ASCAMCAT: Catatumbo's Peasant Association; MP: Patriotic March; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 29 November 2018, in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, a farmer leader belonging to ASCAMCAT: Catatumbo's Peasant Association, member of Patriotic March, manager at El Libano's Community Action Committee, registered within the Integrated National Programme for the Replacement of Illicit Crops (PNIS), and member of Catatumbo Peasant Guard was shot dead by unidentified armed men in Miramontes vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); Government of Colombia (2018-2022); Indigenous Group (Colombia)
notes: On 29 November 2018, in Inza municipality, Cauca, the son of an indigenous councilman was kidnapped by a FARC dissident group that initially aimed to kidnap his father in Calderas reservation. The victim worked as a farmer. Several armed groups operate in this department. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

Around 29 November 2018 (as reported), in Tumaco municipality, Narino, a farmer was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds in Vaquerio vereda. Armed men entered his house the day before and took him. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 29 November 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, unidentified men killed a couple inside their property. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

Around 29 November 2018 (as reported), in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a Venezuelan man was killed and his body was found inside his car. He had multiple injuries in his head, signs of asphyxia, and signs that he had his hands and feet tied. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 28 November 2018, travellers and students from public and private universities from Medellin travelling on 3 buses towards Bogota D.C. were attacked with stones by unidentified actors in El Santuario (El Santuario, Antioquia), breaking the windows and injuring 2 people (who were not students), one severely.

On 28 November 2018, a 25-year-old, the son of the president from the Municipal Council, was kidnapped by unidentified armed actors in his house in Calderas (Inza, Cauca), when the latter were looking for his dad. When they couldn't find him, they kidnapped his son. The Indigenous Guard of Inza located and brought himhome on 29 November 2018.
On 28 November 2018, in Barbacoas municipality, Narino, an Awa indigenous was killed by unidentified men who took him from his house in Nambi indigenous reserve. 1 fatality.

On 28 November 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, a female social leader was shot and killed inside her house by an unidentified man. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 27 November 2018, around Montecitos corregimiento, Cesar, a lawyer was kidnapped by unidentified men in his property between Montecitos and Los Angeles corregimientos. Several armed groups operate in this department. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 27 November 2018, in Toribio municipality, Cauca, an indigenous community leader, together with her partner, were shot dead in La Laguna vereda. The victim was also a member of the JAC of La Laguna. Her partner was a FARC dissident. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

On 27 November 2018, in Pelaya municipality, Cesar, ELN members kidnapped the city's mayor in the rural area, between Carrizal and Seis de Mayo veredas. They detained the mayor and their guards for several minutes and released them after the community pressured the perpetrators.
On 26 November 2018, in Apure, Plato, Magdalena, the president of the JAC and his brother were shot dead by two unidentified armed men.

On 25 November 2018, in Riohacha municipality, La Guajira, a Wayuu indigenous man was shot and killed. The indigenous community had previously reported intimidation and threats against them. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. The victim was a member of a communal assembly that was established to find solutions to conflicts between the Wayuu community and the municipality of Riohacha over the use of land. 1 fatality.

Around 24 November 2018 (as reported), in Tumaco municipality, Narino, a woman was killed and her body was found in the rural area. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Women (Colombia)
notes: On 23 November 2018, a social leader and president from the Community Action Committee from Aguasal, was shot dead by unidentified armed men in her house in San Jose De Cucuta (Cucuta, Norte De Santander). [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

assoc_actor_2: Embera Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; AFP; El Espectador; Front Line Defenders
notes: On 23 November 2018, in San Lorenzo, Caldas, members of an indigenous Embera Chami family were shot and killed by unidentified perpetrators in their house in San Lorenzo indigenous reserve. The victims were a community leader, his wife, and son. The daughter was the only one that managed to escape. Several armed groups operate in this department. 3 fatalities.

On 23 November 2018, in Caldono municipality, Cauca, an indigenous teacher was kidnapped by unidentified armed individuals on the road from Caldono to Aguada corregimiento. The Indigenous Guard was able to identify the car of the perpetrators and rescued the victim short after the abduction. Several armed groups operate in this department.

On 23 November 2018, in Ipiales, Narino, a farmer was killed in a drive-by shooting by two unidentified men on a motorcycle. It is believed that his death may be related to extortion of armed groups. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 22 November 2018, more than 40 Venezuelan women that had been held captive and forced into prostitution by unidentified actors in Bogota D.C. (Bogota D.C., Bogota D.C.) were freed by the authorities. The 'sex slavery' ring in which they were held captive, apparently captured Venezuelan women in the border city of Cucuta and transported them to Bogota D.C., where they confiscated their documents and forced them into sex work for 20 days to pay for their transportation. A doctor was also hired to perform abortions.

On 22 November 2018, in San Juan de Uraba municipality, Antioquia, four family members were killed by unidentified men in their house in Sinai vereda. They were all farmers. Several armed groups operate in this department. 4 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 22 November 2018 (as reported), in Uribe municipality, Meta, a demobilized member of FARC was killed and his body was found in the rural area. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 21 November 2018, a 17-year-old girl was kidnapped by ELN: National Liberation Army in Catatumbo region (Norte De Santander). She was released on 7 December 2018. [women targeted: girls]

On 21 November 2018, in Ipiales, Narino, a bus driver was attacked in a drive-by shooting by two unidentified men on a motorcycle. He managed to survive. Several armed groups operate in this department.

Around 21 November 2018 (as reported), in Ipiales municipality, Narino, a man was killed and his body was found in Chacuas vereda. His hands and feet were tied, his body had torture signs and his mouth was gagged. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 21 November 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, a man was killed in a drive-by shooting by four unidentified men on motorcycles in Comuna 3 sector. Several armed groups operate in the department. 1 fatality.

On 20 November 2018, 2 women were injured, while 2 teenagers and 2 adults were killed, all from the same family, in Irraipa (Uribia, La Guajira) by unidentified perpetrators. The victims were Wayuu indigenous people.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 19 November 2018 (between 15 - 22 November), in El Tablon vereda, Narino, a demobilized member of FARC was killed and his body was found. The victim went missing on the 15th November. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); Indigenous Group (Colombia); MP: Patriotic March
source: Caracol Radio; UNOCHA; Front Line Defenders; INDEPAZ
notes: Around 17 November 2018 (as reported), in Corinto municipality, Cauca, a farmer and an indigenous man who were living in Lopez Adentro indigenous reserve were killed and their bodies were found in a rural area. One of the victims was a member of the Patriotic March. They had signs of torture and gunshot wounds. Threatening pamphlets of paramilitary groups circulated in the area. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

On 17 November 2018, in Corinto, Cauca, a businessman was kidnapped by several men armed with riffles in La Colombiana neighborhood. He was released a week later. Several armed groups operate in this department.

On 15 November 2018, in Provincia Corregimiento, Santander, four human rights defenders were attacked by unidentified armed men, who shot at the armoured vehicle in which they were traveling. No fatalities or injuries occurred. Several armed groups operate in this department.

On 15 November 2018, in Tibu, Norte de Santander, a Venezuelan moto taxi driver was killed in a drive-by shooting by two unidentified men on a motorcycle. The passenger he was transporting was injured. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 14 November 2018, in the area of Palmor corregimiento, Magdalena, a communal leader and farmer was shot and killed by three ELN members in the victim's property in Mocoa vereda. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 6th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (6th Front)
notes: On 14 November 2018, in Inza municipality, Cauca, five armed men dressed in military clothes, who identified themselves as FARC 6th Front dissidents, kidnapped three workers of the West Energy Company, torched a vehicle, and destroyed the worker's tool on the road between Santa Rosa and Picacho area. Six hours after the kidnapping, the dissidents send a message to the military forces asking for a ransom in exchange for the freedom of the workers. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 13 November 2018, a man was found dead in his business premises in BarranquillaPortuario (Barranquilla, Atlantico). His death is currently under investigation and, although authorities think he could have been killed as the result of a theft, NGOs working on the defence of LGBTIQ+ rights demand further investigation of such homicides, as well as better protection for the LGBTIQ+ community.

assoc_actor_2: Former AUC: United Self-Defence Forces of Colombia
notes: On 13 November 2018, in Tibu, Norte de Santander, a former member of the AUC was killed in Santander neighborhood. Police does not discard the possibility that the perpetrators were members of the ELN. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 13 November 2018, in Cocorna municipality, Antioquia, three members of the same family were kidnapped by four hooded individuals in Pinuela vereda. Later, the military forces rescued the victims. Several armed groups operate in this department.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 12 November 2018, in Argelia, Cauca, a demobilized member of FARC was killed in a drive-by shooting by two unidentified individuals. His brother was injured. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 11 November 2018, the son of a key witness in the Odebrecht case (involving bribes to Colombian officials by the Brazilian construction company Odebrecht), who was in Colombia to attend his father's funeral, who allegedly died unexpectedly from a heart attack on 8 November, himself died from poisoning after drinking water laced with cyanide in a family property in Subachoque (Subachoque, Cundinamarca).

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: Contagio Radio; INDEPAZ; Caracol Radio; La W; Front Line Defenders
notes: On 11 November 2018, in Balboa municipality, Cauca, a social leader who was also member of the Council of Community Action (JAC) and of the Farmer Association from Balboa, was shot dead by the military forces on the road between Balboa (Balboa, Cauca) and Argelia. Officers claimed he ignored an order to stop. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Farmers (Colombia)
source: UNOCHA; Front Line Defenders; Blu Radio; INDEPAZ
notes: On 11 November 2018, in La Macarena, Meta, a social leader, who was also a farmer and president of the Getsemani vereda, was killed by unidentified individuals while riding on a motorbike. 1 fatality.

On 11 November 2018, in San Pedro vereda, Cauca, two unidentified armed individuals entered a spa-club and shot 5 people sitting in one of the tables. Two were killed and other two were severely injured. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

On 11 November 2018, in Puerto Santander municipality, Norte de Santander, a man was killed with three gunshots in the trail El Diamante. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 11 November 2018, in La Hormiga, Putumayo, a man was kidnapped by unidentified armed men. His whereabouts are unknown. Several armed groups operate in this department.

On the weekend 10 November 2018, a person was shot dead in Santander neighbourhood, San Pablo (San Pablo, Bolivar). The ELN: National Liberation Army claimed such homicide but the authorities are investigating on the veracity of such claims.

On 10 November 2018, in Aguachica municipality, Cesar, the ELN blew up the Flecha Roja bridge on the road between La Mata and Aguachica. They also shot against passing cars, burned a bus and a car, and threatened the passengers of a vehicle transporting children with disability. No fatalities or injuries occurred.

On 9 November 2018, in Barranquilla, Atlantico, a female public servant of the Atlantic Ombudsman Office was shot and severely injured while leaving her house. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. [women targeted: government officials]

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 9 November 2018, in the area of Chengue corregimiento, Sucre, a JAC member was shot and killed by unidentified perpetrators in El Godo locality. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 9 November 2018, in Llorente corregimiento, Narino, a farmer was killed in a drive-by shooting by unidentified individuals on a motorcycle. Police believe the attack was related to a revenge, however, they continue to investigate the case. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 9 November 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, unidentified individuals shot against a group of six people in Union Victoria neighborhood. The victim who was the brother of a former FARC combatant, was killed and other people were injured. Also in Tumaco, two unidentified men on a motorcycle killed another man in a drive-by shooting in El Triunfo neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

On 9 November 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, a man was shot and killed by unidentified individuals in El Triunfo neighborhood. Also in Tumaco, a boy who was coming out from a school was killed in a drive-by shooting by two unidentified individuals on a motorcycle in Los Angeles neighborhood. , the victim of this last attack was not the original target of the perpetrators. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.
On 8 November 2018, in La Calera, Cundinamarca, the JAC president of the locality was stabbed to death by a man who was later captured. The reason behind the attack is not reported.

source: El Espectador; INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; Front Line Defenders
notes: On 8 November 2018, in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, a coordinator for a vereda committee of Catatumbo's Peasant Association (ASCAMCAT) and artisanal miner, was killed by unidentified perpetrators in Miramontes vereda. His wife is reported to be severely injured. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 7 November 2018, Nasa indigenous militants attacked a Misak community in Siberia, using handmade bombs and machetes. They destroyed houses and crops and attacked the community members.

On 7 November 2018, armed men entered a billiard hall in San Antonio De Gurumendy (Lopez de Micay, Cauca) and shot the people inside, resulting in 5 people dead, 3 injured and 2 disappeared (that were found later). This is believed to be part of armed confrontations betwen members of ELN: National Liberation Army and members of FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia in Lopez de Micay, Cauca. This event could be connected to the killing of an exmember of FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia on 29 October 2018 in Lopez de Micay, Cauca.

On 7 November 2018, in Ebejico municipality, Antioquia, two men were taken from their properties by unidentified armed individuals in the rural area. Several armed groups operate in this department. The victims' whereabouts are unknown.

Around 7 November 2018 (between 6 - 8 November), in Tame, Arauca, four health workers were kidnapped by an armed group between 6 and 8 November. They were released about a week later after the intervention of communal actors that negotiated his releasement. FARC dissident groups and ELN members operate in the area.

On 6 November 2018, in Llorente corregimiento, Narino, a man was shot several times and killed in a drive-by shooting by unidentified individuals. Several armed groups operate in the department. 1 fatality.
On 5 November 2018, an unidentified armed group beat civilians in Carro Quemao, Juan Jose (Puerto Libertador, Cordoba).

source: Front Line Defenders; ProtectDefenders.eu; El Salmon (Chile)
notes: On 4 November 2018, a union leader from SINTRAIMAGRA: National Union for Workers of the Food and Fat-Based Products Industry, was stabbed to death by unidentified armed actors in Villavicencio (Villavicencio, Meta).

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 4 November 2018, a former guerrilla fighter, was shot dead by 4 unidentified men in motorcycles in Medellin (Medellin, Antioquia). Although authorities reported the death as the result of an attempted robbery, the FARC: Alternative Revolutionary Force of the Common People considers it a politically-motivated attack (claiming that 80 former guerrilla combatants and their relatives have been murdered since the peace agreement was signed) and demands clarification for such murders and guarantees of security to the Government.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 4 November 2018, in Convencion municipality, Norte de Santander, an FARC ex-combatant was killed in Campo Alegre vereda. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 4 November 2018, in Tame municipality, Arauca, a farmer was shot and killed while moving on a motorcycle by unidentified armed men in El Tablon vereda. 1 fatality.

On 4 November 2018, in Santander De Quilichao municipality, Cauca, an indigenous community member was shot and killed by unidentified individuals near his house in Los Pinos vereda. Several armed groups operate in the department. 1 fatality.
On 4 November 2018, in Monitos, Cordoba, a robber was killed by Gulf Clan members. He had previously received threats from the group. 1 fatality.

On 3 November 2018, in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, a moto taxi driver was shot and killed by unidentified individuals in Paloquemao vereda. In recent months, several moto-taxi drivers have been threatened and killed by unidentified armed groups. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Labour Group (Colombia)
source: Comision Intereclesial de Justicia y Paz
notes: On 2 November 2018, a transport driver, a former FARC member and linked to SIPOL (Sectional Police Intelligence), was kidnapped by alleged members of ELN: National Liberation Army in the vicinity of Zona Humanitaria Nueva Esperanza, close to Curbarado (Carmen Del Darien, Choco), and forcely taken towards the upper part of river Jiguamiando.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 2 November 2018, near Riosucio municipality, Choco, a former FARC member was kidnapped by three ELN members and taken to an area near the Jiguamiando River. Local inhabitants believe he was killed near Pueblo Nuevo, although there is no confirmation of the killing. The victim left FARC and joined the national police.

On 2 November 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, a man was killed in a drive-by shooting by two unidentified individuals on a motorcycle in Ciudadela neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 2 November 2018, in El Juncal vereda, Norte de Santander, two men were killed while moving on a motorcycle by an unidentified group of armed men. One of the victims was a Venezuelan citizen. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

source: Front Line Defenders; El Tiempo (Colombia); UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; ProtectDefenders.eu
notes: On 1 November 2018, in El Hato vereda, Cauca, a social leader, who was also a teacher and an union leader of ASOINCA (Association for Education Workers in Cauca), was shot dead by unidentified men while driving. He had been threatened multiple times and changed residency due to such threats. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 1 November 2018, in San Pelayo municipality, Cordoba, unidentified men took a horse tamer out of his house, shot and killed him in the rural area of the municipality. The attack was perpetrated by Gulf Clan (ACG) members. 1 fatality.

source: El Colombiano; Front Line Defenders; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; El Espectador
notes: On 31 October 2018, in La Caucana, Taraza municipality, Antioquia, the Social Guarantee Process for Social Leaders and Human Rights Defenders reported that unidentified armed men killed a community leader. The attack was attributed to Los Caparros gang. 1 fatality.

Around 31 October 2018 (as reported), in Suarez municipality, Cauca, an indigenous man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds in El Naranjo vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
