On 31 October 2018, in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, a truck driver was shot dead by unidentified men on a road to Campo Dos corregimiento. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 30 October 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, three people were shot by unidentified men who arrived on a boat nearby Fatima bridge. One man was killed and two women were injured in the attack. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 29 October 2018, in Saravena, Arauca, a civil engineer who had previously performed public duties during the administration of the ex-governor of Arauca, was kidnapped by unidentified armed men. On the night of 30 October 2018, he was freed by the military forces and the Police Forces of Colombia. Although the identity of the perpetrators is unknown, the area in which the engineer was kidnapped suggests either ELN: National Liberation Army or dissidents from FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia as possible perpetrators.

actor1: GUP: United Guerrillas of the Pacific
notes: Around 29 October 2018 (as reported), in El Charco, Narino, a local businessman was kidnapped by the united Guerrillas of the Pacific. Motives of the abduction were related to extortion. The victim was rescued by the authorities in a military operation on 29 October 2018.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 27 October 2018, in El Plateado vereda, Argelia, Cauca, a former member of FARC was killed in a park in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 27 October 2018 (between 27 October - 28 October), in San Faustino corregimiento, Norte de Santander, a man was shot and injured and his body was found near El Provenir trail. He was taken to the hospital but died days later. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 26 October 2018, the Guardia Indigena coordinator from Resguardo Toez (El Guasimo, Caloto, Cauca) was assaulted by unidentified men that asked him about the authority from the resguardo and, when the coordinator did not want to reply to their questions, they tried to kidnap him. There was a struggle and the Guardia Indigena coordinator managed to escape.

actor1: Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022) ESMAD: Mobile Anti-Disturbance Squadron
notes: On 26 October 2018, during an operation against deforestation and extensive cattle breeding, farmers reported that police forces - ESMAD were evicting them violently, beating them and taking away their cattle in San Vicente Del Caguan (San Vicente Del Caguan, Caqueta).

Around 26 October 2018 (as reported), in Candelillas vereda, Tumaco, Narino, two men, including one farmer, were killed and their beheaded bodies were found. The bodies also bore signs of torture. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the municipality. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Women (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 25 October 2018, in Buenos Aires municipality, Cauca, a social leader and member of Santa Catalina Council of Communal action was shot in the head by unidentified men in the rural area. The victim was seriously injured and died eleven days after the attack. Motives are unknown. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

actor1: FARC Dissident - 36th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (36th Front - Jair Aldana Baquero)
notes: Around 25 October 2018 (as reported), in Ituango municipality, Antioquia, approximately 100 children in the rural area have been forced to drop school to join the 36th dissident front of FARC.

On 25 October 2018, in Majagual municipality, Sucre, members of the Gulf Clan killed a man in La Sierpe corregimiento. According to the source, motives of the attack are related to drug dealing. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); Women (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); MP: Patriotic March
source: El Espectador; UNOCHA; Front Line Defenders; El Universal (Colombia); ProtectDefenders.eu; INDEPAZ
notes: Around 24 October 2018 (between 20 - 26 October), in the rural area of Sinai, Cauca, a female social leader, who was also member of the Peasant's Association of Workers of Argelia (ASCAMTA) and of Marcha Patriotica working in coca substitution programs, was kidnapped by unidentified men in her house in Desiderio vereda. The abductors also tied and threatened the victim's family before taken her. The victim was latter killed and her body was found on 26 October 2018. Information on the armed group associated to the abduction is unknown. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 24 October 2018, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, the police chief of the INPEC in Cucuta was killed on his way home in a drive-by shooting perpetrated by unidentified men in Motilones neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 23 October 2018, in San Jose de Ure, Cordoba, two men were attacked in the urban area. One man was killed and the other one was injured. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 23 October 2018, in La Parada, Villa del Rosario, Norte de Santander, five men, including two Venezuelans, were shot by unidentified men. One of the victims was killed and the other were injured in the attack. Motives are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 22 October 2018, in Rosas municipality, Cauca, a community leader and brother of a local council man was shot dead by unidentified armed men who arrived on a motorcycle in the rural area of Loma Abajo. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

source: INDEPAZ; ProtectDefenders.eu; Front Line Defenders; UNOCHA
notes: On 22 October 2018, in Santander de Quilichao municipality, Cauca, a Nasa indigenous teacher was shot dead by unidentified armed men while riding his motorcycle, in Las Quince Letras area. He was from the indigenous reservation Muchique los Tigres. According to the community, initial versions indicate that the attackers tried to steal the victim's vehicle. 1 fatality.

On 22 October 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, a man was killed in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men on a motorcycle in Exportadora neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the municipality. 1 fatality.
On 21 October 2018, in Las Cruces, Arauquita, Arauca, a member of the afro-Colombian community was killed by an unidentified man. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 21 October 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, four people were shot by unidentified men in Esfuerzo Uno urban area. The victims survived the attack with injuries. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area.

On 19 October 2018, in the area of Candelillas corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, a man driving a car on a road to Pasto was killed in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men on a motorcycle. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 19 October 2018, in El Tarra municipality, Norte de Santander, a man was killed by unidentified men in La 84 vereda. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 19 October 2018, in La Esperanza vereda, Tibu, Norte de Santander, a Venezuelan man was killed by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 19 October 2018 (as reported), in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, a man was killed by unidentified men in Oru Siete vereda. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 18 October 2018, in La Muralla vereda, Teorama, Norte de Santander, two young coca growers from Catatumbo region were killed by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of the ELN and the EPL in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 16 October 2018, in Fortul municipality, Arauca, two farmers, who were members of the same family, were shot dead by unidentified men nearby La Primavera rural area. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of the ELN in the area. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 16 October 2018, in Corinto municipality, Cauca, a former member of FARC was shot dead by an unidentified man on the road to Miranda municipality. Motives of the attack and information on the group responsible are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 October 2018, in Aldana municipality, Narino, three men, who were members of the same family, were shot dead by unidentified men on the road to Pupiales. According to the source, one of the possible responsible would be the FARC dissident front commanded by 'Guacho', that previously threatened the communities of Guachacal, Aldana and Pupiales. However, locals also reported that the attack could be related to cattle rustling. 3 fatalities.

On 15 October 2018, in Barbacoas municipality, Narino, an underage member of the Awa indigenous community was tortured and killed by members of the National Liberation Army who broke in Watsalpi indigenous reserve threatening the community. The victim was forcibly recruited by the same group two years ago. 1 fatality.

On 14 October 2018, in La Ermita corregimiento, Ocana, Norte de Santander, a merchant was kidnapped by unidentified armed men in a tourist centre while he was talking to friends and family. The man was later released on 24 October 2018. Information on the armed group associated to the abduction is unknown. Several armed groups operate in this department. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: Around 13 October 2018 (as reported), in Suarez municipality, Cauca, indigenous authorities reported the abduction of 4 people in El Naranjal vereda. Two of the victims were killed. According to the source, the attackers would be members of a FARC dissident group. Motives of the attack are unknown. The whereabouts of the other two victims are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 13 October 2018, in Cartagenita corregimiento, Convencion, Norte de Santander, a social leader and former JAC president of La Laguna vereda was shot dead by unidentified armed men while he was driving in the rural area. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of the ELN and Los Pelusos Gang in the area. 1 fatality.

On 12 October 2018, in San Miguel municipality, (coded to La Dorada) Putumayo, an indigenous communal leader from Nueva Albania vereda was shot dead by unidentified armed men. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 October 2018, in Abrego municipality, Norte de Santander, a man was kidnapped by unidentified men. The victim managed to escape from his captors and ran to the Abrego police station on 20 October 2018. Information on the group associated to the abduction is unknown.

On 10 October 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, five people were shot by unidentified men in Comuna Tres area. One of the victims was killed and the other were injured. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 9 October 2018, in La Labranza vereda, Abrego, Norte de Santander, a cattle farmer and local business man was kidnapped by six armed men on a road to La Playa de Belen area. The authorities suspect that the EPL: Popular Liberation Army could behind the kidnapping. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); Indigenous Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 9 October 2018, in Cartagena del Chaira municipality, Caqueta, two farmers were shot dead while working on their fields in El Recreo Alto area. One of the victims was an indigenous community leader and vice president of el Recreo Council of Communal Action. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 9 October 2018, in Marinilla municipality, Antioquia, a minor was kidnapped by unidentified men on his way out the school in La Pena vereda. The victim was rescued hours latter by the authorities, who clashed with the abductors and released the victim. Several armed groups operate in this department.

On 9 October 2018, in Pradera municipality, Valle del Cauca, a worker of the public water company of Valle del Cauca department was killed by unidentified men on the road to Lomitas. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. This is the second attack against workers of this public company that is recorded in the last three days. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Lawyers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: Front Line Defenders; Contagio Radio; ProtectDefenders.eu; INDEPAZ
notes: On 8 October 2018, in Puerto Asis municipality, Putumayo, a leader belonging to the Association for the Integrated Sustainable Development of La Perla Amazonica (ADISPA), prosecutor for the Community Action Committee of vereda Frontera and contributor in promoting the illicit crops eradication plans in the territory, was shot dead by unidentified armed men in his house in vereda Frontera. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 8 October 2018, in the area of Guayacana corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, a man was shot dead by unidentified men on a rural road. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the municipality. 1 fatality.

Around 8 October 2018 (as reported), in the area of Llorente corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, three women were killed and their bodies were found near Pinde vereda. According to the source, the victims were hired, along with two more women, as a sex workers by unidentified men previous to the attack. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 3 fatalities.

On 8 October 2018, in the rural area of Payan, Magui Payan, Narino, a man driving from Barbacoas municipality was shot dead by unidentified men on a rural road. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. Several armed groups operate in this municipality. 1 fatality.
On 8 October 2018, in Sincelejo municipality, Sucre, an indigenous leader advocating for land restitution was beaten by three members of the Gulf Clan in front of his house. The victim was injured.

On 8 October 2018, in Jamundi municipality, Valle del Cauca, an official working for the INPEC was killed by unidentified men when he was on his way to work in Guabal vereda. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 October 2018, in El Jagual corregimiento, Corinto, Cauca, a member of the Farmer Workers' Association and the Peasants Reserve Zone of Corinto was shot dead by unidentified armed men. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: Around 7 October 2018 (month of), in Las Margaritas vereda, Milan, Caqueta, two men and one woman were shot dead and their bodies were found in an advanced state of decomposition. According to the source, the victims were killed by members of a FARC dissident group. According to the community, motives of the attack are related to social cleansing. 3 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Labour Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 7 October 2018, in Valledupar, Cesar, the president of the Council of Communal Action of Villa Jaidith was shot by unidentified men who broke in his local business to attack him. The victim survived the attack with injuries in his neck. Information on the armed group associated to the attack is unknown.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Coccam: National Coordinating Committee of Coca, Marijuana and Poppy Cultivators
notes: On 6 October 2018, in the area of El Rodeo corregimiento, Cauca, a recognised leader of the crop substitution program and coordinator of COCCAM, along with his two sons were tortured and killed by unidentified armed men in their house in Las Minas vereda. According to the source, the victims were opposing to a forced eradication of coca crops in the area. 3 fatalities.

source: Front Line Defenders; El Espectador; UNOCHA
notes: Around 6 October 2018 (as reported), near San Joaquin corregimiento, Mocoa, Putumayo, three indigenous Inga youths belonging to Cabildo Menor de Osococha - Resguardo Yunguillo, who worked as bailiffs and assistants for the Cabildo's governor, were murdered as they were coming back to Yunguillo vereda. Two of the bodies were found in the vicinity of San Joaquin's school, and the other body was found in the border area with Condagua. Motives of the attack are unknown. 3 fatalities.

Around 6 October 2018 (as reported), in La Salada corregimiento, Los Cordobas, Cordoba, a woman was killed and her body was found on the road. A threatening message was also found next to the body. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is presence of the Gulf Clan in the area. 1 fatality.

On 5 October 2018, Police officers were reported to severely beat youths from Comuna 13 in the escalator from Comuna 13, San Javier, Medellin (Medellin, Antioquia). The events were reported by the neighbours, who recorded them with their phones and shared them in social media, and are currently under investigation.

On 5 October 2018, in Remedios municipality, Antioquia, unidentified men shot at a bus transporting 14 minors to a science fair. The vehicle was on a road in Los Chorros del Carmen vereda when it was ambushed by the attackers. One of the minor's mother was killed and another woman was injured in the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. Motives are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 October 2018, in Sanchez corregimiento, Policarpa, Narino, the Common Alternative Revolutionary Force reported that an unknown number of people were killed by an unidentified paramilitary group. Eight people disappeared and around 120 people were displaced from the area. Casualties unknown.

On 4 October 2018, in Tame municipality, Arauca, two farmers were killed by unidentified men in Botalon and Pueblo Seco areas. According to the source, messages accusing the victims of theft and extortion were found on the bodies. Information on the attackers is unknown. 2 fatalities.

Around 4 October 2018 (as reported), in San Jose de Ure municipality, Cordoba, a farmer was killed and his dismembered body was found in El Cerro vereda. According to the authorities, the victim was reported missing on 14 August 2018. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 4 October 2018 (as reported), in Villanueva vereda, San Calixto, Norte de Santander, two men were killed by ELN members. Motives of the attack are unknown. After the attack, the authorities reported threats to the community from the armed group and the displacement of 205 people. 2 fatalities.

On 3 October 2018, in Guamalito corregimiento, El Carmen, Norte de Santander, the son of the mayor of the municipality was kidnapped by two unidentified men who entered the school where he studies and took him away on a motorcycle. The victim was freed on 9 October 2018 in Norte de Santander department.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 3 October 2018, in Tame municipality, Arauca, the Director of the Food and Medicine surveillance Agency (INVIMA) in Arauca was held captive by members of a FARC dissident group. No further information on the release of the victim was provided by the source.

On 2 October 2018, in the rural area of Ciudad Bolivar municipality, Antioquia, four members of a family were killed by Gulf Clan members in Ventorrillo vereda. According to the authorities, the attack would be related to settlement of accounts between the Gulf Clan and the victims. 4 fatalities.

On 1 October 2018, in El Jagual vereda, Corinto, Cauca, a worker for the Western Energy Company was shot dead by unidentified actors on a road that connects to Los Pinos vereda. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On early morning 30 September 2018, a police officer allegedly shot indiscriminately from the police sub-station in El Naranjal (Bolivar, Valle del Cauca) against civilians in the area, killing 2 and injuring another 3.

On 29 September 2018, in Barbosa municipality, Antioquia, an off-duty soldier from the military forces was shot dead by two unidentified armed men in La Victoria vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 29 September 2018, in Angostura municipality, Antioquia, the former mayor of the city was shot and injured by an unidentified individual who entered his property in La Quinta vereda. He was currently a councilman in the city. Several armed groups operate in the department.
On 29 September 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, a teenager was killed by unidentified armed men in 11 de Noviembre neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 29 September 2018, in Tumaco municipality, Narino, a farmer was killed in Chagui vereda. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality

On 28 September 2018, in Sabaletas corregimiento, Valle del Cauca, two truck drivers were kidnapped by ELN members. They asked for a ransom of 100 million pesos. The owner of the cargo transported by the drivers managed to pay one million pesos and reported the action to authorities. Three days later, CTI and marine officers found and freed the victims.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 27 September 2018, in Baraya, Huila, the body of the local JAC president was found, with bullet injuries. The authorities are investigating whether his death would be linked to death threats he had received after an argument with a man, or if it was related to his work as a social leader.

On 27 September 2018, in Amaga municipality, Antioquia, the ELN abducted a businesswoman on the road to Amaga in Antioquia. Her whereabouts are unknown. Several armed groups operate in this department.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Farmers (Colombia)
notes: On 26 September 2018, in Pueblo Bello, Cesar, a farmer and president of the JAC was shot dead in Los Mangos farm.
On 26 September 2018, in Orito, Putumayo, an Embera indigenous leader of the Alto Orito Reservation was killed.

On 26 September 2018, a stylist belonging to the LGBTIQ  community was killed by 2 Venezuelan unidentified men who she was hosting in Villanueva neighbourhood, Santiago De Cali (Cali, Valle Del Cauca).

On 24 September 2018, in Sotara municipality (coded to Pueblo Viejo), Cauca, a female leader member of a local organization that advocated for women's rights and who was also a member of the peasant guard, was killed in Chapa corregimiento. Her body had gunshot wounds and cold weapon wounds. The victim's family reported she had been threatened previously by a local inhabitant. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022) UNP: National Unit for Protection
notes: On 24 September 2018, in El Estrecho corregimiento, Cauca, two former FARC members were shot and one of them was killed by unidentified armed individuals. The victim worked as a UNP guard. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Indigenous Group (Colombia)
source: ProtectDefenders.eu; Front Line Defenders; INDEPAZ; UNOCHA
notes: On 24 September 2018, in El Dovio municipality, Valle del Cauca, ELN members killed two social leaders and members of the program of substitution of illicit crops. One of them belonged to an indigenous community. They had previously been threatened by the ELN and requested protection from UNP. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

On 23 September 2018, a transexual woman, was shot dead by unidentified armed men who verbally abused her as she was closing her business premisses in Tres Esquinas, Ciudad Bolivar (Ciudad Bolivar, Antioquia).

actor1: FARC Dissident - 36th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (36th Front - Jair Aldana Baquero)
notes: On 23 September 2018, in Huellas indigenous reservation, Cauca, an indigenous member of the community was killed by the leader of the 36th Dissident FARC Front after a fight. As a reaction, the indigenous guard arrested two people linked to the attack, but not the perpetrator. 1 fatality.

On 23 September 2018, in Morales municipality, Cauca, a teacher of an indigenous community was killed by an unidentified individual on the road from Morales to Suarez. By the time of the attack, he was with his wife that resulted injured. The case is being investigated to understand if it was crime-related or for any other reason. Several armed groups operate in the department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 48th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (48th Front - Pedro Martinez)
notes: Around 23 September 2018 (as reported), in Puerto Ospina corregimiento, Putumayo, two merchants were killed and their bodies were found with gunshot wounds and signs of torture. Offensive notes were attached to their corpses. Local sources reported that FARC dissidents clash in the zone and it is believed that 48th Dissident FARC Front is the responsible for the attack. 2 fatalities.
On 23 September 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, a teenager was killed with three gunshots by an unidentified group in Nuevo Milenio neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 22 September 2018, in Valdivia, Antioquia, a relative of a members of the Movimiento Rios Vivos Antioquia was shot and killed by an armed group that shot the relative in their home.

On 22 September 2018, in Zaragoza municipality, Antioquia, 17 workers from EPM company (Public Companies of Medellin) were abducted by Gulf Clan (AGC) members in a rural area of the city. They were freed by the military forces of Colombia on September 25th.

On 22 September 2018, in Chiri vereda, Antioquia, a relative of a member of the Rios Vivos Movement social organization and a minor were shot by two unidentified armed men. The former died and the teenager was injured. According to preliminary information, both were part of the substitution of illegal crops program. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022); Labour Group (Colombia)
notes: On 21 September 2018, 2 former police officers and current workers for Electricaribe were shot dead by unidentified armed men in El Recreo neighbourhood, Barranquilla (Barranquilla, Atlantico).

On 21 September 2018, in Saravena, Arauca, a Venezuelan man was killed in a drive-by shooting by ELN members on a motorcycle. A note saying 'killed for being a robber: ELN' was found next to the victim's body. 1 fatality.
On 20 September 2018, a man and his son disappeared on their way to school in Tigrera (Santa Marta, Magdalena). On 24 September 2018, the father was found dead with bullet wounds.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 36th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (36th Front - Jair Aldana Baquero)
source: UNOCHA; El Tiempo (Colombia); Xinhua; El Espectador
notes: On 20 September 2018, in Ochali corregimiento, Yarumal, Antioquia, three geologists working for Continental Gold mining company were killed and four other persons were injured by members of the FARC Dissident 36 Front. In addition, 2 people were reported missing. After the attack, one of the victim's families reported dead threats by unidentified men. 3 fatalities.
On 20 September 2018, in Salahonda, Narino, a man was shot and killed by several unidentified individuals in Brisas del Mar neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in the department. 1 fatality.

On 18 September 2018, 3 youths from Comuna 13, Medellin (Medellin, Antioquia) disappeared after being forced by unidentified armed men in Belencito Corazon, Medellin (Medellin, Antioquia) to go to another part of the sector, close to Altavista.

On 15 September 2018, Ette Ennaka indigenous leaders and a brother were beaten, attacked with tasers, as well as prevented from leaving for 5 hours, by members of police forces in Sabanas de San Angel (Sabanas de San Angel, Magdalena), after the police officers tried to confiscate the motorbike they were riding and they rejected, as the decree they were basing their actions on was not ruling.

On 15 September 2018, in Riosucio municipality, Choco, an indigenous leader was killed by ELN members in Taparal community. The attack happened after ELN threatened the population of the area and thought the victim was on the phone warning the police forces. The event along with the armed group presence forcibly displaced indigenous families towards Riosucio. 1 fatality.

Around 15 September 2018 (as reported), in Tumaco municipality, Narino, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds in Bajito Vaqueria vereda. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 14 September 2018, in Galeras, Sucre, a social leader was killed in a drive-by shooting by unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle. He reported irregularities in the municipality and it is believed that his killing in politically motivated. After he was shot, before dying, the victim said the perpetrator was the driver of Galera's mayor. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former AUC: United Self-Defence Forces of Colombia
notes: On 14 September 2018, in Pueblo Bello municipality, Cesar, a former members of the AUC was shot and killed in the rural area of the city, near Sierra Nevada. He had recently left the prison. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in the department. 1 fatality.

On 14 September 2018, in the area of San Anterito corregimiento, Cordoba, a man was shot and killed in Mochila vereda. Authorities have been informed that his death was related to a cattle theft and was perpetrated by Gulf Clan (AGC). 1 fatality.

On 14 September 2018, in Ricaurte, Narino, a minor and a man were shot and killed in a drive-by shooting by unidentified men on a motorcycle. The aimed victim was the minor and the man tried to save him when the shooting took place. According to investigation, the killing may be related to a 'social cleansing' announced in pamphlets that circulated in city since July. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

actor1: Military Forces of Venezuela (1999-) GNB: Venezuelan National Guard
notes: On 13 September 2018, the Military Forces of Venezuela (1999-) GNB: Venezuelan National Guard allegedly attacked 5 Colombian citizens (including 2 minors who were released short after) and arrested 3 (who were released days later) in Maipures (Cumaribo, Vichada).

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 13 September 2018, in Galilea, Putumayo, a social leader and president of the JAC of El Pajuil vereda was killed by unidentified armed men in that vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 13 September 2018, in the area of Guateque corregimiento, Cordoba, the manager of a ranch was shot and killed by unidentified armed men in the El Carbon vereda. The property belongs to the secretary of the government of the department and former candidate for Mayor. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 13 September 2018, in Bajo Baudo, Choco, a girl was kidnapped by ELN members. She worked as an informant to the Colombian army, according to the ELN leader. the victim was freed. [women targeted: girls]

On 9 September 2018, a 23-year-old indigenous woman was killed by unidentified armed actors in Jardin (Jardin, Antioquia). Earlier in the region, an armed group had left pamphlets threatening people who consume marijuana. The victim was a known user of the substance.

On 9 September 2018, in Caucasia, Antioquia, an off-duty police officer of the INPEC was shot and killed by unidentified individuals while he was with his brother. He had received previous threats. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 9 September 2018, in Maicao, La Guajira, three Venezuelan children were forcibly recruited. There is no information on which group recruited them.

On 8 September 2018, members of the Military Forces of Colombia threatened, attacked and tortured indigenous peoples during a temporary detention in Guasiles (Convencion, Norte De Santander). This is currently under investigation.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 8 September 2018, in Argelia, Cauca, a former FARC combatant was shot and killed by unidentified individuals while leaving his house. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 8 September 2018 (as reported), in Charras, San Jose Del Guaviare, Guaviare, a 15-year-old girl was sexually abused by two military officers. According to reports, the girl is a member of the Nukak indigenous group and was abducted by a group of military officers, who took her to the battalion camp, locked her in a room, beat her, and two of them, raped her. She was released on 13 September 2018. [women targeted: girls]
On 7 September 2018, two social leaders were shot at by unidentified armed men while gathering in El Centro (Barrancabermeja, Santander), resulting in minor injuries.

On 7 September 2018, ELN: National Liberation Army kidnapped an indigenous minor in Orpua (Bajo Baudo, Choco), arguing she was an whistleblower for the Military Forces. On 19 September 2018, she was released together with her parents, who, according to the insurgents, had gone to the ELN camp to find out the reasons for her kidnapping. [women targeted: girls]

assoc_actor_2: Women (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: Around 7 September 2018 (between 5 - 10 September), in Peque municipality, Antioquia, a female social leader and JAC secretary was killed and her body was found partially buried in Guayabal vereda. She was kidnapped on September the 5th. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in the department. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 7 September 2018, in Suarez municipality, Cauca, unidentified individuals held employees of a water-transportation company hostages. The company interrupted its activities temporarily in the following week. Several armed groups operate in the department.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: A former member of the armed group FARC and member of the party FARC was killed in the area of Argelia in Cauca. The event was reported on September 7th. No group has claimed this event.

On 5 September 2018, 2 engineers working for Continental Gold mining company were attacked by unidentified armed actors while driving a vehicle in El Calvario (Buritica, Antioquia), killing 1 of them and injuring the other.

A social leader and activist of the programme for illegal crop substitution was killed on September 4th in the rural area of the municipality of Taraza in Antioquia. No group has yet claimed this event.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Women (Colombia)
notes: On 5 September 2018, a 25-year-old social leader and secretary for the Community Action Committee of Guayabal, disappeared in Guayabal (Peque, Antioquia) and her body was found on 8 September 2018 in Guayabal. She was beaten to death. The perpetrators of her death and the cause of it (whether due to her work as a social leader or due to sentimental reasons) are still unknown. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

assoc_actor_2: Police Forces of Colombia (2018-2022) Prison Guards
notes: A member of the INPEC (national prisons body) was killed in the municipality of Caucasia in Antioquia. The victim was Benitez Perez who had received previous threats by armed groups in the area. In the event, the brother of the victim was reported as injured. No group has yet claimed this event reported on September 9th.

On 5 September 2018, in La Dorada, Putumayo, a merchant was shot and killed. She was a relative of two known female leaders in El Placer, one of them is reported as victim of forced disappearance and the other works for the land restitution program. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]
Around 5 September 2018 (week of), in Arauca municipality, Arauca, two minors were apparently recruited by armed groups that operate in the area. The victims whereabouts are unknown.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Farmers (Colombia)
notes: On 4 September 2018, in in the rural area of San Jose Del Guaviare municipality, Guaviare, a member of the Council of Communal Action of Cano Mosco village was killed in a drive-by shooting by two men on a motorbike. He was also part of the Nucleo Guacamaya, a group of the National Comprehensive Crop Substitution Program (PNIS).
On 4 September 2018, a transexual woman, was attacked by 2 police officers, who threw her to the ground and beat her when she left a club in Galleria sector in Rionegro (Rionegro, Antioquia).
On 4 September 2018, near Bella Vista vereda, Norte de Santander, a farmer was shot and killed in Filo de la Guara sector. Several armed groups operate in the department. 1 fatality.

On 4 September 2018, in Pueblo Nuevo corregimiento, Norte de Santander, a man was kidnapped by unidentified armed men that entered his property. Apparently the kidnapping was related to extortion. Several armed groups operate in the department. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 4 September 2018, in San Isidro vereda, Putumayo, a farmer was shot and killed by unidentified men who robbed his motorcycle. The victim was with his son that was not injured. Several armed groups operate in the department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: On 3 September 2018, a social leader, president of the Community Action Committee at La Envidia and member of PNIS: National Integrated Programme for Illicit Crop Replacement, was shot dead by unidentified armed men in his house in La Envidia, La Caucana (Taraza, Antioquia).

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Farmers (Colombia)
source: El Colombiano; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; Front Line Defenders
notes: On 3 September 2018, in Taraza municipality, Antioquia, a social leader and JAC president was shot and killed by unidentified armed men, in La Envidia vereda. He was also an activist of the program for illegal crop substitution. Gulf Clan (AGC) substructures, Los Caparros and Julio Cesar Vargas gangs, are known for clashing in the zone of the attack. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Kamentsa Indigenous Group (Colombia); Teachers (Colombia); Awa Indigenous Group (Colombia); Farmers (Colombia)
source: INDEPAZ; ProtectDefenders.eu; Front Line Defenders; UNOCHA
notes: On 2 September 2018, in the area of La Castellana corregimiento, Putumayo, a Kamentsa indigenous teacher and her husband, an indigenous Awa farmer, were shot and killed by three unidentified individuals in their house in La Florida Alto Sardinas vereda. Their daughter was injured and kidnapped. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

On 2 September 2018, in Tomarrazon (Treinta) corregimiento, La Guajira, a family member of a leader of the Nation Wayuu movement was kidnapped by unidentified men. He was the husband of the former Secretary of Indigenous Affairs of La Guajira, who had previously been intimidated and received threats. The victim was released a week later in Las Palmas corregimiento.

On 2 September 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, a man was killed by an unidentified individual in a group. The victim was with a friend, who managed to escape the shots. Several armed groups operate in the department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Government of Colombia (2018-2022); JAC: Council of Communal Action; MAIS: Indigenous and Social Alternative Movement; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 2 September 2018, in Ocana, Norte de Santander, two members of the Convencion Municipal Council were attacked by unidentified armed men in Belen neighborhood. One of the victims, who was a councilman for the MAIS party, former member of JAC, and had participated in the Movement for a Popular Constituent (MCP), was killed. The second victim was injured. Several armed groups operate in the department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 6th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (6th Front)
notes: On 1 September 2018, a political and social leader and brother of the current Health Secretary was kidnapped by dissidents from FARC's 6th Front in Puente Velez (Jamundi, Valle Del Cauca) as he was leaving his property in Puente Velez. As a result of the kidnapping, workers at his property were gagged and restricted from moving. He was freed on 5 October 2018 in El Palo, Caloto, Cauca.
In the area of Robledo in Medellin a leader of the community was killed. Armed men shot the victim and injured five more people on this event in September 1st.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 1 September 2018, in the rural area of San Juan de Losada, Meta, the local JAC president was shot and killed inside his house by unidentified armed men in Brisas del Guayabero vereda. The victim had not received any previous threats. FARC dissident groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 6th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (6th Front)
notes: On 1 September 2018, in Jamundi municipality, Valle del Cauca, a social and political leader was kidnapped by unidentified men while leaving his property in Puente Velez. The victim was the brother of a government secretary in Jamundi. The group gagged some workers of the property and immobilized them during the action. He was released on October the 5th. Police believes the perpetrators of the kidnapping are members of the FARC Dissident 6th Front.

On 1 September 2018, in Puerto Rondon, Arauca, an off-duty military officer was shot in a drive-by shooting by unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle. The motivation of the attack was due to the victim's job of working as a military officer. He was taken to medical assistance but could not resist the injuries and died. 1 fatality.
On 1 September 2018, in Llorente corregimiento, Narino, a merchant was killed inside his restaurant by unidentified armed individuals. Several armed groups operate in the department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: ProtectDefenders.eu; Front Line Defenders; El Espectador
notes: On 31 August 2018, a community leader and president of the Community Action Committee of Brisas del Guayabero, was shot dead by unidentified armed men in his house in Brisas del Guayabero, San Juan de Losada (La Macarena, Meta).
On 31 August 2018, a merchant was kidnapped by unidentified armed men in Agua De La Virgen (Ocana, Norte De Santander).

On 31 August 2018, a businessman from Barranquilla and his wife were kidnapped in Barranquilla (Barranquilla, Atlantico) by unidentified armed actors. The wife was released on the same day as the abduction, and he was freed by the police forces on 1 September 2018.

On 30 August 2018, in Bogota - Teusaquillo, Bogota, D.C., a man working for the departmental government of Cundinamarca was killed by a member of the Gulf Clan. The attacker, who was latter arrested by the authorities, recognized that he killed the wrong victim. According to the source, the main target of the attack would be a former leader of a paramilitary group. 1 fatality.

Around 30 August 2018 (as reported), in El Dovio municipality, Valle del Cauca, a member of the Embera Chami indigenous community was shot dead by unidentified armed men in the rural area. Information on the attackers is unknown. However, authorities are considering that the National Liberation Army might responsible for the attack. 1 fatality.

A social leader was harassed in the department of Cesar. Armed men arrived in her house, killed two of her workers and told her to stop working for the land restitution and farmers reserve in the area. The event was reported on August 29th, 2018.

Around 29 August 2018 (as reported), in Puerto Escondido municipality, Cordoba, a man was killed by Gulf Clan members and his body was found in the rural area. Along with the body, perpetrators left a message saying that the man was killed for having committed a crime in Necocli municipality days before. 1 fatality.

On 29 August 2018, in Riohacha, La Guajira, armed men on a motorcycle carried out a drive-by shooting against the house of a female Wayuu indigenous leader in Las Tunas neighbourhood. The victim, who was previously threatened, survived the attack with no injuries. Information on the attackers is unknown. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia)
source: ProtectDefenders.eu; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; Front Line Defenders
notes: On 29 August 2018, in Tumaco municipality, Narino, an afro-Colombian social leader and member of the Communal Council of Alto Mira was shot dead by unidentified armed men while traveling by boat on the Mira river and nearby La Payita vereda. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 August 2018, in Samaniego, Narino, a man was shot dead by unidentified armed men. According to the source, motives are related to extortion and social cleansing carried out by armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 28 August 2018, in Maicao, La Guajira, a woman and former president of a local Council of Communal Action was killed in a drive-by shooting perpetrated by unidentified armed men on a motorcycle in San Francisco neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; FARC: Common Alternative Revolutionary Force
notes: On 28 August 2018, in La Carmelita, Puerto Asis, Putumayo, a member of the FARC Party and former FARC member, was injured after unidentified armed men shot him in front of his house. The event occurred in the area were ex-combatants are living. Information on the attackers is unknown.

On 28 August 2018, in Puerto Asis municipality, Putumayo, two men were killed by unidentified armed men in Santa Isabel vereda. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 27 August 2018, on the road to Morelia, Caqueta, the social leader and founder of the organization Nuevo Amanecer in Cartago, together with his wife, were shot dead by unidentified armed men. He was previously displaced from his municipality because of the threatens he received.

On 27 August 2018, a social leader was harassed in the department of Cesar. Armed men arrived in her house and threaten to kill her if she continues working for the areas of farmer reserve. She was able to escape the scene. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 27 August 2018, in Santander de Quilichao municipality, Cauca, a man was kidnapped by three unidentified men in San Rafael vereda. The victim was the owner of a supermarket in Cali. Motives of the abduction and information on the group associated to the event are unknown. Several armed groups operate in this department. The victims whereabouts are unknown.
On 26 August 2018, in Lejanias, Meta, a member of the JAC from Yucape was killed. No further information was reported.

Around 26 August 2018 (as reported), in Saravena municipality, Arauca, two men were killed and their bodies were found with their hands tied in Campo Oscuro vereda. The victims had been kidnapped by unidentified men before they were killed. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 26 August 2018, in Puerto Asis municipality, Putumayo, five people, including two farmers, were attacked by unidentified men in Villa Marquesa vereda. The farmers were killed and the rest of the victims were injured in the attack. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; Front Line Defenders; ProtectDefenders.eu
notes: On 25 August 2018, in the area of Huisito corregimiento, El Tambo, Cauca, a female Nasa leader of Valle del Cauca department was shot dead by two unidentified armed men who arrived at her house in Las Juntas vereda. She previously had been displaced due to threats of violence. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Around 25 August 2018 (as reported), in Valle del Guamuez municipality (coded to La Hormiga), Putumayo, two people were killed and their bodies were found with gunshot wounds in Loro 9 vereda. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers is unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: Front Line Defenders; La Prensa Web
notes: On 24 August 2018, in La Caucana, Antioquia, a social leader member of the JAC of San Jose de Ure in Cordoba was killed. The victim was an activist for the program for illegal crop substitution in his municipality. No group has yet claimed this event.

On 24 August 2018, a social leader and founder of a Nasa social organization Mary Cana, was killed in the area of Huisito in the municipality of El Tambo in Cauca. During the attack the partner of the victims was injured, no group has yet claimed the attack.

On 24 August 2018, in Segovia municipality, Antioquia, two men were shot in a drive-by shooting conducted by men on motorcycles in El Tripero area. One of the victim was killed and the other was injured. According to the source, the attack would be related to territorial disputes between the Gulf Clan and Libertadores del Nordeste group. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Farmers (Colombia)
notes: Around 24 August 2018 (as reported), in Taraza municipality, Antioquia, a social leader and a member of the JAC of San Antonio vereda, Cordoba department, was killed by unidentified armed men. His body was found on the road that connects Taraza with Caceres municipality. The victim was also members of a farmers organization of the Bajo Cauca region. Information on the attackers is unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_1: Police Forces of Colombia (2010-2018) ESMAD: Mobile Anti-Disturbance Squadron; Police Forces of Colombia (2010-2018)
notes: On 23 July 2018, in Caloto, Cauca, a Nasa indigenous member was shot during an operation of the Colombian military, Mobile Anti-Disturbance Squadron, and police, in the Albania farm. The security forces were called following a land dispute with locals. The victim later died of his injuries.

On 23 August 2018, in the area of Guayacana corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, a man who was travelling by bus from Pasto to Tumaco, was killed on the road by unidentified armed men wearing masks. According to the source, the victim was killed after the bus made an emergency stop and the suspects forced him to get down the bus. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 22 August 2018, in Mapiripan municipality, Meta, a social leader was attacked in his house in the area of San Antonio. The victim was injured and his son was killed in the attack. Information on the attackers is unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 22 August 2018 (as reported), in Puerto Rico municipality, Meta, a farmer was abducted from his house in El Danubio vereda. According to witnesses, armed men broke into his house, raped his wife and then kidnapped the victim. The farmer was the son of a member of the Patriotic Union party who was killed by unidentified men in 2003. Motives of the abduction are unknown. The farmer's whereabouts are unknown. No fatalities occurred. [women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons]

On 22 August 2018, in Samaniego, Narino, a local bus driver was killed. According to the source, motives of the attack are related to extortion and social cleansing carried out by armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Women (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: Blu Radio; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; Front Line Defenders; ProtectDefenders.eu
notes: Around 22 August 2018 (as reported), in the rural area of El Carmen de Chucuri, El Carmen, Santander, a female social leader and JAC member was killed by and her body was found with gunshot wounds, together with the body of a former employee. Authorities claimed he killed himself after killing her, but human rights groups dispute this version. The victim was known for her activism against mining and fracking in the municipality. 2 fatalities. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Around 22 August 2018 (as reported), in Puerto Asis, Putumayo, a student was killed and his body was found in the municipality's dumpster. The victim was missing since 14 August 2018. Information on the attackers is unknown. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 22 August 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, a man as shot dead by unidentified armed men in Milenio neighbourhood. The victim, who came from Cali, was visiting his family in the area. Also in Tumaco, a man walking on the street in Once de Noviembre neighbourhood was shot dead by unidentified armed men. Motives of the attacks are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 22 August 2018, in El Carmen, Norte de Santander, a man was shot dead by an unidentified armed man in the urban area. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 22 August 2018, in Valle del Guamuez municipality (coded to La Hormiga), Putumayo, a man was killed in a drive-by shooting perpetrated by unidentified armed men on a road to El Placar vereda. Motives of the attack are unknown. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 22 August 2018 (as reported), in Armenia, Quindio, the son of a social leader of Comuna 2 area was killed by unidentified armed men. According to the source, the victim's father was previously threatened. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Farmers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 21 August 2018, in Chimichagua municipality, Cesar, three people, including a member of the Council of Communal Action of El Desengano vereda were attacked in Piedras Blancas corregimiento. The communal leader and a farmer were killed and the wife of the former was injured. Information on the attackers is unknown. 2 fatalities.

On 21 August 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, a man on a bike was killed by unidentified armed men in La Platanera area. The sources claim the action was committed by armed groups that operated in this area. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: FARC: Common Alternative Revolutionary Force; Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 20 August 2018 (as reported), in Miranda municipality, Cauca, two former FARC members who were also members of the FARC party, were killed and their bodies were found bearing signs of torture in Los Tanques area. According to the source the attack occurred 100 meters from a military checkpoint. Information on the attackers is unknown. 2 fatalities.

source: La FM; INDEPAZ; Front Line Defenders; UNOCHA; ProtectDefenders.eu
notes: On 20 August 2018, in the area of La Herradura corregimiento, Almaguer, Cauca, an indigenous and farmer leader was killed by unidentified armed men in the area of Higuerillos. His wife was also injured in the attack. 1 fatality.

Around 20 August 2018 (as reported), in the area of Guayacana corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, a man was shot dead and his body was found on a rural road in Curcuel area. The victim was last seen on 17 August 2018, when he was getting off a bus in the area. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 20 August 2018, in Dosquebradas municipality, Risaralda, a group of people riding bicycles, among which was the former mayor of that municipality, was shot by unidentified armed men on a road near the urban area. One man was killed and another was injured in the attack. The politician survived the attack without injuries. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Awa Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 19 August 2018, in Guayacana corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, an Awa indigenous leader was killed by unidentified men. According to the source, the victim was abducted by an armed group nearby a police station and latter he was shot. 1 fatality.
On 19 August 2018, in Armenia, Quindio, a community leader was shot dead by an unidentified armed man in Salvador Allende neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 August 2018, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a man was shot dead in Los Alpes neighbourhood. The victim was with his wife in front of his house when three unidentified men shot at him. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 19 August 2018, in Tibu, Norte de Santander, the owner of a night club was shot dead in his business by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 19 August 2018, in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, a Venezuelan man was killed and his body was found on a road to La Gabarra. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a territorial dispute between the National Liberation Army and the EPL in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia)
source: Front Line Defenders; UNOCHA; Blu Radio; INDEPAZ
notes: On 18 August 2018, in Bocas Del Rio Atrato corregimiento, Turbo, a social leader and member of the Afro-Colombian community was killed in his house by unidentified armed men. He was an active member of the community and was in charge of organizing young people in the area. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

Around 17 August 2018 (as reported), in San Jose de Ure municipality, Cordoba, three men were shot and killed by unidentified armed men at the border with Taraza municipality. According to the source, the attackers would be armed groups controlling the coca crops in the area. 3 fatalities.

On 17 August 2018, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a business man was shot dead by three unidentified men in Portal de las Americas area. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
On 17 August 2018, in Puerto Leguizamo, Putumayo, a man was killed by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 16 August 2018, in Balsillas vereda, San Vicente del Caguan, Caqueta, a former FARC member was killed by unidentified armed men. The victim was travelling by bus to Huila department when he was held and killed by the attackers. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 16 August 2018, in Granada corregimiento, Taminango, Narino, unidentified armed men attacked a group of people in a car on the Panamerican highway. The driver of the vehicle was killed and one of the passengers was injured. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 16 August 2018, in Ocana municipality, Norte de Santander, a person was shot on the road that connect Odina to Aguas Claras. The victim survived the attack with injuries and was taken to a hospital by the local community. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in the department.

Around 16 August 2018 (as reported), in Puerto Carreno municipality, Vichada, a merchant was kidnapped by ELN members. According to the report, the victim was taken to Apure state in Venezuela and he was killed on 20 August. However, the body has not been found and the authorities have not confirmed this version. 1 fatality.

source: UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; Caracol Radio; Front Line Defenders
notes: Around 15 August 2018 (as reported), in Valdivia municipality, Antioquia, a social leader who was also a representative of the victims of landmines of this municipality, was killed in El Marianito rural area. The victim was shot dead in his house by unidentified men. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 15 August 2018, in Valledupar, Cesar, a Venezuelan sex worker and member of the LGBT community was killed in the city's south side. According to the source, unidentified men who arrived on motorcycles asked the victims and other sex workers to leave the area where they were working. When the victim refused to leave, the attackers shot at him. 1 fatality.

On 15 August 2018, in Santiago De Cali, Valle del Cauca, a government official of the municipality of El Charco, Narino, was killed in Melendez neighbourhood by unidentified armed men. According to the source, the victim had received previous threats by unidentified armed groups. 1 fatality.

Around 14 August 2018 (as reported), in Arauca department, ELN kidnapped two men in the rural zone of the department. During an operation, army officers rescued them 42 days later in Tame municipality, Malvinas vereda.

On 14 August 2018, in Guayacana corregimiento, Tumaco, Narino, a woman was shot dead in her house by unidentified armed men. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 13 August 2018, in Aracataca, Magdalena, a social leader was killed in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men. The victim was a member of the JAC of 2 de Febrero area. According to the source, many other leaders have been threatened in pamphlets. 1 fatality.

On 13 August 2018, in Calamar municipality, Guaviare, the former mayor of the municipality of Miraflores was killed in the rural area of Puerto Zancudo. In the attack another man, who has the husband of a local council woman, was also killed. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is presence of FARC dissident groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 29th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (29th Front - Gonzalez Prado)
notes: On 13 August 2018, in El Rosario municipality, Narino, a farmer was killed by the FARC dissident 29th front in El Vergel vereda. According to the source, one of the leader of that dissident group perpetrated the attack. Motives are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 12 August 2018, in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, a social leader was abducted by an unidentified armed group in Las Cuatro vereda. He was later that day released in the border with Venezuela. Motives of the abduction are unknown. Several armed groups operate in this department.

On 12 August 2018, in Ocana, Norte de Santander, two people were shot by unidentified armed men in Las Monjas urban sector. An underage man was killed and an man was injured in the attack. Motives are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 12 August 2018 (as reported), in San Faustino, Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a woman was shot dead and her body was found on a road. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers is unknown. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 11 August 2018, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, an employee of the Water and Sanitation company of Cucuta was attacked by an unidentified man. The victim was attending to a meeting with the community of a neighbourhood when he was shot. The victim survived the attack with injuries. Motives are unknown.

Around 10 August 2018 (between 10 - 11 August), in Samaniego municipality, Narino, two men were killed and two more were injured in what it seems to be a social cleansing. One of the victims was killed in Chugundy vereda while the second victim was killed in the rural area. Information on the group responsible for the attacks is unknown. In the past days was announced in pamphlets a social cleansing. There is presence of the Gulf Clan, the ELN and FARC dissident groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Nasa Indigenous Group (Colombia); ACIN: Association of Indigenous Councils of North Cauca
source: El Colombiano; ProtectDefenders.eu; UNOCHA; Front Line Defenders; INDEPAZ
notes: On 10 August 2018, in Santander de Quilichao municipality, Cauca, a Nasa indigenous social leader was killed near his house in the Guadualito indigenous reserve. The victim was a member of ACIN. He had received threats from the ELN. 1 Fatality.
A social leader was beaten by members of the ELN in the municipality of Nechi in Antioquia on August 9th. He is an activist for the programme of crops substitution in this municipality.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: UNOCHA; Conexion Putumayo; INDEPAZ; Front Line Defenders; ProtectDefenders.eu
notes: On 9 August 2018, in Pinuna Negro, Puerto Leguizamo, Putumayo, the president of the Council of Communal Action of La Paz vereda and leader of the programme for substitution of illegal crops was killed by unidentified men. The victim was also a promoter of the peace agreement with the FARC and its implementation. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 9 August 2018, in Segovia, Antioquia, a man was killed in La Reina urban area. Also in Segovia, another man was killed in La Reina urban area. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attacks. According to the authorities, motives of both attacks are related to the activities of the Gulf Clan in the area. 2 fatalities.

On 8 August 2018, in Agua Viva vereda, Fortul, Arauca, three off duty soldiers were kidnapped by ELN members. The victims were travelling to Tame in a public bus when they were abducted. The victims' whereabouts are unknown.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
notes: On 8 August 2018, in La Dorada vereda, San Miguel, Putumayo, a social leader and JAC member from El Cedro was shot dead by unidentified armed men. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 7 January 2018, in the sector of Playa Arrecha, Tumaco, a 17 year old was killed by men who talk to him before. The assassination is related to 'invisible borders' (control of territory by armed groups). The identity of the perpetrators is unknown

On 7 August 2018, in El Carmelo corregimiento, Cajibio, Cauca, a social leader and human rights advocate was shot dead by unidentified men in Altamira vereda. The victim was participating in the coca substitution programme PNIS. According to the source, there is presence of Gulf Clan in the area. 1 fatality.
On 7 August 2018, in Dagua, Valle del Cauca, a farmer was kidnapped by unidentified men. After pressure exerted by the authorities, the victim was released the next day.
On 6 August 2018, in El Dovio area, Valle del Cauca, the body of a shaman leader from the Embera Chami indigenous group was found with bullet injuries in Dai Umada Mia indigenous settlement.
A worker of the CAMU of Puerto Escondido in Cordoba was killed in the municipality of Necocli on August 6th. The victim was leaving a local bar with a group when armed men shot them.

Around 6 August 2018, in El Placer, Valle del Guamuez, Putumayo, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands tied. Information on the attackers is unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 5 August 2018, in La Playa municipality, Norte de Santander, a man driving his motorcycle on a road was shot dead by unidentified men in La Vega de San Antonio vereda. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 4 August 2018, in Taraza, Antioquia, a social leader and peacebuilding advocate was shot dead by suspected Los Caparros armed men, in his house. The victim had recently refused to pay extortion to the group.

On 4 August 2018, in Taraza municipality, Antioquia, a social leader and member of the program for illegal crops substitution was killed in his house in Aguas Claras vereda. According to the source, the victim was killed after refusing to pay an extortion demanded by Los Caparros Gang. Locals reported that they are in a delicate situation since the Caparros are extorting people that take part in the coca substitution programme, meanwhile the AGC says they will killed any person that give money to Los Caparros. 1 fatality.

source: Front Line Defenders; UNOCHA; Caracol Radio; ProtectDefenders.eu; INDEPAZ
notes: On 4 August 2018, in La Union, Antioquia, the social leader and foundational member of the association of artisanal miners in Antioquia was killed. Information on the attackers is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 4 August 2018, in Puerto Asis, Putumayo, an underage man was killed in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men on a motorcycle. The victim was on a football field in Villa Paz II neighbourhood when he was attacked. According to the source, motives can be related to 'social cleansing'. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 3 August 2018, in Segovia, Antioquia, a man was killed in Marquetalia neighbourhood. Three more people were also injured in the attack. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 3 August 2018, in the outskirts of Quibdo, Choco, a girl was sexually assaulted and injured after having been stabbed by members of the Gulf Clan. [women targeted: girls]

On 1 August 2018, in Florida, Valle del Cauca, a teacher of the municipality of Florida in Cauca and member of the Nasa indigenous community was beaten by armed men. According to the source, the victim was in a list of people that were threatened by the Aguilas Negras group. The indigenous authorities asked for the protection of the teachers in their community.

source: UNOCHA; Ocana la Region y El Catatumbo
notes: Around 1 August 2018 (as reported), in Teorama municipality, Norte de Santander, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds near the river that communicates Teorama with Quince Letras area. No group has attributed this event, but this is an operation area of the EPL and the ELN. 1 fatality.
On 1 August 2018, in Suarez, Cauca, a radio announcer and journalist was shot dead in Los Almendros neighbourhood. The victim was know for his work in a community radio. 1 fatality.

On 1 August 2018, in Bogota - Kennedy , Bogota, D.C., an unidentified man on a motorcycle shot at the house of the Health and Welfare Observer of the National Police. The victim has been threatened from 2014 due to his work in the institution. No fatalities of injuries occurred.

On 1 August 2018, in Villa Del Rosario, Norte de Santander, a Venezuelan security guar who was off duty was killed while he was taking his children to school in Villa Antigua area. Motives of the attack and information on the attackers are unknown. There is presence of different armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
On 31 July 2018, in Taraza municipality, Antioquia, a woman was killed in a drive-by shooting by unidentified individuals on a motorcycle. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 30 July 2018, in El Tarra, Norte de Santander, members of the EPL shot against a group of people in a local bar. Ten people were killed in the attack, including four former FARC militants, a member of the JAC, and five civilians. Although the group initially denied their involvement in this event, police later announced the arrest of two of their members for this attack, on October 2019. 10 fatalities.
On 30 July 2018, in Salgar corregimiento, Atlantico, unidentified men entered in a house, shot and killed three people, injuring two others. 3 fatalities.

On 29 July 2018, unidentified armed men abducted a civilian in the rural area of Puente Nacional in Santander. The victim, recognized businessman in the area, was released by the perpetrators on August 5, 2018, in the department of Sucre. No group claimed the event.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: Tu Caqueta.com; Front Line Defenders; ProtectDefenders.eu; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ
notes: On 29 July 2018, in Fraguita, Caqueta, a farmer and JAC member was killed. Days before, suspects painted several houses with allusive FARC graffiti nearby where the killing took place. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 28 July 2018, in El Tarra, Norte de Santander, a man was shot and killed. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 28 July 2018, in Turbo, Antioquia, an off-duty police officer was attacked by Gulf Clan members. Apparently, the attack was in retaliation for the past search warrants implemented by the police. The officer was with his child by the time of the event and both of them were injured.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Farmers (Colombia)
source: ProtectDefenders.eu; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; Front Line Defenders; El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: On 26 July 2018, in San Faustino corregimiento, Norte de Santander, a farmer, social leader, and member of the JAC of Sabana vereda was shot and killed by armed men. Gulf Clan (AGC) and Los Rastrojos gang operates in the area, but no group has claimed responsibility for the attack. 1 fatality.

On 25 July 2018, in Mocoa municipality, Putumayo, the director of a school in was killed Naranjito neighborhood. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 25 July 2018 (as reported), in Cartagena del Chaira municipality, Caqueta, a former FARC member was killed and his body was found in El Diamante vereda. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

A businessman was kidnapped in the area of Cantarito of the municipality of Jamundi in Valle del Cauca. According to the source armed men took the victim on the morning of July 24th. No group has yet claimed this event.

On 24 July 2018, in Pradera municipality, Valle del Cauca, a group of indigenous people were attacked by armed hooded men in the rural area. The victims were part of the Kwet Wala reserve. The men shot the group, which took refuge in the forest nearby. Four of the people attacked disappeared and they are probably wounded. Several armed groups operate in this department.

Around 24 July 2018 (as reported), in Tame, Arauca, a man was killed. According to local inhabitants, he was a social leader in the Marquelandia sector. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. 1 fatality.

On 24 July 2018, near Litoral del San Juan municipality, Choco, a group of aid workers from humanitarian organizations were detained nearby the San Juan river. They were abandoned in an indigenous reservation and the boat they were using was robbed. There is no information on the perpetrators. Several armed groups operate in this department. No fatalities or injuries occurred.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 40th Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (40th Front - Jacobo Arenas)
notes: On 24 July 2018, in Uribe, Meta, two men were shot and killed by members of the 40th FARC Dissident Front. 2 fatalities.
On 23 July 2018, in Dibulla municipality, La Guajira, the son of one of a Wiwa indigenous leader was shot and injured by unidentified men in Kogui Malayo Arhuaco reservation.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: ProtectDefenders.eu; El Espectador; UNOCHA; Front Line Defenders
notes: On 23 July 2018, in Villa Colombia corregimiento, Valle del Cauca, a JAC leader and farmer was shot and killed by unidentified armed men. The victim was also responsible for the construction of the aqueduct of the village Las Pilas. Sources claimed the victim was on a hit list of an armed group in the area. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 23 July 2018, in Convencion municipality, Norte de Santander, a man was shot and injured in Llano Grande corregimiento. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 23 July 2018 (as reported), in La Gabarra corregimiento, Norte de Santander, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 23 July 2018, in La Aurora vereda, Santander, unidentified hooded men entered a house, killed a farmer and held his family hostage. One of the farmer's son was injured. 1 fatality.
