On 22 July 2018, in San Pablo corregimiento, Norte de Santander, a man was shot and killed. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: Around 22 July 2018 (between 15 - 31 July), in Pore, Casanare, a rancher was kidnapped by FARC dissidents. According to preliminary versions, he was released after military forces pressured the responsible for the attack.

On 21 July 2018, in Santa Barbara municipality, Santander, a businessman was kidnapped by members of the ELN in a rural area of the city. They robbed him first and asked the family to pay 1.000 million pesos. Army soldiers chased the suspects and rescued the victim the day after, arresting three of the perpetrators.

On 21 July 2018, in Medellin, Antioquia, a 16-year-old social leader and peacebuilding activist was shot and killed by two unidentified armed men in Robledo Kennedy neighbourhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 21 July 2018, in Astrea municipality, Cesar, a rancher was shot and injured while in his car in Villa Yoly location. This was the fourth time he had been victim of an attack. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: INDEPAZ; La Burra Mocha; Front Line Defenders; UNOCHA
notes: On 20 July 2018, in Orito municipality, Putumayo, the president of the JAC of the area was killed by two unidentified armed men in Remolinos vereda. He was leading the substitution of illegal crops program in this vereda. No group has yet claimed this attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 20 July 2018, in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, a man was shot and killed in La Florida corregimiento. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
source: UNOCHA; Front Line Defenders; RCN Radio; INDEPAZ; ProtectDefenders.eu
notes: On 19 July 2018, in El Carmen vereda, Boyaca, a social leader of the farmers community and president of the JAC was shot and killed. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. 1 fatality.
On 19 July 2018, in Guamalito corregimiento, Norte de Santander, a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed men in Villanueva vereda. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 18 July 2018, in San Vicente del Caguan municipality, Caqueta, a rancher and social leader was killed in the rural area of the city. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 18 July 2018, in Roberto Payan municipality, Narino, a farmer was shot and killed by unidentified armed men in the rural area of the city. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 18 July 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, a man was shot and killed in a drive-by shooting by two unidentified men on a motorcycle in La Ciudadela neighborhood. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 17 July 2018, in the area of Las Juntas corregimiento, Norte de Santander, a woman was killed in an apparently sniper attack in La Pacheca vereda. Local inhabitants claim the death is related to the armed conflict in the region. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
Around 16 July 2018, in El Guira, Tauramena, Casanare, the vice President of the Llano Lindo JAC was killed and his body found with gunshot injuries. His body was found on 20 July.

In July 2018, in the rural areas of San Jose de Cucuta in Norte de Santander, Los Rastrojos and the AGC killed an unknown number of people. There is not a specific number since the bodies are dumped or hidden. These groups have also enforced a curfew and limited movement in this area. Unidentified Number of fatalities coded as 3.

A social leader was abducted by armed men in his house in the area of Agua Blanca in the municipality of Buenos Aires in Cauca. One more person was abducted with him but later released. the event was reported on July 16th.

source: Front Line Defenders; El Colombiano; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ
notes: On 16 July 2018, in Caucasia, Antioquia, a social leader and founder of a workers union was shot and killed by two unidentified armed men. He was in a process for land restitution and was leading a group of victims that advocated for this same cause. Weeks before, he was threatened by men on a motorcycle who shot at his house and escaped. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 16 July 2018, in Planadas municipality, Tolima, a member of the FARC political party was threatened and abducted for a few hours by unidentified individuals. According to the source, the victim was later released with a warning to stop his social work in the area.

On 16 July 2018, in Tumaco municipality, Narino, a group of unidentified armed men opened fire against people inside an establishment in Ambupi vereda. Five people were killed and two were abducted. According to military sources, the event was a clash between the Oliver Sinisterra Dissident FARC Front and the GUP, but this version has not been verified. 5 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Farmers (Colombia); MP: Patriotic March; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; W Radio; ProtectDefenders.eu; Front Line Defenders
notes: Around 16 July 2018 (as reported), in Caloto municipality, Cauca, a social leader and member of the JAC was killed and his body was found in his house in El Carmelo vereda. The victim had signs of torture and was killed with a rock. He was also a farmer, union leader, and member of the Patriotic March. 1 fatality.

Around 16 July 2018 (as reported), in Linares, Narino, a social leader was kidnapped by unidentified armed men and was later released. He was part of a local workers' organization known as Astraca. He and several members were forced to leave the organization. Several armed groups operate in this department.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); ASCAMCAT: Catatumbo's Peasant Association
notes: On 15 July 2018, in Ocana municipality, Norte de Santander, four unidentified men on motorcycles attacked a social leader in Las Chircas corregimiento. The victim is an active member of the farmer's organization ASCAMCAT and was in a car of the National Protection Unit (UNP) escorted by security agents. Several armed groups operate in this department. No one was injured.

On 15 July 2018, in Curillo municipality, Caqueta, a teacher was killed in the rural area of the city. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. The victim had been transferred to Curillo due to previous threats that he had received. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
Around 15 July 2018 (month of), around Neiva municipality, Huila, an indigenous farmer was kidnapped by an unidentified group. The indigenous guard rescued him.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: Around 14 July 2018 (as reported), in La Victoria corregimiento, Narino, a man was killed by unknown armed men. Community members claim the perpetrators were FARC dissidents. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.
On 14 July 2018, in Barbacoas, Narino, two men were shot and killed by unidentified armed men. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Afro-Colombian Ethnic Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 14 July 2018 (between 10 - 18 July), in Suarez municipality, Cauca, a social leader of the afro-Colombian population was killed and his body was found in advanced state of decomposition on the Marilops river. He was kidnapped on July 10th by unknown individuals, who took him from inside his house. 1 fatality.

On 14 July 2018, in Yurayaco corregimiento, Caqueta, a farmer was shot and killed by an unidentified man, who escaped on a motorcycle. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.
On 14 July 2018, in Roberto Payan, Narino, a man was shot and killed by several unidentified armed men. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 11 July 2018, in San Andres de Cuerquia municipality, Antioquia, unidentified individuals shot at a bus with employees from Hidroituango project in the rural area. Companies working in the region have special protection granted by state forces because FARC dissidents and Gulf Clan (AGC) operate in the area. No fatalities or injuries occurred.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Oliver Sinisterra Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Oliver Sinisterra Front)
notes: On 11 July 2018, in Guayacana corregimiento, Narino, three members of the investigative corporation of the police (CTI) were killed. The three were driving back from work when unidentified men started to shoot at the car. After they killed the officers, they burned them and the car. Authorities claim the attack was ordered by the leader of the FARC Dissident Oliver Sinisterra Front. 3 fatalities.
A civilian was killed in the shelter for IDPs set in the municipality of Roberto Payan in Narino on July 10th. Armed men shot the victim. No group has yet claimed this event.

Around 10 July 2018 (as reported), in Policarpa municipality, Narino, three farmers were killed and their bodies were found in the rural area. Their bodies were tied and with gunshot wounds. The attack was apparently committed by Gulf Clan (AGC). 3 fatalities.

Around 10 July 2018 (as reported), in Monteria municipality, Cordoba, a rancher was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds in El Charcon vereda. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 10 July 2018 (as reported), in Roberto Payan, Narino, a man was killed by unidentified individuals nearby a shelter. The victim was a displaced person. The victim had never reported threats. According to the police, a FARC dissident group and the Gente del Orden gang dispute the region. 1 fatality.

Around 10 July 2018 (as reported), in Tumaco, Narino, a man was killed and his body was found with a rope around his neck in Comuna 3 neighborhood. He went missing two days before. Social organizations claimed the attack is related to the presence of armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.
A man was killed in the rural area known Palmarito in Fortul on 8 July. The local police suspect this event was committed by armed groups.
A man was killed in the rural area known as La Esmeralda in Arauquita on 8 July. The local police suspect this event was committed by armed groups.

On 8 July 2018, in Guayacana corregimiento, Narino, a man and a woman were shot and killed in a drive-by shooting by two unidentified men on a motorcycle. The man was a farmer. Several armed groups operate in this department. 2 fatalities.

On 8 July 2018, near San Pablo corregimiento, Norte de Santander, a man was killed by unidentified individuals while driving a motorcycle in Vijagual vereda. The perpetrators shot him several times and burned his motorcycle. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 7 July 2018, in Guayabal, Palmira, Valle del Cauca, the body of a man was found in advanced state of decompostion. He had been abducted by members of the Los Peluqueros gang on 17 June. The group had demanded ransom for his release.

assoc_actor_2: Indigenous Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Farmers (Colombia)
notes: On 7 July 2018, in Santa Rosa de Tapias corregimiento, Valle del Cauca, a social leader was killed by unidentified men. He was part of a mixed association of indigenous people and farmers in Guacari. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 7 July 2018 (as reported), in Cucuta - East, Norte de Santander, a man was killed and his body was found in the El Escobal neighbourhood with gunshot wounds along with a letter signed by the Gulf Clan (AGC). 1 fatality.

On 7 July 2018, in Pichinde corregimiento, Valle del Cauca, a social leader was shot and killed by unidentified armed men. The victim was an environmental leader against illegal mining in the Farallones area. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 7 July 2018 (month of), in Puerto Santander, Norte de Santander, a man was killed and his body was found in an advanced state of decomposition. He had a migratory card with him, provided as a mean of identification to Venezuelan citizens. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

On 7 July 2018, in Chaparral municipality, Tolima, a social leader was killed while driving a motorcycle to Calarma corregimiento. He was the leader of lands restitution process. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 6 July 2018, in El Torrente vereda, Antioquia, a community leader was killed in his house. His relative, the president of a social organization, was killed ten days before. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: ProtectDefenders.eu; INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; Front Line Defenders
notes: On 6 July 2018, in Cartagena del Chaira, Caqueta, the JAC president was shot and killed in a drive-by shooting by unidentified men on a motorcycle. The victim was also the vice-president of a farmers association. 1 fatality.

On 5 July 2018, in Tesalia vereda, Putumayo, six armed men arrived at the house of an indigenous leader and killed him. In reaction the father shot at the men using is hunting rifle and the mother defended herself with a machete. The father of the indigenous leader was also shot and killed during the shoot-out. The perpetrators tried to kill the woman, but they escaped after the community heard the screaming and approached the house. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Women (Colombia); CH: Human Colombia
notes: On 4 July 2018, in Caceres, Antioquia, a female social leader was shot dead by unidentified armed individuals. The victim was the coordinator of the campaign of presidential candidate Gustavo Petro (Colombia Humana). According to relatives, she had received a phone threat from the local police commander telephone number. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 4 July 2018, in Medellin - Southwest, Antioquia, the nephew of a community leader was killed in the Altavista corregimiento. According to witnesses, the author was a police officer who threatened the family in the previous week. 1 fatality.
On 4 July 2018, in Arauca, Arauca, an off-duty police officer was killed by two armed men in his house in Los Fundadores neighborhood. The perpetrators were arrested. 1 fatality.

Around 4 July 2018 (as reported), in Santa Maria vereda, Norte de Santander, a man was killed and his body was found next to a grenade. The military forces defused a grenade. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Oliver Sinisterra Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Oliver Sinisterra Front)

source: ProtectDefenders.eu; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; Front Line Defenders
notes: On 3 July 2018, in Palmar de Varela, Atlantico, the president of a community association was shot and killed in his house by an unidentified man in Villa Paraiso neighbourhood. The perpetrator left on a motorcycle with another man. They were later arrested, but it was not reported to which group they belonged. The victim had previously requested security from the National Protection Unit. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Women (Colombia)
notes: On 3 July 2018, in Quibdo, Choco, a female social leader and JAC board president of the Virgen del Carmen neighborhood was killed. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Around 3 July 2018 (as reported), in El Paujil, Caqueta, two men were tortured, killed and found dead. Apparently, their motorcycle was burned and left near their bodies in Bolivia caserio. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

On 3 July 2018, in Ipiales municipality, Narino, two farmers were shot, one of them died and the other was injured in the face in Puente Viejo sector. Police claimed that they were taken from their houses and taken to the sector where they were found. They were brothers. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 3 July 2018, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a man was shot and killed in a drive-by shooting by unidentified men in Palmeras neighborhood. He was taken to the hospital but could not survive the injuries. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 2 July 2018, in Barbacoas, Narino, an Awa indigenous teenager was killed by unidentified armed individuals. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators, circumstances of death, or crime motivation.
On 2 July 2018, near Pajarito municipality, Boyaca, two members of the ELN shot at a truck and injured the driver. They ordered the driver to stop the vehicle but he refused it and they attacked him.

Around 2 July 2018 (as reported), near El Mango vereda, Cauca, seven people were killed and their bodies were found on the road from El Mango to Sinai veredas. According to a Cauca deputy, the bodies were left by a vehicle on the side of the road. The victims were killed in the north of the Argelia's municipality, where clashes between the military forces of Colombia and armed groups, such as ELN, took place. Threatening pamphlets have circulated recently in the region by armed groups claiming a social cleansing would be executed against drug users and sellers, robbers, rapists, etc. 7 fatalities.

notes: Around 24 May 2018, a woman was found dead in the area of La Maria in Corinto, Cauca. She was kidnapped by an armed group during the past weekend while the group was doing a marihuana tour with some Israeli tourists. According to the sources, the perpetrators is a FARC dissident group.

On 24 May 2018, in Briceno municipality, Antioquia, an individual was killed by the army in Travesias vereda. The individual was shot after refusing an order to stop given by a military patrol. Local leader claimed the victim was unarmed and, therefore, they do not find reasons that justify the army's action on the case. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Labour Group (Colombia); SINALTRAINAL: National Union of Food Industry Workers
notes: On 23 May 2018, in Andalucia, Valle del Cauca, two members of SINALTRAINAL, a trade union for workers in the food industry, were killed. The trade union is involved in a dispute with the Nestle corporation in Colombia.

On 23 May 2018, in El Cerrito, Valle del Cauca, a mine worker was killed by an unidentified armed group. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators, circumstances of death, or crime motivation.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 23 May 2018 (as reported), in Jamundi municipality, Valle del Cauca, a member a former FARC member who was being part of the reintegration process, was killed in El Pital vereda. The victim was shot six times by unknown men. No group has taken responsibility for the action. 1 fatality.

On 22 May 2018, in Tumaco area, Narino, a community leader was killed when the truck he was driving was ambushed with grenades and rifle fire. Other three people died in the attack, but investigations revealed the community leader was the primary recipient of the majority of rifle shots. 4 fatalities.

On 22 May 2018, in Fortul, Arauca, a female human rights defender was attacked in a drive-by shooting. She was inside the National Protection Unit's car, escorted by security professionals, when individuals in another vehicle shot against them. The victim is part of the Permanent Committee for the Human Rights defense and wasn't injured. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]
On 21 May 2018, in El Tarra, Norte de Santander, a teenager was shot and killed by unidentified armed men. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: Around 21 May 2018 (between 19 - 24 May), in La Maria vereda, Cauca, a woman was killed and her body was found. She had been kidnapped with Israeli citizens on the Saturday before. The Israeli tourists were released. The group was doing a Marihuana tour in the area. According to the source, a FARC dissident group is responsible for the actions. 1 fatality.

On 19 May 2018, in Timbio, Cauca, the wife of a social leader member of PNIS was killed by an unidentified armed group. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators, circumstances of death, or crime motivation. [women targeted: relatives of targeted groups or persons]

Around 19 May 2018 (weekend of), in Ocana, Norte de Santander, a man was shot and injured in a drive-by shooting by two unidentified men on a motorcycle. He was taken to the hospital. There is presence of several armed groups in the department.

On 19 May 2018, in Fortul, Arauca, a man was killed by two men on a motorcycle in a drive-by shooting in the Nuevo Fortul neighborhood. According to the sources, the event could be part of a social cleansing carried by armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: UNOCHA; ProtectDefenders.eu; Front Line Defenders; INDEPAZ
notes: On 19 May 2018, in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, a member of the local JAC was killed in a drive-by shooting by two men on a motorcycle in la Primavera vereda. 21 families were displaced in fear towards Petrolea locality. 1 fatality.

On 18 May 2018, in El Escobal, Cucuta, Norte de Santander, 20 National Anti-Extortion and Kidnapping Command (CONAS) officers shot at a group of civilians. The motive of the attack is unknown. No injuries or fatalities are reported. CONAS officers entered Colombia without due permission.
Around 18 May 2018 (as reported), in Llorente corregimiento, Narino, a farmer was killed and his body was found with gun wounds. 1 fatality.

On 18 May 2018, in Cartagena del Chaira, Caqueta, two men on a motorcycle shot against a group of teenagers in a drive-by shooting in a park. Three of the teenagers were reported wounded in this event. The authorities suspect that the attack might be related to threats of social cleansing made recently by armed groups that operate in the area.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 17 May 2018, in Guayacana corregimiento, Narino, a political leader was attacked on the road from Tumaco to Pasto. According to the witnesses, the attack happened while the victim was driving in a car with 3 more people, suddenly a grenade and gunshots hit the car. One man died, while 3 more people, including a pregnant woman and two FARC demobilized members were wounded. According to his wife, he had no enemies neither had received threats. 1 fatality.

On 17 May 2018, in Ricaurte municipality, Narino, an Awa indigenous man, who was member of the Gran Rosario indigenous reserve, was killed by unidentified armed men in Chachajo community. There is no information on the perpetrator of the attack. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 16 May 2018, in Cucuta, Norte de Santander, a Venezuelan was killed with three shots in the Seis Reyes invasion. His wife claimed he had not received previous threats, although he had engaged in some land disputes. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 16 May 2018 (as reported), in La Cascada vereda, Meta, a farmer was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds. The man had recently moved to this municipality and was an active member in the Council of Communal Action of this area. The victim could not be identified, since his documents did not match the national register. Near the body was found a message that said he was murdered for snitching. One of the hypothesis considered by the authorities is that FARC dissidents killed him, believing he was an infiltrated agent. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 5 October 2018, armed men attacked and wounded a member of the indigenous community Embera. The attack was in the municipality of Dabeiba, Antioquia and sources claim the men were members of an illegal armed groupd an were armed with rifles, although the attack was commited with a knife.

On 15 May 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, a man was killed in a drive-by shooting by four unidentified men on two motorcycles in San Martin neighborhood. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 15 May 2018 (as reported), in Arauca municipality, Arauca, two men were killed and their bodies were found in a property in the rural area of the city. According to the sources, the victims were shot by unidentified armed men that arrived in the location riding horses. The victims were Venezuelans and worked in the farm in which they were killed. ELN members and FARC dissidents operate in the area. 2 fatalities.

Around 15 May 2018 (month of), in Santa Fe corregimiento, Bolivar, a man was killed and his body was found floating on Magdalena river. His body was in a advanced state of decomposition. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 15 May 2018, in Tumaco municipality, Narino, two brothers were killed while working near the Mira river. Their bodies were found by their relatives later that day, with gunshot wounds. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Nasa Indigenous Group (Colombia); Liberation of Mother Earth
source: RCN Radio; INDEPAZ; UNOCHA; Front Line Defenders; ProtectDefenders.eu
notes: On 15 May 2018, in Corinto, Cauca, a member of the Indigenous community Nasa was killed. The victim was an active member of the Liberation of Mother Earth movement. Armed men approached him in motorcycle and shot against the victim. One woman that was in the area was also hurt. Authorities started to investigate the authorship of the event. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Coccam: National Coordinating Committee of Coca, Marijuana and Poppy Cultivators
source: Front Line Defenders; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; ProtectDefenders.eu; Vanguardia Liberal
notes: Around 15 May 2018 (between 14 - 17 May), in Cantagallo municipality, Bolivar, a member of The Council of Communal Action was killed and his body was found in La Poza vereda. He was an active member of COCCAM. He was last seen on 14 May when he left his house. This is the second leader found dead in Cantagallo. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.
On 15 May 2018, in Bojaya, Choco, seven minors were forcibly recruited by ELN members. Their whereabouts are unknown.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 1st Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (1st Front - Armando Rios)
notes: Around 15 May 2018 (week of), in Puerto Leguizamo municipality, Putumayo, an indigenous underaged girl was forcibly recruited by FARC dissidents. She was released after indigenous authorities intervened and demanded the armed group to free the girl. [women targeted: girls]

On 14 May 2018, in Quibdo, Choco, the son the governor of Casimiro community and a teenager were killed. Both victim were members of Afro-Colombian communities. The responsible for the action is an organized armed gang. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

On 14 May 2018, in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, two men were shot and killed in two different attacks one in Miramontes vereda and the other one in El Socorro vereda. There is no information on the perpetrator of the attacks. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

On 14 May 2018, in Bajo Baudo municipality, Choco, an armed group entered the indigenous community of Puerto Embera. They held 12 prisoners, including 4 underage teenagers, and raped all the women. 656 people were displaced in fear. The prisoners were released on May 21st. [women targeted: girls]

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 14 May 2018, in Pogue, Choco, a social leader was killed by a ELN member during a party. The attack aimed at another man present, who was being threatened by the group. However, the victim shot was a member of the Community Council of Pogue in Bojaya. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Labour Group (Colombia); SINALTRAINAL: National Union of Food Industry Workers
notes: On 13 May 2018, in Bugalagrande, Valle Del Cauca, a union member of the SINALTRAINAL was killed. He had previously received threats, due to a collective conflict from SINALTRAINAL against Nestle in Colombia.

Around 13 May 2018 (weekend of), in Tame municipality, Arauca, a professor was kidnapped by unidentified armed men in Santa Ines vereda. He was part of the National Learning Service Institute SENA. Family and work colleagues claim he had not received previous threats. Police started to search for him. His whereabouts are unknown.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: Front Line Defenders; Diario del Sur (Colombia); UNOCHA; ProtectDefenders.eu; INDEPAZ
notes: On 13 May 2018, in the area of Uribe Uribe (Chilvi), Narino, a social leader was shot and killed in El Ceibito vereda. He was a former member of the Council of Communal Action in his municipality and participated in the program for illegal crop substitution. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. There is presence of several groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 12 May 2018, in El Doncello municipality, Caqueta, a man was killed in Las Americas vereda. The victim was a farmer in the area and was part of the local program for substitution of illegal crops. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

On 12 May 2018, in Siberia corregimiento, Cauca, a businessman was kidnapped by six unidentified men. The governor of the indigenous reserve reported that the victim was released in the area of El Rosal. He was released two days after the kidnapping. There is presence of several armed groups in this department.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: In the area known as the Y near the urban area of the town of Pio X of the municipality of Ituango an ex- FARC combatant was attacked by unidentified armed men. The man was transferred to a local hospital. The event was reported on May 11th.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 11 May 2018, in Ituango municipality, Antioquia, a former FARC member was shot and injured by unidentified armed men in the reintegration area of Santa Lucia. The moto taxi driver who was transporting him was also injured. 1 fatality.

On 11 May 2018, in Ituango municipality, Antioquia, a relative of a former FARC member was shot and killed. There is no information on the perpetrators and the motivation for the attack remains unknown. 1 fatality.

On 10 May 2018, in San Vicente del Caguan municipality, Caqueta, a rancher was killed in Brisas de Condor vereda. According to the authorities, armed men took the victim out of his house and shot him. No armed group has yet claimed the action. 1 fatality.
On 9 May 2018, in Buenaventura, Valle del Cauca, the headquarters of the Ombudsman Office was attacked with shots by unidentified suspects. No fatalities or injuries occurred.

Around 8 May 2018 (week of), in La Gabarra corregimiento, Norte de Santander, a Venezuelan man was killed and his body was found floating on La Gabarra river. He was reported as missing days ago. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Labour Group (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); Fishermen (Colombia)
source: Front Line Defenders; UNOCHA; ProtectDefenders.eu; Caracol Radio; INDEPAZ
notes: Around 8 May 2018 (as reported), in Puerto Valdivia corregimiento, Antioquia, a social leader was killed and his body was found with several gunshot wounds in the area of Pescado. He was a fisherman and a member of the Small Miners and Fishermen of Puerto Valdivia AMPA, and also a human rights activist in the area of Ituango. 1 fatality.

On 7 May 2018, in Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander, two people were shot and killed by unidentified men in Miramontes vereda. According to the police, the attack was ordered by a EPL member. 2 fatalities.

On 7 May 2018, in El Palo corregimiento, Cauca, an engineer was abducted by a unidentified armed group on the road from El Palo to Tacueyo. ELN and FARC dissidents operate in the zone. His whereabouts are unknown.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 7 May 2018, near Filipinas vereda, Arauca, a former FARC member and former political prisoner was killed by unidentified suspects on the road from Filipinas to Galaxia. There is no information on the perpetrators of the attack. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); PDA: Alternative Democratic Pole
notes: On 6 May 2018, in Cartagena del Chaira municipality, Caqueta, a social leader was shot and injured in a drive-by shooting perpetrated by unidentified armed men in Guaudalosa vereda. He is also the city leader of the PDA political party. He had been threatened in 2017 by United Self-Defense Forces of Colombia (AUC). Human rights leaders demanded protection for his life.

On 6 May 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, unidentified men killed a employee of a state electric company in a drive-by shooting in San Felipe de Tumaco neighborhood. The suspects tried to kidnap an engineer, but one of his workers threw himself in front of him to prevent the kidnapping. The engineer escaped and was not injured, the other man died. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 1 fatality.

Around 5 May 2018, the National association 'Tejedoras de Vida' made a public denouncement for the disappearance of a social leader and a member of this organization. According to Tejedoras de Vida, the victim left her house in El Placer to the urban area of La Hormiga, Putumayo. She never arrived at her destination. Over the last months was distributed a pamphlet in which her name was threatened. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Around 4 May 2018 (as reported), in Anori, Antioquia, a man was killed by ELN members and his body was found. The authors of the attack left a note saying the victim was a robber. Families displaced in fear after the event. 1 fatality.

source: ProtectDefenders.eu; Front Line Defenders; Caracol Radio; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ
notes: Around 4 May 2018 (as reported), in Pueblo Rico municipality, Risaralda, the indigenous leader of the Embera Chami community was killed and his body was found in a rural area. According to the sources, the victim was abducted by armed men and has been threatened repeatedly. It is not clear which group is responsible for this action. ELN and FARC dissident groups operate in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 3 May 2018 (month of), in Tibu municipality, Narino, an individual was killed and his/her body was found in advanced state of decomposition in El Empalme vereda. The body had a rope tied around the neck and was half-buried. It is that the corpse was there for at least 15 days. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 3 May 2018 (as reported), in Policarpa municipality, Narino, two people were killed by unidentified armed men and their bodies were found in the Patia river. There is presence of several armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: Around 3 May 2018 (as reported), in Santa Maria vereda, Valle del Cauca, a social leader was kidnaped by a group of dissidents of the FARC. The victim was in a boat over the Rio Naya when armed men intercepted him and forced him to get on the boat with them, he is a known social leader and JAC member in Buenaventura. The week before he suffered an attempted kidnapping inside his property, but managed to escape. His whereabouts are unknown.
On 2 May 2018, in Medellin, Antioquia, a community leader was shot dead by two armed men who arrived on a motorcycle, in Andalucia-La Francia neighbourhood.

On 2 May 2018, in Santa Rosa vereda, La Guajira, a farmer was kidnapped by unidentified men who entered his property. He was released 26 days later, after national army and intelligence forces carried out operations in the area to locate the victim.

On 2 May 2018, in Puerto Valdivia corregimiento, Antioquia, the social leader and member of the social group Living Rivers Movement from Ituango and his nephew were shot dead by unidentified armed men. 2 fatalities.

A man was killed in a rural area of Santander de Quilichao. According to the sources, the name of the victim appeared on a list in the past January, in which the ELN claim people that have to leave the area. The victim is supposedly a member of the criminal that operates in the area.

On 30 April 2018, between Convencion and Teorama municipalities, Norte de Santander department, a man was killed by unidentified armed men in the Las Mercedes road. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
In the rural area of the municipality of Solano in Caqueta an ex FARC member was killed on the morning of April 29th. No groups have yet claimed this act.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 29 April 2018, in Pena Roja vereda, Solano municipality, Caqueta department, a former FARC member was killed by unidentified armed men. 1 fatality.

On 29 April 2018, in Riohacha, La Guajira department, the social leader of the organization Nation Wayuu suffered an attack in his house in the neighborhood of Los Nogales. The leader had been threatened in the past by illegal groups. No fatalities occurred.

Around 27 April 2018 (as reported), near Samaniego municipality, Narino department, a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed men. His dead body was found with gunshot wounds two days later in the area known as Chuguldi. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

source: Front Line Defenders; ProtectDefenders.eu; INDEPAZ; UNOCHA

Around 26 April 2018, in the area of Convencion, Norte de Santander a man was killed. The victim was attacked when he was driving his motorcycle in the area. There is still no confirmation of which group is responsible of his death

On 26 April 2018, in Los Laureles corregimiento, Hacari municipality, Norte de Santander department, unidentified armed men attacked a social leader and member of the ASCAMCAT (Peasants' Association of Catatumbo). The victim survived the attack. The leader had received threats from a paramilitary group. No fatalities.

On 26 April 2018, in the Decio corregimiento, in Samaniego municipality, Narino department, a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed men. He was a moto-taxi driver of the locality. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 25 April 2018, the murder of 3 people in the rural area of San Acevedo in the municipality of Zaragoza in Antioquia produced the displacement of 23 families of this area. According to the sources the AGC had been responsible. The IDPs are waiting for the state to intervene in the area.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 25 April 2018, near Tame municipality, Arauca department, a Venezuelan man was killed in the area of Puerto Jordan by members of a FARC dissident group. The victim's body was found with a letter saying that the killing was part of a process of social cleansing. 1 fatality.

On 25 April 2018, in Sombrerillos corregimiento, Mercaderes municipality, Cauca department, a female lawyer was abducted by unidentified armed men. The victim was working as a lawyer in the Tablon de Gomez municipality. There is presence of armed groups in the area. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 25 April 2018, in Pizarro, Bajo Baudo municipality, Choco department, two women were forcibly recruited by members of the ELN. One of the women was underaged. The victims whereabouts are unknown. [women targeted: girls]
On 25 April 2018, in Samaniego municipality, Narino department, a woman was shot and killed near the Villa Esperanza village. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 25 April 2018, near Samaniego municipality, Narino department, a man was shot and killed in a drive-by shooting perpetrated by unidentified armed men in the Plan de San Martin vereda. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 25 April 2018 (as reported), near Teorama municipality, Norte de Santander, members of the EPL abducted six people. In a video published days after the kidnapping, the EPL members affirm that the victims are members of the ELN. The authorities have not confirmed this information, since they reported that they have received reports of several cases of civilian disappeared in the area, which seem to be related to this abduction. The whereabouts of the victims' are unknown.
On 23 April 2018, in Villagarzon municipality, Putumayo department, an underaged man was killed by unidentified armed men. Several armed groups operate in this department. 1 fatality.

Around 22 April 2018 (between 20 - 24 April), in Candelillas vereda, Tumaco municipality, Narino department, a man was killed and his body was found on 24 April. The man had been kidnapped by unidentified armed men on 20 April. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident - Oliver Sinisterra Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Oliver Sinisterra Front)
notes: On 22 April 2018, in Tablon Dulce La Pampa vereda, Tumaco municipality, Narino department, a man was killed by members of the Oliver Sinisterra FARC dissident front. 1 fatality.

Around 22 April 2018 (as reported), in Puerto Asis municipality, Putumayo department, a man was abducted by unidentified armed men. The perpetrators asked for a ransom in exchange for his freedom. The victim was rescued by the police 6 days later. There is presence of several armed groups in the area.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 21 April 2018, a man was killed in the municipality of Caloto, Cauca. According to the sources, the perpetrator left a sign next to the deceased saying he was killed because he was committing crimes on the name of the FARC.

On 21 April 2018, in Ituango, Antioquia department, a man was shot and killed by members of the Gulf Clan. The perpetrators left a message along with the victim's body accusing him of helping the FARC Dissident 36th Front. 1 fatality.

On 21 April 2018, in Tumaco municipality, Narino department, a man was killed by unidentified armed men. The victim was the brother of a social leader that had been killed in 2017. Members of the Oliver Sinisterra FARC dissident front had threatened the victim days earlier. However, authorities have not confirmed yet if this group was the perpetrator of this attack. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction

Three men died and a woman resulted wounded as part of an attack perpetrated in the area of Quintero in the municipality of Caloto in Cauca. Unidentified men shot the victims in a public local of the municipality. According to informal sources, the perpetrators could be a local band called Los Perogollos. The event was reported on April 19th by Extra Cauca.
On 19 April 2018, in Puerto Asis municipality, Putumayo department, a woman was shot and killed by unidentified armed men. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 18 April 2018, in the La Granja corregimiento, Ituango municipality, Antioquia department, a man was shot and killed by members of the Gulf Clan. The victim was the family of two former FARC members. 1 fatality.
On 18 April 2018, near Orito municipality, Putumayo department, a bus driver was shot and killed by members of the Gulf Clan in the route between Orito and Mocoa. 1 fatality.

Around 18 April 2018 (as reported), in Obando, Guachene municipality, Cauca department, a farmer was kidnapped by 3 unidentified armed men. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 16 April 2018, in Convencion municipality, Norte de Santander, a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed men in the La Laguna sector. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 16 April 2018, in Taraza municipality, Antioquia department, a man was killed by unidentified armed men while he was at his house. During the same week in this area clashes were recorded between Los Caparros and the Gulf Clan. 1 fatality.

On 16 April 2018, in Taraza municipality, Antioquia department, two women were killed by unidentified armed men. During the same week in this area clashes were recorded between Los Caparros and the Gulf Clan. 2 fatalities.
On 15 April 2018, 4 people were killed in Taraza by unidentified attackers. The area is known for the presence of several armed groups.

On 15 April 2018, in the Puerto Claver corregimiento, El Bagre municipality, Antioquia department, an indigenous man who was member of the Zenu indigenous group, was killed by unidentified armed men. The victim was forcibly recruited by illegal armed groups and decided to desert almost a year ago. 1 fatality.
On 15 April 2018, in Saravena municipality, Arauca department, members of the ELN broke into a store and shot the people inside. One off-duty police officer was injured. No fatalities occurred.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 15 April 2018, in Puerto Betania, San Vicente del Caguan municipality, Caqueta department, three underage teenagers were recruited by a FARC dissident group. The victims' whereabouts are unknown.

source: UNOCHA; ProtectDefenders.eu; Front Line Defenders; INDEPAZ
notes: On 14 April 2018, in Popayan municipality, Cauca department, a teacher and his brother-in-law were tortured and killed by unidentified armed men. The victim was a member of the Association of Teachers and Educational Workers of Cauca (ASOINCA). 2 fatalities.
On 14 April 2018, near Puerto Guzman municipality, Putumayo department, an underaged woman was recruited by unidentified armed men. The victim's whereabouts are unknown. [women targeted: girls]

actor1: FARC Dissident - Oliver Sinisterra Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (Oliver Sinisterra Front)
notes: Around 13 April 2018 (month of), in the rural area of Tumaco municipality, Narino department, three Ecuadorian journalists were killed by members of the Oliver Sinisterra FARC dissident front. Their bodies were found in an advanced stage of decomposition in the rural area of Esmeralda. 3 fatalities.

On 13 April 2018, near Puerto Asis, Putumayo department, two men were killed by unidentified armed men. It is claimed that the victims had been forcibly recruited by an armed group. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident - 1st Front: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction (1st Front - Armando Rios)
notes: Around 13 April 2018 (month of), in Puerto Leguizamo municipality, Putumayo, four minors were forcibly recruited by FARC 1st Front dissidents. They voluntarily surrendered to the authorities three months later.

On 13 April 2018, in San Luis vereda, in the Sampues municipality, Sucre department, a man was shot and killed in a drive-by shooting by unidentified armed men. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 12 April 2018 (as reported), in El Llorente corregimiento, Tumaco municipality, Narino department, a man was shot and killed in a drive-by shooting perpetrated by two unidentified armed men. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

On 12 April 2018, in Villanueva, San Calixto municipality, Norte de Santander department, members of the ELN carried out a shoot out inside the facilities of a shelter for victims of displacement. According to the report, in the shelter were victims that had displaced from areas that are being disputed b the ELN and the EPL. No fatalities occurred.

On 12 April 2018, in Las Chircas vereda, in Ocana municipality, Norte de Santander department, a man that worked as a truck driver was shot and killed by armed members of the EPL. The killers were arrested one month later. 1 fatality.

The president of the association of fishermen of the municipality of Hobo in Huila was violently assaulted when he returned to his house from Neiva. The event occurred during the week of April 11th and according to the source the victim was repeatedly hit and his belongings were robbed. The family of the man says the event was impulse due to the investigations the man is doing about the murder of his brother, a former guerrilla fighter.

Around 11 April 2018 (as reported), in Betania corregimiento, El Tambo municipality, Cauca department, three civilians were killed and their bodies were found. There is presence of armed actors and drug trafficking groups in the area. 3 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 11 April 2018, in La Muralla vereda, Teorama municipality, Norte de Santander department, armed men that identified themselves as members of the ELN abducted a member of the Council of Communal Action of the area of La Muralla in Teorama. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 11 April 2018, near Puerto Wilches municipality, Santander department, a businessman was kidnapped in the area of Cienaga Las Guacamayas by four unidentified armed men that broke into his house. The victim is the father of the Government secretary of this municipality. He was released later on August 2, 2018 in the municipality of Morales in Bolivar.

On 10 April 2018, in Perico Negro, Villa Rica municipality, Cauca department, a man was abducted by unidentified armed men. The victim was with his partner checking his sugar cane fields. Several armed groups operate in this department. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 10 April 2018, near the Tumaco municipality, in Narino department, the Indigenous Unity of the Awa Community (UNIPA) reported the detention of one of the members of their community by military units. The young man was held prisoner for several hours and was beaten by the military forces. No fatalities occurred.

In a complaint, the indigenous reserve Chinguirito Mira, located in the municipality of Tumaco, Narino, declared that members of the military forces of Colombia broke into the houses of civilians and threatened and beat them in order to get information about armed groups. This event happened on April 9.

source: Caracol Radio; Front Line Defenders; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ; ProtectDefenders.eu
notes: On 9 April 2018, in La Italia corregimiento, San Jose del Palmar municipality, Choco department, a social leader and member of the Farmers Association was killed by members of the ELN. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 9 April 2018, in Puerto Flores, San Jose Del Guaviare municipality, Guaviare department, a community leader was shot and killed in a drive-by shooting by two unidentified armed men. The victim had been the president of the Council of Communal Action (JAC) of Cano Mosco. Also, he represented his community in the Nucleo Guacamaya, a movement for the substitution of the illicit crop in the National Comprehensive Crop Substitution Program. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 9 April 2018, in Fortul municipality, Arauca department, an underaged woman disappeared. It is claimed that she was recruited by the FARC dissident group. Her whereabouts are unknown. [women targeted: girls]

source: Front Line Defenders; Caracol Radio; ProtectDefenders.eu
notes: On 8 April 2018, in San Jose Del Palmar, Choco, a social leader of San Jose del Palmar who helped with the victims association and the dialogues between his community and the national government during 2016 and 2017 was killed. The authorities suspect the ELN as responsible for this event.

On 8 April 2018, in Pinuna Blanca, Puerto Asis municipality, Putumayo department, three men were killed by unidentified armed men. One of the victims was the brother of a well-known drug trafficker. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 3 fatalities.

On 8 April 2018, in Caceres municipality, Antioquia department, five men were shot and injured in a drive-by shooting perpetrated by unidentified armed men. The authorities are investigating if the victims were members of a criminal group since recent attacks related to internal disputes between members of the Gulf Clan have been reported in the area. No fatalities occurred.

A driver was killed by armed men in the area of Imbili la Vega in the municipality of Tumaco, Narino on April 7th. According to the sources, two armed men shot ed against the victim 3 times. Local organizations claim the crime was perpetrated by a local unidentified armed organization.
Around 7 April 2018, a collector in the municipality was murdered in neighborhood Milan of the municipality of Sahagun in Cordoba. Unidentified men shot the victim.

A motor-taxi driver was found dead in the municipality of San Pelayo in Cordoba. According to the source, the victim had disappeared from the neighborhood La Granja in Monteria on April 5th. The victim had signs of torture and no group has yet claimed the crime.
On 7 April 2018, in Sabana de San Luis vereda, Simiti municipality, Bolivar department, a man was killed by members of the Gulf Clan. In the event, two more civilians were injured. 1 fatality.

On 7 April 2018, on the road that connects El Aserrio to Bejuco, in Teorama municipality, Norte de Santander department, a man was abducted by armed members of the ELN. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

A man was found dead in the department of Cordoba. The victim was a known worker for the bullfight events of the region. His family declared that no threat existed against the victim. No group has yet claimed the crime. The event was informed on April 7th.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 6 April 2018, in Barranquilla, Atlantico department, a former FARC member was killed by an unidentified armed man in the neighborhood El Bosque. 1 fatality.

On 6 April 2018, in Monteria, Cordoba department, a man was killed by unidentified armed men in the road between the bus terminal and the round point of Mocari. In another event also in Monteria, a man was killed by unidentified armed men in the Mogambo neighborhood. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.
On 5 April 2018, in Dabeiba, Antioquia department, five armed men attacked a member of the Embera indigenous group. The victim was injured.

On 5 April 2018, in El Cacao vereda, in Convencion municipality, Norte de Santander department, a man was shot and injured by unidentified armed men. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. No fatalities occurred.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 5 April 2018 (as reported), in Corinto municipality (Cauca), a demobilized member of the FARC armed group was killed by members of the EPL and his body was found. The body had a letter that claimed he was killed because he was helping FARC dissident groups. 1 fatality.

On 5 April 2018, in Samaniego municipality, Narino department, a female teenager was shot and killed by unidentified armed men in a rural area. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality. [women targeted: girls]

An associate of the company Cootranslaboyana of the Huila department was abducted by armed men in the area of El Trebol, between Coconuco and Palera, municipality of Purace during the week of 4 April. The event was reported on April 11th for Radio Super Popayan.

assoc_actor_2: ASCAMCAT: Catatumbo's Peasant Association; Farmers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 4 April 2018, near Tibu municipality, in Norte de Santander department, a social leader and member of the ASCAMCAT was shot and killed by unidentified armed men. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: Around 4 April 2018 (as reported), in Piamonte municipality, Cauca department, a former FARC member was shot and killed by unidentified armed men. The FARC Dissident 49th Front operates in the area. 1 fatality.
Around 4 April 2018 (as reported), near Timbio municipality, Cauca department, a man was shot and killed by members of the ELN. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 4 April 2018, in Soledad, Atlantico department, a community leader was killed by unidentified armed men. The victim was part of the sports committee of the Villa del Rey Council of Communal Action (JAC). 1 fatality.

On 4 April 2018, in Aguasclaras, in Ocana municipality, Norte de Santander department, two men were shot and killed by unidentified armed men. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 2 fatalities.
On 3 April 2018, in Puerto Rico, Caqueta, the Secretary General of the Single Union of Motorcycle Workers of Colombia (SUNMCOL) was killed. The attack is believed to be motivated by revenge.

On 3 April 2018, in Barbacoas, Narino department, a man was shot and killed in a drive-by shooting perpetrated by two unidentified armed men in the neighborhood of Paso Grande. Local organizations claimed the perpetrator is an armed group in the area. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.
On 3 April 2018, in La Pesquera, Arauquita municipality, Arauca department, a worker of the Cano Limon oil field was abducted by unidentified armed men. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 3 April 2018, near Remedios municipality, Antioquia department, a former FARC member was killed by unidentified armed men. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 3 April 2018, in El Remanso vereda, Puerto Leguizamo municipality, Putumayo department, a civilian was killed and three more were injured by unidentified armed men. There is presence of FARC dissidents in the area. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
notes: On 2 April 2018, two men, that apparently participated in the kidnapping of a social leader were killed in this municipality. The crime was allegedly committed by the FARC; a letter was found on the bodies that declares its responsibility for the events. Nevertheless, the local police declare they are investigating the events and there is no certainty about the authorship.

Around 2 April 2018, two men were killed in the area of Miramontes, municipality of Tibu in Norte de Santander. According to the sources, the men were in a zone near Tres Bocas waiting for the rain to stop when armed men arrived in a car and shot them. The authorities claimed that the attack was perpetrated by the EPL. This event is part of the violent actions happening in the area of Catatumbo where the EPL and ELN are competing for the area.

Around 2 April 2018 (as reported), in the area of San Faustino corregimiento, in Cucuta municipality, Norte de Santander department, a Venezuelan man was killed and his body was found in Santa Cecilia vereda. The victim had gunshot wounds in his body, the police commander of Cucuta claimed that the victim is probably a migrant from Venezuela. The Los Rastrojos and The Gulf Clan are suspects of the killing. 1 fatality.

Around 2 April 2018 (as reported), in Teorama municipality, Norte de Santander department, four people were abducted by armed members of the ELN. The victims were released days later. No fatalities occurred.
On 1 April 2018, in the area of Pajarito, Altavista, a man was murdered by armed persons associated with Oswaldo Ocampo. His partner was found wounded in the house they shared.

On 1 April 2018, in Apartado, Antioquia, a transgender woman and leader of the Apartado Diversity Network was stabbed to death by unidentified men. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

source: Ocana la Region y El Catatumbo; UNOCHA
notes: On 1 April 2018, in Guamalito corregimiento, in El Carmen municipality, Norte de Santander department, a man was shot and killed by unidentified armed men. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

On 1 April 2018, in Campo Dos corregimiento, Tibu municipality, Norte de Santander department, a man was shot and killed by members of the ELN. Members of the community accused the victim of having links with Los Pelusos, however, the authorities have not confirmed this information. It is claimed that the motivation for the killing was the conflict between the ELN and the EPL armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 31 March 2018, in Lagunitas vereda, San Calixto, Norte de Santander, a man was kidnapped by ELN members. The victim was kidnapped while he was with his wife and daughter, and was tied and forced to go with his captors. His whereabouts are unknown.

source: ProtectDefenders.eu; Front Line Defenders; UNOCHA; INDEPAZ
notes: On 30 March 2018, in Rosas municipality, Cauca department, a social leader was killed by unidentified men on motorcycles, while leaving his house. He was a delegate of the victims before the Territorial Committee of Transitional Justice. 1 fatality.

source: UNOCHA; ProtectDefenders.eu; W Radio; Front Line Defenders; INDEPAZ
notes: On 30 March 2018, near Corinto, Cauca department, an indigenous man and active member of the Mother Earth's Liberation movement was shot and killed in a drive-by shooting by unidentified armed men. There is presence of several armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
source: INDEPAZ; ProtectDefenders.eu; UNOCHA; Front Line Defenders; El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: Around 30 March 2018 (as reported), in Mapiripan municipality, Meta, a female communal leader was killed by a FARC dissident front in Brisas de Itaviare vereda. The victim led a movement to replace illegal crops cultivations in the Brizas del Iteviare sector. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

Around 30 March 2018 (as reported), in Samaniego municipality, Narino, a man who was kidnapped by unidentified men in Chuguldi area, was killed. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
source: ProtectDefenders.eu; Front Line Defenders; INDEPAZ; El Tiempo (Colombia)
notes: On 29 March 2018, in Rincon del Indio area, Mapiripan, Meta, a female social leader was shot dead at her home by two armed men. The victim was a community leader for the Illicit Crops Substitution Program, and had been threatened by FARC dissidents operating in the area. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 28 March 2018, in San Ignacio, rural area of Puerto Rondon, an ex combatant of FARC was killed by unidentified armed men.

On 28 March 2018, in Arauca municipality, Arauca, a manager of the Municipal Public Services Company of Arauca and son of Arauca's ex governor was kidnapped by the ELN in Barrancones area. On 13 November 2018, he was freed.

On 28 March 2018, in Purace municipality, Cauca, a businessman and driver of a bus company was kidnapped by unidentified armed men in El Trebol area. Motives of the abduction are unknown. There is presence of armed groups in the area. His whereabouts are unknown.
On 28 March 2018, in Fortul municipality, Arauca, a former military officer was kidnapped in the rural area by ELN members. His whereabouts are unknown.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
source: El Tiempo (Colombia); ProtectDefenders.eu; Front Line Defenders
notes: On 27 March 2018, in La Palma, rural area of La Macarena, a social leader was killed by unidentified men, presumably FARC dissidents. Others argue that the victim was manipulating a gun and accidentally shot himself. At least 10 social leaders in La Macarena, Mapiripan, Acacias and Puerto Gaitan have been threatened and warned not to eradicate illicit crops.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 27 March 2018, in Ituango, Antioquia, a FARC ex combatant was killed by unidentified armed men who shot him six times. Leaders of the Common Alternative Revolutionary Force FARC asked the government to protect the ex combatants. 1 fatality.

On 27 March 2018, in Samaniego, Narino, a female teacher and unionist was killed by unidentified armed men. The Union of Teachers of Narino (SIMANA) and the Federation of Educators of Colombia (FECODE) condemn the assassination and thank the work she was doing to defend the rights of the teachers. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality. [women targeted: activists/human rights defenders/social leaders]

On 27 March 2018, in Tumaco municipality, Narino, a man was shot dead by unidentified men in El Tigre area. The victim was taken from urban area of Tumaco to El Tigre, where he was shot in his head. According to the report, the attack is related to extortions. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. 1 fatality.

actor1: GUP: United Guerrillas of the Pacific
notes: Around 26 March 2018 (as reported), in Tumaco municipality, Narino, a woman was killed by United Guerrillas of the Pacific. Her body was found with gunshot wounds on 27 March on the main road. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 25 March 2018, in Caceres, Antioquia, the president of the Council of Communal Action of El Rizo was killed. The victim also participated in processes of substitution of crops for illicit use in Caceres.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia); JAC: Council of Communal Action
source: UNOCHA; Analisis Urbano; Front Line Defenders; ProtectDefenders.eu; INDEPAZ
notes: On 25 March 2018, in Caucasia municipality, Antioquia, the president of the Council of Communal Action of El Rizo vereda, Caceres, and the former president of the Council of Communal Action o Cano Prieto vereda, Caceres, were killed by members of Los Caparros Gang in Jaguas vereda. One of the victims was also a leader of the Illicit Crops Substitution Program. 2 fatalities.

On 24 March 2018, in El Tambo, Cauca, the son of a former member of the Patriotic Union in the municipality of El Tambo was killed. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators, circumstances of death, or crime motivation.
On 24 March 2018, in Arauca, Arauca, two employees of the Secretary of Agriculture and Environment of that municipality were kidnapped by unidentified men. The victims were later freed.

assoc_actor_2: Former AUC: United Self-Defence Forces of Colombia
notes: On 24 March 2018, in La Dorada, Caldas, an ex combatant demobilised from the United Self-defences of Colombia AUC was killed by an unidentified man. The victim had recently coming out from jail and had received previous threats. When he was a member of the AUC, he was part of the bodyguards of the leader of Mineros Block of AUC. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 24 March 2018, in San Pablo, Narino, a businessman was kidnapped by four unidentified armed men. He was taken with his wife when they were arriving to their home. His wife was released in a remote location. The man was later released by police officers. There is presence of several armed groups in this department.

On 23 March 2018, in Caucasia, Antioquia, a 17-year-old man was killed after an unidentified man opened fire against 4 men in Santa Elena neighborhood. Other three people were injured. The attack is related to disputes between The Gulf Clan and Los Caparros, that has produced several killings of civilians in the area. 1 fatality.

Around 23 March 2018 (as reported), in Ituango municipality, Antioquia, a social leader and coca grower was killed and his body was found in Filadelfia vereda. The victim was reported missing several days ago in Puerto Valdivia municipality. Information on the attackers and motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 22 March 2018, in Riofrio municipality, Valle del Cauca, the president of Sintraserpuval labour union was attacked on the road to Tulua in a drive-by shooting perpetrated by unidentified men. He was attacked by two men that followed him on a motorcycle. The victim survived the attack.

On 21 March 2018, in Majagual municipality, Bolivar, a man was killed in a drive-by shooting perpetrated by unidentified men in La Sierpe corregimiento. The victim was previously threatened by unidentified men. Exact motives of the attack are unknow. The department is unknown for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

assoc_actor_2: Farmers (Colombia); MP: Patriotic March; JAC: Council of Communal Action
source: ProtectDefenders.eu; Front Line Defenders; El Colombiano
notes: On 20 March 2018, in Caucasia, Antioquia, a farmer and leader of a peasants organization disappeared. His body was found on 22 March 2018 in the Cauca river in Caucasia city. He was the founder of the Peasants Association of Bajo Cauca and Marcha Patriotica Movement in Antioquia, and a leader of JAC of Mesetas, rural area of Valdivia.

On 20 March 2018, in Quibdo municipality, Choco, a peasant was killed by ELN members in Wuinando corregimiento. The ELN threatened other members of the community. 80 families are members of the community. 1 fatality.

On 19 March 2018, in the department of Arauca, an ex combatant of the ELN, who was also a witness in a case of recruitment of minors by ELN, was killed. Information on the attackers is unknow. 1 fatality.

On 19 March 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, two brothers were killed by unidentified armed men. One of the victims was the son of an Afro-Colombian displaced activist that was killed. The event occurred two weeks after the brother testified in the trial for the killing. In the attack the wife of one of the victims resulted injured. 2 fatalities.

On 18 March 2018, in Santa Rosita vereda, Caucasia, Antioquia, unidentified armed men arrived to a bar and shot against a group of people, killing two of them and injuring four more. Two minors were injured. Motives of the attack are unknown. The Gulf Clan operates in the area. 2 fatalities.

actor1: FARC Dissident: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia Dissident Faction
assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
source: UNOCHA; Front Line Defenders; INDEPAZ; ProtectDefenders.eu; Blu Radio
notes: On 18 March 2018, in Quibdo, Choco, the president of the Council of Communal Action JAC was killed by unidentified armed men. He had received threats before. The groups identified by the authorities as possible perpetrators are FARC dissidents and drug trafficking gangs. 1 fatality.

On 17 March 2018, in Sucre, Cauca, a Zenu indigenous teenager was killed by unidentified armed individuals. There are no reports on the identity of the perpetrators, circumstances of death, or crime motivation.

On 17 March 2018, in Buenavista corregimiento, Barbacoas, Narino two young men, one of them who was a member of the Awa community, were taken by five unidentified armed men to the cemetery and killed with several shots to their heads. The corpses had signs of torture. 2 fatalities.

assoc_actor_2: Former FARC: Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia
notes: On 17 March 2018, in Guapi, Cauca, ELN members kidnapped an ex combatant of FARC. Motives of the abduction are unknown. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 16 March 2018, in Remedios municipality, Antioquia, hooded men entered a house and shot and killed man in Carrizales vereda. Some hours before an attack, in similar circumstances, another person was killed. The victims died in the location of the attack. The perpetrators are ELN militiamen. The Military Forces of Colombia are now controlling the area, which is near a zone for reintegration of FARC ex combatants. 2 fatalities.

On 15 March 2018, in Carrizales, rural area of Remedios, three hooded men entered a house, forced a man to go out and then they shot him. The victim died in the location of the attack. The perpetrators of the attack are ELN militiamen. The military forces of Colombia are now controlling the area, a place that is near a zone for reintegration of FARC ex combatants.

A social leader and land restitution activist disappeared in mid March after leaving his house in Riohacha in the direction to Dibulla. No group has yet claimed this event but it is believed that he was kidnapped.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 15 March 2018, in El Aserrio corregimiento, Teorama, Norte de Santander, the president of the Council of Communal Action JAC was attacked by unidentified armed men. No fatalities occurred. There is presence of the ELN and the EPL in the area.

assoc_actor_2: JAC: Council of Communal Action; Unidentified Communal Group (Colombia)
notes: On 15 March 2018, in Aracataca, Magdalena, a member of the Council of Communal Action of 2 de Febrero neighbourhood was killed in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men in Pasadizo neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. 1 fatality.

On 13 March 2018, in San Juan vereda, Marmato, Caldas, a counsellor and social leader was attacked in his house by an unidentified armed man who shot him five times. The victim escaped unharmed and said the attack could be related to his activism against of small mining and the reports he has presented on illegal mining.

On 13 March 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, a fisherman was shot dead by unidentified men in La Independencia neighbourhood. Motives of the attack are unknown. There is a significant presence of armed groups in the area. 1 fatality.
On 11 March 2018, in Segovia, Antioquia, two unidentified armed men shot at three women in a shop. There is presence of several armed groups in this department. Casualties unknown.

On 9 March 2018, in Caloto, Cauca, the former Governor of Huellas reserve and member of the Nasa community was shot in his house by unidentified men. The victim survived the attack with injuries and was taken to a hospital in Cali. Motives of the attack are unknown.

On 8 March 2018, in Tumaco, Narino, two men working for the electric company Cedenar were attacked in Union Victoria neighbourhood in a drive-by shooting conducted by unidentified men on a motorcycle. One of the victims was killed in the attack and the other survived with injuries. Motives of the attack are unknown. The area is known for the presence of armed groups. 1 fatality.

On 7 March 2018, in La Rinconada vereda, Mompos, Bolivar, a man and his daughter were killed in their house by unidentified men. According to the source, the main target of the attack was an rustler who was not in the property at the moment. There is presence of armed groups in the department. 2 fatalities.
On 6 March 2018, in Cimitarra, Santander, a farmer and member of a peasants organization was shot dead by unidentified armed men. No further information was reported.

source: INDEPAZ; Front Line Defenders; El Heraldo (Colombia); UNOCHA; ProtectDefenders.eu

source: El Espectador; ProtectDefenders.eu; Front Line Defenders
